'od srungs ral pa can gyis/ bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po gson pa lta zhig/
'od srungs gson no// dge sbyong chen po khyod kyis lhung bzed nas bsnams te byon pa tsa/ 'od srungs klu gdug pa gang gi mthus khyod kyi me khang du mar gyur pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ma ldan pa
gnas su ma ster ba de ngas brtul nas lhung bzed du bcug nas khyer te 'ongs so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'dasnyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul
zhang mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi/ bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi
nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so// de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyi bsti gnas na bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam me la yongs su spyod pa re re'i me thab gsum gsum ste/ me thab
ka me thab stong lnga brgya yod do// de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams me la yongs su spyod par 'dod na me de sngar bar ma nus so// de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams lteng rgyas 'od
srungs ral pa can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can la 'di skad ces smas so// mkhan po mkhyen par mdzod cig/ 'dir bdag cag zhugs la yongs su spyod
par 'tshal na/ zhugs de smra ra bar rngo ma thog lags so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po bdag gi zhi 'khor na gnas na de'i mthu zhi ma byung
grang snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs bal pa can/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po mkhyen
par mdzod cig/ 'di bdag gi bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam me la yongs su phrad par 'tshalan/ me ni smrar bar rngo ma thog nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi 'khor na dge sbyong
chen po bzhugs na/ de'i mthu zhig ma byung grang snyam bgyid do// 'od srungs me de sbar bar 'dod dam/ dge sbyong chen po spur du gsol// de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sos
rgyas kyi mthu dang/ lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus mi de rang nyid 'bar bar gyur to// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul
/ che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi/ bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na/ lteng rgyas 'od srubs ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi
nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so// de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams me la yongs su sprad nas me gsad par 'dod nas/ gsad par ma nus so// de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams lteng rgyas
'od srungs ral pa can gang na ba der song ste lhags nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so// mkhan po mkhyen par mdzod cig 'dir bdag cag zhugs la
yongs su spyad na/ zhugs dgum par 'tshal na/ dgum pa'i rngo ma thog lags so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po bdag gi lta 'khor
na gnas pa de'i mthu zhig ma byung glang snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'daskad ces gsal
do dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ 'dir bdag gi bram ze'i khye'u rnams zhugs la yongs su spyad nas/ zhugs dgum par 'tshal na/ dgum pa'i rngo ma tho gnas / bdag
'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi 'khor na dge sbyong chen po bzhugs na/ de'i mthu zhig ma byung grong snyam bgyid do// 'od srungs me de gsad dam/ dge sbyong chen pa dgum du gsol//
de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang/ lha rnams kyi lha'i mthusame de rang nyidesha// de nas steng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'dasnyam du sems te/
'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mdo kyi/ bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs
ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so// de nas dus gzhan zhigan lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can rang nyid me la yongs su spyod par 'dod na/ smrar bar ma nus so// de nas
lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po gnas na/ de'i mthu zhig byung bar ma gyur grang snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa
can/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol// 'dir bdag nyid zhugs la
yongs su spyod par 'tshalan smar bar rngo ma thog nas/ bdag nyid 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nyi 'khor na dge sbyong chen po bzhugs// de'i mthu zhig byung bar ma gyur grang snyam bgyid
do 'od srungs me de sbar bar 'dod dam/ dge sbyong chen po spar du gsol// de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyisongs rgyas kyi mthu dang/ lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus me de rang de 'bar
0 bar gyur to// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'disnyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin taM/ ya mtshan che mod kyi/ bdag kyang dgra bcom pa//
yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so// des dus gzhan zhig na lteng rgyas 'od srungs
ral pa can rang nyid mi la yongs su spradunas/ me de gas da par 'dod na gsad par ma nus so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te// bdag gi nye 'khoran dge sbyong
chen po gnas// de'i mthu zhig byung bar ma gyur grang snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chon po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ 'dir bdag nyid zhugs la yongs su sprad nas/ zhugs dgum par 'tshalan/ dgum par rngo ma thog lags//
bdag 'di snyam du sems te bag ga zhi 'khor na dge sbyong chen po bzhugs na/ de'i mthu zhig byung bar ma gyur grang snyam bgyid do// drang srong me de gsad dam/ dge sbyong chen pa dgum cu
gsal/ de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang/ lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus ma de rang nyidi sha'o// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs bal pa can 'di snyam du sems te/
'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mah+phu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi/ bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yan no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na/
lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so// de nas dus gzhan zhig na lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyi me khang thams cad 'bar/ rab tu 'bar
kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa de la lteng d+mas 'od srungs ral ba can 'khor dang bcas pa dang/ gzhan yang skye bo'i tshogs che na po rnams kyis bsgrims
kyang gsad ma nus so// de sa lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ga ni 'khor na dge sbyong chen pa gnas na/ de'i mthu zhig byung bar ma gyur grang snyam mo//
de nas lteng rgyas 'od srus ral pa can/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skar ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen pa mkhyen par mdzad du
gsol na dge sbyong chen po 'dir bdag gi me khang thams cad 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gnag tu gyur nas sreg par bgyid pa de la bdag 'khor dang bcas
pa dang/ gzhan yang skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bsgramasan zhugs dgum par rdo ma thog nas/ bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po bzhugs na/ de'i
mthu zhig byung bar ma gyur grang snyam bgyid do// 'od srungs me khang zhi bar bya 'am/ dge sbyong chen po zhe por mdzad du gsol/ de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mchu dang/
lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus me khang de rang nyid zhabar gyur to/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che
ba yan te/ ya mtshan che med kyi/ bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yan no sAm mo////'dul ba gzhi/// bam po gya brgyad pa// de nas
bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral ba can gyi bsti gnas kyin gasatshang tshang na bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po bzhi bo dag kha dog 'phags pas mtshan ma la bab pa na/
bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ de rnams dper na me'i phung po 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu
rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur nas srig par byed pa bzhi lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can de nyid kyi mtshan mo rgyu skar rnams la
lta ba na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan stan/ me'i phung po 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa bzhi mi thong ngo///
mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po yang me la yongs su spyod de/ 'di ltar de'i spyan sngan me'i phung po 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu
rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur nas srog bar byed pa bzhi yod do snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can nang par sngar langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas
phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ 'di'i mdang sum bdag rgyu skar rnams la lta ba na/ dag sbyong chen po'i
spyan ldan zhugs kyi phung pa 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur te sreg par byed pa bzhi mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/
dge sbyong chen po yang me la yongs su spyod de/ 'dultar de'i spyan snga na me'i phung po 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par bgyid pa//
bzhi ma ches so snyam mo// 'od srungs kyi nga me la yongs su spyad dam/ nga me la yongs su ma spyod de/ de lta mod kyi 'dir mdang sum rgyal po chen po bzhi pa dag kha dog 'phags pas
mtshan ma la bab pa na nga gang na ba der 'ongs te lhags nas/ pa'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ de rnams dper na me'i phung po 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu
'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyurags sreg par byed pa bzhi lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa yin no// degs lteng rgyas 'od srus ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar
dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi/ bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs 'al
pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang bo brgya byin kha dog 'phags pas mtshan ma la bab pa na/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der songs phananas/
bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ de dper na mi'aphung po 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur pa bzhi po de dag bas kyang ches lhag 'di/
chos 'phags la/ ches bzang ba lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ lteng rgyas 'od srus ral pa can de nyid kyi mtshan mo rgyu skar rnams la lta ban/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na
me'i phung bo chen po 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyunas sreg par byed pa zhig mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems to/ dge sbyong chen po
yang me la yongs su spyod de 'di ltar de'i mdunan me'i phung po chen po 'bar/ bar tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg ba'abyed pa zhig yod do snyam mo//
de nas lteng rgyas 'od srus ral pa can nang par sngar las te// bcom ldan 'das gangan ba derasang ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong
chen po mkhyen pa ra mdzad du gsol/ 'dir bdag mdang sum rgyu skar rnams la lha ban/ dge sbyong chen po'i spyan snga na zhugs kyi phung po 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar to/ ma
lce gcig tu gyuranas sreg par bgyid pa zhig mthong ngo/ mthong nas kyang bdag 'dasnyam du sems te/ dgosbyong chen po yang me la yongs su spyod de/ 'di ltar de'i spyan snga na me'i phung po 'bar/
rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu'abar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur nasasreg par bgyid pa zhig mchis so snyam mo// 'od srungs de me la yongs su sdod dam/ nga me la lings sum srid// de lta mod/

kyi 'dir mdangasum lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya ba'i kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la bab pa na/ nga gang na ba der 'ongs te phyin nas/ nga'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ re dper na mi'i phung po 'bar/
wA rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyuranasasreg par byed pa bzhi po de dag bas kyang ches lhagatsang/ ches 'phagasal/ ches bzang ba lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu
'dug pa yin no// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs la pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi/ bdag kyang dgra bcom
pa yanasnyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral ba can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so// de nas ma mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa kha rog 'phagA
pas mtshan mo la bab pa na/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bde song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis l mgo bos phyag byas te/ dadaper na me'i phung bzhi po de dag cha de snga ma
bzhin du sreg pa zhes bya banas/ me'i phung bo chen po lnga pa de me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar de dag bas kyang ches lhag cing/ ches 'phags la/ tshes bzang ba lta bu'i
lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs la pa can de nyid kyi mtshan mo rgyu skar rnams la lta ba na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na me'i phung po chen po 'bar/ rab6[…]
'bar zhes bya ba nas/ sreg bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i bar zhig mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang de 'dasnyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen bo yang me la yongs su spyod de/ 'di ltar de'i mdun du ma'i
phung bo chon bo zhes bya bas/ sreg par byed pa'i bar zhig yod do snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srasaral ba can nang par sngar langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin
nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te// dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ 'di'i bdag mdang sum rgyu skar rnams la lta ban/ dge sbyong chen po'i sngan snga na
zhugs kyi phung po 'bar ba zhes bya bas/ sreg par byed pa zhes pa'i bar zhig mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang bdag 'dza snyam du sems te/ dge slong chen po yang me la
yongs su spyod de/ 'di ltar de'i spyan snga na me'i phung po chen po 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lcegacig tugyuras sreg par bgyid pa zhig mchis so snyam mo// 'or/
spus cing me la yongs su sbyor dam/ nga me la yongs su ma spyod de/ de la mod kyi 'dir mdang sum ma mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa kha dag 'phags pas mtshon mo la bab pan/ nga gang na ba der
'ongs te phyin nas/ nga'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ de dper na me'i phung bo 'bar/ rab tu 'bar ba bzhi pa de dag nas/ snga ma bzhin du me'i phung po chen po lnga pa de 'bar ba nas//
me lce gtsug tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de dag bas kyang ches lhag cing/ ches 'phags la/ ches bzung ba lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu
'dug pa yin na// de nas steng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'disnyam du sems te/ 'daltar dge sbyong chen po go'u ta man rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi/ bdag
kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyashegs tshang tshing na bzhugs so// de'i tshe lteng rgyas
/ 'od srungs ral pa can gyi 'dug gnas ni mchod sbyin zhag bdun pa byed pa la bab bo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral ba can 'dasnyam du sems/ gal te ma ga d+ha' ma rnams kyis/ dge sbyong
chen po 'ad ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing/ 'di ltar mthu che ba yin par shes na/ de nyid la bya ba byed par sems kyi/ bdage lan de ltar ma yin pa'i gnas 'di yod kyis kyi ma dge sbyong chen
po zhag bdun zhig 'di nas gzhan du song yang ci ma rung snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyi sems mkhyen pas zhag bdun gzhan du bzhud do//

de'i tshe zhag bdun du lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can la rnyed pa dang bkur ste chen po byung bas/ bza' ba dang bca' ba rab tu mang po dang yang ldan/ skya bo'i tshogs chen po yang dbang du gyur to//
de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyi 'dug gnas na mchod sbyin de zhag bdun du byas zin nas 'disnyam du sems te/ 'di'i bdag la zhag bdun du rnyed pa dang bkur sta chen po byung zhing/ bza'

ba dang bca' ba rab tu mang po dang yang ldan/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang dbang du gyur gyas/ kye ma da na dge sbyong chen pa 'ongs kyang na ma rung/ bdag gis de yang de la longs spyad du gzhug go snyam
me/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyi sems mkhyen nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gang na ba der gshegs so// lteng rgyas 'od srus
ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po byonanam/ 'od srungs
'ongs so// dge sbyong chen po khyod pa'i slad du zhag bdun 'di nas gzhan du bzhud lags/ 'od srus khyod kyi 'dug gnas ni mchod sbyin zhag bdun du byed pa la babanus/ 'di snyam du gal tu ma
gad+ha'i ma rnams kyis/ dge sbyong chen po ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul chog/ 'di ltar mthu che ba yin par shes na/ de kho na la bya ba byed par sems kyi/ bdag la ni de lta ma yin pa'i gnas 'diyod
par 'gyur gyis/ kye ma dge sbyong chen po zhag bdun zhig 'di nas gzhan du song yang ci ma rung snyam sems ma yin nam/ pa'i thugs kyis khyed kyi sems shes nas zhag bdun 'di nas gzhan du
song ngo// 'on pa'i slad du 'dir byon lags/ 'od srungs khyod kyi mchod sbyin zhag bdun du byas zin nas/ 'disnyam du bdag la zhag bdun du rnyed pa dang bkur sti chen po byung zhing/ bza'
ba dang bca' ba rab tu mang po dang yang ldan/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang dbang du gyur gyis/ kye ma dge spyong chen po 'ongs kyang ci ma rung/ bdag gas de yang de la yongs su longs spyad du
gzhug go snyam sems ma yin nam/ dge sbyong chen po de lta lags so// nga'i thugs kyis khyod kyi sems shes nas nga 'ongs pa yin no// dge sbyong chen po ci bde kho nar longs spyad
0 gsal/ de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi/ bdag kyang dgra btsem pa/
yan no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na/ lteng rgyas 'od spus ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can/
gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen pa de'i slad du bdag gi 'khor du bzhugs shag dang/ bdag gis khyod la chos dang mthun pa'i 'tsho ba sbyar ro//
bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'as kyi ched du rang kho nas g.yos byas nas
bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po gdugs tshod lags shing mchis na dge sbyong chen po da de'i dus la babab
dgongs su gsol/ 'od srud pa de'i phyir seng zhig/ nga yang 'ong ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can seng nas rang po ma lon par mkhyen nas/ jalta
thugs mnyam par gzhag na/ shang 'dzam bu zhes bya ba gang gas 'dzam bu'i gling du gdags pa de las kha dog dang/ dri dang/ ro dang ldan pa'i 'dzam bu'i snye ma rnams kyis lhung bzed/
bkang nas bsnams te/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyibaste gnas gang na ba der gshegs pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byon nas gdan bshams//
pa kid la bzhugs so// de nas de'i 'og tu steng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'ongs nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'a8sa bste gnas kyagadan bshams pa nyid la/
bzhugs pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po byon nam/ 'od srungs 'ongs so// dge sbyong chen po khyed kyi lhung bzed na ci mchis/ 'dir
a 'od srungs khyod song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas ji ltar thugs mnyam par gzhagan/ shing 'dzam bu zhes bya ba gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling du gdags pa de las kha dog dang//
dri dang/ ro dang ldan pa'i 'dzam bu'i snye ma rnams kyis lhung bzed bkan gnas 'dir phyin pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs kyis/ gal te 'dod na longs spyod cig/ dge sbyor
chen po tsabade kho nar 'tshal lags so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod/
kyi[0f10 ]bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// 'dzam bu'i nyi ma ji lta bar skya ru ra'i snye ma rnams kyang de bzhin no// byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling du gshegs nas/ ma rmos ma btang
pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bras lhung bzed bkang ste bsnams nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyi bsti gnas gangan ba der gshegs te byon nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so//
de nas de'i 'og tu lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'ongs nas/ lteng rgyas 'do srus ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das bsta gnasakyagadan bshams ba nyid la bzhugs pa mthong ngo//
mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol te// dge sbyong chen po byon nam/ 'od srungs 'ongs so// dge sbyong chen po khyod kyi ltung bzed na ci mchis/ 'dir ngas 'od srungs khyod song
nas ring bo ma lon par mkhyen nas/ ji ltar thugs mnyam bar gzhag na/ byang gis ma snyan gyi gling du gshags nas/ marmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bras lhung bzed bkab
nas 'dir phyin pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs kyis/ gal te 'dod na longs spyod cig/ dge sbyong chen po mi bde kho nar 'tshal lags s// de nas lteng rgyas 'od
srungs ral pa can 'disnyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin no/ ya mtshan tsho mod kyi// bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yan nosnyam mo// de bzhin
du rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas su gshegs nas/ lha'i bdud rtsis lhung bzed bkang nas bsnams te zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng
rgyas na/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du
rang nyid kyis g.yos byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po gdugs tshod lags shing mchis na/
dge sbyong chen po de de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na babra' sham thabs mnabs/ lhung bzed dang ches gos masnams te/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs
ral pa can gyi bsti gnas gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/ gdan bshams pa 'di la bzhugs sa// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'dus bde bar bzhugs pa'i ga
nas gtsang zhing bsad pa'i bza' bas lhung bzed bkang nas phul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nga rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can las bsod snyoms bzhes nas/ phyogs gzhan
zhag tu bzhugs nas zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'dras la rgyus chu'i dgos pa zhig byung ngo// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la rgyus chu'i
dgos pa byung bar shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi smyan sngar lag pas sa la bsnun pa dang/ de nas bkod ma chen po zhig byung ste chu
bab pa de la bcom ldan 'das kyis chus chu'i bya ba mdzad do// lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can bsti gnas na chag pa na bkod ma chen po byung ste/ chu 'bab pa mthong ngo// mthong nas/
kyang 'dasnyam du sems te/ chu 'ad sngonan med na/ chu 'dod ltar gang nas babasnyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom
ldan 'das la 'daskad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag 'dir bste gnas ni 'chag pan bkod ma chen po'i chab cig mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang bdug
'disnyam du sems te/ chu 'di sngon ni ma mchis na/ da ltar chu 'di gang nas bab snyam du bgyid do// 'od srungs 'dir khyod las ngas bsod snyoms bzhes nas phyogs 'dir bzhugs te zhal
zas kyi bya ba mdzad ba na/ nga la chus chu'i dgos pa zhig byung ngo
de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis nga la rgyus chu'i dgos pa byung bar shes nas phyogs 'dir lag ba sa la bsnun/
pa las/ de nas bkod ma chen po byung ba de la ngas rgyas rgya'i bya ba mdzad de/ 'od srungs rdzong 'din lag pas brkos pa zhes bya'o// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs rol pa can 'di snyam du/
rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyi bsdu gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyem red nang du yang dag 'jogs las bzhengs nas rdzing lag pas bskos/
pa gang na bder gshegs te byon nas/ rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram gyi mtha' gcig tu na bza' chos gos rnams bzhag ste/ rdzing lag pas brkos par zhugs nas sku khrus mdzad nas//
rdzong lag pas brkos pa nas 'byung bar bzhed pa na/ shing ardzun gang na ba de logs su phyag brkyang ngo// de nas ardzuna' yal ga chen po dud par gyur te/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyas
bzung nas/ rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas byung ngo// lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can bsta gnas na 'chag pa na/ rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'graman a na'i yal ga chen po 'dud pa zhig
mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ ardzuna' yal ga 'di sngonan 'dud par ma gyur na/ aT+Tana' yalag chen po 'dir su zhig gis btud skam mo// de nas lteng rgyas
'do sus bal ba can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag 'di'i bsti gnas ni
'chag pa na/ rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'graman ardzuna' yal gache na po 'dud pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ ardzasha'i yal ga chen po 'di sngon ni 'dud par
mgyuran/ da 'dasu zhig gis btud snyam bgyid do// 'od srungs 'dir phyem red nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas rdzong lag pas bskos pa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/ rdzing lag
pas brkos pa'i 'gram rgya mtha' gcig nan bza' chos gos rnams bzhag ste/ rdzing lag pas brkos par zhugs te/ lus khrus byas nas rdzud lag pas bskos pa nas 'byung bar 'dod nas
shang ardzun 'du gang na ba de logs su lag pa brkyang ba dad de nas azha' yal ga chen po 'di 'dud par gyur te// de la nga 'jus nas rdzung lag pas brkos pa nas byung ngo// 'od/
srungs shing 'di ni ardzun lag pas bzung ba zhes bya'o// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'disnyam dusems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing methu che ba yin te/
ya mtshan che mod kyi/ bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yan no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs
se/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'dzas kyis phyag dar khrod ba'i shana'i las dag brnyes nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ nga'i phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras gang du bkru
skam mo// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgos pa shes nas/ ri brag tsag las rdo leb che la ring ba zhig blangs nas/ bcom ldan
'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'daskad cas gsal te/ khacom ldan 'das phyag dar khrod ba'i shana' ris dag 'di la bkru bar gasog
de la bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar khrod pa'i phesha nal sa rnams bkrus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ nga'i phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na' ras rnams gang du dgram
snyam pa dang/ de nas lha rnams kyidabang bo brgya byin gyi sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes nas/ brag cig las rdo leb che la ring ba zhig khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das
gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'i gna' rdzas rnams dgram du gsal/ de la bcom ldan
kyis phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'as dag bkram mo// lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can bcu gnas na 'chag pa na rdo leb che la rang ba dag mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang 'dasnyam du sems
wA te rdo leb che la range ba 'di dag sngon na medan/ rdo lab che la ring ba 'di dag da su zhig gis khrid de 'ongos snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na
[- ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'daskad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen pa mkhyen par mdzad dugasol/ 'dir bdag bsta gnas na 'chag pa na rdo leb che la ring ba dag rtsig
mthong ngo// mthong nas bdag 'di snyam du sems/ rdo leb che la ring ba 'dug sngon na ma mchis na/ rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag da su zhig gis 'tshal te mchis snyam bgyid do//
'od srungs 'dar ras phyag dar khrod pa'isha na'i rjes dag cig brnyes so// de nas nga 'di snyam du dgongs te// phyag dar khrod pa'i ngesha na'i ras grang du bkru snyam pa dang/ de nas lha rnam
kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis nga'i dgos pa shes nas ( bragacig las rdo leb che la ring ba zhig blos/ de gang na ba der 'ongs te phyin nas/ nga la 'di skad ces gsol te//
bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'i shana'i las rnams bkru bar gsal// sa de la phyag dar khrod pa 'a sha na'i ras rnams bkrus so// nga 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ngas phrug
dar khrod pa'i sha ma'i ras rnams gang du dgram snyam pa dang/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang bo brgya byan gyi sems kyis nga'i dgongs pa shes nas/ brog ga las rdo le ba che la rang ba gzhan zhig
blangs de/ dra gang na ba der 'ongs te phyin nas/ nga la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'dus 'dir phyag dar khrod pa' gna' ris rnams gral du gsol/ ngas der phyag dar
khrod pa'i sha ma'i ras rnams bkram mo// 'od srungs rdo leb che zhing range ba 'di dag na gnod sbyin gyis blangs pa zhes bya'o// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems
te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mchu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi/ bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin nosnyam mo// de nas bcom ldan
'das ste nga rgyas na/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral ba can gyi blta ginas kyin gs tshang tshing na bzhugs so// de'i tshon ran dza na chu cher thug nas bab po// de nas bcom ldan 'das chu
klung ma gang bas lhag bas khengs pa'i snying nas rdul gyis lego ba bla gab med ba la 'chag bas 'chag par mdzad do// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'disnyam du sems te/
rgyu dge sbyong chen bo de lha ra mdzes ba chu chen po brug pas khyer bar ma gyur grang/ ma la bdag gis dge sbyong chen po btsal lo snyam du bsams nas/ shing gcig pa'i gru'i nang du zhugs te/
bcom ldan 'das btsal ba na/ lteng rgyas na 'od srungs ral pa can gyis/ bcom ldan 'das chu klung ba gang bas lhag par khe ngas ba'i steng nas rdul gyis shog ba bla khab med pa chag
wAbs 'chag par mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po gsan nam/ 'od srul gsen no// dge sbyong chen po zhugs shang
kacig pa'i grur 'jug gam/ 'od srungs 'jug ge/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la das ji ltar thugs mnyam par gzhagan shang gcig pa'i gru dza lta bar chu
0 ]la 'jug pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon pa ra 'du bya ba 'du bya'o snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar thugs mnyam par gzhag na shang gcig pa'i gru ji lta bar chu la 'jug pa de
lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen pa rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu cho ga yin te/ ya mtshan che
mod kyi/ bdag kyang dgra bcom ba yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'dus kyi thugs kyis lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyi sems mkhyen nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs la/
pa na la 'di skad rjes bka' stsal to// 'od srungs khyed ni dgra bcom pa ma yin// dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin te/ dgra bcom pa'i lam
gang yin pa de pa nga ma shes sa// de nas lteng rgyas 'od sru des ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen bo go'u ta ma'i thugs kyis bdag gi sems mkhyen no snyam du rig nas/
pacom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi ringes pe thob/
pa lta na/ dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar bdag tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// 'od srungs khyod kyis 'khor la bltas sam/ dge sbyong chen po ma bltas lags so// 'od srungs
de'i phyir re zhig 'khor la ltos shog/ 'di ltar khyod lta bu'i ma grags pa dang ldan pa shes rten can rnams kyis ni 'khor la blta ba legs pa yin no// de nas
lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can rang gi bsti gnas gang yin pa der sengo ste phyin nas/ bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dgashes bar gyis shog/ bram ze'i khye'u dge kho
bo ni dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyanan/ shes ldan dag tu byed/ mkhan po bdag cag gis cung zad mi 'tshal ba de thams cad namakhan po la brten nas lags pas/
gal te mkhan po dge sbyong chen po'i lan sngar tshangs par gyur pa sngar na/ bdag cag kyang mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung ngo// bram ze'i khye'u dag khyed kyis de'i phyir ga yang
gzhi dang/ shing shun dang/ 'khar ba dang/ ril ba s+sablugs dang/ blugs ga zer 'di rig chu klung ni ra dzana' nang du bor nag/ mkhan po bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bram ze'i khye'u de
rnams kyis g.yang gzhi dang/ shing shun dang/ 'khar ba dang/ ril bu sbya blugs dang/ blugs gzar rnams chu klung ni ra dzana'anang du bor nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs la pa
can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can la 'di skad cos smras so// mkhan bo 'di ltar bdag cagags bgyi ba gang lags pa de bgyis lags M se// sa/
lteng rgyas 'od srungs thal pa can 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'das gdan ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po bdag gis 'khor la bltas
lags te/ bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob ba lhan/ bdag gi sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par
spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// 'od srungs tshur shog tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig/ de nyid kyis tshe dang ldan pa de dag rab tu byung ba dang/ des bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang des dge slong gi dngos
par gyur to// de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyi spun chu klung 'od srungs dang/ ga ya 'od srungs gnas 'khor sabargya lnga bcu dang/ chu klungan ra dzana' 'jug gi 'gram gyi
bas gnas na dka' thub spyod do// chu klung 'od srungs dang/ ga ya 'od srungs spyan gyis g.yang gzhi dang/ shing shun dang/ 'khar ba dang ril ba spyi blugs dang/ blugs
ga zer de dag chu klung ne ra dzan nas khyer ba mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gi tshangs pa tshungs par spyod pa rnams rgyal po'am/ chom rkun
nam mi 'am/ chus nyes dmigs 'ga' zhig byung bar ma gyur grod/ ma la bdag cag gis tshes ba mtshungs par spyod pa rnams btsal lo snyam mo// de nas chu klung 'od srungs dang/
ga ya 'od srungs skrun dag lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral ba can tshol zhing/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyi bsti gnas gang na ba der dong ba dang/ de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa
lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can skya snyam sbyarab gasonas/ 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'dus kyi san snga na chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod de// chu klung 'od srungs dang/ ga ya 'od srungs

spyan gyis lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa nas bya snam sbyar bgos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngan chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srungs/
la ba can la 'daskad ces smras so//'od srungs la ba can 'di ni mgal la/ de mchog ma lanam/ 'od srungs dag 'di ni mchog yin te/ den ma yin no// de nas chu klung 'od srungs dang/ ga ya 'od du

spun dag 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chog ma yazhi pa ma yin zhing/ chos ba da pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/ gang gas pa'i da ltar lteng rgyas 'od srubs ral pa can sa nas lo ba
nishu lcag khron pa rgas 'khogs gtugs ba/ ma ga d+ha' ma rnams kyis bkur snyabyas/ blamar byas/ rjed par byas/ mchod par byas shang/ dgra bcom par bkur ba de
bangalan gnas kyi bar du dge sbyong chen bo'i spyan sngararab tu 'byungabar khas blangs kyis/ ma la bdag cag kyang dge sbyong chen po'ispyan sngaratshangs bar spyod pa spyad pa 'a bya'o snyam du bsam
0 sa bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos kho
thob pa lta na/ bdag cag dge sbyong chen po'asnga na sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// khyed kyis 'khor la bltas sam/ dog sbyong chen bo ma bltas lags so// 'od srus
dag de'i phyir zhig 'khor la ltos shagi 'oltar khyed lta bu'i mi grags ba dang ldan pa shes nyen can dag gis ni 'khor la blta ba legs ba yanino// de nas chu klung 'od srungs dang/
ga ya 'od srungs skrun rang gi bsti gnas gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bram ze'i khye'u rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u dag shes par gyis shig/ kho bo nas ni
dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod na/ shes ldan dag 'byid/ mkhan bo dag bdag cag cung zad bya 'tshal ba de thams cad ni mkhan po dag la brten nas lags kyis/
gal de mkhan po dag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs bar spyod pa spyad na/ bdagacig kyang mkhan padag rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung ngo// bram ze'i khye'u dag de'i dus da yin
bar shes par gyis shig/ de nas chu klung 'od srungs dang/ ga ya 'od srungs spun gnyis 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu dag/ bcom ldan 'das gangan ba der song ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan
'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po bdag cag gas 'khor la bltas lags te/ dge sbyong chen po bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba
la rab tu 'byung ba dang/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dengos bo thob ba lta na/ bdag cag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod par spyad par bgyi'o// 'od srungs dag tshur shog
tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig/ de nyid kyis tshe dang ldan ba de rnams rab tu byung ba dang/ des bsnyen par rdzogs ba dang/ des dge slong gi dngos par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan das kyis
ral pa can stong po de rab tu phyung/ bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas/ lteng rgyas su dzatsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas/ ga sa gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/ rim gyis rgyu zhing
gshegs pa na ga yar byon nas/ ga ya na ga ya'i mgo'i mchod rtenan sngon gyi ral pa can thams cad rab tu byung ba'i dge slong stong dang nang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis dge slong stong po de la/ rdzu 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyis 'doms par mdzad de/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang/ kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul dang/ rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul lo//
de la bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul 'di yin te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyisajoltar thugs mnyam par gzhagan/ tir kyi gdan gyi nang du ma snang bar gyur thang/ sher
phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas/ srod lam rnam pa bzhi mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ 'chag pa dang/ bzhengs pa dang/ bzhugs pa dang/ mnal ba mdzad do//
mi'i teng nge 'dzin la yang snyems pa ru 'jug par mdzad de/ me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od gzer rnam pa sna tshogs
dag 'byon par mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po dang/ le brgan dang/ shel gyi kha dog go/ cho 'phrul zung du yang ston par
mdzad de/ sku'i smad nas 'bar bar mdzad la/ sku'i so danas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'babs par mdzad do// sku'i stod nas 'bar bar mdzad la/ sku'i smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun/
'bebs par mdzad pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom par zhugs s// shar phyogs ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang/ nub dang/ byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no// phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi
cho'aphrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa rnams bsdus te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te/ de la 'di ni bcom
ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul yin no// de la bcom ldan 'das kyi kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul na'adi yin to/ dge slong dag khyed kyi sems ni 'di lta bu 'o// khyed kyi yade rna'adi
lta bu 'o// rnam par shes pa ni 'di lta bu 'o// lhaphul// 'di ni rtogs shag 'dan ma rtogs ga/ 'di ni 'di la byos shig/ 'di ni yar la ma byed cig/ rnam
'di ni ngas shig/ 'din ma sbyangs shig/ 'dun lus kyis mngon sum du byas la rdzogs pa ragyis te mnosashag 'danobcom ldan 'dus kyi kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul pa'i
no de la bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul ni 'di yin te/ dge slong dag 'di thams cad ni kun tu 'bar ba yin no// dge slong dag thams cad kun tu 'bar ba de ci
lan zhe na/ dge slong dag mag dang/ gzugs dang/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dang/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa' kun tu 'bar ba yin zhing/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
nang gi tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa byung ba gang yin pa de yang kun tu 'bar ba yang no// dge slong dag rna ba dang/
rtswa dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yadi dang/ ches dang/ padi kyi rnam bar shes ba dang/ yad kyi 'dus te reg par kun tu 'bar ba yin zhange/ yide sku 'dus te reg pa'i skyon
gyis nang gi tsho ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bde ba yang ma ban/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa 'byung ba gang yan pa de yang kun tu 'bar ba yin no/ gang gis na
0 tu 'bar zhen/ 'dod chags kyi me dang/ zhe sdang gi me dad gti mug gi mes kun tu 'bar/ skye ba dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ sbe sngags
'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid ma bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa ste/ sdug bsngal gyis kun tu 'bar ba'i zhes su'o// de la 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rjesasu bstan pa'i cho
'phrul yin no// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ishad ba na/ sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong de len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/
rekas bcom ldan 'das ga ya na ga ya'i mgo'i mchod rten la sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur ba'i dge slong thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa phyag
pa khur bor ba/ rang gi don rjes su thob pa/ sridi pa kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhug
rgyal bo gzugs can Ari bo'i zho shas 'tsho ba'i ma rnams ljongs rgyu ba na/ shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i bsti
gnas dang ha cang yang ma ring ba zhagi chu byung ba de bram ze mtshan mkhan dang/ ltas mkhan rnams kyis gal te khyim par gyur te khyiman gnas niani/ 'khor losasgyur ba'i rgyal ba chos
dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba'i rin po che sna bdun dang par gyur/ de'i rin po che sna bdun na 'di lta bu dag yan par 'gyur ro// 'di
lta// 'khor lo rin po che dang gling ba rin po cho dang 2 rta rin po che dang/ nor bu rin po che dang/ bud med rin po che dar/ khyim bdag rin po che dang/ bdun pa blon po rin po
yin no// de la bu stong yang tshang bar 'byung bar 'gyurati dba' bra/ rtul bod la/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan ba/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'jom pa/ de rgyalatshol
thug pa'i sa chen bo ma lus pa ra gnod par sde ba med myong/ 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med pa'i mtshon gyis 'dul ba med la/ chos dang mthun zhing nyams pas legs par phab/
gnas par 'gyur ro// gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smag bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med pa ra rab tu byung bar gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs la
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs ba'i sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags pa ra 'gyur bar lung bstan to zhes thos so// thos nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs
pa'i can snying po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal ba bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la 'di skad ces smras so// lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag cag 'di'i lha'i

bul na rgyu ba na/ shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i bas gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu byung ba de bram ze mtshan mkhan dang//
ltas mkhan rnams kyis gal te khyim bar gyur te khyim na gnas na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal bo mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba nas/ bdun pa blon bo rin po cher 'gyur ro zhes
bya ba'i bar du'o// de la bu stong yang tshad bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas/ chos dang mthun zhing snyoms par legs pa ra bag thab ste gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'bar gong ma bzhi'i
ru'o// gal te sgra dang kha spu bregs te gos dur gi bgesanas zhes bya bzhas/ 'jig rten du sku rnam par grags par 'gyur bar lung bstan pa zhig thes sa zhes bya ba 'i bar gong ma bzhin
du'o lha de khul zhig/ lha khas gtso bo bas ches gtso bor 'gyur du mtshan/ grong ba dag shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'grim drang srong ser
skya'i bsti gnas dar ha cang yang ma rade ba zhig tu byung ba zhes bya ba'i bar gongo ma bzhin du ste/ gal te khyam par gyur te khyiman gnas ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal bo zhes bya ba sa ga
dang mthun zhing snyoms par legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gadom bzhin du'o// gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te gos dur smrig bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag
ba kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'ag rten du sbya rnam par
grags par 'gyur pa de lha khum zhig/ lha bas gtso bo bas ches gtso bor 'gyur du mchi'o zhes khyed cag de skad ma smra zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ grong ba dag shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu zhes
bya ba nas/ byung ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ gal te 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur na de'i g.yog bya'o// gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te ngurasag bgos nas/ dad pa
yang dag ba kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du sku rnam par grags par gyur na/ de'i/
nyan thos su khas blang bar bya'o// de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal bo bzo sbyangs gzugs can/nga po steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi la 'dug nas/ smon pa'i gzhi lnga skyen par byed de/ kye ma bdag gi
yul du 'jig rten gyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu
'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba dang/ de la long blta ba'i phyir bdag nye bar 'gro ba dang/ rna bar song ba na des
kyang bdag la chos bshad pa dang/ bdag gis kyang ches bshad pa de shes pa dang/ bdag gis chos shes nas bslab pa khas shing/ bslab pa de yang bdag gis byas te gnas kyang ma
rur snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag ma gad+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can Ang pa de steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi
la 'dug nas/ smon pa'i gzhi lnga smon par byed/ kye ma'o bdag gi yul du 'jig rten gyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs bdagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zha3
su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen ba/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyurab/ bla na med pa/ lha dang ma rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'byung
bdang/ de la yang blta ba'i phyi'i bdag nye bar 'gro ba dang/ tre bar song ban des kyang bdag la chos bshad pa dang/ badrag gis kyang chos bshad pa de shes ba dang/ bdag gis chos
shesazhas bslab pa bcas shang/ bslab ba de yang bgags blas te gas kyang phyi ma rung snyam mo// ma ga d+ha'i rgyal bo bzo sbyangs gzugs can ri po'i zho shas 'tsho ba dag/
cig ljongs rgyu ba na/ shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srongoser skya'i bas gnas dang ha cang ma ring ba zhig tu byung ba gang yin pa de bram
zemtshan makhon dang/ ltas mkhan zhes bya ba nas/ 'jig rten du sku rnam par gragasabar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//
de sgra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smag bgos nas// dad pa la dadag ba kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
par sangs rgyas nas/ de ga la ne ga ya'i mge'i mchod rten la ston thams cad ral pa can du gyur ba'adege slong stong thams cad kyang dgra bcomapa/ zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/
byed pa byas pa// khur bor ba/ bdag gis don rjes su thob ba/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang
thabs cig tu bzhugs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang m ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po gang na der dong ste lhags nas mag d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs
can sAng po la 'di skad ces smras so// lu mkhyen par mdzad du gsal/ bdago chag 'di na lha'i yul na rgyu ban/ shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gang lags pa de zhes bya ba nas/
'jig rten du sgyu rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de sku dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smig bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag pa khe nas khyim nas i
0med par rab tu byung ba de bla na med pa lang dag par rdzogs ba'i byang chub ma ngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ dag ya na ga ya ri mgo'i mchod rten la sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur
ba'i dge slong thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag ba zadu ba zhes bya ba nas/ mngadag pa 'api shes bas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so tshis bya ba'i
duste/ lta de la bkuras mdzod cig dang/ de ltan lha gtso bo bas ches gtso bor 'gyur ro// de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ba zegangs gzugasacan 'di pas ma zhig la bsgo ba/
kwa yi nang rje tshur khyed bcom ldan 'das gangan ba der sar la/ seng nas kho bo'i tshig 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas la// gnod pa chung
ngag nyam nga ba chung ngam/ 'tsho 'am/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang/ bde ba dang/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ reg par spyod dam zhes zhus la/ 'di skad ces/
kyang gsol cig/ bdag bcom ldan 'dras dge slong ga dge 'dun dang thabs cig la sudi 'tsho'i bar du zhabaza' chos gos dang/ ba sod snyoms dang/ gzims chadang/ snyan
dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang/ yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs su gsol zhes gsol cig/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi
des ma ga d+ha'i rgyal bo bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying bo la samanyan nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das la/ mdis 'daskad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la ma ga d+ha'i rgyal bo
bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying bo mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam ngag nyung ngam zhes bya ba nas/ rig pa la spyod dam zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste lhun gsal
lags so// kyi ma khyed dang/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal bo bzo sbyangs gzugs can sAde po bdabar gyur cig/ btsun pa ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs tsan snying pa'i mchid nas
'di skad ces/ bdag bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cag la/ sridi 'tsho'i bar du na ba za'i chos gos dar 'khasod sems dang gzams ma dang
snyan dpyad kyi rkyen smanang/ yon
rnams kyis bse'ar ku brgyadesha/ban+domaldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs su gsol zhes ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis ma di la cang ma gsung bas gnang ngo// de nas
nas bcom ldan 'das sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa zhes bya ba nas/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin
rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i bar sha stag dang thabs gtsa tu ma ga d+ha'iljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ yul ma ga d+ha pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas khyung brang ga tshal na
mid pa gang na ba der gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das legs pa ra rab gnas su byon nas/ ma ga d+ha pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas ltang brang ga tshalan yod ban
bzhugs so// ma ga d+ha'argyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das ston thams cad ral ba can du gyurapa'i dge slong stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po zhes bya ba nas
sems shin tu rnam bar grol ba zhes bya ba'i ba ri du skye ma ga d+ha'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ ma ga drwa ba rnams kyi mtshod rten legs bar rab gnas ltad brang ga tshal na yod pa
gang bder gshegs te/ tshag rna ba rnams kyi chod rten legs par rab gnas ltang brang gi tshalan yod pa na bzhugs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang shing rta'i nang du zhugs te/
'khor brgya phraganu ba dang rgyal po'i khab nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi sha sngar song ba na/ de'i shing rta'i lo
la sa'anang du byang bar gyur to// des bsams pa// bdag gis las skyon can nyung zad byas par ma gyur grang snyam mo// lha rnams kyis de la smras pa/
rgyal po chen po khyod kyis las skyon ma byas mod kyi/ khyed dang lhan cig las mtshungs par spyad pa gang yin pa de dag btson ran 'dug gas/ de dgu thon cig/ rgyal pes nas pags
gal te de lhan gdon no zhes rgyal pos btsun rnams 'don du bcug go/ yang rgyal po phyir 'byung bar brtsams pa na/ de'i dbu rgyan sgo la thug go/ des yang bsams pa/ bdag
gas na gdon mi za bar las skyon can zhag byas te/ des bdag la ltas ngan pa gzhan sgo la dbu rgyanajug pa 'di byung ngo snyam mo// lhade rnams kyis yang snas ba/ rgyal po chen
ba khyed kyis las skyen can ma byas mod kyi/ khyod dang lhan cig las mtshungs par sbyad pa gang yin pa de dag kha cig na 'dus/ kha cig na yul ljongs gzhan ga gi me zhes bya ba dag na
las kyi mtha' byed cing 'dug pa dro dag sbren cig/ rgyal bos yul de na gnas pa 'gyo bo'i tshogs thams cad bkug go/ de nas rgyal bo gzugs can snying bo shang rta khra zhes
stong dang/ zha 'bring pa rta pa'i tshogs khri rgyan stod dang/ ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang khyim bdag brgyud stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste/ bcom ldan
'dus la ba lta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ngo// de tsal bzhon pa 'a sa'i bar du bzhon pas song ste// bzhon ba las thabs nas rkang pa
kho nas kun dga' ba zhugs so// ma ga d+ha'i rgyal bo bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos thag ci tsam nas/ bcom ldan 'das mthong ba'i bar de nas rgyal bo'i mtshan la lnga
bo ze'u kha dad/ gdugs dang/ ral gri dang/ nor bu'i rngalab dang/ lham khra bo rnams phud do// 'dul ba gzhi/
bam po gya dgu pa// de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal bo bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos rgyal po'i mtshan ma lta bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ blo
gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mesbyor ba btud de rang gi ming nas phyung ste lan gsum du gsol ba/ btsun pa bdag ni ma ga d+ha'i rgyal
bo bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po lags so// btsun pa bdagan ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugasanyen snying po lags so// rgyal po lags so// rgyal pa chon
bo de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// rgyal po chen bo khyod ma ga d+ha'i rgyal bo bzo sbyangs gzugs can sAng po yin no// rgyal po chan bo khyod ma ga d+har rgyal bo bzo sbyangs ga
@#// can song yin no// rgyal ba yin no// rgyal pochen bar ng gi stan ji lta ba la 'dug cig/ de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can sang bas/
bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ mag d+ha'i bram ze dang khyim bdag kha cig gisan/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// kha tsagan bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag bar dga' ba dang/ yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa
spyi A tshogs byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khed de// kha cig na bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te 'khod do// kha cig bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring pa nas mthong zhas/
cangams bar phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan ba lteng rgyas 'od srungs 'khor de nyid du 'dus yang 'dug par gyur to// de nas ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams
'dasnyam dusems te/ ci dge sbyong chen po lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyi tshangs par spyod pa la spyod dam/ 'on te lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can dge sbyong chen po'i tshangs par
spyod ba la spyod snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi sems mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srungs la tshigs su
bcud pa'i dbyangs kyis dri ba rnas pa// lteng rgyas gnas pa khyod 'di'i bya mthong na// me spangs nas ni brtul zhugs 'di dag spyod// khyod kyis ci ltar me la mchod spangs pa//
na da 'od srungs nga la sa bar rgyus// zheng rgyas 'od srungs kyis gsol pa/ 'dan kha cig zas skom de bzhin re// 'dod pa dag dang khyod med kho na su// de dag thabs kyi dri mar ba
mthong ste/ de bdag mchod sbyin ma dga' sreg blugs mni// khyod ni 'dod dang bza' dang btung ba dang// de bzhin ro la yidi na mo rig 'a na// lha ma 'jig rten la tsa khyod kyi yod//
dga' ba la'i rnam 'od srungs dri yis snyes// phung po la mchis zhe ba ci ma mchis// 'dod sridi ma chags gzhan du 'gyur ma mchis// gzhan gyis ma bkra'i go 'phang mchog
mthong ste// des bdag mchod sbyin mi dga' sreg blugs tshani// go 'phang ma nyams mchog du ma mthong bas (mchod spyi'i brtul zhugs dang na zhugs dag gis// grolo snyam
bdag ga la de na rmongs gyur te/ dmus long gyur na so skye shi rjes bzhin 'theb// skyob pa gtso bo mchog gros legs bsha da nga// go 'phang 'dus ma byas te bzed mthong na/ 'ab
ba go'u tam rnam ba ra'adren khyod na// skye bo phal chen don brtson bden la zhugs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// khyod kyis rtogs pa legs rtogs te// khyod kyis
[rri]@#// zhes par bsam ma yin// rab tu phye ba'i chos rnams la// gtso bo gang yin de blangs so// 'od srungs 'khor skyo ba skyed cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas
'od srungs bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phyin s/ ji ltar sems mnyam par gzhag na/ rang gi stan gyi nang du ma snang bar gyuratsang/ shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags
nas spyod lam rnam pa bzhi byed de/ 'di lta ste// 'chag pa dang/ 'greng ba dang/ 'dug pa dang/ nyal ba byed do// mi'i hIng nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug par byed de/
me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ban/ tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srungs kyi lus las 'od gzer rnam pa sna tshogs 'byin par byed de/ 'di lta ste// ston pa dang/ ser
po dang/ dmar pa dang/ dkar bo dang/ la brgan dang/ shel gyi kha dog dag go/ ngo 'phrul zung du yang ston pa 'a byed de/ lus kyi sad nas 'bar bar byed la/ lus kyi
stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'babs par byed do// lus kyi stod na 'bar bar byed la/ lus kyi smadunaso chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs bar byed ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
sa shar phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang/ nub dang/ byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no// phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas/ rdzu 'phrul mngon
bar 'du bya ba dag bsdus te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi ston pa lags go/ bdag ni rtsom ldan 'das kyanAn thos lags so// bcom ldan 'dasan bdag ga ston
pa lags so// ston pa lags so// bdag na bcom ldan 'dus kyi nyan thos lags so// 'od srungs de de bzhin no/ de de bzhinate/ 'od srungs nga na khyod kyiston pa yin no//
khyodazhari'anyan thos las// 'od srungs pa na khyod kyi ston pa la no// khyod ni nga'i nyan thos yin no// 'od srungs khyed rang gi snyan ji lta ba la 'dug cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa steng
rgyas 'od srungs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gtus la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas ma ga d+ma'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'di snyam du sems te/
dge sbyong chen po ni lung rgyas 'od srungs la pa can gyi tshangs bar spyod ba la ma spyod kyi/ lteng rgyas 'dasrungs ral pa can nyid dge sbyong chen po'i tshongs par spyod pa la spyod dogs
ma denas bcom lam 'das kyis/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal bo bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying bo la bka' stsol ba/ rgyal bon nabo gzugs laskye ba yang yod/ 'jig pa
@#// yang yod de/ de'i skye ba dang 'jig ba yang rig par bya'o// rgyal po chen po tshorab dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa la skye ba lang
yod 'jig pa yang yod de/de'askye ba dang 'jig pa yang rig par bya'o// rgyal bo chen po rigs kyi bus gzugs kyi skye ba dang 'jig ba'i chos nyid rig nas/ gzugs de yod/
su shes so// rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa'i skya ba dang 'jig pa'i chos 'di rig nas/ rnam par shes pa
de yongs su shes so// rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus gzugs yongs su shes na/ gzugs la bdag gam bdag gir khas ma len/ ma 'dzin/ lhag par ma gnas/
mngon par zhen par ma byed do// rgyal bon po rigs kyi busatshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa yongs su shes nA/ bdag gam bdag gar
khas ma yin/ ma ni/ lhag bar ma gnas/ mngon par zhen par ma byed do// rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus gzugs la bdag gam bdag gir khas ma yin/ ma 'ag
lhag par ma gnas/ mngon par zhen par ma byed na/ tshad med cing grangs med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yin nozhes sla'o// rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bu tshor ba dang/ 'du
shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa la bdag gam bdag gce khas ma len/ ma'idzin/ lhag par ma gnas/ mngon par zhen par ma byed na/ tshad med cing grus
med pa'i mya ngan las 'das ba yin no zhes smaro// de nas ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te gzugs bdag ma yin/ tshor ba dang/ 'dus
dang 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa bdag ma yanin/ 'o na bdag sems can nam/ srog gam/ skye ba po 'am gso ba bo'am/ gang zag gam/ shid las skyes
sam shed bu'am/ byed pa bo ma/ byed du'ajug ba bo'am/ shes ba bo 'am/ kun nas shes pa po 'am/ slong ba po'am/ kun nas slong ba bo 'am/ stsa ba bo/
'am tshor ba po 'am/ kun nas tshor ba po gang yin bzham yang ma byung/ 'byung bar ma 'gyur zhing/ da lta yang yod pa ma yanan/ gang gas de dang der dge ba dang sdug pa'i las
byas ba rnams kyi rnam par sman pa so sor nyams su myong zhing/ gang gis phung bo 'di bor ti/ phung bo gzhan dang rkang mtshams sbyor ba de su zhig yin pa ra 'gyur snyam mo// des
bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis mi ga d+ha'abram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyisims mkhyenanas/ dge slong rnams 'khaka' tshul la/ dge slong bdag 'bar ces bya ba ni byis pa gso/
skye bo sbos dang ma ldan pas brtags pa'i rjes su lhung ba yin te/ 'dalabadage 'am bdag gamed kyi/ dge slong dag skye ba na sdug bsngal 'ad skye zhing/ 'gag
ba na yang sdug bsngal 'gag go/ skye ba na 'du byed rnams skye zhing// 'gag pa na 'du byed rnams 'gag bar 'gyur te/ rgyu de dang rkyen de la brten nas sems can rnams kyi 'du byed
kyi rgyud 'jug go/ dge slong drag de bzhin gshegs pas 'du byed kyi rgyud kang mtshams sbyor ba thugs su chud nas sems can gyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba 'dogs par mdzad de/ dge slong dag ngas
lha'i spyan rnam par dag ba ma'i las 'das pas sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang/ skye ba dang/ kha dog bzang bo dang/ kha dog dran pa dang/ dman pa dang/ gya nom pa dang/
bde 'gro dang/ ngan 'gror 'gro ba yang gzigs so// las ji lta ba bzhin nye bar 'gro ba'i sems can rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tuakhyen te/ sems can 'di dag ni lus
kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/ ngag dang yid kyanyis par spyod pa dang ldan/ 'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa dang log par lta ba yin te/ log par lta ba'i las dang chos blangs
pa'i rgyus/ rgyu de dang rkyen des lus zhig nas shi be'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung bsems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// sems can 'di dganalus kyi
legs par spyod pa dang ldan/ ngag dang yid kyi legasaba'aspyod pa dang ldan/ 'phags pa rnams la skur ba ma 'debs pa dang la nga dag par lta ba yin te/ yang dag par lta ba'i las dang chos
blas pa'i rgyus/ rgyud dang rkyen des lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha rnams suskye bar 'gyur ro zhes byabar mkhyen no// dge slong dag ngas de ltar makhyen cing/ de ltar
gzigs bas/ ngo 'di skad ces bdag gam ( sems can nam/ srog gam/ skye ba po 'og/ gso ba po 'am/ gang zag gam/ shed las skyes sam shed bu
'am byed pa bo 'am/ byed du 'jug pa bo 'am/ shes ba bo 'am/ kun nas shis ba po 'am/ slong ba bo 'am/ kun nas slong ba bo 'am/ smra ba po 'am/ tshor
ba bo 'am/ kun nas tshor ba po gang yin pa ni nam yang ma byung/ 'byung bar ma 'gyur zhing/ daltar yang yod pa ma yin pas/ gang gis de dang der dge ba dang sdig pa'i las
byas pa'i las kyi rnam bar nub so sor nyams su myong zhing/ gAng gis phung po 'dabor tI phung po gzhan dang nying mtshams sbyor ba de chos su brdar btags pa ma gtogs ba 'di lo'i
no zhes ma gsung ngo// de la chos kyi brdar btags pa ni 'di yin te// 'di lta ste// 'di yod pas 'di yod/ 'di skyes pas 'di skye ba ste// 'di lta ste/ ma rig ba'i skyen gyis 'du byed/ 'du
'byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam bar shes pa// rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ma dang gzugs/ mdang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug// skye mched drug gi rkyen/
gyis reg pa/ rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid ba/ sride ba'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis
sha ding/ mya ngan dang/ skye ngags 'don dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yade ma bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams byung ste/ de ltar na sdug bsngalargyaphung po chen po 'ba' zhig bo 'di 'gyur/
bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ 'di med pas 'di med la 'ad 'gags pas 'di 'gag par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste// ma rig pa 'gags bas/ 'du byed 'gag/ 'du byed
'gabs sa/ rnam par shes ba 'gag/ rnam par shes ba 'gags su mang dang gzugs 'gag/ mi dang gzugs 'gags bas/ skye mched drug 'gags//
skye mched drug 'gags pas/ reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gags pas/ tshor ba 'gag/ tshor ba 'gags pas/ srid ba 'gag/ sred pa 'gags pas/ len pa 'gag
lin ba 'gags pas/ sudi ba 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas/ skye ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gags pas/ rga shi dang/ mya ngan dang se sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal
bdang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams 'gag ste/ de lta na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba'azhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro// dge slong dag 'du byed rnams ni sdug
bsngal lo// mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o// rgyu kun 'byung bas sdug bsngal kun 'byung zhing/ rgyu 'gags pas sdug bsngal 'gag ste/ rgyun bcud bas ma 'byung zhing/
nga mtshams sbyor ba med par 'gags pa 'ditad nasdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no// dge slong dag de la lengasaMsu mya ngan las 'das pa gang zhe na/ gzhan med kyi sdug bsngal 'gags
ba gang yin pa de ni lta bar zhi ba/ de na bsal bar gyurapa/ de nanubapa ste/ dge slong dag zhu ba'a gnas 'di yin te/ 'di ltaste/ phung po thams cad sangs pa/ sred pa zad pa/
'dod chags dang bral ba/ 'gags ba mya ngan las 'das ba lan no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang ma ga d+ha'i rgyal bo bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying bo la lan gnyis su bka'
la po chen po ji snyam du sems/ gzugs rtag gam ma rnag/ btsun pa 'di tsho rtag lags se martag ba gang yin pa de sdug bsngal lan nam/ sdug bsngal ma 'dan/
btsun pa 'di'i sdug bsngal lags so// mi rtag pa sdug bsngal ba 'gyur ba'i chos can gang lan pade la ca ga 'phags ba nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'di ni bdag ban no// bdag ni'i ri
'di yin no// 'dazheb dgag bdag go zhes bdag tu khas len par byed dam/ btsun pa ma lags so// rgyal po chen po rjesnyam du sems/ tshor ba dang/
'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa rtag gam mi rtag/ btsun pa 'di ni mi rtag lags so// mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal lan nam/ sdug bsngal ma yin/
btsun pa 'di ni sdug bsngal lags so// mi rtag pa sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba'i chos can gang yin pa de la tsag 'phags pa'i nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'dani bdag yin no// bdag ni 'di
pano// 'di'i bdag gi bdag go zhes bdag tu khas len par byed dam/ btsun pa 'a lags so// rgyal po chon pede lta bas na khyod kyis gzugs gang yin pa su yang rung/ 'das pa
'am ma 'ongs pa 'an/ da ltar byung ba 'am nang gi 'am/ 'i 'am/ rags pa 'am/ phra ba ma/ ngan pa 'am/ gya nom pa 'am gang dag cag range ba 'am/
gang dag thag nye ba yang rung ste/ de thams cad la 'di ni bdag ma yin no// bdag ni 'dam yin no// 'di ni bdag gi bdag ma yin no zhes de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta
ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o// rgyal po chon pa de lta bas na khyed kyis tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed gang ci yang rung ba dang/ rnam par shes ba gang tsayang rung 'as pa
'am ma 'ongs pa 'am/ da ltar byung ba 'am/ nang ga 'am/ phyi'i nam rnags pa 'am/ phra ba 'am/ nganab 'am/ gya nom pa 'am/ gang dag thag ring ba 'am/
gang dag thag zhe bar yang rung ste// de dag thams cad la 'di'i bdag ma yin no// bdag na 'di ma yin no// 'di bdagag bdag ma yin no zhes de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta
ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o// rgyal po chon bo 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan bde ltar mthong mthong ba na gzugs la yang yade 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/
'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa la yang yid 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yad byung na 'dod chags dang bral lo// 'dod chags dang bral na rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// rnam bar
grol nA/ bdag gi skye ba zad do// tshangs pa spyod pa bsen to// bya ba byas so// srid pa 'di las gzhan ma shes so zhus rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bar 'gyur ro//
chos kyi la grangs 'di bshad ban/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal bo bzo sbyang sagazugs can sUng po dang/ lha brgyad khri dang/ ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang/ khyim bdag 'bum phrag du ma la/
chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so// de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snyang pos chos mthong ba dang/ chos thob ba dang/ chos rig
pa dang/ chos kyi gatring slebs pa dang/ som zhe las rgal ba dang/ thatsom las rgal ba dang/ gzhan gyi dring ma 'jog pa dang/ gzhan gyis ma bkra ba
dang/ ston pas bstan ba'achos rnams la ma 'jigs pa thob nas/ stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar
[G]ba btud de/ btsem ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so// mngon bar 'phags so// bdag btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dang/ chos
dar dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/ dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng sun chad ji srid 'tsho'abar du srog dang bang bsdos te/ skyabs su mchi
bar mngon bar du lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun du bsapal ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang/ bsod snyoms
dang/ gzems cha dang/ stun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyudi lags na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs su gsol// bcom
ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po khozo sbyangs gzugs can snang ba la cang ma gsung bas gnang ngo// de nas ma gi d+ha'i rgyal bo bzo sbyangs gzugs can sAng pos bcom ldan/
0 'das cang ma gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo/
slong rnams sbe tsom skyes nas/ the tsom thams cad gcod// sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po 'khor dang bcas/
pas las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par sman pas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dgeslong
dag rgyal bo gzugs can sA po 'khor dang bcas pas las tshogs red/ rkyen yongs su bskyarab 'dod pa bzhin du bar gnas pa/ gdon ba za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i
las dag byas shing bsags panA/ rgyal bo gzugs can snying po 'khor dang bcas pas laso sa shing bsags ba dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/ dge med
rag las shing bsags pa dag na phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par ma 'gyur/ chu'i khams la ma 'gyur/ mar khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung gi khams la mi
'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba dag byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung pa dang/ khams dang/ skye mched rnams la rnam bar sman por 'gyur te/ lag
da rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni// chud ma za bo'ang tshogs dang dus// rnyed na lus can rnams la ni// 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid// dge slong
dag sngon byung ba 'dus ba na 'jig rten du ston pa rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na
med pa// lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rtsibs kyi lte ba zhes bya ba byung nas/ desasangs rgyas kya mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad de/ phung po lhag ma med
pa'i mya ngan las 'dus pa'i dbyangs su yongs su mya ngan las 'das sa// skye bo'i tshogs chen pos de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod ba byas nas/ sa phyogs dben zhing yangs
ba zhig tu mchod rten chen po rtsigs so// de'atsho 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po kri ka zhes bya ba khrom gyi ra ba bye ba phrag bcobargyad dang/ steng gi nam mkha' las yul rgyu ba na/ mdo
rten de dang nye ba zhig tu phyin pa dang/ sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa'i lha rnams kyis de'i 'khor lo rin pe tsho thogs par byas so// rgyal po kri kos bsams ba/ 'di ltar 'tsho
lo ni bo che 'di thogs pa las// bdag gi bsod nams zad par ma gyur grang snyam mo// de la lha rnams kyis smras pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyibasod nams ma zad modakyi/
phyogs 'di la yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtsibs kyi lte ba'i mchod rten bzhugs pas/ ngesan 'khor lo rin po che 'di de'i steng du ma 'gro zhing thogs pa ra gyur to// de nas
rgyal bo kri khrom gyi rub bye ba phrag bco brgyad dang lhan cig babs na jitsaman mchod rten byi dor ma byas pa de mthong nas/ 'khor dang bcas pa des byi dor byas te/ droding/ byugs
pa dang/ bdug pa dang/ phye ma dang/ rol mo rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas 'khor dang bcas pas drung du btud de smon lam btab pa// bdag gas yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya/
ba byas pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gas yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par 'gyur ba dang/ ston pa 'di lta bu m tes par byed ci yis nyes pa mi byed par gyur cig ces btabago/ dge slong
dag jinam dusems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po kri ka zhes bya ba 'khor dang bcas pa gang yin pa de na/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po gzugs can sAng po 'di
ni de yin taM/ 'khor dang bcas ba des yang dag par rdzogs po'i sangs rgyas skyabs kyi lte ba'imachod rten la mchod pa byas pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par sman pas/ 'dis
bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag mang par lha dang ma rnams kyi bde ba khyad par du 'phags pa nyams su myong bar gyur to// 'di lta bu'i yon tan dag thob par gyur cig ces smo na lam
btab pa gang yin pa des ni ba'iny+tsan sngar 'khor dang bcas pa bden ba mthong bar byas so// ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed tsang ma ma zhes par ma byed par gyur cig ces
smon lam btab pa gang yin pas na// dge slong dag nga nyid dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtsis kyi lce bar lhan cig mnyam bas mnyam ste// stobs mnam pa dang/ shugs mnyam
ba dang/ brtson 'grus mnam pa dang/ thob pa mnam pa yin te/ 'dis ston pad mnyes par byas kyi/ mam zhes par ma byas ba yin no// dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu
gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par san pa na gcig tu gzhag pa yin la gcig chu dkar ba rnams kyi ni dkar ba yin/ 'dren ma rnams kyi 'dren ma yin no// dge slong dag de lta bas na las
gcig tu gnag pa dang/ 'dren ma rnams ni spangs la/ las gcig tu dkar ba la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slongadag khyed kyis de lta bu la bsub par bya'o// dge slong
rnams the tsom skyes nas/ thatsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srungs kyis las ci zhig bgyisan/ desazhatsho
'phrul lnga brgyas btul bar gyur lags/ chu klung 'od srungs dang/ ga ya 'od srungs dag ni tshogs chung dus btul bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge
slong dag nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed ba/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba zhes bya ba nas/ lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dge slong dag sngon byung ba
bskal pa bzang po 'di re la skye dgu'i tsha le nyi khri grub pa na/ 'jig rten du ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rage ba dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar
gshegs ba/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang ma rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba byung nas/ wA
nA NA sa'i grong khyer dang nye ba zhig tu brten te/ drang srong sa u0f97ba' ro dgos na bzhugs so// des sangs rgyas kyi mdzad bamatha' dag mdzad nas/ shang zad pa'i mi bzhin du phung po'i lhag
ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'dus pa'i dbyangs su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de'i sku gdung rgyal po ka kis skyes kyi shing thams cad spungs te/ smras pas bsregs nas me'o
mas bsadade/ sku gdung de dag rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i bum pa'i nang du blugs nas/ sa phyogs dben zhing yangs par sku gdung gi mchod rten dpag tshad gcig la rgyar dpag tshad
phyed pa zhig brtsig tubcug go/ de'i tshe de'i dus na wA rA N+Nas na khyim bdag phyug pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba/ yongs su bzung ba/ yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos
kyi bu'adir dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi 'dul zher gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas ba des ragis mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te// de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar
byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed/ da rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa na/ rim gyis khye'u gsum btsas so// tsim na khyim bdag de nad
kyis thebs nas/ do rtsa ba dang/ sdong bu dang/ lo ma dang/ 'dab ma dang/ 'bras bu'i sman rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas kyang de'i nang zhi bar ma gyur nas/ da 'chi ba'i
chos dang ldan par gyur to// de nas de'i bu rnams kyis sa ston pa dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang 1 dkur bos phyogs brgyan nas dur khrod du khyer te bsregasas// de nas kha
la ba'i bya ba byas nas mya ngan sangs/ de nas nor so sor bgo bar gros bya bar brtsams nas/ phu bo shes kyis sbas pa/ nor bgo'o// nu bo na gtis ma dang do// des
sh+tsa gal gyis gnyis pa dang/ de gnyis kyis sa pa/ gal te de lta na re zhigA'aji gzhupha rol gyi lam brgyags blangs la phyis bge ba ra bya'o// des smras pa/ su dag bya/ de gnyis
kyis smras pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs 'das mchod do// de dad pa chung ba zhig pas des bka' 'khor du khas blangs so// de nas de rnams kyis yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs la mchod nas smon lam gdab par brtsams de/ dugs kyis 'di skad ces smras so// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di bdag cag gnyis yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes bya ba la bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu rnams kyi rmi le brgya thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sa sa rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan pa gang yin pa de'i bstan pa la bdag cag rab tu byung nas khyad par thob par gyur cig nyes btab bo// de
gnyis kyis smon lam btab pa phu po des thos nas drud du btud de/ smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/ bdag nadad pa chung ma la dmu rgod yin pas dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag kyang bcom
ldan 'das shAkya thub pa des cho 'phrul lnga brgyas btul nas rab tu phyung ste/ rab tu byung nas yang khyad par rtogs par gyur cig ces byas so// dge slong dag jisnyam du sems/ bubo
shos dmu rgod dad pa chung ba gang yin pa de ni/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs 'dranod pa'i go/ nu bo gnyis po gang dag yin pa de dag na chu klung 'od srungs dang ga la 'od srungs 'di dag kar ni//
smon lam gyi dbang gis des na lteng rgyas cho 'phrul lnga brgyas btul ba lani no/ chu klung 'od srungs dang/ ga ya 'od srungs ni tshogs chung dus btul ba yin// gang
ga tshi rgyal po gzugs can snyade po gzhon nur gyur pa de'i tshe rgyal po 'a khaban khyim bdag cig yod ba de la/ kun dga'i rab me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ chu thun
sum tshogs pa zhig yod de/ ded la lhag par chags par gyur to// jatsaman gzugs can snying bo phyi rol tu byung bas skyed mos tshal de mthong ba dang/ de la nga lhag par chags par gyur
nas smras pa/ khyim bdag skyed mos tshal na nga la byan cig/ des ma byin no// lan gnyis lan gsum du yang smras na yang ma byanenas/ yang smras pa// rin sbyin no// des smras
ba gzhon nu nyes na kho bo yul nas lcags kyang bla'i/ skyed mos tshal na mo 'bul lo// gzhon nu gzugs can snyang pos sbas pa// khyim bdag khyod kyis smas pa dran pa rabyes
shig/ nam da rgyal bor gyur pa de rang nyid kyis bkur ro// des sas pa/ nam khyod rgyal por gyur pa de'i tshe kho bo yang rgyal po'i khabanas 'grolo/ gzhon nu gzugs can snying/
bos 'jal lo zhes byas nas song ngo// jitsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po pad+ma chen po shi nas/ gzhen nu gzugs can snyang po rgyal srid la bzhag pa dang/ des skyed mos tshal de 'thus
grogos so// khyim bdag de snying na zhing skyed mos tshal de la lhag par chags pas shanas de nyid kyi sbrul gdug pa zhig tu skyes te/ de rgyal po la rgyun du glags tshol ba lhur len cing gnas
jitsam na rgyal po gzugs can snyade po so ga'i dus la bab ste/ me tog gshang rnams kha 'bus pa na btsunamo dang lhan cig skyed mos tshal der zhugs nas/ de de na skyes pa med/
par rol mos btsun mo'i bud med dang lhan cig dga' ba'i rtsed mo nyams su myong bar byas nas gnyid log go/ bud med na me tog dang 'bras bu la dga' ba yin bas/ kun tu 'khyab du dong ngo//
bud med gcig gis ral grwa bskur te/ rgyal po bsrung du bcug go/ de nas sbrul gdug pa des rgyal bo'i drung na sgra grag par rigs/ rgyal po la gzung ba'i phyir tshang nas byung ste
chasaso// rgyal po'akhasadanams kyi mthus bya ka lan ta ka zhes bya ba de rnams kyis sbrul gdug pa de kun nas bskor nas tsapa'i sgra phyung ngo// bud med ral gri thogs pas thosanas
srangs te sgra chen po byung nas ral gris bsad do// de nas rgyal ba yong stangs te sadazhas snas pa/ 'di ni byung/ bud med des smras pa/ lha sprul gdug ba 'di lha la gzung ba'i phyir
chas pa na/ bya ka lan ta ka rnams kyis tsa pa'i sgra phyung nas/ bdag gis bkum lags so// rgyal po'i gnas skabs de gzhon nu dang/ blon po dang/ khrom gyi ru ba dang/
rgyal bo'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyis thos nas/ skyed mos tshal de'i phyi nang du ku co'i sgra chen bos gang bar gyur te// rgyal bo de skye dgu la byams pa zhig pas/
phyir zhari btsun mo skye bo'i tshogs dang bcas rta mag mchims gang zhing 'khod do// des rgyal pos smras pa// shes ldan dag rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang
bskur ba la srog skyob pa de la mchog tu sbyin skye bo'i tshogs kyis slas pa// lha rgyal srid kyi phyed do// rgyal pos sas ba/ shes ldan dag bya ka lan tA ka rnams kyis nga'i srog bu'i
pas rgyal srid byed 'di dag la byin no/ blon po rnams kyis sab/ lha bya 'di dag ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas su bod ba lags khas/ rgyal sridi phyidakyis 'di dag la ci bgyi/ 'di dag
