'od ma 'tshal gang du gnas pa der 'di dag gi gnas bca' 'o// rgyal bos smras po/ de bzhin du gyis shig/ skyed mos tshal de'i ya'i rtsib gyis yongs su bskor te/ blon po rnams
kyis de rnams kyi gnas 'od ma'i tshal gyi sku 'khor du bcas pas/ de 'od m 'tshol bya ka lan da ka gnas pa zhes bya bar gyur to// rgyal bo gzugs can snying po'i zhing pa kun du 'tsho
rnams kyizhung du rab tu byung nas/ des skyed mos tshal de de'i gnas kyi phyir byon no// ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das ma ga d+ha nas langs rgya zhing gshegs ba dang/ rgyal bo'i khab tu byon
nas shang zhig gi drung na bzhugs so// mig d+ha'i rgyal bo bzo sbyangs gzugs can sAng pos bcom ldan 'das ma ga d+ha nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ rgyal bo'i khab tu byon nas ji
zhig gi drung du bzhugs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang/ rgyal po'i mthu chen pos rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba derasangaste/
pa'i pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po/
bzo sbyangs gzugs can sAng po la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod bar mdzad/ yang
dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par/
rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang ma gsung ngo// de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal bo bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das
gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sang bdag gi sdum par dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tugadugs
tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+ha'i rgyal bo bzo sbyangs gzugs can sAng po la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo// de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal
bzo sbyangs gzugs can sAr pos/ bcom ldan 'das cad ma gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas stan las
langs te song ngo// de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ba ze sangs gzugs can sAng bas/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa 'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag stan gon byas nas/ nang par sngar las
te/ gdan bshams nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsol pa// btsun pa gdugs tshod lags na/ da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/
de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar
te ma ga d+ha'i rgyal bo bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po'i bkad sa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas ma
ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can sAng pos/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi
lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/ rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das gsol zani
nas phyag brgyabs te/ lhungabazod rgyu bar rig nas/ gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te/ btsun pa 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa 'dir bcom ldan 'das ci bde bar bzhugs shag
ces bcom ldan 'das la skyed mos tshal de phul lo/ de bzhin du gnas brtan rnams kyis kyang mdo sde rnams kyi nang du/ btsum ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshol bya ka lan
tA ka gnas ban bzhugs so zhes gdags bar byas so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka'i gnas na bzhugs so// rgyal po'i khab na khyim
bdag cig gnas pa des/ bcom ldan 'das dag slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu rang gi khyim du spyan drangs so// yang de'i tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dgos ba
'ga' zhig gi phyir rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas da khyim bdag de'i khyim du nub mo brang btab bo// de nas khyim bdag de de nyid kyi mtshan mo langs/ nang mi rnams la bsgo
ba nang rje dag longs shig/ bzhan bzangs dag longs shig/ shing rnams gshogs shig/ me dag bus shig/ 'bras chan tshosashig/ srin
tshod tshos shig/ bca' ba dag bzang du rgyas shag/ bkadasa'i zhal rtadagagyis shig/ de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyani 'dasnyam du sems te/ khyim bdag 'di
bag ma len nam/ bag ma gtongangam/ yul ma 'am/ tshongapa 'am/ tshogs sam/ 'khor ram/ 'dis ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po/
bzo sbyangs gozugs tsanas nig po sad khyimadu gdugs tshod la spyan drangs sam snyam du bsams nas/ khyim bdag de la 'di skad ces smras so/ khyim bdag khyod ci bag ma
len nam/ bag ma gtong ngam/ khul tsha 'am/ tshong pa 'am/ tshogs sam/ 'khor ram/ khyod kyis ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs
ba gzugs can snyang pa sang khyim du gdugs tshod la sla na drangs sam/ khyim bdag kho bo bag ma len pa'i m/ bag ma gtong ba yang ma yin/ yul ma ma yin/
tshong pa ma yin/ tshogs pa ma yin/ 'khor ma yan/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po yang gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa ma yin te/ 'on
kyang kho khos sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod la spyan drangs sa/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyan gyis/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra sngon mthos
pa thos pa dang/ ba spu 'i khung bu thams cad nas spu zing zhes byed nas/ de spu hreng zhes byed pas khyim bdag de la 'di skad ces sas sa// khyim bdag sangs rgyas zhes/
bya ba 'di su yan/ khyim bdag dge sbyongago'utamashAkya'i sras shAkya'i rigs las sa dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smag bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas
khyim med par rab tu byungs/ da ban med pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa zhig yod de/ khyami bdag de ni sangs rgyas zhes bya'o//
khyim bdag dge 'dun zhes bya ba 'di su yin/ khyim bdag rgyal rigs las kyang rigs kyi bu sa dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smage bgos nas/ dadapa yang dag pa kho nas khyim/
nAs khyim med par bcom ldan 'das de kho na rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung ba dag yod do// bram ze'i rigs dang/ rje'u rigs dang/ dmangs rigs las kyang rigs/
kyi bu dag sa dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur sag bgiso nas/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par bcom ldan 'das de khon rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung ba dag yod de/
khyim bdag de ni dge 'dun zhes bya ba yin to/ sang kho bo'i khyim dusangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun de ga dugs tshod la spyan drangs so// khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das
ded ltar gang na bzhugs/ rgyal bo'i khab 'danod kyi dur khrod kyi bsal ba'i tshal na bzhugs so// khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das de bdag cag gis ltar rung ngam/ khyim
bdag de'i phyir khyod re zhig snyed cig dang/ gal te bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid du gshegs pa dang/ sang khyod kyis mthong bar 'gyurab 'i gnas gang yin pa
ni yod// des khyim bdag mgon med bras sbyan sangs rgyas la dmags pa'i dran pas nyal lo// de nam ma langs par nam langs pa'i 'dushes kyis lho sgo gang na ba der song
ba dang/ de'i tshe lce sgo thun gnyis la sgo phye nas 'jog ste/ thun dang po la na pho nya glo bur du 'ongs pa rnams ma thogs par bya ba'i phyir phye ste 'jog go/ thun tha ma la ni pi
ka 'gro bar chas pa rnams ma thogs par bya ba'i phyir phye ste 'jog go/ de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyani 'disnyam du sems to/ 'di ltar lho sgaphya ste 'dug pas gdon mi
za bar nam langs so snyam du rig nas/ snang ba de 'di ru grong khyer nas byung ba dang/ de byung ma thag tu snang ba gang yin pa de med nas/ slar mun nag por gyur to// de
'jigs par gyur/ bag tsha bar gyuradi/ spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas/ bdag ma 'am/ ma la yan pa 'am/ g.yon can 'ga' zhig gis gtsus
par ma 'gyur grang snyam du bsams nas/ slar ldog par 'dod pa dang/ de nas lho phyogs kyi sgon gnas pa'i lha gang yin pa des natsam lho phyogs kyi sgonas/ bsal
ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod kyi bar thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar byas nas/ khyim bdag mgon med byas sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so// khyim bdag spyan sngar song zhig/
slar ma ldog cig/ khyod spyan sngar sengan legs par 'gyur rgyu/ slar log na nam yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rta brgya dang ni gser rgyan brgya/ dre bu'ashang rta pa rgya
dang na// sna tshogs nor gyis spur ba yi// rta rgod ma yishing rta brgya// gom pa gcig cig bor ba la// bcu drug char yang ma phod do// khyim bdag spyan sngar seng
zhig/ slar m ldog cig/ khyod spyan sngar song na legs bar 'gyur gyi slar log nan ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhin/ gangs can ri yi grung chen brgyu// gser
dnganor bus brgyan byas la// lus che gshol mda' mchab r ldan// ma tang ga skyes stod pa ni// gom phugatsag cag bor ba yi// bcu drug char yang ma yod de/ khyi/
bdag spyan sngar song zhig/ slar m ldog cig/ khyod spyan sngar sangan legs par 'gyur rgyu/ sur 'ogazhan ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ the gar yul gyi bu mo brgya//
nor bu'o ne cha gdub kor thogs// gser gyi dpung rgyan thogs ba la// mgrin pa rgyan gyis legs brgyan pa// gom pa gcig cig bor ba ya// bcu drug char yang ma phod do//
khyim bdag spyan sngar song zhig/ sur ma ldog cig/ khyod spyan sngar song na legs bar 'gyur gyi/ slar log nas ma yin no// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zasu
na byas/ lha'i bu de la 'di skad ces smras so// bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig/ khyim bdag kho ban khyod kyi grogs po rnying pa bram ze'i khye'u sbrang rtsi'i bu po yin te/ kho bos dge slong shu
ri'i bu dang/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu gnyis la sems dad pa bskyed nasashi ba dang/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes te/ lho sgo 'ditide na gnyug mar gnasaso// de'i phyur
khyed lakhe bo 'di skad ces khyim bdag sba na sngar seng zhag/ skur ma lcog cig/ khyod smra na sngar song na legs par 'gyur gyi/ slar log na nam yin no zhes su'o// de nas lus bdag
mgon med zas sngon 'dasnyam du sems/ skye ma'o sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing/ chos bshad pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/ de ltar bcom ldan
'dus de la blta b.rolta yang brtson par byed de snyam du bsams nas/ bsal ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du song ba dang/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol bla gab med pa na 'chag
byang lhag par yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'ong ba la gzhes so// demasakhyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag
0 mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ yang dag par gyis bar 'gyur bas yang dag par dgyes par byed// bcom ldan 'das su ga bde bar mnal lam/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshatshigs su/
bcad de bka' stsalapa/ gang zhig 'dod bas ma gos la// bgamed rab tu rnam grol ba// mya ngan longs 'das bram ze na// thams cad du ni bde bar manal// 'dir ni ri ba kun
bcas nas// thugs kyi rims nad rnams bsal zhang// zhi ba thob ba'i thugs skyas na// nye bar zhi ba bde bar mnal// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyimabadag mgon med zas sbya'i khrid/
nas ga tsug lag khang du zhugs te/ gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa dang/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas twaM/
phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'jug ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas spyin la ches dang ldan pa'i gatam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du
bcug yang dag pa ra gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thog ma'as su chos kyi gtam gleng ba gang yin pa de 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i gtam dang/

tshul khrims kyi gtam dang/ mtho risakyi gtam dang/ 'dod pa rnams mnog chung ba dang/ zhes dmags dang/ kun nas nyon mo dos ba dang/ rnam par byang ba dang/ nges par 'byung ba dang/ rab tu dben pa'i phan
yon gyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos kyi gtam rgyas par yang dag par bstan to// gang gi tshe bcom lton 'das kyis de dga' ba' sems dang/ dge ba'i sems dang/ mgu ba'i
sems dang/ sgrib pa dang bral ba 'aims dang/ skal ba dang ldan zhing yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa kun shes par nus par gzi gas pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yang dag phul rgyu

chos bshad pa/ 'phags pa'i phaden pa bzhi po gang yin pa 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang/ kun 'byung ba dang/ 'gog pa dang/ lam rgyas par rab tu bstanato/ dper na ges gtsang ma nag rnogo med pa tshon ts+tsa
'os pa'i nang du bcug na tshon rtsa legs par 'dren du btub pa de bzhin du/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin snyan de nyid la 'dug bazhin du 'phags pa'i baden ba bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang
yahaM kun 'byungab dang/ 'gog ba dang lam mngon par rtogs so//khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyan gyis chos mthong ba dang/ chos theb pa dang/ chos rig pa dang/ chos kyi gting sleb pa dang/ som nyi las
rgal bdang/ the tsom las rgal ba dang/ gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang/ gzhan gyis ma bkri ba dang/ ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la ma 'jigs pa thob nas/ stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa
shig/ cig tu gzar nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bdag 'phagasas/ mngon par 'phags so//
bdag bcom ldan 'das dang/ chos dang/ dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis bdag bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang bsres te/skyabs su mchi bar mngon
bar dad lags so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//khyim bdag khyod kyi ming ni btsun pha bdag gi mang za sa sbyin lags med kyi bdag mgon
ma mchis pa rnams la 'tshal ba skyel bas/ des na bdag mgon med zas sbyin zhes bgyi bar skye bos 'tshal to//khyim bdag khyod kyi gnas gang yani/btsun pa yul phratsan zhes bgyi ban shes la rnams kyi
grong khyer mnyan yod ces bgyi ba mchis te/de 'badag mas lags so// bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegs shag dang/ bcom ldan 'das dgeslobagarige 'dun dang thabs gcig la/bdag rjes+sade'atsho/
bar du na bza' chos gos dang/ bsod snyoms dang/ gzims chadang/ snyan dpyad kyi skyon sun dang/ yo byad rnams kyis bsnyenabakur bgyi lags so//khyim bdag mnyan yodan gtsug lag khang yod dam//
btsun pa mamachis lags so//khyim bdag gang na gtsug lag khang yod pa der dge slong rnams 'ong ba dang/ 'gro ba dang/ gnas bar sems so//'them ldan 'das gshegs shig dang bdag gis ci nas
kyang mnyan yod du dge slong rnams mchis pa dang/ gzhan du mchi ba dang/ mchab r sems par 'gyur ba de ltar gtsug lag khang brtsigs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin
la cung ma gsung bas gnang ngo// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sun gyis/ bcom ldan 'das nyungam gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gtus laage

bos phyag byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo//sa rgyal po'i khab tu bya ba dang bsgrubs pa gang yane ba de thams cad byas shing bslas nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom
ldan 'as kyi zhabs gtus lamago bos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdagamagon med zas sbyin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
bcom ldan 'das bdag ga grogs dge slong gcig stsal du gsol/de dang lhan cigabcom ldan 'das kyi slad dugatsug lag khang brtsig lags s/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/dge slong su zhig khyim
bag mgon med zas sbyani 'khor dang bcas pa dang/ mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshigs 'dul bar 'gyurasnyam nas/dge slongo shA ra'i bus 'dul bar gzigs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/

tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas ba dang mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshog l soms shage/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang mas+sa
bar bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' mnano//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyis nusnga nas song ngo//de nas tshe dang ldan

[ro ]bshA ri'i bu de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'dus nas/snga dro sham thabs bagos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs nas/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms spyad de zas kyi

bya ba byas nas/zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms spangs te/gnas mal ji ltar spyod pa mkhos su phab nas/rje lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs te/mnyan yod gang nab der rgyu zhangasong ngo//nga nas khyim bdag mgo/

med zas sbyin 'kha khargyags mang bo khyin s/nub mo nub mo zhing mazhan yod du song ste phyin nas de mnyan yod du ma zhugs pa de du kun dga' rab nas kun dga' ra ba dang/ skyed mos tshal nas skyed mos tshal

dar nags tshal nas nags tshal du 'chags naas 'chag sar dpyod cing 'di skad ces smras s//mnyan yod dang da dung yang ma ring la ha cang yang ma zhu ba dang/ kun par lang long tung zhing/ ku co chung ba dang/

mtshan mo gcom chung ba dang/ sgra chung ba dang/ sbrang bu dang/ sha sbrang dang/ rlung dang/ rnam dang/ sdug sbrul gyi rigA ba rlung ba'i sa'i phyogs gang na yod pa der bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag la

btsugazhag phyogs de gang na yodasnyam pa las/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gzhon nu rgyalabyed kyi kun dga' ra ba na mnyan yod dngahacungam ringal da cang lang ma zhi ba dang/ nyin par yang khang

khong nyung zhing/ ku co nyung ba dang/ mtshan mo btses chung ba dang/ sgra chung ba dang/ sdong bu dang/ sha sbrang dang/ rlung dang/ nyi ma dang/ sngag sbrul gyi rig ba chung bar mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang 'dasnyam dusemA te/
'dir bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang btsug gosnyam nas/derang gi khyim dum sob 'dedu/ gzhon nu rgyal byed gangan ba dorasong ste phyin nas/ gzhon nu rgyal byed la 'dri/
skad ces smras so//gzhon nu kun dga' ra ba bdag la stsol nug/ der bdag gis btsem ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig lags so//des smras pa/ khyim bdag de ni nga'i kun dga' ra ba na ma gi
te skyed mos tshal yin mod kyi/de nga' yin no// khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis lan gnyis lan gsum du/ yang gzhon nu rgyal khyed la 'di skad ces smras so// gzhon nu bdag la kun dga' ra ba
stsol cig/ bdag gis der bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang btsug la gas se// khyim bdag kun dga' ra ba de gsar bye ba gshibs kyang nga ma gtong ngo///'dul ba gzhi//
bam bo dgu bcu pa// yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbani gyas/ gzhon nu rgyal byed la 'di skad ces smras so// gzhon nus kun dga' ra ba'i rin thang bkum/
lags sa/ dbyig dang gser bzhes shig/ kun dga' ra ba nabadag ga lags so// rin thang sa bcad/ khyod kyis rin thang bkum med/ de gnyis rin thang bcad do// rin thang ma bcad
do zhes rtsod bar gyur nas/ zhal che gcod pa'i mi gang na ba der dong ba dang/ bar skabs der 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi 'di snyam du sems te/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'adi ni bcom ldan 'das
kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig par brtson gyis/ de'i grogs bya'osAm nas/ de nas zhal che gcod pa'i mi'i bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas dgos pa'i phyir 'dus so// khyim bdag mgon med /
zas sbyin dang/ gzhonan rgyal byed gnyis zhal che gcod ba sna chen bo la gtogs pa'i drung du song nas/ de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyan gyis zhal che gcod pa sna chen po la gtogs pa'i rnams
la don de rgyus bar sbas pa dang/ de rnams kyis sa ba/ gzhon nus kun dga' ra ba ni rin thang bcad zin gyis/ gser long zhig/ kun dga' ra ba na khyab bdag ga yanano// decung ma smra bar
'dug go/ dAnas khyim bdag mgon med zas spyin gyis shing rta dang/ rgya dang/ gzeb dang/ rdzame dang/ grang dang/ bong bu rnams la gser mang po bkal te 'ongs nas/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshel
thams cad gshab bar brtsams pa dang/ sa phyogs 'ga' zhig ma yog pas ma bkram pa nyid du 'dug go/ de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin don de sems shang yud tsam zhig dur ma slu bar
'dug ste/ gang gis ma bkram pa'i s phyogs 'di bkramanas/ slar yang sla bar ma dgos pa'i gteraha cang chung du yang ma lan/ ha cang mang po yang ma yanibadegang yin snyam pa dang/ gzhon zhu

rgya la byed kyis bsams pa// khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyini mis na ma za bar ci'i phyir kun dga' ra ba'i ched du nor gyi phung bo chen po'o snyid yongs su gtangazhes 'gyod ba skyes so snyam du bsams nas/
khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so// khyim bdag gal te khyed 'gyod pa skyes nagaseraslar long zhig/ kun dga' ra ba na nga nyid kyi yan no/ gzhog/
nu bdag ni 'gyod pa ma skyes te/ 'on kyang don 'das mas shang yudatsam zheg cang masmra bar 'dug pa na/ bdagags ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs 'dabakab nas/ sur yang sba bar bya ma dgos/
pa'i ganyer ha cang nyung ba yang ma yin/ cang mang po yang ma yin pa de gang yin snyam mo// de nas gzhon nu rgyal byed 'dasnyam du sems/ kye masangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mchog ma yin pa
ma yin zhing/ chos bshad pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/ de la dra ltar khyam bdag 'di kun dga' ra ba'i ched du nor gyi phung pa 'disnyed yongasasu gtong ngo snyam du bsams nas/ khyim
gdag mgon med zas sban la 'daskad ces so// khyim bdag ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs khe bo la slawa 1ge/ der kho bos bcom ldan 'das kyi peresgo khang brtsig par bya'o// de nas khyim bdag
mgon med zas sbyin gyis gzhon nu rgyal byed la ma bkram pa'i s phyogs byin nas/ der gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir sge khang brtsig tu bcug go/ de nas khyim bdag
mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig par brtsams pa dang/ mutsugs can zhe sdang drag pos kun nas slong ba'i yid can rnams 'dus nas/ khyim
bdag mgon med zas sbyin gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang/ lcas pa/ khyim bdag khyod dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i phyir gtsug lag khang ma rtsig cig/ ci'i phyir kho bo cag gis grong khyer bgos te/
dge sbyong go'u ta ma'ani rgyal po'i khab lani ne// kho bo cag gnamanyan yod yin no/ des snus pa khyed cag gas grong khyer rnams bgos kyi/ bdag ga nor ma bgos pas/ gang lagadono
ba ' dga' bde'i chos kyi phung pa brtsigage/ de rnams rgyal po'i drung du dong ba dad/ der yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis pham par byas pa dang/ mu stegs spyi brtol can mu tser slab
rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag dga' dgur byed du mi gzhug ste/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'anyan thos kyi mchog gcig 'ongs nas/ gal te de'agshegs kyis khob cig pham par gyur na/
gtsug lag khang rtsigs shig/ des smras pa/ rung gis re zhig 'phags bshA ri'i bu la brtag go/ de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbya'i tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/
tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ tshodang ldan pa/
ra'i bu la 'daskad ces smras so// btsun bshA ri'i bu mu stegasacan rnams 'di skad cis khyim bdag khyod dga' dgur byed du mig zhugaste/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i nyon thos kyi mchog 'os nas
gal te de'agshegs kyis kho bo cag pham par gyuran/ gtsug lag khang tshugs shig ces mchin/ ngol ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bus bsam
pa tsa'adi rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba cung zad yod dam/ 'on te mdas bsams pa las yod par mthong ngo// su zhig la rag las par 'gyur snyam n bdag kho na la'o// yang bsams pa/
tsa'adasnyed cig kho na bdag la rag las pa'i tshig gas 'dul bar 'gyur ram/ 'on gzhan yang tshigags 'dul ba yod snyam pa las ma da pa mthong ngo// dus sud kyis tshogs par 'gyur
mAman/ zhag bdun lon nas so// bsamasanas smras pa/ khyim bdag de bzhin du bya ste/ 'on kyang zhag bdun pa'i rton par bya'o// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dga' ba dang
mgu ba skyes nas/ mu stegs can rnams gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ mu stegs can rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ shes ldan dag 'phags pa shA ra'i bu na re/ de bzhin du bya ste/
'on kyang zhag bdun pa'i tin par bya'o zhes zer ro// de rnams kyis bsams pa// 'di la rgyu gnyis yod par 'gyur te/ yang nani de 'bres 'dod do// yang na nade phyogs tshol lo// de ma
yanan dus der gdab pa deges bdag cag kyang phyogs btsal le zhes de rnams phyogs btsal bar brtsams te/ de rnams kyis phyogs btsal ba dang/ kun tu rgyu mig dmar mthong nas/ de la de
rnams kyis sbas pa/ khyod dang bdag cag ni tshangs bar mtshungs par spyod pa yin gyis/ dge sbyong ge'u ta ma'i nyin thos kyi mchog bdag cag gas brtsad pa'i phyir bkug na de phyogs tshol gyis/

khyod kyang bdagacig gi grogs gyis shig/ dus ji tsam zhig ga na/ 'dunas zhag bdun gyi rten par ro// rung gis de bzhin du bya ste// gang gi tshe khyod cag 'dus par gyur pa de'i tshe kho bo la sbron cig/
mu stegs can rnams bag tsha ba dang/ sems khral skyes nas/ nyin re zhing phyogs tshol ba dang/ nyi ma bgrang bar byed do// jitsam na zhag bdun len pa dang/ khyim bdag mgon med zas
sbyin gyis bla gab med pa'i sa phyogs yas par stan shem du bcug go/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i ched du yang sang ge'i khri bshamasas// yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i mu stegs can rnams dang//

mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang/ de'i 'i 'khor na gnas ba'i srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag kyang kha cig na ngo mtshar skyes/ kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bskul nas 'dus so//
denas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyan gyi 'khor dang bcas pas mdun dubadar te/ rtsod pa'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas 'dul ba'i skye bo rnams la bltas te/ 'dzum pa sngon
du btang nas spyod lam zhi bas seng ge 'i khri la 'dzegs nas 'dug go/ 'khor thams cad sems ma g.yeng bar tsho dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu la rtog cing 'dug go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bus/
mu stegs can rnams la snas pa/ shes ldan dag ca re zhig byed dam/ 'on te 'jug/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ kho bo cag gas byas/ khyod kyis shog cig/
tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/ gal te bdag gas byas na 'dzag rten lha dang bcas pas kyang 'jig par ma nus na/ kun tu rgyu mig dmar gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam du rag sa/
kun tu rgyu mag dmar la 'ad skad ces smras so// khyed kyis byos shig/ ngas gzhag go/ de mgi 'phrul byang ba yin pas/ des shing sa ha ka ra shAn tu mi rtog gas rgyas pa zhig sprul pa dang

tshe dang ldan pashA ra'i bus rlung dang char drag po phab ste/ sade lcags byung nas phan tshun du rnam ba'agator ti/rnal 'byor pa rnamA kyis yul du yaya gyur to//de nas shes pad+ma'i rdzipa zhig sprul bang/ tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i byis glang dang
cha bzang po zhig sprul nas/ des kun tu rnal nas mngag lhag ma tsam zhig bzhag go/ des sbrul mgo bdun pa zhig sprul pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bus nam mkha' ldang zhig sprul te/ des
ri blaae// des ro langasashig sprul pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus sngags kyi phur pos btab pa las/ nyes par spyad pa'i ri las ni bdag de la gsod par byed pas des de de
bsags pa dang/ des de 'jigs skrag 'phongosashang ba spu zing zhes byed nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu skyabs su mchi lags kyis/
yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus sngags kyi phur pa phyung ba dang/ ro langs de zhi bar gyur to// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bus de la ches bshad de/ de dad ba skyes nas
smras pa// 'phags pa shA ra'ibu bdag legs par gsungs pa 'a chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong ga dngos po gnang na/ bdag 'phags pa shA ri'i bu'i spyan
sngar tshangs bar spyod pa spyad bar bgyi'o// tshe dang ldan pashA ra'i bus de rab tu phyung/ bsnyen par rdzogs par byas/ gdams ngag byin te/ des brtson pa dang/ 'bad pa dang/ brtsal
ba byas pas nyon mongs ba thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom par gyur nas/ khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/ bong ba dang gsar du
mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthal du mtshungs pa' sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan dang ste'ur mnyam pa// rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i skabs dral nga/ rig pa dang/ mngon par
shes pa dang/ so so yang g bar rig pa thob pa/ srid pa dang rnyed pa la chags pa dang/ bkur sta la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang nye dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par
bya ba dang/ rjed par bya ba dang/ mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to// de nas de'i 'khor rnams ngo mtshar gyi mig bgrad nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la mngon par dad par gyur te smras pa//
'phags pa shA ri'i bus// smra ba'i khyu mchog chen po tshar bcad do snyam du thag nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i gdong du lta bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'ibus
'khor de'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal ba dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin shes nas 'phags pa'ibaden babazhes sa yang dgayapar rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad par byas so//
de thos pas sems can brgya phrag du mas khyad par chen po thob ste/ kha cig gsan nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed/ kha cig gsan rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu/ kha cig gis
ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/ kha tsag gsan skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i bzhu rnams bungs/ kha cig gsan rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas//
kha tsage gas na lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ kha cig gis na phyirim 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ khatsug gis ni rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs taM/ dgra btsem pa
mngon sum du byas so// 'khor de phal cher yang sangs rgyas la gzhol ba/ chos la 'bab pa/ dge 'dun la bab pa la bkod do// mu stegs can rnams kyis bsams pa/ bdag
cag gas 'di gshags kyis tshar gcod par ma nus kyis/ thabs shag bsham par byas la/ des glags rnyed nas/ 'dabasgags rtegasad par bya'o snyam nas/ thams cad 'dus te/
0/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi drung du dong ste smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis kho bo cag gi 'tsho ba'i gzhazims cad na bcad bas/ de bas snyang brtse bar gyis shig dang/ khyod kyi gtsug lag
khang du gla mi'i las bya'o// kho bo cag 'dun ring zhig tu gnas gnas pas phul bar na ma rung ngo// khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyan gyis smras pa/ ri zhig 'phags pa shA ri'i bu la brtag/
gzhig/ de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa mu stegs can rnams kyi mchid nas/ khyed kyis khob
cig ga 'tsho ba'i gzhathams cad band pas na skade brtse bar gyis shag dang/ khyod kyi gtsug lag khang du glama'i las bya'o// kho bo cag 'dun ring zhig tu gnas gnas pas bul boranam rung ngo zhes
mchi'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bsam pa la zhugs te/ 'di dag la dge ba'i rtsa bcung zad yod dam/ 'on te med snyam na/ des yod bar mthong ngo// su zhig la rag lus snyam na/
bdag khon la'o snyams/ des bsams te smras pa// khyim bdag de la 'gal ba tsayod kyis/ de bzhin du gyisashug/ de rnams gtsug lag khang der bla ma'i las byed par brtsams pa na/
tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bus lcag thogs kyi mi gtum po zhig sprul nas/ de de rnams las byed du gzhug par brtsams so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de rnams kyi gdul ba'i dus shes nas/
de dang zhi ba'i shing drung zhig na 'chag cing 'dug pa de/ de rnams kyis mthong nas/ de rnams so bsams pa/ dben pan 'dug pas 'dagasad pa'idus ni'id yin no snyam nas
rdzo rnams kyis de'i drung du deng ste bskor nas 'dug go/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/ 'di rnams bsam pa ci 'dra bas bdag ga drung du 'ongs snyam na/ jim na gsad pa'i sems kyis
lan pa shes nas/ des lcag thegos sprul pa de thad nas/ des de rnams las byos dengazhis thag bcug pa dang/ de rnams kyis smras pa// 'phags pa shA ri'i bu yongs su bskyab tu gsol/
des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa re zhig seng la ngal sor chug cig/ de rnams kyis bsams pa/ 'dini 'di lta bur bdag nyid che ba yin te/ bdag cag gisana'adagasad par bsams na/ 'di
bdag cag la byams par sems so snyam du rig nas dad par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bus de rnams kyi bsam pa dang/ bag la nyul ba dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin shes
nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad par byas te/ de thos nas de rnams kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyashu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes
btsemanas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ de rnams kyis bden pa mthong nas smras ba/ btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba

dang [0f10 ]bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gnang na/ bdag cag btsun pa'i ri'i bu'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bus de rnams rab tu byung/ bsnyen
bar rdzogs par byas nas/ gdams ngag bya'i taM/ de rnams kyis brtson pa dang/ 'bad pa dang/ brtsal bar byas pas/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang ma g.yo ba 'di nyidi rig ste/
'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang/ lhung ba dang/ rnamapar 'thor ba dang/ rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyis thal gyis mnan nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs taM/ dgra bcom
ba mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom par gyur nas/ khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/ beng ba dang gser du mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthal du tshungs pa'i sems dang ldan ngag
tsan dan dang ste'ur mnyam pa/ rig pas ma reg pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dral zhang/ rig pa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ ses yang dag par rag pa thob pa/ srid pa dang rnyed pa la chags pa dang/

bkur ste la rgyab kyis phyogs pa// dbang po dang nye ba'i dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang/ rjed par bya ba dang/ mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa/
shA ri'i bus gtsug lag khang gi thog skud kyi mtha' gcig nas bzung/ mtha' gcig nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bzung ba dang/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bus 'dzum dbyung bar brtsamA
dus khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs ba rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rten thos rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med
par 'dzum pa ma mdzad na/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'dzum pa mdzad/ khyim bdag de de bzhin// de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs

pa'i nyan thos rnams na rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa ma mdzad de/ khyed kyis 'di'i thag skud bzung ba na/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su yang gser gyi khang ba grub par gyur to// de nas khyim bdag mgon med

zas spu'i ngo mtshar skyes pa'i mgi bgrad de smras pa/ 'phags pa shA ra'i bu galade ldan de'i slad du yang thig skud brkyang dang lhag par sems mngon par dad par bgyi'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bus yang
thig skud de gzung ba dang/ khyim bdag mgon med bras spyan gyis lhag par dad pa drag po'i shugs kyis sems mngon par dad par byas te/ dad pa de'i mjug thogs kho naragaser gyi khang pa ran po che sna
bzhi las byas par gyur nas/ tshedang ldan pa shA ra'i bus kyang de la go bar byas so// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas spyan gong nas gong du bsad nams rab tu 'phel ba'i rgyud kyis gtsug lag khang
chen po bcu drug dang/ khang phran drug cu brtsig tu bcug ste/ ngegatsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang/ khang phran drug cu brtsigs nas/ yo byad thams cad kyis rgyas par byas te/ tshe dang ldan

pa shA ri'i bu gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad kyis smras so// 'phags pa shAri'i bu btsem ldan 'das gshegs na/ shul sa dzatsam du byon par 'gyur/ khyim
tshadag dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'a tsam mo// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal nga mchi ba'i tshad ji tsam/ khyim bdag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po na kim gtsug gas rgyang grags bcu'i lam du
'gre'o// de nas khyimo bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gang yang mnyan yod nas rgyal po'i khab de'i khoragyi gshegs dgongos brtsis nasagazhes sa dag byed du bcug/ sbyin gtong gi khang pa dag byed du
bcug/ dus tshod gsal ba'i mi degabakod/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan gyis brgyan tshanadan gyi chus chag chag btab/ shan tu dri zhim pa'i pog par dag lte bar bkod/ rna babs
dag byed du bcug/ dus kyi dang thun tshod kyi sman dag kyang 'jog tu bcug go/ de ltar tshogs bsags nas ma zhig la bsgo ba/ kyenang rje tshur spyon/ khyed bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song la/
sen pa dang kho bo'i tshig gas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// gnod pa chung ngam/ kam nga ba chung da/ 'tsho 'am/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang
bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes zhus la 'dza skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegs su gsal/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi rige 'dun dang thabs chag la/ bdag yod
'tsho'i bar du na bza' tshos gos dang/ bsod snyoms dang/ gzims chadang/ stunadapyad kyi rgyan sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bsnyenabakur bgyid do zhes kyang gsol
cig jo bo bka' bzhin tshal zhes ma yis khyim bdag mgon medwa zas sbyan gyi ltar manyanas/ rgyal po'i khab gang na ba der sa rta/ rim gyis rgyal bo'i khab tu phyin to// de nas lam gyis
dub pa ngal bsos nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu
'dug nas ma des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la zhabs gnyis la/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas zhes bya
ba nas/ reg par gnas sam zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// kyi ma khyod dang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bde bar gyur cig/ btsun pa khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi mchades
bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegs su gsal/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la/ bdag ja sridi 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang/ bsod snyoms dang/
gzims cha dang/ snyan dpyad kyi rgyan sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bkur stari bgyid do zhes mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis mdi la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo// de nas ma de bcom ldan
'das cang ma gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas seng de/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dul pa//
'khor dul ba/ zhib/ 'khor zhib/ grol ba/ 'khor grol ba/ dbugs phyin pa/ 'khor dbugs phyin pa/ rnam par dul ba/ 'khor rnam par dul ba/ dgra bcom pa/ 'khor
dgra bcom pa// 'dod chags dang bral ba/ 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba/ mdzes pa// 'khor mdzes pa/ khyu mchog ba langag tshogs kyis bster ba lta bu/ glang po che'i mchog
glang po che phrug gu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ seng ge mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nam mkha' lding bya'atshig
kyis bskor ba lta bu/ bram ze slob ma'i tshogs kyis bser ba lta bu// 'khor los sgyur ba bu stong gsabaskor ba lta bu/ zla ba sgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nyi ma 'od gzer
steng gas bskor ba lta bu/ yul 'khor srung dra za'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'phags skyes po grul bum gyi tshigs kyis boskor ba lta bu/ mig mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor
ba lta bu/ rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ thag bzangs ras lha ma yin gyi gos kyis bskor ba lta bu/ brgya bya'i sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis bskor
ba lta bu/ tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rgya mtshog yob med ba lta bu/ sngon chu dang bcas pa lta bu/ rgyang bodamapa dregs pa dang bral ba ltar
dbangabo rnams shin tu dul bas spyod lam gyi tshul ma 'khrugs pa/ sku skyes bu chen po'imtshan sum cu rtsaganyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rnam par mdzes par byas/
pa 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa'i// nyi ma'i 'od gzer steng bas lhag ba'i 'od can/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes pa/ stebs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/
ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gazhag pa gsum dang/ thugs rje chen pa dang ldan pa/ dge slongog dge 'dun chen po dang/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa dang/ mnyan yod
na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang/ lha brgya stong phrag du mas zham 'bring byas nas/ mnyan yod kyi grong khyer du gshegasas// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi grong khyer du gshags
nas/ mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang bcas pas grong khyer gyi sgo'i thim ba la zhabs g.yas pas mtshan pa de'i tshos rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur te/ sa chan pa 'degayos/ rab tu g.yos/
kun tu rab tu g.yos/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg ste/ shar phyogs mthon/ nub phyogs dma'/ nub phyogasamathon/ shar phyogs dma'/ lho phyogs mgon/
byang phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mthon/ lho phyogs dma'/ mtha' mthon/ dbus dma'/ dbus mthon/ mtha' dma' bar gyur cing/ 'jig rten 'di thams cad 'jig rten gyi
bar dang bcas te/ snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to// bar snang la yang lca'i rnga rdung zhing/ nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i lhas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi steng nas lha'i me tog utu la dang/
pad+ma dang/ ku mu ta dang/ pad+madakar pa dang/ a ka ru'i phyam dang/ rgya spos kyi phye ma dang/ tsan dan gyi phye ma dang/ gur kum gyi phye ma dang/ ta ma la'i lo ma'aphye ma dang/ lha'i ma rtog
man da ra ba rnams 'thor zhing/ lca'i ngodos rnams kyang 'thor ro// bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa na 'di reg dang/ gzhan yang ngo mtshar de lta bu dag byung bar gyur to// gzhan yang
dog pa rnams ni yangs par gyur to// dma' ba rnams ni mthon par gyur to// mthon pa rnams mnyam par gyur te// glang po che yang skad 'byin/ rta yang skad 'byin/ khyu mchog rnams kyang
skad 'byon no// khyiman yod pa'i rol mo cha byad sna tshogs pa rnams kyang rang sgra 'byin no// leng ba rnams kyis mig na mgigs mthong ngo// 'on pa rnams kyisan rnabs thos sa// lkugs
pa rnams kyis nad+ma nus par gyur to// dbang po ma tshang pa rnams nadebang po rnams yongs su tshang bar gyur to/ chang gis myos pa rnams na myos pa dang bral bar gyur to// dug 'thungs pa rnaA
na dug zhi bar gyur to// phan tshun khon byung ba rnams byang bar gyur to// sbrum pa rnams ni bde bar btsas par gyur to// btson du btanges pa rnams nabatsangs pa las thar
ro ner med pa rnams nanir rnyed par gyur to// de dag dang gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshigs pan ngo mtshar brgya stong dag byung bar gyur te// de nas bcom ldan 'das bkur ste/
rmo na pa de lta bu s mnyan yod du gshegs so// gshegs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa de la bzhugs su// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin
mdza' bshes dang/ nye du dang/ gnyen gyi skye bas yongs su bskor nas gser gyi byamabum blangs te chu'i rgyun sbreng bar brtsams pa las/ de 'dzag tu ma btub pas khyim bdag mgon med zas
sbyin yade ma bde ste bsams ba/ bdag gis las nyes pa dang bcas pa cung zad byas par ma gyur grangasnyam pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// khyim bdag khyod kyis lus nyes ba/
dang bcas pa cung zad kyang byas pa med do// 'on kyang khyed kyis phyogs 'dir 'dug nas sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyogs 'di nyid phul ba yan gyis/ phyogs gzhan zhig
tu 'dug la sbrengasashagi/ des phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dug nasasbrengs pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'igasung dbyangs kyis rgyal byed kyi tshal brjod par mdzad de//
0 rgyal byed kyi tshal brjod par mdzad pa na/ gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis bsams pa/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis der bdag gi ming thog mar skyes kyang bya ma rung snyam pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thug
kyis gzhon nu rgyal byed kyi sems mkhyen nas/ dge slong dag 'di ni rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba yan ne zhes der mang thegamar skyes pa mdzad do// gzhon nu rgyal
byed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyisader bdag ga mang theg mar skyes pa mdzad pa thos nas/ shin tu dga' bar gyur to/ dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes pa des nor gyi rigs las bcom ldan 'das kyi
'i rin po che sna bzhi'i sgo khang byed du bcug go/ de bzhin du gnas brtan sdud pa byed pa rnams kyis kyang mdo sde'ang du/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// zhes gdags pa byas sa// ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis dge sbyong go'u ta ma ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ mnyan yod du byon nas/ mkhan/

yodon rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te shes ldan ge'u nyam de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bdag
nyid zhal gyis 'chi'o zhes thosas// thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' ba dang/ yang dag par
mgu bar 'gyur ba'agatama rnam pa sna tshegs byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug ga/ phyogs gcig tu'adug nas/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis/ bcom
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kyego'u ta ma bdag gis shes ldan go'u ta ma blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs bar sangs rgyas par bdag nyid zhal gyis 'tsho'o
zhes thes lags na/ go'u ta mgangadag de skad ces lung ston pa de dag cu go dge sbyong go'u ta ma la skur pa 'debs ba ma lags sam/ thal bar smra ba ma lags sam/ shes ldan go'u ta mas gsung
pa bzhin skya b.lags sam/ chos skya ba lags sam/ chos dang mthun pa'i chos lungaston pa lags sam/ tshig de dag gi drung du pha rol po chos dang mthun par rtsod pa'i rjes su rtsod pa
mchis na/ snyed pa'i chos kyi gnas su ma 'gyur lags sam/ rgyal po chen po gang dag ji skad du smra ba dag de skad du lung ston ba bdenate/ nga la skur pa 'debs pa ma yin/ thal bar
sna ba ma yan/ de ni gsungs pa bzhin skya ba yin/ chos skya ba yin/ chos dang mthun pa'i chos lung ston pa yin te/ de dag gi drung du pha rol po chos dang mthun pa'i rtsod pa'i rjes su rtsod pa
'angos na skyed pa'i chos kyi gnas su ma 'gyur ro/ rgyal po chen po de ci'i phyir zhen/ ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyus so// shes ldan go'u ta ma de
skad gsung bod kyi shes ldan go'u ta ma la bdag yid ma chis lags so/ de ci'i slar ngu zhen/ kyi go'u ta ma re zhig rgan zhang rgan pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze na 'di dag lags te/ 'di lta ste//
'od srungs rdzogs byed dang 8 kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu dang/ smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu pha bdag rgyal ba can dang/ mi pham skra'i la ba can dang/ ka ta'i bu nog can dang/ gcer bu gnyen
gyi bu gang lags pa de dag kyang/ dadung bran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bdag nyid g.yar gyis ma 'che lags nA/ bshes ldan go'u ta ma
'khrungs nas rang pa ma lags pa/ gsar du rab tu byung bas lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ rgyal po chen po gzhon nu bzhi po 'di dag la khyad du gsad par ma bya/ gzhon nu la thol gyis gnon par
ma bya pa/ rgya gzhon nu la zal gyis gnon par ma bya'o/// spyan lan rgyalarags gzhan nu khyad du gsad par ma bya/ gzhon nu la zil gyis gnon par ma bya'o// rgyal po chen pasal gale kha bkab[----]
rgyal po chen po ma chung ngu la khyad du gsad bar ma bya/ chung ngu la zil gyis gnon par ma bya'o// rgyal po dge slong gzhon nu la khyad dugs
par ma bya/ gzhon nu la zal gyis gnon par ma bya'o// rgyal pa de ci'i phyir zhen/ dge steng gzhon nur gyur kyang/ de rdzu phrul che zhing mthu che ba'idagra bcom par 'gyur ro// bcom
ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas na/ bde gshegs kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad gsungs// rgyal rigs dpe byad/
ldan pa dang/ rigs btsun grags par ldan pa la// blo dang ldan pas de gzhon zhes// khyad du ma gsad zal ma gnon// rgyal po rgyal rigs mkhas pa yis// rgyalasude dag thob
gyur nas// chad pas gcod pa'i gnas de yod// de bas de la shan tu gdud// de ltar rang gi sregabasrung zhing// rang gi don la lta bsan// de na khyad du ma gsad cing// de la
tsha legs par bag kyang byu// gal te grong ngab dgen ba'ang rung// gang du sbrul na mthong gyur na// blo dang ldan pas de gzhon zhes/ de khyad ma gsad zil ma gnon// 'di ltar sbrul
na rgyu ban/ rigs ni rnam pa sna tshogs la// glags rnyed nas ni gzhen nus kyang// skyes pa bud med du ma zani// de ltas rang gi srog bsrung zhing// rang gi don la lta bas na//
donikhyad du ma gsad cing// de la legs par bag kyang bya// mang po srogatsang 'bar byed pa// lam gzhag bsreg bya za ba'i mi 2/ blo dang ldan pas de chung zhes// khyad du ma gsad zil
mgon// men chung ngur gyurang yang// rkyen la chen por gyur pa yin// mesan ring por mi thogs par/ grong rtal dang na grong khyer sreg/ de ltar rang gi srog bsung zhing// rang
ga don la lta bas na 'di na khyad du mgasadatsang/ 'dil legs par bag kyang bya// lamazhag bsreg bya za ba'i mis// nags tshal bsregs pa gang yin de// zhag 'das nas ni/
'ga' zhig tu// 'dab ma rnams ni skye 'gyur gyi// dge slong tshul khrims ldan pa la// brten nas gang zhig tshig gyur pa// de la bu tsha yod min pas// bgoskal spyod pa theb ma
'gyur/ tA la'i mgon gcad pa bzhin// ring por ma thogs rabs kyang 'chad/ de bas rang ga srog bsrung zhing// rang gi don la lta bas na/ de na khyad du mi gsad cing//
de la legs par bag kyang bya// rgyal rigs dpe byad ldan pa dang// de bzhin brang 'gro ma dang ni// dge slong tshul khrims ldan de la/ 'bro dang ldan pas brnyas ma bya// de bas
rang gi srog bsrung zhing// rang gi don la lta bas na// de la khyad du ma gsang rung// de la legs par bag kyang bya// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal banom ldan 'das kyis
gsungs pa la mngon ng ra dga' ste rjes su yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snga na snga nas dong ngo// denus
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasargyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon medazas sa kyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// kes la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rgyal po zas gtsang la song yag bkur ba/
[4] ]@#/// lhadagyes pa bskyed du gsol/ khyed kyi sras kyis bdud rtsi thob nas/ bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par byed do zhes springs pa/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos nas kho

btang ba las de nyid du rab tu byung ngo// gnyis pa ba dang ba dang/ de yang de nyid du rab tu byung ste/ pho nya gang dang gang btang ba de dang de dag nyid du legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid la bab tu/

byungabar gyur to// rgyal pa zos gtsang lag kha la 'gram pa gtad nas pho nya gadzad ng gang btang ba de dang de dag de nyid du legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'du'atha ba nyid la rab tu byung ngo snyam nas/ saMms
khongos su chud tsang 'dug pa/ 'char khas mthong nas smras pa/ lhatsa'i slad du khyodaphyag la zhal gtud nas thugs ma dgyes shing bzhugs/ des smas pa/ 'char kha gang gatsho gzhen
nu don thams cad grub pa dka' ba med pa de'i tshe/ khobs 'phrin yig spel ba'i ma btang ba las de dag kho bos gan du 'ongs nas/ gzhen nu don thams cad grub pa bzhugs pa 'di dang 'a8sa
bzhugs s zhes smra'o// da ni kho bos 'phrin yig skyel ba'i mi gtangan 'ga' yang 'phrin khyer te ma 'ong na ji ltar sems khongs su chud par ma 'gyur/ 'char khas smras pa// lha bdag
mchiste bka' bzhin 'tshal nas slar mchi'o// rgyal po zas gtsang gsasmras pa/ 'char kha gang dang gangasong ba de de'i ston pa phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas/ de nyid du 'dug pas khyed kyang song na/
de nyid du 'dug par 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do/ 'char khas smas pa/ lta spur mchi lags so// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang rang nyid kyis 'phrin yig bris pa/ lhums su zhugs
pa bzung nasasu/ khyod ni bdag gis cher bskrun te// nyon mongasame rab 'bar bzhin du/ rgyal po ljon shang la bsdadan// da ni khyed kyi slob ma yi// yal ga lcag ma 'phel gyur pas//
gzhan bde bas dga' bar gyur// bdag ni sdug bsngal skal bar ldan// gzhan ya nga gang gis khyod ni ljon shing lcag phran mtshungs tsam na// bdag gabun 'di ya sA mo nas chung nas bskrun
bskrun te// bu drug yul mas 'bras bu yongs su spyod thebs// de la yon tan 'bras bu ma ster khyod la snying rjemed// gang tshe thog ma bltams pa na/ nying don bsgrubs nas gnyen rnamos
ni/ shAn tu che thang phan gdags zhes// khyed kyirim bca' mdzad nas na// khyed kyis zhi gnas de brnyedan// bdag dang gzhan gyi tshogs rnams la// thugs brtse rjes su zung mdzod do//
gshegs par dgongs pa mdzad du gsal// zhes spring ba'i yang gi 'char khas khyer nas chas ram gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang/ lam gyis dub pa ngal bses nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang
na bder song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsal pa'i yi ge lags sos bcom ldan 'das la ya ge phul ba dang/ bcom ldan 'ang de las bzhes nas bkags
[7/ ]@#// so bklags nas yage mtha' gcig tu bzhag pa dang/ 'char khas gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das lags/ ser skya'i gzhi'i ma bzhud dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/
bka' stsal pa// 'char kha'adong ngo// 'char kha snon bcom ldan 'das dang lhag par 'dris pa yan sa/ de sngon gyi 'dris pa khe nas gsel pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te ma bzhud dang//
bdag ga mthus bkra bar bgyi lags so// de nas btsem ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig yul gyi rgyal por ma chags shing// sred 'gas bkra ba yod
pa ma yin pa'i// sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas mnga' ba de// gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi yis bkra// gang zhig yul gyi rgyal mor ma chags shing// sred 'gas bkra ba yod pa ma yin pa'i/
sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa ya rtsal mnga' de// gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi yis bkra// gang zhig bcom nas brtsigs pa med gyur cing// 'jig rten ma bcom cung zad yod min pa// sangs rgyas spyod
yul mtha' yas mnga' ba de// gzhi med nan gang ga gzhayas bkra// gang zhig bcom nas brtsigs pa med gyur cing// 'jig rtan ma bcom cung zad yodaman pa// sangs rgyas mtha'
las pa ya rtsal mnga' de// gzhi med nan gang gas gzhi yus bkru/ lan la spobs pamed nas gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po zas gtsang la
rig par bgyi'o// 'char kha sangs rgyas kyi pho ka ni 'di lta bu ma yin no// 'char khas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci 'dra ba zhig lags/ rab tu byung ba yin gyis/ khyod kyang rab tu
byung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang la slar mchibar dam bcas lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'char kha rab tu byung la dza ltar dam bcas
pa bzhin du gyisashog/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpar rgyu'apa na yab da/ yumadang/ mkhanapa dang/ slob dpon dang/ bla ma dang/ bla ma'i gnas lta
bu rnams kyi chos dang mthun pa'i tshig lan 'ga' yang sur ma bzlog go/ 'char khas gsal nga/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de lta na rab tu 'byung lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'char kha 'don yun ring po'i don dang/ phan pa dang/ bde ba'i phyir rab tu byung zhag/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal
zhes tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas 'char kha rab tu phyung/ bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te/ kun tu spyod pa'i tshis dag de la rgyas par smras nas/
'char kha 'don khyod kyis bya ba yin te/ deng phan chad bud med dang lhan gcig khang pa gcig tu nyal bar ma bya'o zhes bya ba dag go/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes 'char khas tshe dang ldan pa
'a ri'i bu'i rkang pa gzhan la mgo bos phyag byas te sangs/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba derasong ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mge bos phyag/
byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir mchi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal la/ 'char kha song la khyod de mdo
kho nar rgyal po'i khab tu ma 'jug par sku ra sdod la/ shAkya'i dge slong 'ongs so zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te nang du spyod cig ces gleng na 'jug par bya'o// zhugs nas gal teshAkya'i
dge slong gzhan yang yod dam zhes zer/ 2 yod de zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te gzhon nu de'o thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra zhange cha byad 'di 'dra 'am zhes 'dran/ 'di 'dra zhang cha byad 'di
'dra'o zhes brjod par bya'o// khyod kyi rgyal po'i khab tu yang gnas par ma bya'o// gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang rgyal po'i khab tu gnas bar ma byed dam zhes gleng na/ ma bzhug
sa zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te gang du gnas par byed ces 'drani/ dgon pa 'am gtsug lag khang du'o zhes brjod par bya'o// gal rtagatsug lag khang ci 'dra zhes 'drin/ rgyal bu
rgyal byed kyi tshul gyi rnam pa bus bstan par bya'o// gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byon nam zhes 'dri na/ byonan zhes brjod par bya'o// rje sudi ga na byon zhes 'dun/ zhag
0/ bdun lon na'o zhes brjod par bya'o// des gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ song zhig/ sa bdag rnams ni tshig gas te//
lha rnams bsams pas grub 'gyur zhing// de bzhinabasam gtan pa rnams kyi// sems bskyed pas na thams cad 'grub// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha de ji ltar skad cig

nyid la grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir son pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa 'chang la bcom ldan 'a sa la dad pa mi bzad ba skyes pa de rgyal po'i khab kyi sgor bsdad nas smras pa/ shes
ldan dag rgyal po 'ashAkya'i dge slong mchis so zhes gsol cig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ tsashAkya'i dge slong gzhan dag kyang yod dam/ shes ldan dag yod do// de rnams kyis/ rgyal
pa la smras pa// shAkya'i dege slong mchis so// rgyal pos smras pa/ nang du theng zhig/ de nang du zhugs pa rgyal po zas gtsang gas mthong nas smras pa/ 'char kha rab tu byung ngam/ des
sa pa/ lha rab tu byung ngo// khyod slar 'ong zhes smras pa ma yin nam/ 'ditse yin/ 'char khas smas pa/ lhabcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi pho 1 ni 'di lta bu ma yin bka'
stsal nas/ chos 'dul ba legs par gsungs pa'i phyir bdag rab tu byung mod kyi/ bdag rang gi ded pas kyang rab tu byung ngo// rgyal pos yan lag thams cad kyis 'khyud nas stan bsham
pa nyide la 'dug tu bcug ste/ de'idon du chu brtags pa gtsang ma dang/ 'bras bu brtags pa gtsang sbra byas te thar bcugago/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha mchog tu zhib zhib dang/
dul bar gnas pa dang ldan zhing/ ji skad rjes su bstan pa'i tshig bzhin yongs su legs spyod do// rgyal pos de la brtags nas ngo mtshar skyes te smas pa// 'char kha tsa gzhon nu don thams cad
grub pa yang 'di 'drab r nye bar zhi ba yin nam/ 'char khas smras pa/ lha bdag gdul ba dang nye bar zhi ban cung zad tsam lags s// dper ji lta bu/ ri rab dang yungs 'bru bzhin no// rgyu
mtsho dang rmig rjes bzhin no// na ma dang srin bu me khyer bzhin no// nam mkha' dang pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i bu kha bzhin no// rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ 'char kha gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa/
yang 'di 'dra zhang cha byad 'di 'dra 'am/ lha 'di 'dra zhing cha byed 'di 'dra'o// rgyal po zas gtsang brgyal nas sa la 'gyel ba dang/ chu mang du btab nas dbugs sur byung ste smras pa/ 'char
kha gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byonanam/ 'char khas smras pa/ byon no// dus ja sradi cagan/ dgung bdun lon na'o// rgyal po zas gtsang gis bon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan
dag gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byon par 'gyur gyis/ rgyal po'i khab dang pho brang phyi dor gyis shage/ 'char khas smras pa/ lha bcom ldan 'das ni pho brang du bzhugs par ma mdzad do//
rgyal pos smras pa/ gang du bzhugs/ 'char khas lcas pa/ dgen ba 'am gtsug lag khang du'o// rgyal po zas gtsang gas smras pa// 'char kha gtsug lag khang ci 'dra ba yin/ tshe dang ldan

ba 'char khas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa ri mor bris te bstan to// de nas rgyal pos/ blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshel gyi rnam pa

gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang/ khang phran drug cu brtsig tu chug cig/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes blon po rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la makananas/ n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rgyal bu/

rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang/ khang phran drug cu brtsig tu bcug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'a8sa kyas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka'
stsal to// mo'u 'gal gyi bu song la/ dge slong rnams la bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir gshegs te/ yab sras gdan 'dzoman/ khyed cag las su zhig lta bar spro ba de chos gos long zhige
ces sgo zhig/ btsun pa bka'aphazhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/ dge slong rnams la smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das
ser skya'i gzhir gshegs te/ yab sras gdan 'dzoman/ khyed cag las su lha bar sprob de chos gos dag long zhig sa bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba/ 'khor dul ba//
zhib/ 'khor zhi ba/ grol ba// 'khor grol ba/ dbugs phyin pa/ 'khor dbugs phyin pa/ rnam par dul ba/ 'khor rnam bar dul ba/ dgra bcom ba/ 'khor
dgra bcom pa// 'dod chags dang bral ba/ 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba/ mdzes pa// 'khor mdzes pa/ khyu mchog ba lang gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ glang po che glang po che phrug gu'i
tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ seng ge mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nam mkha' ldadi bya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ bram
[}]ze slob ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ sman pa mkhas pa nad pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ dpa' bo ru pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ lam mkhan 'gron po'i tshigs kyis bskor ba lta
bu/ ded dpon tshong pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ khams kyi rgyal phran blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'khor los sbyar ba bu stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs
kyis bskor ba lta bu/ num 'od gzer stong gas bskor ba lta bu/ yul 'kher skyeng dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'phags skyes po grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ mag
ma bzang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rnam thos sras gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ thag bzangs ras lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ brgya byin sum
tsu rtsa gsum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ tshangs pa tshangs pas kyi tshigs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rgya mtsho g.yo ba med pa lta bu/ smren rgyu dang bcas pa lta bu/ glang po dam la dregs pa dang
bral ba ltar dbang po rnams shin tu dul bas spyod lam gyi tshul ma 'khrugs pa/ sku skyes bu chen po mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan ba/ dpe byadebazang po brgyud myus rnam par spras/
[-- ]pa NA sa kyi tshan khagaphyis las ngan gyis 'bad khang btsa na zla
ma'i 'od gzor song bas lhag pa'i 'od can/ rin pa che'i ri bi 'grob ltar kun nas mdzes pa/ stobs bcu dang/ ma 'jigs pa bzhi dang/
ma 'dres pa 'dren pa che bar gzhag pa gsum dang/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu 'bab chu ro hikAr byon no// rgyal po zas gtsang gas gzhon
nu don thams cad grub pa 'bab chu ro ha kar byon no zhes thos sa// thos nas kyang rgyal po zas gtsang gis grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi rdzob dang/ rgyu ma dang/ gseg ma rnams bsal nas/
tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ drangegan tu zhim po'i pog par zhi bar bshams/ dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po dbyangs te/ gang yang 'bab chu ro hoka nas/ gang yang rgya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba
do kha cig ni [“]shing 'dar bar byed do// kha cig ni khrus byed do// ser skya'i gzhin gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa gshegs sa
zhes thes so// thos nas kyang kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bskul/ kha cig ni ya mtshan skyes nas/ thams cad rgya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba nas byung ste/ ci yab sras kyi zhabs la phyag
byed dam/ 'on te sras yab kyi zhabs la phyag byed pa blta'o snyam mo// 'dul ba gzha/// bam po gcig pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das
'di snyam du dgongs te/ gal te nga zhabs kyis se ra skya'i gzhir gshegasan/ shAkya nga rgyal can rnams/ kye ma'o gzhon nu don thams cad grub pas dka' thub kyi nags su gshegs nas/
lhod pa zhig grub pa lta zhig ste/ de lha brgya stong phrag du mas zhabs 'bring byas nas steng gnam mkha' las gshegs te dus de srid du dka' ba brgya stong spyad pas/ bdud rtsa thob nas de zhabs kyis
gshegs pa lta zhes ma dad pa skyed par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar thugs mnyam par gzhagan/ shar phyogs kyi snying gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas/
spyod lam rnam pa bzhi mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ 'chag pa dang/ bzhengs pa dang/ bzhugs pa dang/ mnal ba mdzad do// me'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug par mdzad do//
me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ sangs rgyas btsem ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od gzer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin nga ra mdzad de/ 'di lta ste// sngon po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar
bo dang/ dkar po dang/ le brgan dang/ shel gyi kha dog dag ge/ cho 'phrul zung du yang ston par mdzad de/ sku'i smad nas 'bar bar mdzad la/ sku'i stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'babs par
mdzad do// sku'i stod nas 'bar bar mdzad la/ sku'i smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so// shar phyogs la ji lta bar lho dang/ nub
dang/ byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no// phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe 'phrul rnam pa bzhibastanas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par 'du mdzad pa bsdus te/ rta la bdun gyi sridi tsam na bzhugs so//
dge slong rnams ni de la drug gi sridi tsamana'o// bcom ldan 'das drug gi sridi tsam na// dge slong rnams lnga'i sridi tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'dasaM lta'i sridi tsaman na/ dge slong rnams bzhi'isridi
tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'dus bzhi'i sridi tsam na na/ dge slongo rnams gsum gyi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das gsum gyi sridi tsam nan/ dge slong rnams gnyis kyi sridi tsam na'o//
! bcom ldan 'das gnyis kyi sridi tsam nan/ dge slong rnams rta la gtsag gsudi tsamana'o// bcom ldan 'das mi bdun gyisridi tsam na bzhugs zhani/ dge slong rnams ma drug gi srid tsam na'o//
bcom ldan 'das drugagi sridi tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams ltar sridi tsamana'o// bcom ldan 'das lnga'asrid tsamanan/ dge slong rnams bzhi'i sride tsamana'o// bcom ldan
'das bzhi'i slade tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams gsum gyi sradi tsamana'o// bcom ldan 'das gsum gyi sriditsamanan/ dge slong rnams gnyis kyi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das gnyis kyi sriditsam
na dge slong rnams ma gang lhag tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das ma gang lhag tsamanan/ dge slong rnams sa la'o// rgyal po zas gtsang gas cho 'phrul de lta bu da dang// dge slong mang po mthong

nas/ de la bcom ldan 'das gang yin pa ma shes te rmongs par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha la smras pa/ 'char kha 'don ngur smig gyon pa'i rab tu byung ba mang po zhig yod na/ de la gzhon
tshes nu gang yani/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas btsem ldan 'das bstan nas smras pa/ 'di na bcom ldan 'das lags srid pa'i mthar byed sems kyi dbang phyug 'dren pa lags// 'dani ten mas
sal mdzad nyid byed de de donan kun tu ston mdzad lags// 'di'i dgongs pa bzhin brnyes stobs bcu mnga' bas kun gyi pha rol gshegs pa lags/ dri med gsal ba ches kyi dbang phyug khyod
kyisras lags ma dbang da gzigs shig/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis lus btud nas zhabs la phyag byas te/ tshigs su bcad pas gsol pa// blo gros phas pa khyod la 'di dang ni//
kun spyan zhabs la lan gsum phyag bgyis te// bltams pa'i tshe na sa ni g.yos pa dang// 'dzam bu'agrib ma sku las ma 'das ba'o//de nas shakya dngashAkya mo rnams kyis/ rgyal po zas
gtsang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs pa mthen gnas / de ltar yab sras kyi zhabs la phyag byed pa ni tha tshig sa ma dad pa bskyed do// rgyal po zas gtsang gis shAkya dang shAkya mo rnams
la go bar bya ba'i phyir 'di skad ces smras so// shes ldan dag da gdod kho bos gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i zhabs la phyag byas pa ma yan/ gang gi tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa
bltams pa nas chen po g.yos par gyur cing/ 'jig rten 'di thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyurato 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi bar gyi chun gnag smag tu gyurang/ ki ma dang
zla ba 'digs 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba'i 'od kyi snang ba nyams su ma myong ba gang yin pa de yang/ de'i tshe snang ba rgyu chen pos gsal bar gyur nas/ desems can gang dag
skyes pa de dag snang ba des sems can dag gcig gis gcig mthong nas/ shes ldan dag 'dari sems can gzhan dag kyang skyes pa lta/ shes ldan 'daresems can gzhan dag kyang skyes pa lta
zhes ngo shes par gyur pa de'i tshe yang/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas so// gang gi tshe gzhon nu de'o thams cad thub pa zhing las kyi mtha' la gzigs pa na/
shang 'dzam bu'i grib ma la bzhugs nas/ 'dod pa rnams las dben pa/ sdig pa ma dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyad pa dang bcas ba/
dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang/ bde ba zag pa med pa dang mtshungs pa'i basam gtan dang po lhabar bsgrubs te bzhugs pa na/ shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma nashar phyogs su gzhol/ sha
phyogs su 'bab/ shar phyogs su bab kyang/ shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i sku las mo 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe yang/ ngomatshar rmad du byung ba'i chos des kho ba'i yidi bsdus/
pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yang phyag byas te/ 'dodang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la lan gsum phyag byas s// de bas na 'di skad/ blo gros yangs pa khyed la 'di dang ni/ kun
sbyan zhabs la lan gsum phyag bgyis te// bltams pa'i tshi nas na g.yas pa dang/ 'dzam bu'agrib ma sku las ma 'das pa'o// zhes smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul
mngon par 'du mdzad pa de brdul nas/ 'khor brgya stong phrag du ma zal gyis mnan nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa de la bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang skad
'dzin cing snying dang mig mchi mas gang bas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ gzhal med khang gi gnas rnams las// yab kyi khab na bzhugs pa las//
dgon pa'i 'jigs dang bcas rnams su// ji lta bur na 'ba' zhig bzhugs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// ma la bdag po gang dun// khyim gyi 'ching ba las grol ba// 'phag
pa ya ni gnas pa bcu// thub pa rnams ni gnas par mdzad// rgyal pos gsol pa// bas gser gyi rtsa ba can// shin tu bde ba btang ba yi// khri la mnal bar mdzad pa las// gdang
ba la ji ltar mnal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po rnam grel gnas mal ni// dga' ba byang chub yan lag gi/ me tog bkram par chags med tsang// yongs su
gdung ba rnamasngangs mnal// rgyal pa zas gtsang gis gsol pa// dpa' bo nyid kyi khab nan// gser dngul bum pas khrus mdzad na// rnyog pa can la dro ba ya/ chab kyis ji ltar khrus
mdzad lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// go'u ta ma dad pa'i 'bab chu rtog ba med// bsod nams 'jug ngogs dam pas bsngags pa ste// de la rig pa'i yon tan rmed bkrus
na/ lus ma gsher bar pha rol rab tu rgyal// rgyal po zas gtsang gas gsel pa/ dpa' bo khyed sngon ser skya ya ]/tsan dan gyis sku bkrus shing/ kasha'i mchog gnas mdzes pa lag
de dang bral nas mdzes ma lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// tshul khrims nga yi rgyan yin te// tshul khrims de na byug pa yani// gser dang nor bu rna cha dag/ rmongs
bskyed nga la ci zhig bya// rgyal pos gsol pa// dpa' bo nyid kyi pho brang na// glang po shing rta rtas bzhud pa// tsher mar bcas pa'i sa gzhi la// zhabs kyis ji
ltar gshegs par mdzad// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga ya shing rta rdzu 'phrul rkang// yang dag rtsol ba'i bzhon pa yas// sa kun rnam par rgyun yang// nyon mes
tsher mas gnod pa med// rgyal po zas gtsangags gsal ba/ da 'bo sngonanaka tsAka'i// na bza' mnabs na mdzes pa las// ngur smig rtsub po'i gos mnabs pa// ji ltar
khyod kyis las bzod// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po nga'i gos ngo tsha shes// nga yi bsgob snam sbyar te// de bgos thub pa zhi ba rnams// thugs khrong nan mdzes par
gyur rgyal po zas gtsang gas gsel pa/ 'di ltar khyod sngon gsar gyi gzhong pa nas// du ma'i ri ldan 'bras chen gsol pa las// 'di ltar gtso bo da lta'i bsod snyoms na ke/ phal
pa gsol ba ji ltar mgur du mcha// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zas kyi srid pa thams cad spangs nas ni// nges par byung dang mnyam par bzhag ldan pa'i// ngan chos kyi ri
mchog gsal mdo kyi// 'jig rten kun la brtse phyir nga spyod do// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsal pa/ mgur du bde ba mang bgyid pa'i// dgun skyems kha ra'arlab gsal na//
rtog pa can la dro ba yi// chab na ji lta zhig tu gsol// bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsal pa// ma ya bdag po gang 'thus na// bdag la btung ba thams cad na// dug dang 'dra bar snang gyur
pa chos kyi ro mchog nga btung ngo// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ 'di ltar khyod sngon bsal khang gzhal med khang///khang bzangs stengan ji lta'i dus bzhin bzhugs// da lta gcig
pu nags khrod khyod bzhugs pa// blo bzangs ji ltar b snyengs pa med par bzhugs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ go'u ta ma 'jigs pa'i rtsa bgang yin de// dri ma bag chags
bcas par dras spangs pas// nga la mya ngan 'jigs pa med gnas te// nga la 'dan 'jigs pa cung zad med// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ khyod sngon khrus khang shin tu yid 'ong
bar khrus mchog khyad par 'phags pas rtag bsal na// gcig pu khyong nanags khrod gnas ldan par// thub dbang da ltar su yis khrus mdzad 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa go'u ta ma chos kyi mtsho bran dri med pa// tshul khrims 'jug ngogs dam pas sngags pa ste// de la rig nga 'i yon tan mgi bkrus na// lus ma gsher bar pha rol rab tu rgyal// rgyal
po zas gtsang gis gsol pa// gang gas khyod ni khyad du gsod// gang las 'jigs su rung ba ste// yade 'byung ba yang gang las skye// zhus pa de dag bdag la gsungs// bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gang gas ngan khyad gsod dang// gang zhig las 'jigs pa dang// gang las yade byung skyes pa dag// kog cig khyod la bshad par bya// rgyu dang
na dang 'chib ste// gal te 'di gsum yodi mnan// nga yang shA lu yadi 'ong ba'i// yul rnams lan dga' bar 'gyur// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ shAkya rnams kyi rigs dga' ba//
legs par 'khrungs pa'idapa' bo lags// khyod ni 'jig rten chos brgyad kyis// ji lta bur yang ma gos so// de nas rab dga' dad pa rgyus byas nas// drang song dge 'dun bskor ba byas nas
na thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bde bar gshegs la kun nas rtog cing 'dug/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bdag gabus yon tan gyi tshogs 'du lta bu
thob pa ni// bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed de snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar/ 'khor de'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal ba dang/ khams dang/ rang
bzhin mkhyenanas/ de dang mthun pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas zas dkar la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri bdun stong gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ rgyalapo zas
gtsang na ma gtogs// lha sbyin nga rgyal can las kyang nga rgyal can sdig pa 'ded pa des bden pa mthong bar ma byas pas/ khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa dang bcas pas smras pa/ gal te bdag gi/
'di 'drab 'i sgyu mas dbang du byed par shesan/ bdag gis kyang 'jig rten thams cad dbang du bya ba zhig/ de la shAkya rnams kyis bshes pa'i tshigs gsas pa/ lha sbyin bcom ldan 'das ni
rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba yin gyis/ de skad ma s+sa 'ag ces bzlog nas/ cang mats+tsha bar 'dug go/ tshangs pas bskorab 'i skyed mos tshal du 'ad lta bu'i bshad pa mdzad de/ ri thes pas rgyal
po zas gtsang ma gtogs par/ bre bo zas la sogs pa shAkya drug khri drug stong gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pan yang/ lha sman de kho na bzhin du kha zer ro// ro ha ri ka'ad/
mos tshal du 'ad lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang ma gtogs bar/ bdud rtsiwas la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri lnga stong gas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/

pa na yang/ lha sbya'i de kho na bzhin du kha zer ro// 'khor lhag ma rnams las kha cig gsan ten thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do// kha cig gas ni rangasas rgyas kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do//
khag gas ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/ kha cig gsan rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ khacig gis na lan gi phyi'i 'phas ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig
gas na phyir ma 'ongs ba'i 'bras bu/ khacag gas na rab tu byung nasakon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom par gyur/ kha cig gas sangs rgyas la skyabs su song/ kha cig gis mchis
la/ khacig gis ni dge 'dun laste/ 'khor de dag kyang phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol/ chos la 'bab/ dge 'dun la bab par bkod do// de nas rgyal po zasagatsang
'ad snyam du sems// sngon na bcom ldan 'das lha dang lha ma yan gyi 'gro bar bcas pas/ mchod pa dang/ rjod pa dang/ mngon du sba bar bya bar gyung na/ da ltan mas mched kyi/ lhas na
ma yin no snyam mo// de nas shAkya gzhon nu zhage gas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ drang song chen po mchog dam chos kyi// char pas 'gro ba 'dani tshom mdzad de// mi bzad lam du lcang
ba'i 'jig rtan 'di// drengs te thar pa'i lam la sbyar bar mdzod// rgyal po zas gtsang na 'di snyam du/ bdag ga bu 'ba' zhig 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhang 'ad lta mthu che ba yin no snyam ste/
lhag par dga' bas bden pa ma mthong ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis ci'i phyir bden pa ma mthong snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam du bdag gabu 'ba' zhig 'di ltar
rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin no snyam ste/ lhag par dga' ba las gyur gyis/ mdor na de 'drigs pa stong du gzhug go/ rgyu gnyis kyis bden pa rnams mthong bar ma 'gyur tu/ ha cang zhum
pa dang shin tu dga' ba'o// de la zhum pa'i sems da shan tu dga' ba yod kyis/ ma la ngas de'i zhum pa dngashar du dga' ba gos spong du gzhug go snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu rgyal po zas gtsang la soms shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhis/ tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos
bcom ldan 'das las mnyananas/ rgyal po zas gtsang gang na ba der song ba dang/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis tshe dang ldan ba mo'u 'gal gyabu chen po rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngo// mthong nas
kyang tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po tshur gyen/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po khyod byon pa legs so// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu
chen po gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs r shog/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos sems ji ltar mnyam
par gzhagan rang ga stan las ma snang bar gyur te/ shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas/ spyod lam rnam pa bzhibyid de/ 'di lta ste/ 'chag pa dang/ 'greng ba dang/
'dug pa dang/ nyal bar byed do// me'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug par byed do// me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i lus las
'odo gzer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byon par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po dang/ le brgan dang/ shel gyi kha dog dag go/ cho 'phrul zung du
yang ston par byed de/ lus kyi smad nas 'bar bar byed la/ lus kyi stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par byed do// lus kyi stod nas 'bar bar byed la/ lus kyistsad
yis chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par byed pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// shar phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du/ lho dang/ nub dang/ byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no//
phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par 'du bya ba bsdus te/ stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gas/ tshe dang
ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po/ btsem ldan 'das kyi nyan thos 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar mthu che ba gzhan yang mchis lag
sam rgyal po chen po mams so zhes/ tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ mthu che ba dang gsum rig dang// sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa dang// zag zad dgra bcom gang yan pa// thub
pan+ti pa'i nyan thos mang du mchis/ 'di nas rgyal bo zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems/ bdag gi bu 'ba' zhig 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che bar ma zad de/ 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu cha
ba'i rab tu byung ba gzhan yang yod do snyam nas/ de shin tu dga' ba gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to// skabs de'i bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed bar mdzad de/ kye ma
brgya byin dang tshangs ba la sogs pa lha rnams 'ongs na/ lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos bshad do snyam pa dang/ chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thug
bskyed pa mdzad pa de'i/ srog chags grog sbyar rnams kyi sems kyis kyang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa shes par 'gyuran/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa la segs pa lha rnams kyis lta smos
kyang ci dgos/ gang gi tsho 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thugs bskyed bde'atsho/ nyan thos chen po rnams kyi sems kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa ma shes na/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa//
la sogs te lha rnams lta ci smos/ srog chags grog sbyar rnams kyis lta ga la shes/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'as ci'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i
thugs bskyed pa mdzad snyam pa las/ de 'dzisnyam du sems te/ lha'i 'khor dag pa rnams la chos 'chad par bzhed do snyam nas/ de nas lha'i bu bzo thams cad pa la bsgob/ bzo thamasacad
pa bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad par bzhed kyis/ n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar 'an po che sna bzhi'i khang pa rtseg ma gdan sna tshogs bshams pa zhig sprul cig/ ko'u shi ka khyod
kyi mchog tu bzang ngo zhes lha'abu bzo thams cad pas/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin las mnyan te/ n+ya grod+ha'akun dga' ra bar rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa rtsig ma sne tshogs bshams pa zhig
sngal lo// de la rgyal po chen po bzhi sgo bzhin 'khod pa ni yul 'khor skyong dang/ 'phags skyes pa dang/ mag ma bzang dang/ lus ngan po ste/ shar sgo nan yul
'khor skyong dbung rgyan dang/ rna cha gdub 'khor dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ rgyanasna tshogs a brgyan pa'o// lho phyogs na 'phags skyes po lha'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ nub phyogs

nan mig mi bzang rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o// byang phyogs na na lus ngan po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis rgya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba cho
thang du brgyan du bcugaste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la don de rgyas par gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa la sogs

[–/ ]pa lha brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor nas khang pa brtsegs par bzhugs te/ lha'i 'khor phal po cha'i gung la rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i seng ge 'i khri la bzhugs s// de nas tshe

dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos rgyal bo zas gtsang khridi de/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang nang du zhugs pa dang/ rgyal po zas
gtsang la rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong gis/ rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'gro bar sdod cig ces bzlog go/ ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/ der mar gyur/
0 pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo// bzhin bzas khyod su zhig/ rgyal bo chen bo bdagan yul 'khor skyong ngo// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang lho sgorasang ba dang/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pos mthongs/
smras pa/ rgyal po chen bo nang du ma 'jug par sdod cig/ rgyal po zas gtsang gas smras pa// bzhan bzangs khyod su zhig/ 'phags skyes pos smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag ni 'phags
skyes po// tsa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/ der mar gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo// de nas rgyal po zasagatsange nub sgor song ba dang/ rgyal po chen po mgi
