ma bzang gas mthong nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug par sdod cig/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig/ mag ma bzang gis smas pa/ rgyal po chen
po bdag ni mig ma bzang ngo// ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/ der mir gyur ba 'jug tu ma dbang ngo// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang byang sgor songab dang//
rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi lus mthong nas smras pa// rgyal po chen po nad du ma 'jug par sdodatsagi/ rgyal po zas gtsang gas smas pa// bzhan bzangs khyod su zhig/ rnam shos kyi bus smras pa/
rgyal po chen po bdagan rnam thos kyi bu'o/ ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/ der mar gyur pa 'jug tu ma dbang ngo// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang kye ma'o//
bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad pa de/ bdag gis blta'o snyam pa'i 'dod pa skyes so// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ga zhumapa'i rgyud gang yin pa de bralaporagyur
do 3bcom ldan 'das kyis dgos pa/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis gal te nga ma mthong na/ khrag dron po skyags nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs gang yin pa de yod kyis/ de la thabs
shag bsham par bya'o snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa brtsigs pa gang yin pa doshel las byas par sprel pa dang/ sa na rgyal po zas gtsang ganges sangs rgyas kyi
sku sgrub pa med par mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis/ rgyal po zas gtsang gabasam pa dang/ bag la nyal ba dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ches bshad pa
mdzad de/ de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ de bden pa/
mthong nas/ lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa// btsun pa bdag la phas ma bgyis/ mas ma lags/ rgyal pos ma lags/ lha rnams kyis ma lags/ sngon gyi 'obs
pa rnams kyis ma lags/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis ma lags/ sdug pa dang/ rang gi skye bo dang/ gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags pa gang lags pa de// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag
la mdzad de/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho na bskabs/ rus pa'i ri bo las na bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo rnams n bkum/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phyi/ bdag lta dang ma rnams kyi
nang dun bzhag go/ yang gsol pa/ pha la lan du phan gdags pa// dam pa'i busan brgya ba gang// khyed kyi bdag la mdzad lags te// sems grol bar gzhol bar bgyis// khyod
kyis brtagan ngan 'gro las// drangs te mtho ris thar pa la// sgram ma 'tshal bar gzhag lags te/ khyod kyis dka' ba mdzad pa legs// mgon po 'o bams khyod kyis// bdag ni
tshong pa rnyed ldan ltar// mtho ris rnyed pas sridi pa ya// longs spyod dag na rnyed par mdzad// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gtsag tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan
'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun rung thabs su cusang bdag gisdum par gdugs tshod sbyor
zhange mams na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po zas gtsang ma la cang ma gsung bas gnang ngo// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang bcom ldan 'das cang ma gsung bas gnang
tu@#// bar ragi nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyispyan snga nas chas te/ zas dkar gangan bder song ste phyin nas/ zas
dka ra la 'di skad ces smras so// gzhon nu khyod rgyal sridi thob kyis/ rgyal sride khyer cig/ ci'i slad du/ ngas bcom ldan 'das kyis+san sngarab den pa mthong bas so// gangagagadugs la 'ag/

de ring kho na'o// bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das gang gi nyi ma la rgya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar tshes bshad pa de'i rtsom la/ bshAkya bdun khri bdun steng dang lhan cig bden pa mthong lags se ri bzhin

du bre bo zas la rgyal srid khyer cig ces smras pa dang/ des smras pa/ bdag gas kyang bcom ldan 'a8sa kyis gang gi tshe tshangs pas bskor ba'i skyed mos tshal du chos bshad pa de'i tshe/ shAkya drug khri drug/

stong dang bden pa mthong lags so// de bzhin du bdud rtsi zas la rgyal sridi khyer cig ces smras pa dang/ des smras pa bdag gis kyang gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das ro ta ka'i skyed mos tshal du chos bshad
pa de'i tshe/ shAkya bdun khri lnga ste dang lhan cig bden pa mthong lags s// gal tedi ltar gyuran/ da su zhig rgyal srid la gzhag/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis
bgyi'o zhes/ de rnams 'dus nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan rgyal srid kyi rebang phyug la dbang bskur ro// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis de nyid kyi mtshan mas gtsang zhing bsad pa'i bza' ba dang
bca' ba dag sta gon byas s nang par sngar langs te gdan bshams shange nor bu'i chu'i snod bzha gnas / bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsol pa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
gdugs tshod la bab lags na/ 'de'i dus la bab pa dgongs su gsel/ de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/ dge slong
gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/ rgyal po zas gtsang ga bkad sa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gdege 'dun gyi gung la gdan
bshams pa nyid la bzhugs s// ri nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong ga rige 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ gtsang zhing bsad pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bas rang
gi lag nas stobs shang tsham par byed de/ rnam thangs du maragatsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bas rang ga lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas
phyag btabs te lcang bzed rgyu bar dza gnas / gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba phul lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung
dbyangs kyis yon bsngo ba mdzad pa/ sbyin pa'i bsod nams gang yin 'das// shAkya rnams kyis bsams pa ya/ yadi la re ba rdzogs nas ni// rtag pa'i gnas ni thib par shog//
thubya// de nas bcom ldan 'das ser skya'agazhishare rgyagro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de bzhin du gnas brtan rnams kyis kyang mdo sde la bcom ldan 'das sarastsa' gzhi shang
rgya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs sa zhis gdags pa byas s// bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi de 'di na bzhugs nas/ na ma gcig na rgyal po'i pho brang du gdugs tshod gsal/ tA ma gcig
tsha ni btsun mo'i nang du gsal le// rgyal po zas gtsang gis ral pa can las rab tu byung ba'i dge slong rnams spyod lam zhi zhing sems dang ba yin na/ 8ka' thub drag po'i brtul zhugs kyi khyad par
dag gis lus gdungs pas/ lus ma mdzes par mthong nga// mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar ral pa can 'di dag spyod lam zhi zhingesems dang ba yin mod kyi// lus
mdzes pa ma yin na 'khor du 'dra ba zhig gis/ btsem ldan 'das mdzes par 'gyur snyam pa las/ des bsams pa// shAkya'i 'khor gyas pa'i no snyam nas/ de nas shAkya thamasu
cad bsags te smras pa/ shes ldan dag gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa rab tu ma byung bar gyur na par 'gyur/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// khyed cag ci zhig byed par
'gyur/ g.yog bgyid par 'gyur ro// de ltar gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal par gyur na/ khyed cag ci'i phyiragayog ma phyid/ lha tsa rab tu 'byung ngam 3
rab tu byung zhig/ chu thams cad dam/ khyim re nas re re'o// bka' bzhin 'tshal/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir dril sgrogs su bcug pa/ rgyal po'i zhal
nga' yulen gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis khyim re nas re re rab tu byung zhig nyes de bka' stsal to/ bre bo zas la bu gnyis yod pa ma 'gags pa dang mang chen no// mang chen nazhing las kyi
mtha' la lhug par brtsonano// ma 'gags pa nasnying gi khang bzas kyiga' la 'dug nas/ skyes pa med pa'i rol mos rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do// ming
chen la mas smras pa/ bu rgyal pos dril sgrogs su bcug pa shAkya rnams las khyim re nas re re rab tu byung zhig ces bsgos/ khyod rab tu byung zhig/ jis smras pa/ bdag ni rab tu mi
'byung gas/ khyod kyi bu sdug pa bde ba dang ldan par gnas pa gang yan pa de rab tu phyung zhig/ bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po can gyi sems can de la khyod 'gran ma chol cig yum khyod gang la/
bgyis pa de bsod nams kyi debang thang chen po na lags mod/ de ring de la cung zad kyang ma bskur dang/ rtsibasodanams kyi dbang thang chen po lags sam ma lags mngon par 'gyur ro do bu re bzhin
du byas tA yid ches par bya'o// desagazeb stong pa rjes bkang nas kha ras dkar pos dkris te/ rgya skyegs la rgyas btab nas/ bu mo mngag gzhug ma'i lag tu bskur nas bsgob/ gal
ga da di nasu yod ces 'dri ba dang/ rtsi yang ma mchis so zhes smos shig/ des de khyer nasasong ba dang/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi shes pa mthong bar 'og tu 'jug pa yan pas/
des bsams pa/ rang sangs rgyas kun shis la bsod sems phul ba gang yin pa de deng ci'i phyi'i zas kyis 'phongs par bya/ de'agazangasbyar bar bya'o zhes/ des rje'u de rnams su sran tshod rang

'chi tshod ma sna tshogs ro dang ldan pa dang zas kyis bkang ngo// jitsam na mngaga gzhug ma des khyer nas ma 'gags pa'i drung du phyin pa dang/ des smras pa/ bu mo 'i nani ci yod/ des smras pa/ gzhon
nu tsa yang ma mchis so// ma 'gags pas bsams pa// bdag la ma byamasan 'dastengong ra ste bskur/ gdon mi za bar 'dunatso yang ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i bsashig bskur gyis/ rezhig
blta'o zhes tsiman kha phye bdang skyed mos tshal de thams cad zas kyi dri zhim pas gang bar gyur to// de bsnams nas ma 'gags pa mchog tu ya mtshan skyes so// de ma la gus pa yin pas/
des ma la zas kyi phung bskur nas sprang ba/ yum gdugs re re zhing zas su yang ma yin ba zhes brgyab 'ad lta bu shastag bskur ba'i rigasaso// des kyang mtheng nas mchog tu ya mtshan skyes te/
des mang chan la bsam nas/ bu mthongo ngam/ yum mthong lags so// khyod la kho mos sngar bsod nams kyi rebang thang chon po'i sems can ma'i skal ba bzang po dang ldan patshal bar 'gan ma rol
tsag skyes masmasasam/ des smras pa/ yum bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po dang ldan yang rung ma ldan yang rung bdag ni rab tu ma 'byung ngo sa/ de ltar mang chen gnas skabs thams cad du khyab
tu byung bar khas len du ma btub bo// de nas des ma 'gags pa la smras pa/ bu rgyal pos dril sgrog tu bcug pa/ shAkya rnams pas khyim renas re ra rab tu byung zhig ces bson/ khyed ni rab tu
'byung ngam/ 'on te khyam par 'dug/ des slas pa// yum rab byung ba la phan yon ci mchis/ nyes dmags tsamachas/ khyim par mchis pa la phan yon tsamachis/ nyes dmigs ci
mchas/ bu rab tu byung bas legs par bsgrubs na mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro// legs par ma bsgrubs na lha dang ma thob par 'gyur ro// khyim par 'dug ste legs par bskyang
na lha dang ma thob bo// ma bskyangs na sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro dang/ yarigs theb de// yum rab tu byung ba'i nyes dmigs gang lags pa da na/ khyim na gnas pa'i phan yon/
lags pas/ de bas na khyonan gnas pa ma 'tshal rgyas/ gnang bar mdzod cig dang rab tu byung ngo shAris smas pa// bu lags kyis de bzhin du gyis shig/ ma 'gags pa'i ni'u zla shAkya'i

rgyal po bzang ldan yin pas de de'i drung du song ngo// de'i tsheshAkya'irgyal po bzang ldan pa wang len te/ de ba wang len pa na rgyud chad nas sgra gzhan du gyur to// ma 'gags pa pa wang len pa la byang ba
yin pas/ des sgra na 'dra bar gyur pa'i rtags bzung nas de sgo bsdad de/ sgo srungs kyi ma lamyas pa/ kun ng rje song la rgyal po bzang ldan la ma 'gags pa lha'i zhal
mthong bar 'tshal nas son sdod tsang mas so zhes gsol cig/ sgo srungs song nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan la smras pa/ lha ma 'gags pa lha'i zhal mthong bar 'tshal nas chab sgon sdod bde
mchis so/ des smras pa/ shes ldan ma 'gags pa la su 'gog/ shes ldan ma 'gags pa nang du thong zhig/ de nad du zhugs pa dang/ rgyal pos 'khyud nas 'dug tu bcug ste snus ba/
khyod 'ongs nas ji sudi lano/ desalcas pa/ gang gi tshe khyod pa wang len pa na rgyud chadanas sgra gzhan du gyur pa nas so// de mchog tu ya mtshan skyes nas/ des smras pa// khyed pa wang len pa la
byang ba yan no// shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smyos pa/ gzhon nu don ci zhig la 'os/ ma 'gags pas smras pa/ lha rgyal po zas gtsang gas dril sgrogs su bcug pa/ shAkya rnams
las khyim re nas re re rab tu byung zhig par bsgo bas/ de khyod kyis mkhyen par mdzodacig/ rab tu 'byung ngo/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te de ltar n kho bo yang rab tu 'byung ste gros bya ba yod
kyis khyod de ring 'di nyid du gnas thob cig/ de de 'di pugs btab bo// mal 'cha' bas rams bag gi dra can gyi gos kyis brnying 'ang me tog gsal mas bkram pa'i mal du ma 'gags

ba nyal ba dang/ de'i 'og na me tog gi rtsa ba yod pa'i rig pa de'i nyams su myong nas sbas pa// ci 'dra'i 'og na rdo phre'u yod dam/ de rnams kyis brtag par brtsams pan/ me tog gi rtsa ba zhig mthong
nas/ de rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes so// ma 'gags pas mtshan mo mi bde bzhin nyal nas nam nangs so// rgyal pos smras pa/ ma 'gags pa tsag bde bar gnyid log gam/ des
! smras pa// lha bde bar gnyid ma log go/ rgyal pos smras pa/ ci'i phyir/ ma 'gags pas smras pa// lha mas bag gi dri can gyi gos btang bar me tog ga sil ma bkram pa'i me tog gi rtsa bas
lus smad lags so// rgyal pos mal 'cha' ba bku gnas / khyod kyis rims bag sad du nan gyi ges btang ste ci bya/ mal 'cha' bas sa pa// lha bdag la dkor bas gtad pa lags so//
rgyal pos dkon pa bkug nas smras pa/ khyod kyis rams bag gi drin gyi 'os shog ste bya bya/ des smras pa/ lngabadag la tha ga pas gtad pa lags so// rgyal pos tha ga pa bkug nas skus pa/
khyod kyis ci'i phyir rams bag gi dri can gyagis dbul[0f10 ]tha ga pas sbas pa// lha snam bu thag pa'i 'phro cung zhig luT pan/ bdag rams kyis thebs bzhin bgyis pa lags so// rgyal bosaM
lcas pa/ gzhon nu khyed kyis ci ltar shes/ des smas pa tshe ba'i rig pa nyams su myong bas rams bag ga drilags so// rgyal po mchog tu ya mtshan skyes te lcas pa/ shes ldan ma
'gags pa ni shAkya'i skal ba bzang po dang ldan pa yin no// de nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang lhan gyis smras pa/ gzhon nu gal te kho bo rab tu byung na/ lhaspyin shAkya rnams kyi rgyal
par gyur te/ deshAkya rnams la gnod pa byed par 'gyur gyas/ ma la bdag cag thams cad 'dus la/ lha sbyi'i spro ba bskyed bar bya'o zhes// shAkya'i rgyal pa'i thang nga ldan kyis de bkug ste/ de nas
thams cad 'dus nas smras pa// lha spyin kho bo cag thams cad rab tu 'byungan khyed na byed/ lha sbyin kyis bsams pa/ gal te rab tu ma 'byung ngo zhes lcas pa dang/ shAkya'i rgyal po
bzang ldan rab tu 'byung bar ma 'gyur gyis/ de la thabs shagabasham par bya ste bsu'o// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'dis kyis gangag ma la rgya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar skya ma'i cho 'phrul bstan pa
de'i tshe bdag blo skyes pa// ji ltar 'di'i skya mas skye bo'i tshogs chen po dbang du byed pa de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang dbang du bya'o zhes bsam mo snyam nas smras pa/ khyed cig rab tu 'byungan/
bdagan ste 'dug/ shAkya'i rgyal po bzung ldan gyis bsams pa// 'di ni ba rdzun du smub yazhigyus/ dam 'char bcug la 'gro ba mang pos so sor gang ra bya'o snyam mo// des rgyal pos
tshig de glegs bu la bres nas/ grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir dril sgrogs su bcug nga/ grong khyer ser skya'i gzhin gnas pa'ishes ldan dag nyen cagi/ bzang ldan dang/ nam gru dang/ ma 'gag
pa dang/ lha sbyin la sogs te/ shAkya lnga brgya rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur gyis/ sa par gyis la rab tu dga' ba skyed cig ces bswe'o// lha sbyin gyis de shes nas sdug bsngal chen po dang/ yani
mabade ba skyes nas/ gal te bdagags shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan sa par rab tu 'byung bar shes par gyur dang/ bdag khas len par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ nga rnagal te rab tu ma byung na brdzun du snub
yani no zhes/ rgyal srid kyang thob par ma 'gyurabs/ thams cad kyi thams cad du rus 'dar zad dam/ dus rab tu byung la bdag rab tu 'byung bzhin rgyal sradi bya'osnyam mo// de nas rgyal po
zas gtsang 'di snyam du sams te/ shAkya rnams kyi thuma'i 'byor nga la lta'o snyam nas/ des grong khyer de gseg ma dang gyo ba bsal/ tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ gdugs dang rgyal
mtshan sgreng/ dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po dbyas/ shar tu dri zhim po'i pag par nye bar gzhag/ me tog sna tshogs kyangesal mas dga' ga' ltar byed du bcug go/ de nas shAkya brgya stong phrag
du mas yongs su bskor nas grong khyer gyi sgo naseng ge 'i khri la 'dug go/ shAkya modang shAkya gzhon nu ma ngo mtshar skyes pa rnams kyang/ skar khung khelab can dang/ skar khung dang/ stegs budag
la 'jug go/ kya rnams kyi 'byor ba la lta bar 'dod pa'i skye bo'i tshogs/ lul sna tshogs nas lhags pa dag kyang lam po che dang/ tshong shus dang/ bzhi mdo dang sum mdo rnams
su 'dug go/ shAkya las su dag gis mnyes par 'gyur/ su dag gis thugs byung ba 'gyur ba brtag pa'i phyir/ bram ze mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan dag bkug go/ shAkya
rnams doshal dang/ gdu bu dang/ dpung rgyan dang/ rgyanagyis brgyan pa rnams kyis pha dang mjug la bltas nas so sa'i shing rtar zhugs te/ phyir 'byung bar brtsams pa// shAkya'i rgyal po
bzang ldan sna la byung ba/ mtshan mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas/ de dag gis smras pa/ re zhig 'dis na mnyes bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du nam gru dang ma 'gags pa la sogs pa phyir byung ba dang/

de rnams kyang mtshan mkhan rnam kyi lung bstan to// de nas lha sbya'i phyir byung ste/ de phyir byung ba na bya khras gtsug gnor bu phyogs pa mtshan mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas/ de rnams kyis smras pa/
'di'i rtags rung sbyaran gdon mi za bar ston pa la 'khus nas dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur ro// ko ka la ka dang/ khon da dra ba bya dang/ ka ta ma ra ka tIsha dang/ rgya mtshos sbyan rnams phyir byung
ban bong bu'i skad gra gnas / de dag kyang mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa// 'di dag gis kyang nyan thos chen po rnams tshig ngan pa smras nas dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur ro// zhe dga' grung
po che la zhon pas phan tshun du lta bar byed pan/ mu tig gdoshal lhung ba dang/ de gang po che las babs blangs so// de yang de rnams kyis lung bstan pa 'di ha cang 'dod chag ches pas semu
can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas bzang ldan dang/ nam gru dang/ ma 'gags pa dang/ lha sbyin la sogs pa shAkya lnga brgya po de rnams skyed mos tshal du dus ston la 'gro bzhin du bal
pos 'gran tsange bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dengang// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ gal te ngas shAkya rnams la dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu phyung na/ kha cig gis rnamanyes
par byed par 'gyur/ khacig gis na mnyes par byed par ma 'gyur te/ mnyes par byed par ma 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag gzhan dusems la/ dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba ni thams cad sad pa/
tha ma yazhi pas/ ma la ngas thams cad dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs su gzhug go snyam du dgongs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa//
dge slong dag ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams gsel ba dang bzhi'i las kyis rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par gyis shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong rnams kyis/
bcom ldan 'das las mnyane// rgyal po zas gtsangags shAkya rnams kyi 'dreg mkhan 'bara'akher zhes bya ba de rnams rab tu 'byin pa na/ skra 'breg par btan gnas / shAkya'i rgyal ba
bzang ldan gyi sgra 'dreg pa na/ de ngo 'dzum gnag cing mchim 'dzag la skad 'dzer tsage bags baa por sku 'dreg par byed do// shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smyos pa/ zhi bar 'khor ci'i phyir
du de snying rje rje skad du bcom chung ngur dal bus tshig re nas lcas pa// lha bdag 'dzam bu gling ga skyes bu gtse ba rnams la bsnyen bkur bkyang bgyid ba ma phal pa rnams la yang
bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur ba lta zhig/ khyed kyis spras rtegason pas gum ma bsngo'o// shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smyos pa/ nye bar 'khor khyed kyis jo bo la snying nye ba'i mnyes par bya ba
bstan zin te chogags/ mya ngan ma byed cig/ sa ni ltar ma phal pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed par mi 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas/ des phyogs gcig tu ras shig bting nas/ shAkya
gzhon nu rnams la skyas pa/ shes ldan gzhon nu dag ton ga/ 'dreg mkhan zhe bar 'khor 'dis bdag cag la bkur sti byas la/ bdag cag kyang slar khyim du ma gnas kyis/ rgyan rnams de'i
'tsho ba'i rgyun du ras kyi steng du zhog cig/ de rnams kyis se mo do dang/ do shal dang/ mgul rgyan dang/ gdu bu dang/ dpung rgyan dang rna rgyun lasogs pa ni po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan
pa'i rgyun khyad par can rnams kyis ras kyi steng du phung po chen por klungs sa// nye bar 'khor gyis de rnams mthar gyis skra breg te/ de rnams khrus la dongs dang/ des bsams pa// re zhiga gzhon
nu 'di reg rigs dang 'byor pa dang/ lang tsho la bab cung chung ma dang ldan la/ mdzod dang bang mdzod kyis rgyas pa yang spangs nas rab tu 'byungan/ bdag rgyan 'di tsam la chags pa ni tshul ma yin
pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro// gal te bdag rigs ngan du ma skyes na/ bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing chu bo las brgal ba dang/ sbyor ba las yang dag par
'da' bar bya ba'i phyir btsal ba dang 'bad pa lu brtson par bya ba zhig snyam mo/'dun chos nyid yin te/ ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du sangs rgyas

kyi sman gyis 'jig rten la gzigs pa de bzhin du/ nyan thos chen po rnams kyang byed pas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bus 'degamakhan nye bar 'khor lhag par skyo ba skyes pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang
'dreg mkhan nyi bar 'khor gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ 'dreg mkhan zhi bar 'khor la 'di skad ces smras so// nye bar 'khor khyod ci'i phyir shin tu ma dga' bas lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas semA
khos su chud cing 'dug/ 'a bar 'khor gyis smas pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu gangag phyir da ltar gzhon nu 'di deg rigs dang/ 'byor pa dang/ lang tsho la bab cing chung ma dang ldan la/ mdzod dang
bang mdzod kyis rgyas pa yang sbyangs nas rab tu byung zhi/ bdag rgyan 'datsam la chags pan tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro// gal te bdag rigs ngan du ma skyes na/ bdag kyang legs

par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing chu bo las brgal ba dang/ sbyor ba las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir btsal ba dang 'bad pa la brtson par bgyi ba zhig na/ bdag ci'i phyir sems
khongs su chud par ma 'gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i dusang+gas pa// bzhin bzas thub pa'i dbang po'igasung rab 'di lan rigs snying bor byed ba ma yin/ rus snying bor byed pa

ma yani/ rgyud snying por byed ba ma yin/ thos pa snying por byed pa ma yin te/ 'deltar thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung rab 'di la ni sgrub pa snyang por byed pa yazhi no// de bzhin gshegs rnams rdzogs dang ni//
rgyad dang cus la rtog ma mdzad// 'das nas yun ring lon pa yi// las rnams la ni rtog par mdzad// gal te legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge
slong ga dngos po 'dod na tshur/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dod dang/ khyed bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu 'byin par 'gyur ro/// 'dul ba gzhi/

bam po gaganyis pa// des khas blangasas// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bus 'dreg mkhan zhi bar 'khor khrid de/ bam ldan 'das gang na ba der deng nas phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la
N+NaM mgo bos phyag byas taM/ bcom ldan 'das la 'ad skad ces gsol to// btsun pa nye bar 'khor 'di legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byus dang/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slongag dngos po
'tshol lags na/ thugs brtse ba che bar bzung ste// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'dzas kyis de la bka' stsal pa// dge slong

tshur shog tshangs bar spyad pa spyod nug ces/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i mod kho nar sa bya ba dang/ snam sbyar gyon ba dang/ lag pa lhung bzed dang bya ma bum gyis 'brel ba dang/ skra dang kha spu
skyes nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam dang/ dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur te// smyos pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas/ skra byasnom
sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing/ mod la dbang po rab zhor gnas gyur to// sangs rgyas dgos pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur// shAkya rab tu byung ba rnams na rgan rabs ji lta ba bzhin du 'dud pa byed
pas [0f10 ]shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan 'dud pa byed ban/ zhe bar 'khor gyi rkang pa yin pa shes so// de nas des gdong bteg ste gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni zhi bar 'khor lags na/ bdag

gas 'di'i rkang pa gnyis la yang 'dud pa brgya 'am/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bu ngargyal spang ba'i phyir rab tu byung ba yin te/ 'di rgan gyis khyod kyis nga rgyal gyi dregs pa rmog la thud cig/
sa de'i rkang pa la gtugs pa na/ sachen po lan drug tu g.yos par gyur te/ sa chen po 'dug yasaM/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yes/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu
rab tu ldegaste/ shar phyogs mthon/ nub phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs mthon/ shar phyogs dzama'/ lho phags mtho na/ bang sogs dam 'a/ ma kha u0f7cgas ma bor lte bkas mang
dbus mthon/ mtha' dma'/ mtha' mthon/ dbusadama' bar gyur te/ de ltar thams cad kyis rims bzhin du gzhugs s// lha sbyin gyis ma btud pa dang/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bu nga rgyal spang ba'i phyir rab tu byung pa yan gyis thud cig/ des gsal pa/ bdag gis de'i rkang pa la ma gtugs na khyod la gnod pa ci mchis shes de 'dud du ma btub ste/
der thog mar bcom ldan 'das kyabaka' lha sbyan gyis bcagage/ dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsum
rgyu shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis nye bar 'khor la phyag bgyis pa dang/ sachen po 'di rnam pa drug zhugayos par gyur pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni chos nyid yin te/
dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'de 'ba' zhig tu ma zad/ 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'das po'i rkang pa la gtugs pa na/ sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa de nyon cig/ dge slong rag son byung ba
grong khyer wa rA NA sa ni/ rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang/ rgyas ba dang/ bde ba dang/ lo legs pa// skye bodang ma mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyalaphradi byed du 'jugage/ de'i
tshe wA ra NA si'i grong khyer smad 'tshong ma bzang mo zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa de'i drung du/ bram ze'i khye'u mdzes dga' zhes bya ba song nas smas pa/ bzang mo dga' dgur spyad kyis tshur shog/ sa
smras pa/ khyod la kar sha pa Na lnga brgya yod dam/ ris lcas pa med do// sang la kar sha pa Na lnga brgya khyer te shog cig/ de la 'byor pa med kyang de de la lhag par chags pas/ dus dus su me tog
dang 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs skyel bar byed pa dang/ de de la sngag pa skyes so/ ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na wa ra NA sa'i dus ston byung nas/ bud med thams cad gos dang/ 'phrengab dang/
rgyan rnams kyis klubs nas/ rang gyi khyiman rtsa zhing dga' bo mang pos gnas pa de/ bram ze'i khye'u mdzes dgas bos nas ya chad par gyur te// smad 'tshong ma bzang mos bsams pa//
de ring wa rANasa'i ma rnams gos dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ rgyun rnams kyis klubasanas/ rang rang ga chung ma rnams dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyod par gyur na/ bram ze'i khye'u mdzes dga' su zhig/
dang dga' dgur spyod par 'gyur zhes de de snyam du sems shing/ bram ze'i khye'u mdzes dga' gung na med pa'i lugs der 'ongs nas/ des do mthong ba dang// sngon gyi byas pa drin du gzo bas pad bde
ba bskyed nas smas pa bram ze'i khye'u skyong la shun tu dri zhim pa'i m rtog dug khyer ste shog cig/ bdag cag lhan cig dga' dgur spyad par bya'o// de sha ba lags s ba bzhin du dga' bas sems
kyi rgyud ngo mtshar gyis bsdus nas song ngo// de'agazugs dang lang tsho dang/ g.yer ba'i yon tan la brtags nas skyes shang zhon pas mtshan thog thag gnyid ma log bsanam nangs pa dang/
mtshan mo gnyid kyis shin tu lci bar gyur nas/ jitsam nyi ma shar gyi bar du gnyid log nas/ gang gi mi 'jig rten gyi dus ston gyi ched du ma tog thams cad bzhus zin pa de'i tshe/

sad nas me tog ga tshod du phan tshun song ban ma rnyed nas/ des shang sha ri sha zhes bya ba'i mi rtog dag khyer nas/ ri'i drung du song ste tshigs su bcad pas stsas pa/ g.yang gzhi thogs pa bu pho mdzes
dga' na// ma sha phyed med rgyud zhan snyoms las kyis// de ring shing rnams me tog rgyas dus na'ang// sbyin pa'i mi rtog sharisha 'ad yin no// des smras ba/ song la me tog gzhan dag khyer
la shog cig/ 'dod pa rnams las ser rten par byed pa ni kun tu sbyor ba sogs te/ de'i 'dod chags rab tu 'phel bas/ sos ka'i zla ba tha ma'iton par sprin med byang rlung ma ldang bar 'dug pa'i 'am

phyi'i dus dang/ grong khyer nasashin tu thag ring ba'i yul dgon pa dpag tu mgo 'dren pa dang dkyus ma dag dbyangs su len cing me tog thu'o// rgyal po tshangs sbyin yang de rigs sher du chas pa na/ de nyi ma'i
'od gzer non pas gdungs nas grub ma'i ched du phyogs der son pa na/ de' gru'i sgra thos nas tshigs su bcad nas smras pa// steng nas nyi mas gdung byed cing// 'og nas bye mas gdungs pa la//
glu len khyod kyi lus la ni// ci phyir ni ma'agadung ba med// mdzes dgas kyang tshigs su bcad desmras pa/ bdag ni mas ma gdungs te/ rtog pa yis ni bdag gdungs lags// bya ba bya ba
ma yin pas// 'jigaN+Din 'di'i gdungs nyi ma man// rgyal posakhasams pa/ bram ze'i khye'u 'di ni gdon ma za bar bsal bar byed pa'i gtam la mkhas pa zhig yane/ desan nyi ma phye'i tsha 'jug/
las me tog thu'o snyam nas/ des de bkug ste snus pa/ bram ze'i khye'u re zhig bsal bar byed pa'i gtam dag byosanyag ma'an no// des bsams pa/ rgyal po de ni gdon mi za bar lus gdungs pa
gan te/ des na 'di skad 'osnyam nas/ des bsal bar byed pa'i gtum rnam pa sna tshogs de la smras pa thos nas/ rgyal po lus kyi gdung ba dang bral bar gyur to// rgyal po mngon par dga' bar
gyuras/ blun po rnams la stsas pa/ shes ldan dag rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i srog sbyin ba gang yin pa de la lan du phan na gdags/ lha rgyal sradi phyed kyis so// de nas

rgyal po des sas pa/ bram ze'i khye'u de ring rgyal po'i pho brang du gnas thob cig dang/ sang rgyal srid kyi phyed sbya'i no// de rgyal po'i pho brang ngu mal bzang po byon nas de de la nyal ban/ bzang mo

rjes su dran pa sems shang rgyal sridi phyed pa de yang smad 'tshong ma bzang mo'i phyir blang ngo sum mo// yang bsams pa/ rgyal sridi phyed pa de la longs spyod pa'i rgyal po da ma 'dra ba zhig/ ma la bdag
gas de srog dang dbral bar bya'o snyam me// yang bsams ba/ rgyal po bsad pa'i rgyal srade gang yin pa des ci zhig bya snyam nas/ tshigs su bcad di smras pa// don ma grub na 'dod 'gyur la/ 3[k]
shogrub 'dod pa ldog ma 'gyur// mgrub na'aphos gyur pas// de bas don ni don ma yani// jitsamanyamanangs su lta ban// de 'gyod pa skyes nas mal nas babs

[Or ]gabang gzhas la bting nas nyal lo// nam nas pa na rgyal bos smras pa// shes ldan dag bram ze'i khye'u de khug cig/ de la rgyal srid phyed spyi'i no// rgyal po'i pho nya dag 'ongos pan mal chen po
rgyu sa babs te g.yang gzhi nges la btang nas nyal ba mthong ngo// mthen gnas kyang ma dang nga skyed de/ rgyal po'i gan du song nas smas pa/ lha 'din rgyal srid kyi 'is ma lags so// rgyal bas/
snyas pa/ ci'i phyir/ de rnams kyis smras pa// lha nyon mongs mal chen po gya nom pa sbangs te g.yang gzhis la bting nas mems/ nyal ba'i dman pa la mos pa gang lags de la rgyal sridi
sul rtatsang rung/ rgyal pos smras ba/ shes ldan dag shes rab can de de la rgyu zhig yod par 'gyur gyis khug cig/ ri rnams kyis de bkug pa dang/ rgyal bos smras pa// kye bram ze'i
khye'u khyod ci'i phyir mal chen po nas babs te g.yang gzhi sa la bting nas nyal/ des ji ltar gyur pa rnams rgyal po la ragi par byas nas de nas smas pa/ lha gnang bar mdzod cig dang rab tu
'byung ngo// rgyal pos smras pa// dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te khyod rab tu byung nas khyed kyis yon tan gyi tshogs cung zad rtogs pa nga la brjod pa lta na gnang ngo// des re bzhin du
bgyi'i zhes khas blangs so// de nas des zhi ba'i phyogs su song nas mkhan po dang slob dpon med par rang byang chub rtogs par byas nas/ rang sangs rgyas des bsams pa/ bdag gis rgyal po de la
sngon khas blangs pas sang la/ khas blangs pa de rig par bya'o zhes de rgyal pa'idrung du song nas steng gnam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ 'bar ba dang/ gsal ba dang/ char 'bebs pa
dang glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so// rgyal pos de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te tshigs su bcad pas smras pa// dge ba cu zhig btsal phyi'i rab tu byung ba ya// bram ze'i

khye'us rnyed pa legs rnyed de// cung zad las kyi rnam smin bskyed pa yi// nyer 'gros khyad par chen po 'di'i rtogs ltos3/ rgyal po tshangs sbyan gyi sa mkhan gang+ga skyong zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de/

des mdzes dgas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa 'dzin du bcug nas smras pa// gang+gA skyong nga la tshigs su bcadu ba de yang dang yang dungun bar gyis shog/ sgra mkhan gad+ma skyong rang ga bzo lashAni tu byang
ba yazhi pas/ rigang gi tshe rgyal po tshas sbran gyi kha spu 'chos pa de'i tshe/ riganyid log par 'gyur zhing se gol gyis sad par byas te/ sangs kyang gang+gA skyeng la mchog gang 'dod pa gsal
cig ces mchog sA'i bar byed ba na/ des smras pa/ lha gsol ba zhig mchis so// gang gi tsho gang+gA steng gas rgyal po la tshigs su bcad pa dran par byed ro'i/ rgyal po 'dod pa'i gtam
! @#/// la sems kyang ma 'gron/ 'dod pa la zhen cing spyod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ btsun mo la lta bar yang ma byed do// btsun mo rnams nyon mongs pas myosashang zhen nas

gang+gA skyong la smras pa/ zhang pa ga ngag tshe khyod la lhas mchog sprin par mdzad pa de'i tshe/ lnga gal te bdag la dgyes pa tshigs su bcad pa 'di'i don rgyas bar bshad du gsol zhes gsol cig/ rgyal
pos tshigs su bcad pa de'i don rgyas par rnam par bkrol ba dang/ de skyob skyes nas rkang pa la gtugs te smras pa/ lha bdag gis bsnyen bkur bgyis lags kyis/ khyim nas khyim ma mchas pa 'a
rab tu 'byung ngo// rgyal pos smras pa// gal te rab byung nas yon tan gyi tshogs cung zad thob na nga la rig bar byos shig/ des smras pa/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal snyan du gsal bar bgyi'o/ 3/
ts+tshA de drang srong rnams kyi nang du song ste rab tu byung nas/ des mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas s// de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rgyal po tshas sbya'i lasngon khas blangs kyis//
song la khas blangs pa de rig par bya'osnyam nas/ de rgyal po tshangs sbyin gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ 'bar ba dang/ gsal ba dang/ char 'bebs/
pa dang/ glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so// so so'i skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gong yin pas/ ris rkang pa la gtugs te snas nga/ 'phags pa khyod kyis
yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta burtogs sam/ rtogs so// rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis drang song gang+gA skyong gi rkang pa la gtugs pa na/ sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to// yang de'i mas tshigs su
bcad de smras la/ tshangs sbya'i blo dang ldan pa'o// 'di ru 'dreg mkhan lag cha rag/ bzha gnas rab tu byung 'dal/ lha khyoda gzhug pa'i tshul ma yani/ rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis mas khong du chud
bar bya ba'aphyir/ tshigs su bcad ngas snyas pa/ 'di ltar thub pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la// desan deka' spyad 'di dag sbyar lags te/ blo rgya chen por gyur pa gang lags pa// gdaskyong
la cung zad ma ga khung zhig/ dka' thub za'i gyis sdig pa thams cad mnan// dka' thub zal gyis 'jig rten thams cad mnan// dka' thub zil gyis 'dreg mkhan snod bcom ste// dka' thub/

'bar la cung zad ma gsung zhig/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yan ba de bzang ldan 'di tade yanin// drang srong gad skyong zhes bya ba gang

pa'i ba de ni na bar 'khor 'ad nyo de yin te/ de na yang shAkya'i rgyal pa bzang ldan tshangs sbyin du gyur pa na/ nye bar 'khor drang srong gang+gA skyong zhes bya bar gyur pa la phyag byas pa na/ sa rnam pa drug tu g.yo/
par gyur to// da ltar yang bzang ldan gyis lte bar 'khabo rab tu byung ba la phyag byas pa na/ sa rnam ba drug tu g.yos par gyur to/// sdem la/ ke'u de bya dang ral ba'i dbyibs//
thams cad sgrolanor shange rta dang// gdugs dang srin bu ka ta tsa// byams pa'i dril sgrogs bcug pa dang// dga' skyong la tu btung ba dang// snum 'khur gnas 'jog
sbrang tsa na// 'dul ba 'dzin mchog bgrangs pa'o// gang gi tsho tsho dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u dbyas ton mongs pa thams cad spras// dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang snam sbyar gyi rgyal mtshan thogs pa rnams kyi mchog tu gnan pa de'i tshe/ dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tsho dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u de rgyas lasan zhig bgyis na/ desan bcom ldan 'das kyis snam sbyar gyi rgyal mtshan thogs pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan lags
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rage slong dag dge slong kun shes ko'u di rgya bad rtsod kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongos su bskyar ba/ 'dod pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ gdon
ma wakhar 'byubar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas sharibasags bas/ dge slong ko'u da rgya 'di nyid kyis las byas gang bsags pa dag gzhano su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong
dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni/ phyi rol gyis 'a khams la rnam par smin par ma 'gyur/ chu'i khams la ma 'gyur/ me'i khams la ma 'gyur rlung gi khams la ma 'gyur
rgya 'ad ltar las dge ba dang ma dge ba byas shing bsags pa ga na u0f7a/ zan pa'i phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched rnams la rnam par sman par 'gyurati/ las rnams bskal pa
brgyar yang na// chud ma za ba'ang tshogs dang dus// rnyed na lus can rnams kha na// 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyidi// dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nying laskye dgu rnams
kyi tsho la zhi khri thub pa na/ 'jig rten du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'dzag rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dulaba'i kha bsgyur/

bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srubs zhes bya ba byung ste/ de grong khyer wA rA NAsa'i nye bar brten nas ra ba ral ba'i dbyanges zhes bya ba la bzhugs so/
tsam dus gzhan zhig na yang dag pa'i rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srus snga dro 'bazashams thobs ma thag/ chos gos dang lhung bzed bsnams te wA rA NAs re bod snyoms la zhugs//
dang/ dga' 'dun lnga brgya tsam dongo ba'i dga' 'dun de rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa// skudape byad bzang
brgya cus mdzes bar byas la// 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa// 'od gzer lho kha steng bas lhag nga 'i 'od can/ rin po che'i ri bo'agro ba ltar kun nas mdzes par mthong/ ming
ma thag tu dad pa bskyengs gros bya bar brtsams pa// shes ldan dag bdag cag 'di las rab tu byung bar bya'o zhas/ de rnams kyis de ltar gros byas pa las/
bcuge/na rgya mtsho chen por zhugs so// kha cig ni yul gyi mthar dong ngo// kha cig nishaba'achos dang ldan bar gyur/ skye bo bcu drug cig lus pa de rnams ra bi rol ba'i dbyibs la dong nas/
gang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srus las rab tu byung ste/ de rnams de na bsam gtan dang/ klog pa dang/ rnal 'byor gyis gnas so// ji tsam dus gzhan zhag na yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad nas/ shang zad pa'i me bzhin du drang srong smra ba'i ri dgas kyi nags su phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan
las 'das pa'idabyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de rnams la lha rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'do srus yongs su mya ngan
las 'das// rje yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas de ring du zhag bdun lon te/ de'i bstan pa yang nub na khyed cag 'bras bu med pa'i sbyin pa 'dra zhing 'dug ste ma rung zhes byas pa thos nas/
bya ba ma byas pa'i sdug bsngalachen pos gdungs so// rigs ldan thos ma thag tu ri bo ral ba'adi byibs las babs nas wA N+Nasar zhugs s// drug gsanadi nyid du yang byung bas brtson
00 'grus brtsams nas rang byang chub mngon sum du byas so// phyis lnga yang babs nas wA rA Nas de du 'dug par brtsams pa na/ jitsam na shing rtas 'tsho ba'i tshong pa dag 'gro ba na/ shang/
Nas 'tsho ba zhigag glangadag nyam chung bzhin du de dag la/ ris lcag gzer bu can gyis yang nam yang du gzhus te/ de rnams nyam chung bas ba shi la thug cing 'gro ma nus bzhin du shing rtas 'tsho
ba de shang rtas 'tsho ba'i tshong pa'i sna lu 'gro ba dang/ de la dge slong de rnams kyis smras pa/ kye shang rtas 'tsho ba khyod kyi glang nyam chung ba 'di rnams la/ lcag gzer bu can gyis yang nas
yang du gzhus te tsa'i rung/ gal te 'gro ma nus na dal bus 'gror chug la phyi nas song ngo cog/ des smras pa/ bdag sna lashing rtas 'tsho ba'i tshong pa dang lhan cig mchi ma nus zhes/ gal
te bdag pha nas chasanagadon mi za bar shing rtas 'tsho ba'i tshong pa 'dis bdag boranas dong bar 'gyur ro// de rnams kyis shing rtas 'tsho ba de las zur bzung nas ma dga' ste/ gcig la
gcig smras l/ shes ldan dag la dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs yongs su mya ngan las 'das te bdag cag lus na/ 'dis kyang bdag cag la skul ma btab kyis/ ma la
bdag cag gis brtson 'grus brtsams par bya'o zhes smras nas/ tshigs su bcad de snus pa/ thub pa chen po 'do srungs kyi/ gal te chos na nub rgyur kyang// yang dag sangs rgyas
kyis bshad ba'i// btsa' 'grus 'dor bar ma bya'o/ bdag cag gnazig pa yang// gal te zad bar ma gyurani// shAkya seng ge skyob pa yi// na sa
mchog tu 'gyurab r bya// de rnams lha ra NA sar zhugs nas bsod snyoms sprad de/ slar yang bo ril ba'i dbyibs la dong nas/ sam gtan dang/ klog pa dang/ rnal 'byor gyis
gas pa na/ de rnams las bzhasha'o// gcig cag lus pa de ma dga' kha skyes shing yadi byung bas ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa/ ri bo ral ba'adabyibs gang yan pa 'di nyid la bdag gis

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs bsnyen bkur byas de'i dge slong ni khro lang mthong na da zag 'ba' zhig 'dzam bu'i gling mtha' dag na snam sbyar gyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa lha zhacig snyam na/
ga smon lam gdab par btsugs ba/ 'di ltar bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ 'od srungs las 'di srid du tshangs par spyod pa sadan/ yon tan tshogs chung

zad kyang ma rtogs kyis/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes bya bgang yin nga de la/ bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu rnams kyitsho
lo brgya thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkyi thub par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de'i bstan pa las bdag rab tu byung nas/ der thog mar

[z} ]nyen mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa des bdag snam sbyar gyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan par gyur cig ces brtakha
go dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srus yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa 'dege slong ni khri yod pa las/ rag
slong gcig lus pas 'dzam bu'i gling mtha'adag snam sbyar gyi rgyal mtshan bzung ste/ ri bo ral ba'i dbyibs gang na ba der song nasasmon lam btab pa gang yin pa de na/ dge slong kun shes ko'u
'ad/ de lanitaM/ de'asmon lam gyi dbang gis da ltar yong bam ldan 'das kyis snam sbyar gyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin ba'i mchog tu bstan to// dge slong dag de lta bas na/ las gcig tshugazhag
ba rnams kyi rnam par sminaban gcig tu gzhag pa yin la/ gtsag tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par mAn pa na gcig tu dkar ba yan/ 'dren ma rnams kyani 'dren ma la'i pas/ dge slong dag de lta bas
na las gtsami tu gzhag pa dang 'dren ma rnams naspangs la/ las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o// gang gi
tshebcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa ko'u dbyi la chos bshad nas/ yang dang yang du rmed par mdzad de/ ke'u ri rgya khyod kyis chos kun shes sam/ bcom ldan 'das kun 'tshal lags//
ke'u de skye khyod kyis rton kun shes sam padi bar g gadzad pa ku 5 tshal lags so zhes gsol pa de'i tshe/ dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thamasacad
gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus ba/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u ngas las ci zhig bgyis na/ des na btsem ldan 'das kyis chos bshad nas/ yang nas yang
du rmed par mdzad de/ ke'u da rgya khyod kyis chos kun shes sam/ bcom ldan 'das kun 'tshal lags so// ke'u du n+ya khyod kyis chos kun shes sam/ bde bar gshegs pa kun 'tshal
lags s zhas gsal lags/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal pa// ngag slong dag dge slong ke'u da rgya 'di nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa// tshogs rnyed pa bya ba nas/ lus can
rag la 'bras bur 'gyur// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer wA rANasari rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bde ba dang/
'o 'gas pa skye ba dang ma mang pos rab tu gang ban rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/ de dus gzhan zhig na btsun ma lhan ga la bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed de/ rtse bar
byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa na/ btsun mosems can dang ldan par gyur to/ de zla babargyad dam dgu lon pa na/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa blta na sdug pa
dban lag gi mchog thams cad dang ldan ba yig btsas so// btsas nas de'i btsas pa ri btsas ston rgya cher byas nas/ khye'u'i ming nyare gdags zhi samang 'dogs par byed do// no bo rnams
kyis smas pa/ lha yul dbus kyi yul chos kyis nagazugs bzang zhing mdzes pa dang blta na sdug pa lags na// des mdzes dga' zhes 'dogs lags la/ khye'u 'di yang gzugs bzang zhing
mdzes la blta na sdugatsang yul sha'i rgyal po'i sus kyang lags pas/ khye'u'i mang kasha mdzes dga' zhes bgyi bar gdags so zhes/ de'i mang ka shi mdzes dga' zhes bya bar brtags
khye'u ka shi mdzes dga' ma ma brgyad po// pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang/ num bsnun pa'i ma ma gzhis dang/ dramo 'phyo ba'i ma ma gtas dang/ rtse grogs kyam ma gtes/ ma mthargyan/
la rjes su gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang/ zhe dang mar dang/ zhun mar dang/ mar gyi sung pa dang/ gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtse bo gtse bo dag gsasring bar byed skyed pa
byed tsang/ rdzing na gnas pa'i pad+ma bzhin du myur du skyed ngar byed do// yang rgyal ba skyo bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa na/ btsun mo sems can dang ldan bar gyur te//

de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa na khye'u zhig btsas te/ gang ga kim la btsas pa de skad kyi zhwa ma la wA rA Na sa'i yul ma dang grong ma 'thab ma chen po byung ngo// de btsas pa 'batsas ston rgya cher byas nas/
khye'u'i mang bar gdags zhes mang 'degs par byed do// btsun mo'i tshigs kyis sa pa/ lha 'dabatsas pa na wA rA N+Nasari grongam deng yul ma rnams 'grub ma chen po
byung bas/ de'aslad du khye'u' mang 'thab mo skyes su gdags se zhes btagasase// rgyal po tshangs sbyan na chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ gzhan nu ka shi mdzes dgas
ba chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyalamAde byed du 'jug pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam dusems te/ bdag kyang yab 'das na rgyal por 'gyur zhing/ bdag gas kyang chos dang chos
ma yin pas rgyal sradi byed du btsug nas dmyal bar gzhol gyis ma la bdag khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam nas/ de pha'i drung du song ste rkang ba la gtugs te smas pa// yab/
gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bdag khyim nas khyim ma mchis par rab tu 'byung lags so/ des smras pa// bu gangag na du mchod sbyin mched par byed/ sbya'i sreg sreg par byed//
dka' thub kyis gdung bar byed pa'i rgyal sride khyod kyi lag tu 'ongasan/ ci'i phyir rgyal sride spyas rab tu 'byung des tshigs su bcad pas smas pa nagasan shing shun rtsa gyen 'di
ba 'bras bu 'cha' ba dang/ ri dgasagadug pa rnam sa dang na// lhan cig gnas pa mchog lags kyi// 'jig rten pha rol 'dzag byed pa'i// mkhas pas rgyal sridi slad du na// gsod
dang btsang dang rdeg pa dag/ bgyid pa de lta ma lags so// rgyal pos snyas pa// gzhon nu shes par gyis shig/ khyed ni nga'i bu gcig pa/ sdug ba/ pade du 'ong ba/ bzod pa// ma mthun
pa med pa yan/ ngasha bor gyuran ma 'dod bzhin du khyed dang 'brel grung/ gsazho bzhin du lta ga la gtang/ gzhon nu kasha mdzes dgas snas pa/ 5 ba gal te gnang na de lta na legs/
gal te mganang na 'tshalam yang ma 'tshal/ phyag kyang ma 'tshal lo// de nas gzhon nu ka sha mdzes rtags ma gcig kyang zan bcad pa byas nas/ gnyis dang/ gsum 88
drug gi bar du zan bcad pa byas// de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis// gzhon nu ka shi mdzes dga' la 'daskad ces sus so// bu gzhon nu shes nga ra gyis shig/ tshangs
spyod pa spyad dka' 'o// rab tu dben bar bya dka' 'o// gtsag bu nyade la mngon par dga' bar bya dka' 'o// gnas mal dgon pa nags khrod ri drung dung bas mtha' dag tu gnas pa/
mnag dka' 'o// gcig pu dwagon par gnas pa yang sdug bsngal lo// khyed kyis ji spradi 'tsho'i bar du ri dgas gdug pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas par bya dgosas// khyod kyis
srid 'tsho'i bar du gzhan gyis byin pas 'tsho bar bya dgos so// khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du mi'i 'dod pa dag las dben par bya dgisaso/ khyed kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mi'i
'khra/ dga' ba dang rtsed mo dag las dben par bya dgos so// bu ga'on nu khyod tshur shog/ 'di nyid du 'dug la rgyal tshab byos// 'dodo pa dag la yang sprod cig/
sbyin pa dag kyang bya'i cig/ bsod nams kyang byos shig/ de skad ces smras kyang/ gzhon nu kasha mdzes dga' cang mastsa'o// de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis/ btsun mo dang/
blon po dang/ mdun na 'don la bsgo ba/ gshes ldan dag re zhig gzhon nu slong zhig/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes btsun me dang/ blon pa dang/ mdun na 'don rnams/ gzhon
kashamadzes dga' gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/ gzhon nu ka shi mdzes dga' la 'di skad ces smras// sras gzhon nu mkhyen par mdzod cig/ khyod ni gan tu gzhon pa bde
ba bzhed pas sdug bsngal ma mkhyen te tshangs pa ra sprod pa sprad dka' 'o// rab tu dben par gyi dka' 'o/ ]gtsag pu nyid la mngon par dga' bar bgyi dka' 'o// gnas mal
dgon pa nags khrod ra drung dang ngas mtha' dag tu mnag par dka' 'o// gcig pu dgon par gnas pa yang sdug bsngal lo/ khyod kyis ji snyed 'tsho'i bar du ri dwags gdug pa rtag dang lhan
nug gnas par bgyi'o tshal la khyed kyis ji sridi 'tsho'i bar du gzhan gyis byin pas 'tsho bar bgyi 'tshal lo// khyed kyis dza sudi 'tsho'i bar du ma'i 'dod pa dag las dben par bgyi 'a tsa
la khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du ma'i dga' ba'i rtsed mo rnams las dben par bgyi 'tshal lo// sras gzhon nu khyod tshur spyon/ 'di nyid du bzhugs la rgyal tshab mdzod de/ 'dod
pa rnams la yang yongs su spyod cig/ sbyin pa dag kyang stsol nug/ bsod nams dag kyang kyisashig byas de skad smras pa na/ gzhon nu kasha mdzes dga' cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ de
nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis gzhon nu ka shi mdzes dga' dang lhan cig rdul khrong na rtsortse ba'i blon po'i bu rnams dang/ mdun na 'don gyi bu rnams dang/ gzhan yang gzhon nu rnams la
bsgob/ gzhon nu dag tshur re zhag gzhon nu ka shi mdzes dga' slong zhig denas blon po'i bu rnams dang/ mdun na 'don gyi bu rnams dang// gzhon nu rnams kyis rgyal po tshangs sbyani
las mnan nas/ gzhon nu ka shamadzes dga' gangan bder dong ste lhags nas/ gzhon nu kashamadzes dga' la 'di skad ces smras so// gzhon nu des pa mkhyen par mdzod cig khyod
nin tu gzhon pa bde ba bzhed pas sdug bsngal ma mkhyen te/ tshangs bar spyod pa spyod dka' 'o// rab tu dben par bgyi dka' 'o// gcig pu nyid la mngon par dga' bar dka' 'o//
gnas mal dgon pa nags khrod ro drung dang bas mtha' dag tu gnas par mag dka' 'o// gcig pu dgon par gnas pa yang sdug bsngal lo// khyod kyis rjesridi 'tsho'ibar du ra dgas
rgyu/ gdug pa dag dang lhan cig gnas par bgyi 'tshal lo// khyod kyis ji srid 'aro'i bar du gzhan gyis byin pas 'tsho bar bgyi 'tshal lo// khyod kyis dzasunge 'tsho'i bar
du ma'i 'dod pa dag las dben par bgyi 'tshal lo// khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du ma'i dga' ba'i rtsed mo dag las dben par bgya 'tshal lo// srasa gzhon nu khyong tshur spyon 'danyid du bzhug
lo rgyal tshab mdzod de/ 'dod pa dag la yang yongs su spyod cig/ sban pa dag kyang stsol nug gsod nams dag kyang gyis shig ces rdoskad smas na/ gzhon nu kasha mdzes dga' cang ma smra ba/
'dug ge/ de nas blon po'i bu rnams dang/ mdun na 'don gyi bu rnams dang// gzhon nu rnams rgyal po tshangs sbyin gang na ba der song ste phyinen/ rgyal po tshangs sbyin la'ang de skad ces smras so/
lha mkhyen par mdzod nug/ gzhon nu deg pa ka shA dze dga' gum na tsa chung/ 'di ltar rab tu byung ba nas khas pa rnams kyis bsngags pa lags te/ gal te de la mngon par dga' bar
gyur na/ gas na par de la gzigs par 'gyur ro// gal te mngon par dga' bar ma gyur to/ slar yang drangaslong rnams las u0f7cga par gyur na/ bu'i gnas na lha dang ma ma lags pa gzhan gado
du mchi bar 'gyur/ rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis smras pa/ gzhon nu dag gal te de lta na gnang bar bya'o// de nas blon po'i bu rnams dang/ mdun na 'don gyi bu rnams dang/ gzhon nu rnams
00 gzhon nu ka shi mdzes dga' gang na bder song ste phyin nas/ gzhon nu ka shi mdzes dga' la 'daskad ces smras so// gzhon nu des pamakhyen par mdzod cig/ rab tu 'byung bar gnang ste/ gzhon/
nu de ni de'i dus mkhyen par mdzod cig/ de nas gzhon nu kasha mdzes dga' bcud kyi khu ba'i rim gyis lus kyi mthu dang/ stobs dang/ brtson 'grus bskyed de/ wA rA NA sa nas byung nas drang
srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ngo// des brtson pa dang/ 'bud pa dang/ brtsal ba byas 'dod pa rnams las 'dod chags dang bral bar byas nas/ byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob ste/
hishan tu sems can rnams la brtse ba dang ldan par gyur nas/ de'i byams pa des na ri dgas gdug pa rnams kyang bste gnas su 'dres par gyur te gnod par ma byed pas/ de'i mang ba bod pa
sla ba bzod pa smra ba zhes bya bar gyur to// jatsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po tshangs sban shanas/ 'thab mo skyes rgyal sridi la bzhag ste/ de chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal sride byed du
'jug go/ drang srong bzod pa sla bas smras pa// mkhan po bdag gi lus na kha zas dang btung bas bskyed pas dgon pa'i sman gyis 'tsho bar rdzo ma thig gsi/ grong mthar gnas su
mchi lags so// des smras pa// bu grong ngam dgon par gnas kyang rung ste/ drang srong rnams ni dbang po rnams srung bar byed kyis/ song la wA rA Na' 'i nye 'khor du son nas lo ma
dang 'dab ma'i sprul pa byos la gnas par gyis shig/ de mkhan po las lung thob nas lha rA N+Nasar song ste zhiba'i gnas btsal ba'i phyir phan tshun du rgyu zhing ram gyis
ba'i skyed mos tshal du sen te/ dis dor btsal ba las zhiba'i phyogs shig mthong bas de de na gnas so// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po 'thab mo skyes so ga'i dus la bab pa na/ nags
tshang tshong mi rtog ga shang rnams kha 'busashing ngang pa dang/ khrung khrung dang/ rma bya dang/ ni tse dang/ ri skegs dang/ khu byug dang/ shang shang te'u rnams kyang skad 'byon paskyid
rgyu mos tshal gyi sa gzhiri btsun mo dang lhan cig dong nas/ des skyed mos tshal der bde ba nyams su myong bas dub par gyur te gnyid log pa dang/ bud med na me tog dang 'bras bu la dga' ba yan pas//
skyed mos tshal de 'di nas phan tshun du rgyu bar brtsams pa las/ rdzatsam na drang srong bzod pa ska ba spyod lam zhi bas mtha' gcig na 'dug pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang bla mar bya ba'i sims
skyes nas/ drang srong de la phyag byas te bskor nas 'khod de// drang srong bzod pasmabs bud med rnams mthong nas lhag par spyod lam zhi bas ches bshad par brtsams so// jitsam na/
rgyal po 'thab mo skyes gnyid kyi skom pas dub pa las sangs pa// btsun mo 'khor gyi bud med ma mthong nas/ des ral gra blangs te btsun mo'i bud med rnams btsal bar brtsams pa
nga jitsim na drang srong bzodapa smra ba bskor nas 'khodapa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang phrag dog bskyed de/ bdag nyid khros pa'i kun nas dkris pa'i rang bzhan gyis drang srong ri'i drung du song
ba dang/ btsun mo'i tshogs kyis de khros pa'i gnas skabs mthong nas lag ste byer ro// rgyal po bsnyems pa can gyis/ bzod pa smra ba la smras pa/ kyi nang rje khyod su zhig/ ris
smas pa/ bzod pa sna ba'o// rgyal po 'thab mo skyes kyis smras pa// khe bo 'khrugs pa la yang bzod pa sla bar bdag nyid khas 'che ba yan nam/ da ni khyod bzod pa smra ba yin nam ma yan
shis par bya'o zhes rjes de'i lag pa gnyis bcad nas yang dris pa/ khyod su yani/ ris smas pa/ bzod pa smra ba'o// des de'i rkang pa bcad tsang yan lag dang 'dre lag rnams kyang
bcad pa dang/ des tshigs su bcad pas smras pa// gal te bdag gi lus la ni// til 'bru tsam du gtum pa ya ]/lus na phye ma brgyar gtubasanas/ sa la gtor kyang bzod mi spong/
gang phyir bdag gis byams dge ba'i// sems ni rtag tu goms byas pas/ dbu sdug lta bu'i skye bo la// bzod pa de gtong spro ba med// ces tshigs su bcad pa' dbyangs de lta bu s
tshor ba bsal nas smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/ ji ltar rgyal po 'di de nyen mangs pa la zhen pa'i blos bdag la yang dang yang du smos nas/ yan lag dang rkang lag rnams gtubs pa bzhi
du bdag bzod pa dang des ba dang lhan cig par gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bdag nyid kyis nyon mongs pa'i tshogs rnams bcom nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzo/
pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na/ de la shes rab kyi ral gris yang dang yang du rmad cung thog mar de'i nyin mongs pa gcod par gyur cig ces btab bo// de nas bzod pa
smra ba la mngon par dad pa'i lha gang yan pas bsams pa// rgyal po sdig can 'dis drang srong 'danyis pa med cing gnod pa ma byas par rkang pa dang lag pa dang phral te bor gyas/ can s kyang bdag
gis 'di la gnod par bya'o snyam du rigs/ khro ba drag po'i kun nas dkris pas bzod pa snuba' mdun du 'dug ste/ tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ 'thab skyes bu dang bu mor bcas/ gnyen
@#1 gyi tshogs bcas grong khyer dang// ljongs bcas 'jig rten 'tsho ba kun// tha mar dbye yas bka' stsol cig/ des sbyar tshigs su bcad de smas pa// gang gis bdag lus lag pa rkang pa/
dang sna dang phral nas ma rdung byas gyur pa// de la'ang sdig pa cung zad ma 'dodon// zhes med 'ge ba rnams la smos ci dgos// de nas wa rANA sa'i lha gang yin ba rjes yams nad dang/
bya bar ng/ bye ba dang/ ni tso rnams btang zhing/ lhas char ma phab pas skye bo'i tshogs sha bar gyurato// rgyal pos ltas mkhan rnams bkug nasalcas ba/ shes ldan dag pa'i phyir
lha nAr la babs shing/ bya ba dang/ bye ba dang/ nitso rnams rab tumang por gyur la skye bo'i tshogs kyang shi bar gyur/ de rnams kyis smyos pa// lha drang srong bzod pa smra ba la mngon par
dad nga 'i lha gang lags pa'i lha de rab tu 'khrugs te/ ri 'khrugs ngas des yams kyi nad 'di btang lags s/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/
ltas mkhan rnams kyis smras pa/ lha gtor ma dang/ me tog 'phreng dang/ yo byad rnams kyis lha rab tu 'khrugs ba mnyes par 'gyur bas/ gtor ma dang/ me togi 'phreng dang/
ye byad rnams sbyar la lca dang drang srong de la yang bzod pa gsol bar bgyi'o// de nas rgyal pos lha rA NA sar dral snyegs su bcug ba/ grong khyer wA rA NA san gnas pa'i shes ldan dag nyon
cig skyed mos tshal na gnas pa'i lha drang srong bzod pa sla ba la mngon par dad pa des yams kyi nad btang zhing/ des char ba 'bebs ba dang/ bya ba dang/ bye ba dang/ datso rnams
tu mang por byas te// skye bo' tshogs kyang sha bar gyur gyis/ yams kyi nad de nye bar zhi ba'i phyir khyed cag sang gtor ma dang/ me tog 'phreng dang/ yo byang rnams dang chas te/ skyed
mos tshal der dong la/ de la mchod pa byos shog/ skye bo'i tshogs kyis de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtor ma dang me tog 'phreng dang/ yo byad rnams sta gon byas te/ skyed mos tshal
der rgyal bo dang btsun mo dang lhan cig tu dong ngo// de nas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos lha de la brten nas/ dge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ bkren ba dang/ 'bos
ba rnams la sbyani pa dag bya'i nas/ lha'i gnas su mchod pa chen po byas te/ lha de la yang bzod pa gsol lo// de nas rgyal po drang srong bzod bstsa ba'i drung du song nas rkang pa la gtugs
te bzod ba gsal bar brtsams pa/ drang srong chen bo bdag gis yul zhig la lhag bar zhen pas khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa'i blo gros kyis khyod la gdo pa bgyis pa bzod pa gsol lo//
ba bod pa snabs snus pa/ rgyal po chen po bzod do// lus 'tshal/ des tshigs subadudabs smas pa/ lus la mtshon gyis 'debs pa na'ang// bdag ni sems can kun la
byams/ gal te khyod yid ma ches na// bdag gi khrag 'dzag pa la ltos// de' khrag 'o ma'i thogs par 'phrog pa'i cho 'phrul rgyal po sdig pa'i las byed ba de la bstanan/ 'on kyang
yid ches par ma gyur nas/ des yang smas pa/ drang srong chen po bzod par gsol lo// rgyal po chen po bzod do// sus 'tshal/ de nas byang chub sems dpas yan lag dang
nying lag gtubs pa rnams gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bzhags nas// bden pa gsol ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad de snus pa/ rgyal po khyod kyis bdag gi lus// gtubs kyang shin tu
00 phrag ya/ zhe sdang 'di ltar yodamanag/ bdag lus ji ltar sngon bzhin shog/ des bden pa'i tshig gsol pas/ lus sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to// de nas rgyal po ya mtshan
gyis mgi phye nas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ kye ma chos la legs gnas pas/ kyi ma brtul zhugs 'du grub ste// lus lagatsub par byed pa na// khyod la mi dga' tsa langamad/
rgyal po 'thab mo skyes btsun mo dang/ blon pa dang/ grong ma dang/ yul mi dang bcas pas drang srong de'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas te dong ngo// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe/

de'i dus kyi drang srong bzod pa smra ba gang yin pa de nang nyid yin no// rgyal po 'thab mo skyes gang yin pa de na dge slong ke'u da rgya 'di nyid yin te/ ngas de la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing nu ma
du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bdag gis de la yang nas yang du rmed cing nyon mongs pa gcod par gyur cig ces btab pa'i smon lam gang yin pa deng debang gas/ da ltar yang de bzhin gshegs pa de
la chos bshad nas yang nas yang du smos so// dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa gcig tu gnag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas/ dge slong dag khyed kyis
de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'as kyis lha brgyad khri chos kyi ngos yang dag par bsdus te/ bden pa rnams la rab tubakod pa de'i tshe/
dgeslong rnams the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gacod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis lha brgyad khri chos kyi sa
yang dag par bsdus te/ bden pa rnams la rab tu bkod pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar
'das pa'i dus na yang ngas 'di rnams tshong pa brgyad khrir gyur pa na zang zing gas yang dag par bsdus nas/ brtul zhugs lnga'i gzhi rnams la rab tu bkod pa de nyon cig/ dge slong
dag snon byung ba na ded dpon gnyis shig byung ste// thams cad skyob dang legs grub ces bya ste/ re re la yang tshong pa'i 'khor ba'i khri bsha khri yod do// de la legs grub nges par
'byung ba la mngon par dga' nas/ de drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ste/ des mtha' gcig tu brtson 'grus la gnas nas/ mkhan po dang slob dpon med par rang byang chub mngon
sum du byas so// de'i tshong pa rdo rnams deng dpon ma mthong nas phan tshun du btsal bar brtsams pa na/ gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad du ma rnyed pa de'i tsha/ ded dpon thams cad skyob kyi
drung du dong nas smras pa/ red dbon des na bdag cag la ma bltas par mchis te/ brtag cag gas btsal na yang ma rnyed na/ de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ des smras pa/ yid blong bar
00ma byed par 'khod cig dang ded dpon de btsal lo// de nas ded dpon thams cad skyob tshong pa brgyad khris yongs su bskor nas/ ded dang don legs grub skyed mos tshal dang/ 'dug gnas dang/
dka' thub kyin gs su btsal bar brtsams pa na/ des de mthong nas dris pa khyod kyis ci'i phyir tshong pa rnams spangs te rab tu byung/ bdag rta chen po de dag ni lus kyis chos 'chad kyi/
ngag gas ma yin pas des ded dpon 'khor dang bcas pa de la 'bar ba dang/ gsal ba dang rnam 'gub pa dang/ glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul gyis dad nga ra byas so// des tshong pa brgyad
khri po de zang zing ga cesnga bas bsdus nas smas pa/ 'di'i phyi'i bya ba byos shig/ 'di la bya ba byas na gdon ma za bar 'bras bu sbyin par 'gyur ro// de rnams kyis de la bya ba rnam pa du ma
byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'idus kyi ded dpon thams cad skyob gang yin pa de na nga nyid yin no// tshong pa brgyad khro bo gang yin pa de ni lha brgyad khra bo 'di dag ni
yani/ de na yang ngas zang zing gis nye bar bsdus nas brtul zhugs lnga'i gzhi rnams la rab tu bkod do// 'di deg de ltar yang ngas chos kyi ris yang dag pa bsdus nas bden pa rnams
la rab tu bkod do// dge slong dag de lta bas na lo sa gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par s+san pa na gtsag tug ge pa yin la/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par rman pa na gcig tu
dkar ba yan/ 'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin pas zhes bya ba nas/ dge slong khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/// gang
gtsi bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton te/ dbang pa dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rin po che rnams bgo bsha' mdzad nas/
dam pa 'a chos kyis tshim par mdzad pa de'i tsho/ dge slong rnams the tshom skyes/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
kyis lha sde'i dge slong rnams 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton te/ dam pa'i chos kyi ngos tshim par mdzad pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag/
'di ltar da ltar nga 'dod chags dang bral/ zhe sdang dang bral// gti mug dang bral zhing/ skya ba dang/ rgya ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chib dang/ mya ngan dang/ smre sngags 'don pa dang/
sdug bsngalab dang/ yidi ma bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su grol nas/ thams cad mkhyen cing rnam pa thams cad makhyen te/ ye shes dang shes bya thams cad la dbang
tharnyes nas lnga sde'i dge slong rnams 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon ba nas bton te/ dam pa'i chos kyi ris tshim par mdzad pa de la ngo mtshar ci zhig che/ 'das pa'i dus na nga 'dod chags
[no ]dngabacas/ zhe sdang dang bcas// gad mug dang bcas shinge/ skye ba dang/ rgyu ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ skye sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/
yade ma bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su ma grol te// ded dpon du gyur pa na/ lnga po dag 'brog dgon pa'i lam du chu med pas srog dang bral ba'i sdug bsngalo dog pa nyamang ba thob/
ba na lha rnams la bden pa gsolan/ dbang phyug chen pos char phab pa'i chus chem par byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba ded dpon thams cad skyob ces bya ba tshong/
ba lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu tshong byed cing/ 'brog dgen pa'i lam chu chung ba zhig zhugs nas rim gyis 'bags byed ces bya ba'i dgon par phyin pa dang/ tshong pa de rnams der chu thams cad kyi

thams cad du zad nas chu dang bral yang mnags de dong ba las/ tshong pa lnga tsam chu ma rnyedapas lhag par ya blong bar gyur pa'i rnam pa de lta bu de dag/ ded dpon thams cad skyob kyis mthong nas de
rjes sems bskyod pas/ kha gyen du bltas te lha rnams la gsol ba bya bar brtsams pa// zhi ba dang/ chu lha dang/ lus ngan dung/ khyab 'jug la sogs pa// lhashes ldan
dag gson cig/ bdag sems can rnams la mnyam par sems pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang yin pa'i bden ba dang bden pa'i tshig 'das dbang phyug chen po'i lhas char 'bebs bar
gyur cig/ byang chub sems dpa' mthus dbang phyug chen po'i gnas g.yos pa dang/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi shes pa mthong ba na 'og tu 'jug pa yin
bas/ des bsams pa/ su zhig gis dbang phyug chen po'i gnas g.yes par byas snyam na/ byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yin par mthong nas/ des dbang phyug chen po'i char gyi
rnam pa de lta bu dag phab ste/ des tshong pa de rnams tshim par byas nas 'brog dgon pa'i lam nas bsgral le// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi ded dpon thams cad

skyob gang yin pa de na nga 'di ya'i no// tshong pa lnga po chu dang bral bas lhag par ya byung bar gyur pa de dag na lnga sde'i dge slong 'di dag pa'i to/ de na yang ngas 'di dag chus tshim par byas nas/
'brog dgon pa nas bsgral lo// da ltar yang ngas 'di dag dam pa'i chos kyi ngos tshim par byas nas/ 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bsal lo// gang gi tshe bcom ldan
'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton nas/ dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub yan lag ga rin po che rnams kyi bgo bsha' mdzad pa de'i tshe/ dge
slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das e lnga sde'i dge slong rnams 'khor ba'i 'brog dgo/
ba panas bton nas/ dbang po dang/ stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag ga rin po che rnams kyi mgo bsha' mdzad pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
dge slong dag 'di ltar da ltar nga 'ad chags dang phrul zhe sdang dang bral/ gti mug dang bral zhing/ skye ba dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang 'chi ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ smra sngags
'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yadi ma bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su grol nas/ thams cad mkhyen tsang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen te/ ye shes deng shes
bya thams cad la dbang brnyes nas/ lnga sde'i dge slong rnams 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton te/ dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi bgo bsha' mdzad
ba de la ngo mtshar rtsa zhig tshe/ 'das pa'i dus na nga 'dod chags dang bcas/ zhe stang dang bcas/ gti mug dang bcas shing/ skye ba dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/
mya ngan dang/ sesngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su ma grol te/ ded dpon du gyur pa na rang gi srog yongs su btang
nas 'di dag rgya mtsho chen po nas bton te/ rin po che rnams kyi bgo bsha' byas pa gang yin pa de kon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba na ded dpon nor gyashang rta zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/
de tshong pa lnga zhig dang lhan cig rgya mtsho chen por dong ba na/ ngo rnams dang ded dpon de phan tshun bshes pa'i gatam smra bar byed pas mdza' bar gyur te// ji tsam 'a
mthar gyis rgya mtsho'i 'gram du phyin nas/ gru so sosta gon byas nas 'jug pa'i tsha/ de rnams kyis ded dpon nor gyashing rta la smras pa// ded dpon bdag cag ni khyod dang bral na dga' bar
ma 'gyur 'gas so// des smras pa/ gal te de lta na 'dare zhugs shag dang gru dor ro// de rnams der zhugs pa dang/ rlung langs nas skrag par gyur to/ nor gyi shaji sa
snyas po/ shes ldan dgam 'jigs shig/ gang gi tshe gru zhig par gyur ba de'i tshe bdag gi mgul du 'jus shig dang/ bdag gas khyed cag gdon// byang chub sems dpa'
rnams na bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas de dang de dag la mkhas pa yin pas/ de'i rin po che chen po la 'os pa dag mchan khung du brtags nas gru zhig pa na/ de rnams ded pon de'amagul
du 'jus nas/ des de rnams lus dub rung srog gi lhag ma cung zad cag lus te rgya mtsho'i 'gram du phyin par byas so// de rnams skam la phyin te de btang ba dang/ de dbugs gtan
tshad nas shi'o// de rnams kyis de chu nas skam la phyung ba dang/ ji tsam namachan khung na rin po che chen po la 'os pa dag mthong nas de rnams kyis de khyer te dong ngo// dge slong dag ji snyam
dusems/ de'i tsha de'i dus kyi ded dpon nor gyi shang rta gang yin pa de ni nga 'di yan no// tshong pa de rnams ni dge slong lnga po 'di rig ra yan te/ de na yang ngas 'di dag rgya mtsho chen po nas
bton rin po che rnams kyi bgo bsha' byas so// da ltar yang ngas 'di dag 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon bzhas bton nas/ dbang pa dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag/
ga rin po che rnams kyi bgo bsha' byas s// 'dul ba gzhi/
bam po go gsum pa// yang gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun
shes ke'u de rgya rgan pa 'a dang la 'dug pa de'i tshe 'khor la bgadugs lta bur byas te 'dug go/ dge slong rnams the tshom skyes na/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u da rgyas las su zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas 'khor la gdugs lta bur bgyis te mchis lags/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka'astsal pa// dge slong kun shes ko'u da rgya 'di nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pas rtogs rnyed pa dgan zhis bya ba nas/ lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur//
@#// dmangs shang rgya rma ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas so// de'i tshe grong khyer wA ra NA sa na rgyal po
tshangs s+yan zhes bya ba 'byor ba dang/ rgyas ba dang/ bde ba dang/ lo legs pa/ skye bo dang ma mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srade byed du 'jug pa las/ dzatsam na ltas mkhan
rnams kyis lo bcu gnyis su char ma'ab ba bo zhes bstan to// rgyal potshangs spyan gyiso rang ga bul du dril sgrogs su bcug ba/ pa'i yul na gnas pa'i rigs ldan grong ma dag ton
cig ltas mkhas rnams kyis lo bcu gnyis su charam 'bab bo zhes bstan gyis/ de la khyed cag las lo bcuganyis kyi bza' ba dang btung ba yod pa de dag ni nga'i yul du gnas par gyis
gi/ gzhan n phyogs sna tshogs su deng la/ lo bcu gnas 'das nas slar shog tshug/ de nas khyim bdag sdums byed kyis mngan la smras pa/ kyi nang rje bang mdzod na lo bcu gas
kyi bza' ba dang btung ba yod dam/ ris smras pa// dpon po mchis so// skye bo'i tshog san kun tu dong ngo// mu ge chen po nyam nga ba dkon pa slong ma bas rnyed par dka' ba byung ba la/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba med ba na rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang ngan pa la snying brtsepa can bas mtha'a gnas mal sten pa 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig bu dgu 'dza'i/
rten du 'byung bar 'gyur bas/ de'i tshe lha rA ts+tshas dung ha cang yang ma ring ba'i bsta gnas zhag tu rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya gnasas// gang gi tshe mu ge'i dus kyi 'chi ba'i 'jigs su rung bas/
skye bo'i tshogs skag nas kun tu myong ba de'i tsho/ de rnams kyibasod snyoms chad nas de dag thams cad 'dus no/ khyim bdag sdums byed gang na ba der dong nas sbas pa/ khyim bdag kho
tsag rab tu byung ba lnga brgya la bsod snyoms rgyun du sbyor ram/ des snas ba/ mngan la rmas te bgyi'o zhes/ des man byed po'i mi la smas pa/ kyenang rje bdag cag gi bang mdzod na bdag
cag dang thab tu byung ba lnga brgya po gang yan pa 'di rnams kyi lobcugs kyi bza' ba dang btung ba yod dam/ des smras pa// dpon po mchis so// khyim bdag sdums byed kyis rab tu byung
ba lnga brgya'i bsod sems sbyar ro zhes/ rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya gzhan dag gas thos nas/ khyim bdag sdums byed kyi drung du drong ste phyin nas/ khyim bdag sdums byed la 'di skad ces
smras ba/ khyim bdag khe bi cag rab tu byung ba lnga brgya la bsod snyoms rgyun du sbyor ram/ des smras pa// 'phags pa dag phul lugs bzhin du yang bsung ca'atshal/ khyim bdag du
rnams kyang gzhan yan la/ bdag cag kyang gazhan yin no// des smras pa/ 'phags khagal te de ltar na mngan la rma bar bgyi'os/ des mngan byed pa'i mi lasmas pa/ kyi
nang rje bdag gi bang mdzod na bdag cag dang rab tu byung ba stong pa gang yin pa 'di rnams kyi lo bcu gnyis kyi bza' ba dang btung ba yod dam/ des sbas pa/ dpon po
mchis so// des rang sangs rgyas de rnams la smras pa/ 'phags pa rnams bzhugs shig/ khyed kyi gdugs tshod kyi dus gang lags/ dernyams kyis sa pa/ khrimasudag
nyi ma phyed ma yol bar ro// de nas khyim bdag sdums byed kyisasbyan gtong ga de khang pa brtsig tu bcug nas/ sbyin gtong ga zhal ta byed pa'i ma dang dus tshod spyin pa yang bzhi g nas/ de rnams
ma re re zhing lhags nas zas kyi bya ba byed do// dgra bcom pa stong po de'i dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gang yin pa de lhag bar mdzes la mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pas 'khor de la gdugs ltar byas
gnas so// khyim bdag sdums byed kyi bu mos/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan de'i mgo gdugs ltar 'dug cing kha dog rgyas pa// mchog dang ldan par mthong nas kyang lhag par dad pa
ses go// jitsamajug gzhan zhig na dro la bab pa dang/ lhas char dbab par brtsamasas// de nas bu mo des dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi spyi bor gdugs bzung nas/ zas zos zin pa dang
rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'asi ji ltar 'phags pa 'di yon tan gyi tshogs tsa'adra ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dag thob pas 'di 'khor la gdugs lta bur byas te
gnas pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang 'khor la gdugs lta bu byas te gnas par gyur cig ces btab bo// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ khyim bdag sdums byed kyi bu mo gang yin pa de dge slong
kun shes ko'u de skye 'dod yin te/ den 'du gzhon nu mar gyur pa na rang sangs rgyas kyi dge 'dunagyi gnas brtan rgyagadugs bzung nas smon lam du ye'o tan gyi tshogs 'ang lta tho bzhi s 'khe'o
la gdugs lta bur byas te gnas par gyur cig skyes btab// des na de ltar zhen mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas nas kyang/ 'khor la gdugs lta bur
byas te gnas so// dge slong ga de lta bas na/ las gcig tu gzhag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa na gcig shuganag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas/ dge slong dag de lta bu la khyed kyis bslab pa
bya zhes ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u de rgya la brten nas/ lha brgyad khridam pa'i chos kyi nges tshim par mdzad pa
de'i tsho/ dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis tshongang ldan pa kun shes ko'u de ru lu
brten nas/ lha brgyad khri dem ba'i chos kyi ris tshim par mdzad pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'as kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dgagang gi phyir da ltar nga 'dod chags dang bral/ zhe sdang
dang bral/ gti mug dang bral zhing/ skye ba dang/ rgo ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'ab dang mya ngan dang/ smre sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid ma khed
ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su grol nas/ thams cad ma khyenatsang+ge rnam pa thams cad mkhyen te/ ye shes dang shes thams cad la dbang brnyes nas/ kun shes ko'u da la/
gal te/ lha brgyad khri dem pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par mdzad pa de la ngo mtshar rtsa zhig che/ 'das pa'i dus na nga 'dod chags dang bcas/ zhe sdang dang bcas/ gtachug dang bcas shang/ skye ba
rang/ rgo ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ smre sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yidi ma bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa las yongs su ma grol// dud 'gro byel

song gi lus su skyes pa na/ ke'u de rgya sran bu kar gyur ba la brtenanas/ srin bu ka ka brgyad khri rang gshas tshim par byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag ste na byang ba na byang chub sems/

dpa' ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas te/ rgya mtsho chen po rus sbal rnams kyi nang du skyes nas de rnams kyi gtso bor gyur to// dzatsam na tshong pa lnga brgyas rgya mtsho'i gru bo chab sgrubs nas rgya mtsho
chen por zhugs te/ de nas rin po che sna tshogs byas nas slar log pa las/ 'di ltar gru bo che de chu srin 'a'i gis kyis tshan gyis phug ste/ de na kutso chen po byung ba'i sgra de rus sbal gyis
[thos nas/ rgya mtsho chen bo nas langs ste/ de de rnams kyi drung du song nas smras ba/ shes ldan dag bag tsha ba bor la kho bo'i rgyab tu zhen cig dang kho bos bsgral bar bya'o// de nas tshod
ba de rnams sha ba las sas pa bzhin du thams cad rus sbal gyi sgrub du zhon te/ des de rnams khyenas rgya mtsho'i 'gram du phyogs te chas pa na/ khur gyis shani nubatsur kyang brtson 'grus lags/
shang snyoms las ma bskyed de/ de lus dub pas de rnams legs par bstsal te mgrin pa bskyang nas gnyid log go/ de dang ha cang yang ma ring ba zhig na srin bu ka da ka rnams kyi tshong led sa/
de nas ka ta ka gcig rgya zhang sengo ban dri tshor du de'i drung du song ba dang/ des lus chen po de gnyid log par mthong nas/ ris pa'i 'gros kyisrin bu ka ta ka'i tshang du son// rangagabasdus ka
tAka rnams lage bar byas nas/ srin bu ka te ka brgyad khridid de rus sbal gyi drung du dong ngo// de nas de gnade log stesha ba bzhin du sems med pa la bza'abar brtsams te/ gang gi tshe de'i
sha chen po rnams las zos na ngal bas dub ste ga'adi stag bos non pas ma tshor ro// ji tsam na shar rnams kyasha rnams za ba de tsho sad pa na/ sun bu ka ta ka thams cad kyis lus yog par
mthong nas des bsams pa/ gal te lus bsgul lam bsgyur na gdon maza bar 'di rnams 'bar 'gyur te/ srog chags gzhan la gnod pa byed pa bsan/ srog dang bral yang bla'osnyam
(du bsams nas/ gnad rnams su phug cing tshigs rnams phral ba na smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/ ji ltar sranibu ke ta ka brgyad khri po 'di rnams la sha dang khrag
gas tshim par byas ba de bzhin du/ brtag ma 'ongs pa 'dusan bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas pa ni yang/ de rnams la chos kyi ris tshim bal
byed par gyur cigaces smon lam btabab// dgeslong dag rjesnyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rus sbal gtso bo gang yan ba de nang nyid yin no// sran bu ke ta ka de rnams la lam ston pa/

gang yin pa de ni dge slong ko'u di rgya 'di de yin no// de la brten nas sha dang khrag gis tshim par byas pa'i srin bu ka dka brgyad khri po gang yin pa de dag ni/ lha brgyad khri 'di dag nyid yin te//
de na yang ngas rang gi khrag gis tshim par byas so// de ltar yang ngas de rnams la dam pa'i chos kyi ros chem par mdzad do// dge slong dag de lta bas na/ gtsag tu gnag pa rnams kyi las
kyi rnam par smin pa na zhes bya ba nas/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dege slong rnams dam pa'i
tshes kyi sa tshim par mdzad nas/ 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton te/ shin tu mthar thug ba'i grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan 'das pa la bkod pa de'i tshe/ dge slong rnams the tshom
[z/ ]skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcodapa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams dam pa'i chos kyi nges tshim par mdzad nas//
'khor ba'i 'brog 'gon pa nas bton te/ shin tu mthar thug pa'i grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod pa la gzigis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong ga
'di ltar da ltar nga 'dod chags dang bral/ zhe sdang dang bral/ gti mug dang bral zhing/ skye bdang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ smre sngags 'don pa dang/
sdug bsngal ba dang/ 'di'i bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams la sa yongs su grol nas/ thams cad mkhyen cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen te/ ye shes dang shes bya thams cad la dbang bas
so/ lnga sde'i dge slong rnams dam pa'i chos kyicos tshim par mdzad nas/ 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon banas bton te/ shin tu mthar thug pa'i grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la
bkod pa de la ngo mtshar ci zhig che/ 'as ba'i dus na nga 'dod chags dang bcas/ zhe sdang dang bas/ gtsA mug dang bcas shang/ skye ba dang/ rgab dang/ na ba dang/ 'tshe ba dang/
