nas bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed khyer te shing sA la de la 'dzegs nas sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsadas mas bkang ste/ a gyis dal bu dal bus shing sA la las babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phul ba dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis de srog chags dang bcas pa yazhi pas ma bzhes so// de nas spre'u des mtha' gcig tu song nas srog chags bsal te/ bcom ldan 'das la phul ba dang bcom ldan 'das kyis de brta

pa ma yazhin zhis ma bzhes so// de nas spre'u de mtha' gcig tu seng ste chu grang mos btab nas/bcom ldan 'das la phul ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de brtags pa byas so/ zhes bzhes so// de nas spre'u de

bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi sbrang rtsi'i lhung bzed bzhes sesnyam du 'ge nas/ dga' ba dang/ mgu ba dang/ dga' ba rgya chen bo dang/ yang bde ba skyes nas thal mo khong stong du sbyor ba byas te/ phyinur du
gar byed cing phyag 'tshal ba las/ de bcom ldan 'das la dad pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das rtog cing sgrub du ma bltas pas khron par lhung nas shiste sgra gcan nyid/
kyi bram ze las drug la brtson pa zhig gi khyim du skyes so// gang ga ma kho na la nying mtshams sbyor ba byas pa de kho na'i ma la sbrang rtsi'i char bab bo// de'i phas ltas mkhan rnams bkuka nas sa

ba dang/ de rnams kyis smras pa// sems can 'di'i mthu yin no/3dzitsam na bram ze mdo zla ba brgyad ma dgu 'dus nas khye'u zhig btsas so//gang gi rim kho na la btsas pa de kho na' 'am la sbrang rtsi'i chare

bab po// de'azhi du rnams 'tshogs shing 'dus nas rnam bdun gsum nad+d+heshu rtsa gzhug tu de'i btsus pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas/ khye'u'i mnge 'a ra gdags shes mang 'dogs par byed do// nye du rnams

kyis smras pa/ khye'u 'di gang gi nyi ma kho na la ma'i rum du zhugs pa de kho na'i nyi ma kha sbang rtsa'i char bab la/ gangag ni ma kho na la btsas pa de kho na'i nus la yang sbyang rtsi'i char bab la// ga sa 'jog dang

yang rus gcig pas/ de lta bas na khye'u'i ming gnas 'jog ga bu sbrang rtsican zhes bya bar btags so//bsringes bskyed nas chen por gyur to// gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe legs par gsungs pa'i

chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ste/de rab tu byung nas kyang ki ma re re zhing sbrang rtsi lhung bzed gsum gsum grub par gyur to/ des de rnams las gcig na bcom ldan 'das la 'bul lo// gnyis pa na dge 'dun
la'o gsum pa na grogs bshes dang lhan cig longs spyod par byed do// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ 3/

btsun pa bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ldan pa gnas 'jog gi bu spung tsacan gyis las cazhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par snyan pas gdugs re re zhing sbrang rtsa lhung bzed gsum khas la grub par gyur lags bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gnas 'jog ga bu sbrang rtsi can nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas po zhes bya ba nas/ lus can dag la 'bras bur

'gyur/ zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dge slong dag khyed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la sbrang rtsi'i lhung bzed 'bul ba'i spre'u gang yin pa de mthong ngam/btsun pa mthong lags s//de'i tshe de'i dus kyi

spre'u gang pa ni pa de ni gnas 'jog gi bu sbyang can 'di de yan te/ nge na 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la sbrang rtsi'i lhung bzed phul ba de'i las kyis rnam bar sman nga sa/ bram ze las drug la brtson pa'i ma

du skyes shing nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs pa dang/ btsas pa na yang sbrang rtsi'i char bab bo//'di ltar da ltar yang nyi ma re re zhing sbrang rtsi lhung bzed gsum gsum 'grub par 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de lta bas na
las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas/ las gcig tu dkar ba la brtsal bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te

dge slong gnas 'jog gi bu sbrang rtsi can gyis shar gyi rgya mtsho chen po la sbrang rtsir mas shang lhodang/ nub dang/ byang gi rgya mtsho chen po dang sbrang rtsir mos na/ de dag kyang spang rtsar 'gyur/
te/ dge slong dag de ltar na yon gnas de bzhin gshegs ban dpag tu med pa yin no// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus
pa btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis las ci zhig bgyisan/ las de'i rnam par sman bas rgyal po'i 'breg mkhan du gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/
bar 'khor 'di nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su las byas shing bsags pa dang tshogs rnyed pan zhes bya ba nas// lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur// zhes bya ba'i bar gong du bzhin du'o//
dgeslong dag sngon byungab rgyal po'i 'dreg mkhan zhig yod pa'i drung du rang sangs rgyas shag song nas/ bzhan bzas pa'i spu bregs shig dang/ khyod la bsod nams su 'gyur ro// de yang rgyal po'i
pho brang du rmas pas/ ris tsha bo la smras pa tsha be rab tu byung ba 'di'i debu bregs shig/ kho bo rgyal po'i khab tu 'gro gos kyis/ ji ltar rgyal po la bya ba de bzhin du bregs shig/ des/
bsams pa/ zhang po ji skad smra ba las gdon mi za bar 'di lo bsod nams yed desnyam nas/ des gus par byas te de'i skra dang kha spu bregs so// rang sangs rgyas kyis bsams pa//
sems can 'dis bsod nams mang du bskyed kyis/ 'di dge ba bskyed par bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ de la rjesasu snying brtse ba'i phyir stong gi bar snang la 'phags te/ 'bar ba dang/
gsal ba dang/ char 'bebs pa dang/ glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so// sasi'i skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtodapa yin pas/ dzeshang rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin
du rkang pa gnyis la gtugs ten lam gdab par brtsams pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ji ltar bdag gi zhing pa rgyal pa'i 'dreg mkhan byed pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang rgyal po'i 'dreg mkhar
du gyur cig ces byas se// dge slong dag ji snyam dusems/ rgyal po'i 'dreg mkhan gyi tsha bo gang yin pa de na dege slong che bar 'khor 'di nod yan te/ de na 'dus rang sas rgyas kyis dang/
kha spu bregs nas smon lam btab pa de'i las kyi rnam par snyani pas/ rgyal po'i 'dreg mkhan du gyur to// gzhan yang 'dis smon lam btab pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon
byungab ra'ir zhag na khyim bdagagacig gnas te/ des rigs mnyam pa las rlung mablangs nas/ rje de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed de/ de rtsa bar/
byed / dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u zhig btsasaso// yang de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u zhig btsasas zhes bya banas/
[4]// rim gyis khye'u bdun btsas so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// de'i ni'u zla rgyal po'i 'dreg mkhan zhig yod pa de bu med pas lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de/ bdag la bu pho yang med bu
ma yang med pas/ bdagashe nas bdog pa thams cad bu med do zhes rgyal pos mnga' mdzad par 'gyur rosnyam du sems khongs su chud tsange 'dug pa de/ khyim bdag des mthong nas sbas pa/ ni'u
zla ci'i phyir sems khongasasu chud/ des smras pa// ne'u zla kho bo lanor gyi rigs 'di snyed cig yod na/ bu pho yang med bu mo yang med pas/ khe bo gnas 'di dag thams cad rgyal pos mnga'
mdzad par 'gyuran/ ci'i phyiresems khongs su chud par mi 'gyur/ des smras pa/ gal te de lta na kha ba'i bu 'di reg thams cad kyi nu bo shos de kha bas khyed la sbani no/ dzes de byas ste//

ji tsam na khyim bdag de shab dang/ de'i bu de rnams gang gi tshe kha cig dang lhan cig 'thab mo bgyid pa de'i tshe/ des gang dag gasman 'dreg mkhan yin pa khyed kyang 'thab me rgol la ma zhes kha zer bar
byed do// de rnams yadi ma bde ba skyes sabasams pa/ bdag cag brnyas pa ci yang rung ba gang yin pa de thams cad ni nu bo 'di'i skyen las gyur gyis/ thams cad du 'phrog go snyam nas/ de rnams
kyis de phrogs pa dang/ 'dreg mkhan khros nas des 'dreg mkhan thams cad la khrims su bcas pa/ khyim bdag ga ge mozhes bya ba'i bu rnams kyi kha smra bcos pa'i las sus kyang ma byi'o zhis

00 bcasas// de rnams skadang/ kho skya dang/ sen ma ring por skyes pa de rnams rgyal pos mthong nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed cag ci'i phyir sgra dang/ kha skya dang/ sen mo ring por 'dug/ de rnams
kyis smras pa/ lha 'dreg mkhan 'das 'dreg mkhan thams cad la de rnams kyi kha spu bcos pa'i las su yang ma brgyud ces bkag lags so// ci'i phyir/ de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pasas pa dang/
rgyal pos smras pa/ phas bu la byin na khyed cag gis ci'i phyir 'phrog/ de la slar byon cig/ de rnams kyis ma 'dod bzhin du sur btang ngo//de rnams yid mi bde ba skyes te/ 'dzagi rten gyis smad pas
'jigs nas de gsad par 'dod do// 'jig rten la ni mdza' ba dang/ mi mdza' ba dang/ bar ma yodang sa/ de la gzhan dag gas sman pa dang/ des 'brog mkhan de la smras pa/ de rnams bdag la gsed par

'tshal gyis/ gnang bar mdzod cig dang bab tu 'byung ngo// des bsams pa/ de rnams kyis srog dang phral ba bas rab tu byung ba'i snyam du bsams nas smras pa/bu gal te de lta na song la rab tu byung zhig/

gang gi tshi yon tan gyi tshogs cung zad thob pa de'i tshathadag yasmyos shig/ de gnang ba thob nas drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ste/ ris mkhan po med pa dang slob dpon med par rang byang chub mngon sum
du byas nas/ nges bsams pa/ bdag sa pha de la sngon khas blangs pa'i dam bcas pa de ston du 'gro'i snyam nas/ de de'i drung du song ste// 'bar bar ng/ gsal ba dang/ char 'bebs pa dang/ glog 'byin
ba'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so// so se'i spyi bo ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod pa yin pas/ de shangertsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rkang ba gnyis la gtugs nas smon lam
gdab par brtsams pa/ bdag gas len gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa yin pa'i dgeba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag rgyal po'i 'dreg mkhan du gyur cig/ gzhan yang 'dis rangasangs rgyas lnga brgya la bya ba
byas nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag rgyal po'i 'dreg mkhan du gyur cig/ gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhi la bya ba byas nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
'dis bdag rgyal po'i 'dreg mkhan du gyur cig tses btab pa'i las de'i rnam par ts+tshan pas lan mang du rgyal po'i 'dreg mkhan du gyur to// yang dge slong rnams the tshoms skyes nas/
the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun ba tsho dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par sman pas 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams kyi
mchog tu bstan lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// smon lam btab pa nyid kyisas// gang du smon lam btab lags/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'du/da la skye dgu

rnams kyi tshe lo na khri thub pan/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'ag rten du byung ste zhes bya banas/ de grong khyer wA rA NAsar rdo bar brten te drang sreng skya ba ri dgas kyi nags

na bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de'i bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung bar gyur ste/ rab tu 'byin ba'i dge slong gang yin pa de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungasakyis 'dul
ba 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to// de la 'das tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad na yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob nas/ de na 'di 'chipa'i dus la bab pa na smon lam btab pa/
bdag gas yang dag par rdzogs pa'isas rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs la tshe ji srid par tshangs par sprod pa spangan/ yon tan gyi tshegs 'ga' yang ma thob kyis/dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yanang

'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas btsem ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes bya ba gang yin pa de la/ bram ze'i khye'u khyed skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgya thub pa na de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur re zhes lung bstan par gyur ba de'i bstan pa la/ bdag rab tu byung zhing nyon mongs pa thams cad
spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas nas/ ji ltar bdag gi mkhan po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu
bstan pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa des 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan bar gyur cig ces brtab pa de'i smon lam gyi dbang gis/ ltar de bzhin gshog
[paf]@#// pas 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to// dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par sman pa na gcig tu gnag pa yin la zhes bya ba sa
bstsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag de lta bu la khyed kyis bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dud 'byung bo 'khor dang bas

ba bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug bcom nas/ bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes pa de'i tshe/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis grong khyeser skya'i gzhir rgyal pobatsun mo dang blon po dang/ grong mi dang/ yul mi dang

bcas pa la dge sbyong go'u ta man de 'ang shi'o zhes bsngags so// de nas rgyal bo zas gtsang btsun mo dang/ gzhon nu dang/ blon po dang/ grong mi dang/ yul ma dang bcas pas mya ngan bya bar brtsams pa dang/
lha rnams kyas pa mthongo ban 'og tu 'jug pa yin bas/gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis smas pa bcom ldan 'das ma nongos te/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa'i ye shes ban+tis
se de nas rgyal po zas gtsangags kun dga' ba byas te/ kun dga' bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdud rtsi zas kyi khye'u zhig btsas/de'abatsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas/ khye'u'i ming rnyir gdags zhes
u0fc4 ming 'dogs par byed do//nye dudag gis smras pa/ khye'u 'di kun dga' bar gyur pa na btsas pas/khye'u'i ming kun dga' bo zhes gadagasas zhes/ de'i mi'i kun dga' bo zhes bya bar btags te//
khye'u kun dga' bos ma brgyad de/ pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang/ nu ma snyam pa'i lam gnyis dang/ dri ba 'phro ba'am ma gnas dang/ rtsen grogs kyi ma ma ga nga la rjes su gtad do// de ma ma'i
pang na 'tsho ba na mtshan mkhan rnams kyis/ khye'u 'dis ni them ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i rim gro byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstanato// bdud rtsi zas kyis khye'u tshanam ban rnams kyis lung bstan
to zhes thos nas/ des bsams pa// gal te de lta na bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu byung du 'ong ngo zhes spyan sngar ma'abab par bya'o snyam nas/ gangag tshobcom ldan 'dasaser skya'agazhar gshegs pa
de'i tshe/ de yangs pa can du skyel lo//gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das yas pa can du gshegs pa de'i tshe/ slar yang ser skya'i gzhir khyer ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni de lta bu ma mkhyen pa
'am mgazigs ba 'am/ thugs su ma chud pa 'am/ rnam bar m rig pa cung zad kyang ma mnga' 'o// chos skad kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten la
phan par zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig pu pa/ rtag gcig dpa' ba/ zla med pa/ gnyis sumagasung ba/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gsi bzhugs pa/ dul ba'a gnas gsum rgyagazhi la mkhas pa/
chu bo bzhi las brgal ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs legs par gnas pa/bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas goms pa/ yan lag lnga spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las 'das pa/
yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gas phyug pa/ lam gyi yan lag brgyad ston pa// mthar gyis
gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur snyan pas yang dag par rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcu la dbang sgyur ba las khyad par du 'phags pa rnamu
na/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs nas/ gang zhims par gyur/ gang ni 'phel bar gyur/ gang ni gnod par gyur/ gang na nyam nga bar gyur/
gangan ma bde bar gyur/ gang ni gnod pa dang/ rnam nga ba dang/ mi bde bar gyur/ gang ni ngaseng la gzhol/ gang ni n gnas ong la 'ab/ gang ni ngan song la 'bab/ ngas gang na ngen song las bslang ste/

mtho ris dang thar pa la gzhag par bya/ gang ga dege ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dag zhi bskyed par bya/ gangags bskyed pa dag ni yos su smin par bya/ gang gasmin pa ni grol bar bya zhes mkhyen pa dang gzig
pa 'jug go/ yang smras pa chu srani gnas kyi dug can pa// dus las 'da' bar 'gyur srid kyi// sas rgyas ga dzul la byams pa na// dus las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom
ldan 'das kyis dgos pa/ gzhon nu kun dga' bon srid pa tha ma yin pas/ de nga'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ste/ rab du byung nas nga'i rim gro byed cing gsung rab 'dzin pa dang/ nga yongs
[7 ]sumya ngan las 'das nas bdud rtsi thob par 'gyur gyi// ma la ngas gzhon nu kun dga' bo bstan pa la gzhug par bya'o snyam nas/ ma nor ba kho nar grong khyeraser skya'i gzhir byon nas bdud rtsi zas
kyi ga nas khang du gshegs te/ gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// bdud rtsi zas gzhon nu kun dga' bo khang phran gzhan zhig gnang du bcug ste bzhag go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gas
na sgo rang 'bye bar 'gyur ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas/ thog ma kho nar bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bsal yab blangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyisnam logs na bcos
ldan 'das la g.yab cing 'dug go/ de nas bdud rtsi zas kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas t+taM phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bdud rtsi zas la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab
tu dga' bar mdzad do/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas
gdan las bzhengs te bzhud do// rgyu'i stobs che yang rkyen gyi stobs la ltos dgos pas/ srid pa tha ma pa'i sems can kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'ad4kyi rjes bzhin rjes bzhin 'brang ban/ bdud rtsi
zas chung ma'i 'khoradang bcas pas bzlog par ma nus pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dan srid pa tha ma pa'i sems can yin pas khyed kyis bzlog par ma
nus kyis ma zlog cig/ bdud rtsi zas kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar gyur na 'di la rim pa bzhin bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin du byos shig/ de nas
bdud rtsi zas kyis dge sbyong dang/ tham ze dang/ bkren pa dang/ phongs pa dang/ 'gro bar chas pa'i slong ba po rnams kyi phyir sprase pa dag gtong du bcug/ bsod nams dag byed du bcug/ rangag skye go

dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams la yang bzod pa gsol du bcug nas/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te/ glang po che la zhon nas skye 'ongu mas yongs su bskor te/ n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba'i logs su phyogs/
bcom ldan 'das kyispyan sngar btang ngo// de yang sung gi dbus na 'aglob na glang po chos ut+pa la'i chun po zhig zos so// mtshan mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas/ de rnams kyis snus pa gzhon
nu 'di ni thos pa 'dzin ba rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/ ji tsam bzhen pa'i sar bar ngu bzhon pas song nas bzhon pa las babs te/ rkyang pa kho nas rgya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar zhugs nas//
bcom ldan 'das gang na ba derasangs phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od srungs gzhon nu rab
tu phyung zhig ces/ 'od srungs stobs bcu ldan la gtang nas/ ris de rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas//
rgyal po'i khab gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs 1 rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs ba dang rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas/ rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na bzhugs so// tshe dang/
ldan pa kun dga' pa'i spyi bor phol mgi byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'tsho byed la bka'astsal pa/ dge slong kun dga' bo la dpyad byosashige/ btsun pa bka'abazhin 'tshal zhes/
'tsho byed gzhon nus bskyed kyis/ bcom ldan 'dus las mnyan no// de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs sa chos 'chad do do/
tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yang chos mnyan pa'i phyir de nyid na 'dug go/ 'tsho byed gzhon nus bskyed kyis bsams pa// 'di chos la dad pa bdo bar gyur pas ma tshir gyis/ dpyad bya ba'i
dus la bab bo snyam nas// ngos de' phe la mgi s+sa na par 'gyur bdag ba sunas de 'di ru dral te de cha de ru sus par byas se/ 3re nas tshes bshad pa rdzogs nas 'tsho byad kyis gsal
bcom ldan 'dasabadag gis 'phags pa kun dga' bo 'di kore na mchas bzhin du phel mgi sman par bgyis te brtol nas sos par bgyas lags so// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smyos pa/
gal te bdag gi lus til 'bru tsam du gzhugs par gyur kyang/ bdag gis mtshor lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis ches las byung ba'i dad pas bsams pa bsdus
pa la 'tsho byed mchog tu ya mtshan skyes so// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod bsangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa// btsun pa tshe dang ldan
pa kun dga' bos las ci zhig bgyis na/ des na spro bir phel mig byung bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong kun dga' bo 'di nyidi kyis las byas shing
bsags pa dag ni zhes bya ba nas/ lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur// zhes bya ba'i bar gang ma bzhin du'o// dge slong dag sngon byung ba yul mtha' 'khob tsan+d+ri na rgyal po ka ra ta zhes bya ba gnas
sa sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa na/ 'jig rten du rangasangs rgyas dman pa dang ngan pa lasnya'i brtse ba can bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba/ 'garten gyi yon gnas gtsag bu pa dag

'byungab 'gyurabs/ de nas rang sangs rgyas shig de dang der rgyu ba na ka ra ta'i grong khyer du phyin nas/ de der bsod snyoms kyi phyir kA ra ta'i rgyal po'i khyim du zhugs pa dang/ de de la mi bzod pa skyes
tesems gdug pas 'jim la gyidan kong gis rgyab tu bsnun pa las/ bdag nyidan pa de drags pa dang nga rgyal bcom pa yin pas/de snod du ma gyur pa shes nas song ngo// dge slongadag jisnyam du sems/

0/ ki ra ta'i rgyal po gang yin ba de ni dge slong kun dga' bo de nyid yazhi ste/ gang 'dis rang sangs rgyas lam bzod pa bskyed rjesems gdugs 'dzam ral gyi rten kong gis rgyab tu bsnun pa de'i las rnam par smin /

pas tshe rabs lnga brgyar gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der spyi bor phel mgi byung bar gyur to// 'di ltard ltar 'di'i srid pa tha ma la yang sprubir phol mgi byung ngo// gang gi tshatshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo
bcom ldan 'dus dang thas cig 'gro bde'i tsho/ debcom ldan 'das la lhag por dad pa dang/ gus pa dang khrel yod ba dang/ ngo tshashes pa dang/ 'dzem pa nyid kyis nye bar gnas so// gang gi
sbrul pa yanin nidid pa dang/ gus nga dang ngo tsho shes pa dang khrel yod pa dang/ 'dzes pa de 'dra ba dag gis ma gnas so// jitsam na khyim bdag cag gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi
dge 'dun rang gi khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs/ lhung bzed dang chos gos snams te/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su skong/
dge slongagi dge 'dun gyi mdun gyis bltas nas/ khyim bdag de'i khyim du gshegs te/ gdugs tshod gsolanasasar gshegs so// dag slong rnams kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' ngo lo/
dris pa/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo tso'i ring khyod bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig song ngam/ 'on te sprul pa dang/ des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig song gi/ sas
rgyas [”]sprul pa dang ni ma yin no// sngon gung gtso khe bo phacom ldan 'das dang grubs cig 'gro bde'i tsho/ bdag bcom ldan 'das la lhag par dad pa dang/ gus ba dang/
ngo tsha shes pa dang/ khrel yod pa dang/ 'dzimapas zhe bar gnas pa yin no// gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa lan pa de'i tshe de ltar mi 'gyur ro// dge slong dag phan tshun snyas ba/
tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ni mtshan ma la mkhasaso// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su dge slong kun dga' bo mtshan ma la mkhas so zhes sa b+hAsgrags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
rgyal po'i khab tu ji tsam bzhed kyabar du bzhugs nas/ mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/ rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang mnyan yod du byon nas/ mnyan yod na rgyal bu
rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de nas tsho dang ldan pa kun dga' bo snga dro sham thobs bgos/ chos gos dang lhubazed thogs nas mnyan yod du bsod
snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa/ bram ze zhig gis mthong nas bsams pa/ dge sbyong go'utu ma'inyan thos dge slong kun dga' bo mtshan ma la mkhas so zhes thos pa gang yan ba de ni 'di yin gyis/
re zhig shangesha pa zhes bya ba bde la 'dab ma du yod pa dri'i sam nas/ des do la dras pa/ 'phags pa shangasha pa 'di la 'dab ma ji snyed mas/ des sa pa/ brgya dang/
stong dang/ khri phrug 'di snyed yod do zhes smras nas song ngo// bram ze des de la lom dag cig bkon nas bgrangs bor ro// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bsod snyoms spyad de slar log
ba dang/ bram ze des yang stsas pa/ 'phags pa de ltar shing sha pa 'di la 'dab ma ji snyed mchis mkhyen nam/ des skyas pa/ sngar brgya dang/ sdong dang/ khri phrag 'dasnyed yodod
yod pa las/ de las 'di snyed cig btogs so/ 2 bram ze de 'phags pa'i rtsis la yang de ltar mkhas pa lha zhes mchog tungo mtshar skyes so/ ba 'dabed slong rnams the
chom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos las ci zhig bgyis na/ des na mtshan ma la mkhas par gyur
lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag dge slong kun dga' bo 'di nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag ni zhes bya ba nas/ lus can ga la 'bras bur 'gyur/
zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dge slong dag sngon byung ba wA rAnas niabram ze zhig yod pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma byus te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/
dga' dgur spyod par byed do// de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u zhig btsas te/ zhag bdun gsum cha d+d+hishu rtsa gcig tu de btsas pa'i batsas
ston rgya cher byas te/ rigs dang mthun pa'i mang btags nas/ degases bskyed de chen por gyur to// de yul gzhan dusong ste mtshan ma'i bstan chos drug khri bsubs so//

de bzhin du tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe mtshan ma'i bstan chos drug khri bslabs shing/ gzhan yang bstan pa'i rgyu de dang rkyen des/ gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der mtshan
mkhan rnams kyi mchog tu byung ngo// 'di ltar da ltar gyi srid pa tha ma la yang mtshan mkhan rnams kyi mchog tu byung ngo// kos la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la nyi ma re re zhing dro ga'i ngus su gshong
bar 'byas sA lu'i se na dang/ bu ram shang gi sdong bu zhig dang/ sreg pa gnyis lcang la de gnyis las gcig na gzhong pa'i phreng du 'bab/ cig shes nas la'o// des tshe dang ldan
pa kun dga' bo la jig par bya te/ des kyang dag seng rnams la'o// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas 2 the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus
pa btsun ba ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis las ci zhig bgyis na/ des na 'tshapa ma'i dus su gzhang par 'bus sA lu'i chan dang/ bu ram shange zhig dang/ sreg pa gnyis lhung
la de gnyis las gcig ni gzhong pa'i steng du 'bab/ rgyas shos ni sa la ltung bar gyur lags/ btsem ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag kos la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di tshu
00kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan dag tu las shing bsags/ desan 'di'i zas kyi dus su gzhong par 'bras sa lu'i chan dang/ bu ram shing gi sdong bu dang/ sreg pa gnyis lhung la/ degs las

gcig ni gzhong pa'i steng du 'bab/ cig shos nis la ltung bar gyur pa ni/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer wA rAnas ni khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la khos spyod che ba zhig gnas// de'i mngag
gzhug pa rnams kyis zhing pa'i grong nas 'bras sA lus ra pa zhig dang/ sreg pa gnyis dang/ bu ram shang zhig khyer te 'ongs so// sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa na/ 'jig rten du rang
sangs rgyas dman pa dang ngan pa lasnyang brtsab can bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba/ 'jig rten gyi yen gnas gcig pu pa dag 'byung bar 'gyurabs/ de nas rangams rgyas shag wA rA N+Nasar
'ongs nas de snga dro sham thabs bagos/ chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs te bsedasnyems la khyim bdag de'i khyim du zhugs pa na/ des de lus mdzes pa dang sems dang bar mthong nas/ sa der
de la thog mar lo tog ar pa 'on cig ces smras nas/ 'bras sA lu'achan dang/ bu ram shangeg sdong bu zhig dang/ sreg pa gnyis phul ba las/ de las gcig ni lhung bzed du lhung ngo// cig
shes nas la'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'astsal pa// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag gang yin pa de ni rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di nyid yari taM/ 'dis rang sangs
la 'bras sA lu'i chadang/ bu ram shangag sdong bu dang/ sreg ba gnyis phul ba de'i las kyi rnam bar s+sadapas lo mang po dang/ lo brgya phrag mang po dang/ lo stong phrag/
mang por ma'i bde ba nyams su myong ngo// da ltar yang 'di'i zas kyi dus su gzhong par 'bras sa lu'i chan dang/ bu ram shangeg sdong bu dang/ sreg paganyis te/ de las gcig nag zhong pa'i steng du/
lhung la/ cig shes na sa la'o// kes la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi las rgyu ba gag lung bstan ngas/ sngon gyi mtha' las kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras
bu ni yod de sum du gnas/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la mngon par dadatsang/ de de ltar las kyi rnam par smin pa la yade ches par blo gros kyis gnasas// ltas mkhas rnams kyis
'phagasapa kun dga' bo'i cod pan gyis btsanges par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pas/ jitsam rnamanangs pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'depral bar phol mag byung ngo zhes/ kos la'i
rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis thos nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ yon gnas rnams la bya ba byas na bsod nams kyi 'bras bu'i khyad par med par ma 'gyur bas/ ma la bdag gis 'di la rang
nyid kyis bkur sti bya'o snyam nas/ des sman pa thams cad bkug ste/ 'phags pa kun dga' ba'i depyad gyis shig/ de'i dpyad gsal ba na bya bar brtsams pa dang/ kos la'i rgyal
00 bo gsal rgyal gyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rang nyid kyis rtsibs brgya khod pa'i gdugs bzung zhing/ dpral ba'i 'bebs pa na byed pan gyis bcingasas// dge slong rnamatshig/
skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos las ci zhig bgyis na// las de'i rnam par s+san pas ko sa la'i/
rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rang nyid rtsibs brgya mchos pa'i gdugs bzung zhing/ rang nyid kyis rnyed pan dkar pos bsus te bsnyen bkur bgyis lags/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bkalastsal pa// dge slong dag dge slong kun da ga' bo 'di nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan dag tu las byas shing bsags pa dag ni zhes bya ba nas/ lus can dag la 'bras bur
'gyur// zhes bya ba'i therageng ma bzhin du'o// dge slong dag sngon byung ba wA rANasIr sman ba zhig gnas pa'i drung du rang sas rgyas nad pa zhig song ba dang/ des de la yo byad thams cad kyis
bstabs te rang nyid kyisats+tshanadabyar dang bkums byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'atsha de'i dus kyi sman pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong kun dga' bo 'di nyid yan te/ de na
'dis rang sangs rgyas la bya ba byas nas smon lam btab pa de'ilas rnam par sman pas lo brgya phrag du ma dang/ lo stong phrag du mar rgyal bo dang/ blun po dang/ bram ze dang/
khyim bdag rnams kyis 'di la bkurasti byas so// ji ltar da ltar yang 'di la kos la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rtsibs brgya med pa'i gdugs sprabor bzung zhing rang nyate/
kyis bsnyen bkur byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas/ shang su la can gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshogs te/ rim gyis
rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang sA la can du byon nas/ sA la nyan gyi bram ze'i grong khyer na bzhugs so// de'i tshe 'di lta bu'inyan thos chen pe gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams bcom ldan 'das
kyi nye 'khor na zhe bar rten cing 'dug ra/ 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u du rgya dang/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang/ bzang ldan dang/ rlangs pa dang/ mang chen dang//
grags pa dang/ gang pa dang/ sram med ba dang/ ba lang bdag dang/ lag bzas dang/ tshe dang ldan pa shAri'i bu dang/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang tshe dang ldan
pa 'od srungs chen pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa sus po che dang/ tshe dang ldan pa ka phan chen po dang/ tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang/ dga' yon dang kam pha la dang/ sa la gnas pa'i
gnas brtan grags ba dang/ yul chu mgacan na gnas pa'i gnas brtan gangapa dang/ de dag dang gzhan yang gnas brtan nyan thos chen po rnams/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyi 'khe na nye bar brten
te gnas so// 'dul ba gzhi/// bam po go drug pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dgeslong rnams la bka' stsal ba//
dge slongadag da nang rgas/ 'khogs/ gtugs te/ 'khor bzhi po rnams dge slongadang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma la gdams ngag dbog tu ngub kyis/ dge
slong dag nga'i rim gro ba thugs la ma 'thad pa ma yin gyi/ thugs la 'thad pas rim gro byed tsang bka' stsal ba 'dzin pa dang/ rang gi don yang nyams par ma'agyur ba'i dge slong zhig spro ba
skyed cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u de rgya stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzaranas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das/
la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun po bdag bcom ldan 'das la thugs la ma 'thad pa ma lags kyi/ thugs la 'thad pas rnam gro bgyid cing bka' stsal pa 'dzin pa dang/ rang gi don yang
nyams par ma 'gyur ba lags so// ko'u di rgya khyod re zhig rgas/ 'khogs/ gtugs pas khyed nyid la rim gro pa dgos kyis/ re zhig ka de bya khyod nyid kyi stan ji lta ba bzhin la

'dug cig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u de rgya rang ga stan ji lta ba la 'dug go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang/ bzang ldan dang/ rlangs pa dang/ ming chen dang/ grags pa dang/ gang po dang
dri ma med pa dang/ ba lang bdag dang/ lag bzangs dang/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen
pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang/ tshe dang ldan pa ka phal chen po dang/ tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang/ dga' yod dang/ kim pa la dang/ sa la gnas pa'i gnas brtan grags
ba dang/ yul chu mgo can gyi gnas brtan gung pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo skur ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das
la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag ni bcom ldan 'das la thugs la ma 'thad pa ma lags kya/ thugs la 'thad pas rim gro brgyade cing bka' stsal pa 'dzin pa dang/ bdag gi don yang 'ams
par ma 'gyur ba 'gas se// gang po khyad kyang rgas/ 'khogs/ gzhugs te/ khyed nyid la rim gro ba dgos kyis/ re zhig gang pa khyod nyid stan ji lta ba bzhin la 'dug cig/ tshe dang ldan pa
gang pa rang gi bstan ji lta ba la 'jug go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'disnyam dusems te/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gang zhig rim gro par bzhed par 'gyur/ ma la bdag gis
ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs la lta bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam mo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos ji
! ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na/ bcom ldan 'das thugs la lta bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das
kya thugs la bltas na/ nga' rim gro dge slong kun dga' bos byas na thugs la ma 'thad pa ma yin gyi/ thugs la 'thad pa dang/ bka' stsal pa 'dzin pa dang/ rang gi don yang nyams par ma 'gyur

ba la ni no zhes/ bcom ldan 'dus kyi thugs tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la gtad par mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces skyasaso/
tshe dang ldan b shA ri'i bu shes bar gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs la bltas na/ dge slong kun dga' bos nga'i ma gro byas na thugs la ma 'thad pa ma yin gyi/ thugs la 'thad pa dang/
bka' stsal ba 'dzin pa dang/ rang gi don la yang nyams par ma 'gyur ba yin no zhes/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la btad do// dper na khang ba brtsegs pa 'am/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i
khyams byang phyogs su rang ba shar phyogs su skar khung btod pa// shar phyogs kyi skar khung nas nyi ma'i 'od gzer shar ba nub phyogs kyi rtsig pa'i sa la 'bab pa de bzhin du/ nga'i
rim gro dge slong kun dga' bos byas na thugs kha ma 'thad pa ma yan gyi/ thugs la 'thad pa dang/ bka' stsal pa 'dzin ba dang/ rang gi don yang nyams par ma 'gyur ba yin na zhes
bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la gtad kyis/ tshur bdag cag dong la spro bar bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu dang/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u
'gal gyi bu chen po/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang lcen tshug mngon du yang dag par dga' ba dang/ yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur
ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang mo'u 'gal gyi bu gnyis phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/
tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces sa so// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo khyed bcom ldan 'dus kyi rim gro par spro 'am/ bde bar gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bya ba ni khyod la don
chen par 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi ma gre par bdag mi spro'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsnyen par baka'
zhing bzod par dka' ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dper na me 'bar ba'i me phug na bsen par dka' zhing bzod par dka' ba yin no// de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang
bsnyen par dka' zhing bzod par dka'abs bcom ldan 'das kyi rim gro bar bdag ma spro'o// 'di lta ste// dper na gcan gzan gyi rgyal po seng ge ri phug na gnas pa'i so phrag mi sgen
par dka' zhing bzod par dka' ba yin no// de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang bsnyen par bka' zhing bzod dka'abu yan no// 'di lta ste// dper na ma tangaga' glang bo che'i
rgyal pa la drug cu lon ba/ dar la bab pa/ grags pa// mche ba gshel mda' tsam yod pa// brang ga wel ka che ba/ g.yul myong ba g.yul ngor son pa'i mche ba'i phug nibasnyen par
dka' zhing bzod par dka' ba yin no// de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang bsnyen par dka' zhing bzod par dka'akhas de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'dus kyi rim gro
par bdag mi spro'o// des tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skapany+tsas skyas sa// tshe dang ldan pa shes par gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das ni
pa'i rim gro dge slong kun dga' bos byas na thugs la ma 'thad pa ma yan gyi/ thugs la 'thad pa dang/ bka' stsal po 'dzin pa dang/ rang gdon yang nyams par ma 'gyur ro zhes/ tshe dang
ldan pa kun dga' bo la thugs gtad de/ dper na khang pa brtsigs pa 'am/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i khyams byang phyogs su ring ba/ shar phyogs su skar khung btod pa/ shar phyogasakyi
skar khung nas nyi ma'i 'od gzer shar ba nub phyogs kyi rtsig pa'i nges la 'bab pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das ni nga'i rim gro dge slong kun dga' bos byas na thugs la ma 'thad pa ma yin gyi/
thugs la 'thad pa dang/ bka' stsal pa 'dzin pa dang/ rang ga din yang nyams par m 'gyur ro zhes/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la thugs gtad na/ tshe dang ldan
pa kun dga' bo khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi rim gro par spro 'am/ bde bar gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bya ban khyod la no chen por 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu bdag gso de bzhin
du bgyiste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rim gro bgyid par spro bar bgyin/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la mchog gsum po/ bcom ldan 'das kyi na bza' smad g.yogs dang chos gos
bdag gis ma bcang ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gang zag pa'i mgron du 'bod na bdag gir ma bya ba dang/ bdag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bkur sti bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro ba la dus ma yi
pa cung zad kyang med par gnang ngam/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la mchog gsum gnang ba lta na/ bdag de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi rim gro
bgyid par spre'i/ gzhan du na ma lags so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang tsho dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi rim gro par spro ba
bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod de// phyogs gcig tu 'khodazhas/
sa ba/ bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi rim grobgyid pa'i dgeslong bdag cag gis spro ba bskyed pa ni 'di lta ste/
tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo lags na/ de'i mchid nas 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po/ bdag gas de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi rim gro brgyud par spro bar bgyi na/ gal
te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la mchog gsum po/ bcom ldan 'das kyin baza'asmad g.yogs dang chos gos bdag gis ma bcang ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gang zag pa'i mgron du 'bod
na bdag gis bdag gire ma bya ba dang/ bdag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bkur sti bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro ba la dus ma yin pa cud kyang med par gnang ngam/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis
bdag la mchog gsum gnang ba ltan/ bdag de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi rim gro bgyid par spro'o zhes mchi lags so// me'u 'gal gyi bu legs so legs so// dge
slong kun dga' bo ni mkhas pa yin ste/ ris ma 'os pa na tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams las rtsod cing rjes su rtsod pa spyod pa'i gnas kyi chos 'byung la/ gzhi 'dis
bdag la tshangs pa mtshungs par sbyod pa rnams/ dge slong kun dga' bo ni chos gos kyi rgyus ston pa la bkuras byed do zhes kha zer bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ mo'u 'gal gyi
'don dge slong kun dga' bo'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i ris yazhino// me'u 'gal gyi bu legs so legs so//dge slong kun dga' bo mkhas pa yin te/ des ma 'ongs pa'i
dusan tshas pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams las rtsod cing rjes su rtsod pa smad pa'i gnas kyi chos 'byung la/ gzhi 'dis bdag la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams/ dge slong kun dga' bo nikha
zas kyi rgyus ston pa la bkur lta byed do zhes kha zer bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'di ni dge slong kun dga' ba'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos yin no// mo'u 'gal gyi bu legs so
legs so// dge slong kun dga' bor mkhas pa yin te/ dus shes shing dus rig pas/ de 'dani bdag gas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyare 'gro ba'i dus yin/ 'di ni dus ma yin/
'di ni dge slong ga dge 'dun dang/ dge slong ma'i dge 'dun dang/ dge bsnyen gyi 'khor dang/ dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor gyi dus yin/ 'di ni gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu dag/ bcom ldan 'das
la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba'i dus yin/ 'don jus ma yan/ gzhan mu stegs can dang kun tu rgyu 'di ni bcom ldan 'das khyobaka' la spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ 'di dag ni bka' la spobs
pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur/ bza' ba dang bca' ba 'di ni bcom ldan 'das la bde ba skyed par 'gyur/ 'di ni bde ba skyed pa ma yin zhes shes te/ mo'u 'ga' rgya bu dge slong kun dga' bo namawA
pa yin te/ dusashesashang dus rig pas/ de 'di na bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba'i dus yin/ 'di ni dus ma yin no// 'danoreg slong gdage 'dun dang/ dge slong ma'i
dge 'dun dang/ dge bsnyen gyi 'khor dang 2 dge bsnyen ma' 'khor gyi dus yan no// 'di ni gzhan mu stegs can dang kun tu rgyu dag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba'i
dus yanano// 'din dus ma yin no// gzhan mu stegs nyan dang kun tu rgyu 'di dag niwacom ldan 'das kyi bka' la spobs ba dang ldan par 'agyur ro// 'di dag ni bka' la sdebs pa/
dang ldan par ma 'gyur ro// bza' ba dang bca' ba 'di'i com ldan 'das la bde ba skyed par 'gyur ro//'di ni bde ba skyed pa ma yin no zhes shes pa gang ya ba 'di nimo'u 'gal gyi bu dgeslong kun
dga' po'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos yin no//mo'u 'gal gyi bu legs so legs so//dge slong kun dga' ba na mkhas pa yin no//desam 7 rnam gras la mkhas pa lan/de bzhin gshegs pa phyi 'breng
du yang dag 'jog las bzhes ba mtshan ma 'am gsungabastan pas shes par 'gyur zhing/ bdeba'a gnas ba 'di dang 'dis bcom ldanu'adas mang du bzhugs so//gas pa 'di dang 'dus bde bar gshegs ba mang du
bzhugs so zhes ston par 'dod na/ ji skad bstan pa de dag thams cad de bzhin du 'gyur te/gzhan duma'agyur ba gang yin pa 'di'i mi'u 'gal gyi bu/dge slong kun dga' bo'i rmad du byuba'achos yin// des
de bzhinagshegs pa'i rim gro byas na thugs la ma 'thad pa ma yin gyi/ thugs la 'thad pa dang/ bka' stsal pa 'dzin pa dang/ rang gi don nyams par mi 'gyur ro//
mo'u 'gal gyi bu dbazhin gshags pa'i 'am gro dge slong kun dga' bos byas na thugs la mi 'thad pa ma yin gyi/ thugs la 'thad pa dang/ bka' stsal pa 'dzin pa dang/ rang gi don yang
u0fc4 nyams bar mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni/ dge slong kun dga' bo'i rmad du byung ba'i chos yin no// gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i budang me'u 'gal gyi bu gnyis kyi/ tshe
dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi rim gro bar sngobabaskyed pa na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su bsngags pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ dge slong rnams thatsem skyasanas/ thatsom thams cad
gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa// btsunapa tsho dang ldan pa kun dga' bos las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas bcom ldan 'das kyi mched du gyur cing thos pa mang
ba dang/ thos pa 'dzin pa dang/ thos pa bsags pa'i romi gro par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag dge slong kun dga' ba 'di nyid kyis las byas shing
paN+NaM bsags pa dag ni zhes bya ba nas/ lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur// zhes bya ba bar gongam bzhin du'o// dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyerawArANasIn rgyal po 'od gzer zhes bya ba

'byor ba dung zhes bya ba nas/ skye bo dang mi mang po yod pa na rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste zhes byaba'i bar du lta ]btsun mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do//
de tsa bar byed/ dgabar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed ban khye'u zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas da 'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas/ khyobumang regadags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do//
byonapo rnams kyis/sa pa// 'di'i yab do gzer lags/ de'i slad du khye'u'i ming 'do gzer can du gdags so zhes/ de'i mang 'od gzer can du btags nas/ bsris bskyod de chen por
gyur ba dang/ phas rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ro// yang de rtsa bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dagur sbyod par byed pa na khye'u zhig btsas nas/ de'i yang btsas pa bu ston rgya cher byas
to/ 'od gzer ldan zhes bya bar mngeb gso// gzhon nu 'od gzer can des par 'byung ba la mngon par dga' zhing/ dus pha chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du 'jug ba mthong
nas dus bsams pa// bdag kyang yab 'das nas rgyal por 'gyur te/ bdag gis kyang chos dang tshe kha yin pas rgyal srid byed du bcug nas dmyal bar gzholo bar 'gyura'o snyam nas/
de ba'i drung du song nas rkad pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras ba/ lha mkhyen bar mdzad du gsol/ rab tu 'byung lags so// des smras pa/ bugang gi don du mchod sbyin mchod par
'byed / sbyin srog sreg par bye/ dka' thub kyis gdung bar byed pa'i rgyal srid de khyod kyi lag tu 'ongs na/ ci'i phyir rab tu 'byung zhes de bzlog kyang ma btub bo///
rgyal pos gdon mi za bar gal gyis 'chu bar shes nas gnang ba dang/ da drang srong rnams kyi nang du song ste rab tu byung ngo// rgyal pos gzhen nu 'odo gzer ldan rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ro//
'od gzer can drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ste/ mtha' gcig tu song nas mkhan po med pa dang slob dpon med par rang byang chub mngon sum du byas so// dadus gzhan zhig na nad kyis
thabs par gyur nas/ phan tshun 'khyam pa ni wAr Na sir phyin to// rgyal po 'od gzar gyis 'od gzer can rang byang chub mngon sum du byas te/ deng 'ongasaso zhes shes nas/ de'i drung du/
! song ste rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa// drang srong chen po khyodanangasod snyoms don du gnyer ba lags la/ bdag ning sod nams 'tshal ba las shes kyis/ bdagag skyed mos tshal 'di
nyid du bzhugs shig dang/ khyod la bdag gis yo byad thams cad kyis ma bul bar bgyi'o// des khas blangs pa dang/ rgyal pos de'i rim gro par gzhon nu 'od gzar ldan byin to/ des de'i
rim gro par zhugs pan rang sas rgyas kyis de zhag bdunan 'chib 'gyur ba'i mtshan smin pa mthong nas/ des de la sgras pa/ nu bo ci'i phyir rab tu mi 'byung/ des smras pa// drang srong
[d]chen po rab tu 'byung do/ gal te de ltar gyuranasod la yab la rtogs8shig/ de rgyal po'i drung du song nas/ lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdagarab tu 'byung lags so// rgyal bos

lcas ba/ khyod kyi phu bo rab tu byung bas/ nga 'dus nas khyod khon rgyal po yanin/ ci'i phyir rab tu 'byung zhes darang tu 'byung ba ma thob bo// rang sangs rgyas danyid rgyal bo'i drung du song ste/
song nas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ 'ong gzer 'od gzer ldan mthong dang/ 'od gzer ldan po rab tu 'byung/ 'od gzer rab tu 'byung ba legs// 'di ltar rgyal ba rnams kyis
bsngags// rgyal pos smras pa// drangasrong chen po khyod rab tu byung bas de ni bdag 'das na rgyal por 'gyur te 'dinyid du sbyin pa dag stsol ba dang/ bsod nams dag bgyid par 'gyur na ni'i
phyir rab tu dbyung/ rang sangs rgyas kyis tshigs su bcad de smras ba/ 'od gzer tsho ni cung zad de// ro ltar thogs na zhag bdun nyid// don gzhan ched du bsam bsam pa// gzhin nyid/
ngu ni yongs su 'gyur// drang srong chen po 'di'i tshe zhag bdun lags sam/ rangasangs rgyas kyis smras pa/ zhagabadun yin na// rgyal pos smras pa/ drang srong chen po galate de lta na/
gnang bar bgyis rab tu phyung zhig/ de bdag la tsho chung zhig yod par shes nas dad pa drag pos de la bkur sti bya bar brtsams so// rang sangs rgyas de rlung nad can zhig ngas/ sa lhung bzed/
lag tu blangs nas zaban rlung gis lag pa 'dar bar gyur to// de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu das gdu bu byung nas lhung bzed kyi gzhir bzhagapa dang/ de la lhung bzang ma g.yo bar
'dug go/ des de mthong nas smon lamagadab par brtsams pa// ji ltar 'do'i lhung bzed 'di ni g.yo ba de bzhin du/ gaba'i rtso ba 'dis bdag gi rgyud la chos ci yod pa de dag mi g.yo ba
gnas par gyur cig ces btab bo// de de la sngon yi ge dang tshigaran pa na par chos 'chod pa yin pas/ des smras pa// khyod sngon khyim par gyur pa na yi go dang tshig ran pa na par tshos 'chadalags
na da rang byang chub mngon sum du bgyis na ci'i phyir chos ni bshad/ des snyas pa// kho bo chos ma 'chad do// 'o na su 'chad lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pas sangs rgyas rnams gang yin pa ste/ sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni tshig dang yi ge ran pa ran par chos 'chad do// des smon lamabatab pa/ sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das
tshig dang yi ge ranang na par chos 'chad pa gang yin pa de'i mchod dang rim gro par bdag gyur cig ces btab bo// rang sangs rgyas des de rab tu phyung nas smras pa// khyed zhag bdun 'das nas
'chi bar 'gyur pod kho na khyod kyis yid la byos shig/ des zhag bdun len na cung zad kyang ma rtogs nas/ des 'chi ba'itshi smon lam btab pa// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bam ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ thos pa mang ba dang/ thos pa 'dzin pa dang/ thos pa bsags par gyu cig/
ces btab bo// dge slong dgaji snyam du sems/ rgyal bu gzhon nu rang sangs rgyas kyi nu bor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ dag slong kun dga' bo 'di nyid yin te/ den yang 'dis rangasangs rgyas
phungo shes kyi rim gro byas na smon lamabatab pa de'i las kyi rnam par sminang sa/ bcom ldan 'das kyimachod du gyur cing thos pa mang ba/ thos pa 'dzin pa// thos pa bsags pa'i rim gro/
par gyur to// dag slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/ thatsem thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun nga tsho dang ldan pa kun dga' khos lasazhizhig bgyis na las
de'i rnam par smin nga sa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thos pa mang bo/ thos pa 'dzin pa// thos pa bsags pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
dge slong kun dga' bo 'di nyidakyis las byas shing bsags pa dang/ tshogs rnyedapa ni zhes bya ba nas/ lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur// zhes bya ba bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dgaslong
dag sngon byung ba bskal ba bzang po 'di nyid la skyadagu rnams kyi tsho lo nyi khri thubapan/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa la zhes byab nas/ sas rgyas bcom
ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste zhes bya ba'i bar tu ste/ dgrong khyer wA rA NA sir nye bar bstan nas drang srong smra ba rigs kyi nags na bzhugs so// de'i

bstan pa la 'dirab tu byung na de na 'dis yon tan gyi tshegs cung zad kyang ma thob bo// 'dirab tubyin pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis thos pa/
mngab dang/ thos pa 'dzin pa dang/ nyes pa bsags pa rnams kya mchog tu lung bstan pa/ yin bas/ da 'chi ba'i tshe smon lam btab pa/ bgagis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yen gnas bran med pa 'od srungs la tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad na yon tan gyi tshegs cung zad kyang mtheb kyis/ dgaba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis bag yangs par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis bram ze'i khye'u bu ma zhes bya bgang yin pa dal/ bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu rnams kyi le brgya thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgu
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de'i bstan pa la bdag rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas
[“ ]nas ji ltar bdag gi mkhan bo yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis thes pa mngab/ thos pa 'dzin pa// thos pa bsags pa rnams kyi mchog tu lung bstan pa de bzhin
du/ bdagakyang shAkya'irgyal po'i rang rgyal po bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa des thos pa mngag/ thos pa 'dzi ba/ thos pa bsags pa rnams kyi mchog tu lung bstan par gyur cig ces btab/
go smo na lam de'i dbang gis de ltar ngas thos pa mang ba/ thes ba 'dzin pa/ thos pa bsags pa rnams kyi mchog tu lung bstan to// dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa
rnams kyi zhes bya banas/ dag slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// sdom la/ rdzu 'phrul ston pa gsum smra dang/ gtum byed rigs pagaya dang/
gangag phyir ni gnod pa dang/ sems can rna ba khyi yin no// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal byuka lan ta ka gnas pa na bzhugs so// de'i tshe mu ge'i dgon pa//

nyamang ba slong mebs zas rnyed par ng ka' ba byung ngo// den gaslong rdzu 'phrul thob pa gang yin pa de rnams ni 'dzam bu zhes bya ba'i ming gis 'dzam bu'i gling zhes bya bar btags pa gang yin pa de 'das
shing 'dzamabu'i snye ma kha dog dang/ dri dang/ ro tsun sum tshogs pa rnams las lhung bzed bkang ste thas nas/ bdag nyid longs spyod par byed cing/ lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa
gzhan yang 'di'i nyi 'khor na bil ba'i tshal lam/ ka pita'i tshul lam/ sgyur rtsi'i tshal gang yin pa de las/ skyu ra rtse 'a 'bras bu kha dogo dang/ dri deng/
rephun sumatshegs pa rnams las lhung bzed bkang ste blangs nas/ bdag nyid les spyod par byed cing/ lhag ma yang dag slong rnams la 'gyed par byed do// byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi
gling du dong nasam rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'bru lasaM lhung bzed bkang ste blangs nas/ bdag nyid lengs spyod par byed cing/ lhagam yang dag slong yod pa rnams la 'gyod par byed do// rgyal
chen bzhi'i ris samasum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du dong nas/ lha'i bdud rtsi las lhung bzed bkang ste byas nas/ bdag nyid lengs byed pa'i byed cing/ lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams

la 'gyod par byed do// yul ljongasa'abyor pa dang zhes bya ba nas/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba'i bar gang yin pa de nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bas lhung bzed bkang ste blangs nas/

bdag nyid longs spyod par byed cing/ lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams la 'gyed pa 'byed do// de nas lha sbyin 'di snyam du sems te/ da ltar mu ge'i dgan pa nyam nga ba slong me bas zas rnyed par dka' ba

byung ba la/ dge slong rdzu 'phrul thobab gang yin pa de rnams ni 'dzam bu zhes bya ba'i ming gis 'dzam bu gling zhes bya bar btags pa gang yin pa de las/ shing 'dzam bu'i snyam kha dog dang/ dri dang/
ro phun sum tshogs pa rnams los lhung bzed bkang ste blangs nas/ bdag nyid longs spyod par byed cing/ lhag ma yang dag myong yod pa rnams la 'gyod par byed do// gzhan yang 'di'i nye 'khor na bal
ba'i tshal lam/ ka pi ta'i tshul lam/ skyur rtsi'i tshal gang na bde las/ sbyar rtse'i 'bras bu kha dog dang/ dri dang/ ro phun sum tshogs pa rnams las lhungabazed bkang ste blangs nas/ bdag

nyid longs spyod par byed cing/ lhagamayang dgi spyod yod pa rnams la 'gyed par byed do// byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling dudong nas ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'dra sA lu'i 'bru las lhung bzedabakang stabasanas/
bdag nyid longs spyod par byed cing lhag ma yang dge slong yod ba rnams la 'gyed par byed do// rgyal chen bzhi'i sa sam sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du dong nas/ lha'i bdud rtsi'i lhung
bzed bkang ste blangasanas/ bdaganyid longs spyod par byed cing/ lhags yang dag song yod ba rnams la 'gyed par byed do// zhes bya ba nas yul ljongs 'byor pa dang shes bya ba nas/ skye bodong
mi mang pos gang ba'i bar gang yin pa de nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba lhung bzed bkang sta glangs nas/ bdag nyid longs spyod cing lhagam yang dag srong yang yod pa rnams la dgyed

bar byed kyis/ gal te bdag gis kyang rdzu 'phrul zhig thob na bdag gis kyang 'dzam bu zhes bya ba'i ming gis 'dzam bu'i gling zhes bya bar btags pa gang yin pa de las/ shing 'dzam bu'i snye ma kha dego dang
dri dang/ rophun sum tshogs pa rnams las lhung bzed bkang ste blangs nas/ bdag nyid longs spyod cing lhag ma yang dgeslong yod pa rnams la bgobar bya'o// gzhan yang 'di'i nye 'khor na bar ba'i
gya tsha la lam/ ka ba ta'i tshal lam/ skyaratshil gang yin pa de las/ sbyar rtse'i 'bras bu dang/ kha dog dang/ dri dang/ ro phun sum tshog sapa rnams las lhung bzed bkang ste

blangs nas/ bdag nyid 'das spyod cing lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams la bgo bar bya'o// byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling du song la ma rmos ma btabapa'i 'bras bu'i 'bru las lhung bzed bkang ste blangs/

nas bdag nyid longs spyod cing lhag ma long dge slong yod pa rnams la bgo bar bya'o// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris sam sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du song la/ lha'i bdud tshu las lhung gzod bkang

nas blangs te/ bdag nyid longs spyod cing lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams la bgobar bya'o// yul ljongs 'byor pa dang zhes bya ba nas/ bye bodang mi mang pos gang ba'i bar gang yin pa de nas gtsang zhing
bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba lhung bzed bkang ste blangs nas/ bdag nyid longs spyod cing lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams la bgo bar byan/su zhig bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam lung 'theg pa'i nus
snyam mo//de nas lha sbyin bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la/

ts+tso lha sbyin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam gyi lung dbo gtu gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha sbyin sdig ba'i 'dod pa de lta bu skyes par gyur pa thugs su chud nas/lha sbyin

ga 'di skad ces bka' stsal te//go'u ta ma khyod lhag pa'i tshul khrims la tshul bzhin yid la byes shig dang/ khyod rdzu 'phrul dang gzhan dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur//go'u ta ma khyod lhag pa'i sems dang lhagapa'i

bshesarab la tshul bzhin yid la byas shigadang/ khyod rdzu 'phrul dang gzhan dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// de nas lha sbyin 'di snyam du sems te/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam gyi lungam bog/

go snyam du bsams nas chas te/tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di rgyagang na ba der song ste phyin nas/tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'ud r+ya la 'di skad ces smras so// gnas brtan bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyilung dbog tu/

gsol/denasatshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs dang lha sbyin gyi la bltas na/sdig pa'i 'dod pa de lta bu skyes par shes nas/lha sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so// lha sbyin khyod

gzugs la tshul bzhin yod la byos shig dang/ khyed rdzu'aphrul dang gzhan dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// lha sbyin khyed tshor bdang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa la tshul bzhin yid la byos

shig dang/ khyod rdzu 'phrul dang gzhan dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro//de nas lha sbyin 'di snyam du sams ta/gnas brtan kun shes ko'u di rgyas kyang bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lamagyi lung ma phog gesnyam du bsams

nas tshe dang ldan po rta thuladang/ bzang ldan dang/ rlangs pa dang/ ming chon dang/ grags pa dang/ gang po dang/ dra ma che dadang/ ba lang bdag dang/ lag bzangs dang/ gnas brtan lnga brgya gang na ba der song ste phyin
nas/gnas brtan lnga brgya la 'di skad ces smras so// gnas brtan bdagal rdzu 'phrul gyi lam gyi lung dbog rtagasol/de nas gnas brtan lnga brgya bos bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs

dang dge slong gnas brtan rnams dang/ lha sbyin gyi la bltasan/ sdig pa'i 'dod pa de lta bu skyes par shes nas/lha sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so//lha sbyin khyed gzugs la tshul bzhin yid la byos shig dang/

khyod rdzu 'phrul dngagazhan dag dang yang ldan bar 'gyur go/lha sbyin khyod tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam ba shes pa la tshul bzhinaya de labyes gdang/ khyod rdzu 'phrul dang gzhan dag dang yang ldan

par 'gyur ro//de nas lha sbyin 'disnyam du sems to/gnas brtan lnga brgyas kyang bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam gyi lung ma phegan/rtse tshe dang ldan pa 'di dag bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig tu snga nyid nas bgros

sam/'di ltar bdag la sus kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi lam gyi lung ma thog go snyam mo//de nas lha sbyin 'di snyam dusams te/ su zhig bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam gyi lung dbog par nus snyam mo/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa
'od srungs stobs bcu ldan rgyal bo'i khab kyi sde can gyi phugan 'dug go/ de nas lca sbyin 'di snyam dusams to/gnas brtan 'od srungs stobs bcu ldan 'din yun ring po nas g.yomed nga / sgyu can ma yin/
drang po'i byed pa/ drang bo'i ring bzhin can yin/ bdag gi nye mtshams kyi phu bo kun dga' bo'i yang mkhan po yin pas/ gnas brtan 'od srungs stobs bcu ldan gyis bdag lo rdzu 'phrul gyi
lam gyi lung 'bogs par nus so snyam du bsams nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs stobs bcu ldan gang na ba der song ste phyin nas// tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs stobs bsu ldan gyi rkang ba gnyis
la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas lha sbyin gyis/ tsho dad ldan pa 'od srungs stobs bcu ldan la 'di skad ces smras so// gnas brtan bdag
lardzu 'phrul gyi lam gyi lung dbog tu gsol/ do nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs stobs bcu ldan gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs dang/ dag slong gnas brtan gnas gartan rnams dang/

lha sbyin gyi la bltas na/ sdig pa'i 'dod pa de lta bu skyes par gyur par ma ldog nas/ lha sbyin la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam gyi lung phog go/ de nas lha sbyin gyis nam gyi cha stod dang nam gyi cha smad la
mi nyal bar brtson pa dang ldan pa'i gnas bas/ bsam gtan dngapo la brten te rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrubs nas/ dgacig tu gyur cing mang por 'gyur ba dang/ mang por gyur cing
gcig tu 'gyur ba dang/ snang bar gyur cing mi snang bar 'gyur ba shes ba mthong bas nyams su myong bar byed do// rtsig pa la yang thad kar 'gro/ ril yad thad kar 'gro//
ra ba la yang lus kyis mi thogs par thad kar 'gro/ 'di lta ste/ nam mkha' dang sa la rang stong du 'byungab dang bye'u zul byed de/ dper na chu la bya ba bzhin no// chu la
yang ma nub par rgyun phyogs su 'gro ste/ dper nas la bya ba bzhin go/ skyil mo krung gis nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed do// dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin//zla ba dang nyi ma
'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/'di ltar mthu che ba la yang lag pas nyug cing kun tu zug par byed do// de nas lha sbyin 'di snyam du sems te/ ci bdag gis 'dzam bu zhes bya ba'i ming gis 'dzam/
bu gling zhes bya bar btags pa gang yin pa de las 'dzam bu'i snye ma kha dog dang/ dri dang/ re phun sum tshogs pa rnams las lhung bzed bkang ste blangasanas/ bdag nyid longs spyod cing lhagam
yang dge slong yod ba rnams la bgo bar bya ram/ gzhan yang 'di'i nye 'khor na bal ba'i tshal lam/ ka pi ta'i tshal lam/ skyur rtsi 'i tshal gang yin pa de las/ skyur rtsi 'i 'bras bu kha dog dang/

dra dang/ ro phun sum tshogs pa rnams las lhung bzedabakang ste blangs nas/ bdag nyid longs spyod cing lhag ma yang dag srong yod pa rnams la bgo bar bya 'am byang ge sgra mi snyan gyi gling du song la ma

rmos ma babasalI 'bras sa lu'i 'bu las lhung bzed bgangs blangs nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong mabazhin du'o// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris sam sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du song la/ lha'i bdud rtsi las
lhung bzed bkang ste blangs nas/bdag nyid longs spyod cing lhag ma yang dag slong yod pa rnams la bgo bar bya 'am/ yul ljongs 'byor pa dang zhes bya ba nas/ skye ba dang mi mang pos gang ba'i bar da

nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba lhung bzed bkang stabs nas/ bdag nyid lengs spyad cing lhag ma yang dag myong re da nga rnams la bag bar bya 'am snyam mo// de nas yang lha sbyin 'di snyam/

dusems te/bdag gis yul ma ga d+ha'i mi gtso bo gang zhig dbang du byas na/ de dbang du gyur pas skye bo'i tshogs chen po tshegs chung dus bdag gi dbang du 'gyur snyam pa dang/ de nas lha sbyin 'di snyam

dusems te/gzhon nu ma skyes dgra 'di la gshin s pa'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la bzhag par 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag gis gzhon nu ma skyes dgra dbang du 'gyur bar bya sti/ da dbang du gyur na skye bo'i tshigs

chen po tshigs chung dus bdag gi dbang du 'gyur snyam mo// de nas lha sbyin gyis glang po cho cang shes bzang bo dang/ rta cang shes bzang po dang/ dag slong skra brags shing snam sbyar bgos par dar la
bab pa dag bsgyur nas/ gzhon nu ma skyes dgra'i sgo nas zhugs shing sgo'u chung du 'byung ba dang/ sge'u chun gnas zhugs shing sgor 'byung bar byed de// res 'ga' gzhon nu gsar gyi 'go pag gis
bcings par bsgyur-i nas/ gzhon nu ma skyes dgra'i phang na 'gre ldog par byed do// maskyes dgra yang gzhon nu de la 'dzin cing kha spyad de 'khyud par byed de// res 'ga' ni khar mchil ma'i thal
ba blugs na de yong lha sbyin med par byed do// 'di ltar rnyed pa dang bkur stis dril gyis non pas soms gtugs pa'i phyir ro// de nas gzhon nu ma skyes dgras lhag par yang sdig pa can
gyi lta bar song bathob ste/ kye ma ston ba bas na 'phags pa lha sbyin ches mthu chago zhes dad par gyur to// de la dad par gyur nas lhag par bya babyed do// gshing rta lnga brgya tsam dang

lhan cig snga dro dang phyi dro rim gro byed du 'gro 'o// de la g.yos kyi sna rdzo'u lnga brgya tsam yang bkad sa dang brda sa dag tu stobs par byed do// lha sbyin yang dge slong lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig bkad sa'i gung
la 'dug bar byed do// de nas dge slong rab tu mang po snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzang dang chos gos blangs te rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs so// dag spyod rab tu ma du po rgyal po'i

khab na bsod snyoms spyod pas/ lha sbyin la rnyed pa dang bkur sti 'di lta bu dag 'byung bar gyur te/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po lus 'phags ma'i bu ma skyes dgra shing rta lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig snga dro dang phyi

dro rim gro byed du 'gro 'ango/ dgayos kyi sna rje 'u lnga brgya tsam yang bkad sa dang bkad sa dag tu stobs par byed de// lha sbyin yang dag slong lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig bkad sa'igungan 'dug pa'i byed de
zhes thos so// thos nas kyang rgyal po'i khab tubasod snyoms spud de/ zas kyi bya ba byas shing zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms spangs nas/ chos gos dang lhung bzed mkhos su phab ste rkang pa bkrus
nas bcom ldan 'dasagong nab der song sta lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'okhod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/
bcom ldan 'das la/ dag slong rab tu mang bos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa 'drir bdag dag slong rab tu mang bo snga dro ngasham thabs 'tshal/ lhung bzed dang chos gos byas te rgyal bo'i khab/
tu bsod snyoms la zhugs nas/ btsun pa bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang po rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms spyod pa na/ lha sbyin la red pa dang bkur sti 'di lta bu dag byung bar gyur te/ ma ga

d+ha'i rgyal bo lus 'phags ma'i bu ma skyes dgru shing rta lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig snga dro dang phyi dro 'am gro bgyid dumachizhing/ de la g.yos kyi sna rdzo'u lnga brgya tsam yang bkad sa dang bkad sa dag tu
stobs par bgyid de// lha sbyin yang dag song ljabargya tsamadang lhan cig bkad sa'i gung la mchis par bgyid do zhes thos lags so// dge slong dag khyed lha sbyin gyi rnyed pa dang bkur ste la dga'
bar mkhyad cig/ draci'i phyir zhe nA/ lhasbyin gyi rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni gsod ba yin no// lha sbyin gyi rnyed pa dang bkur sti nismad ba yin no// dge slong dag dperan chu shing na 'bras bu phyung
nas rnyes par 'gyur zhing/ chu 'ang ni'abras bu phyung nas skams par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ lhasngon gyi nad pa dang bkur ste na gsod pa yin no// lha sbyin gyi rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni smad pa
yin no// dper na snga dang smyug mni 'brasabu phyung nas skam par 'gyur zhing/ spa dang smyug ma'i 'bras bu byung nas dung yag tu 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ lha sbyin gyi rnying pa dang bkur sti ni/
gsod pa yin no// lha sbyin gyi rnyed pa dang bkur stin smad pa yan no// dper na dre'u mo ni mngal du bzung nas 'chi bar 'gyur zhing/ dre'u mo nimangal du bzung nas ma

rung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ lha sbyin gyi rmad ba dang bkur sti ni gsod pa yin no// lha sbyin gyi rnyed pa dang bkur stenismad pa yoneno// dge slong dag lha sbyin gyi rnyed pa dang bkur ste de lta bu ji snyed byung
ba de dag ni/ skyes bu gtumug de la yun rang par gnod pa dang/ phan pa ma yin b dang/ sdug bsngal bar 'gyu'o// dge slong dag de lta bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ rnyed pa dang/
bkur ste gang yin pa zil gyi mnan par bya'o/ redapa dang bkur sti byung ba la sems gtugs te gnas par ma bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis da lta bu la bslab par bya'o// chu'i
'bras bu smyug 'bras dang// snga ni 'bras bu skams pa dang// rang gi bu yis dre'u mo ltar// skyas bu tha ngal bkur stis 'joms// jisrid byis pa mngon byed nga// de srid du ni phung bar 'gyur//
byis pa'i dkor ba'i cha'ajoms pa// rtse mo las kyang ltung bar 'gyur// de nas lha sbyin rnyed pa dang bkur stis zil gyis non pa/ sams yongs su gtugs pa la sdig pa'i 'dod pa 'di lta
bu skyes par gyur te/ da ni bcom ldan 'das bgros/ 'khogs/ gtugs te/ 'khor bzhi la gdams ngag dbog tu mnyel bar gyur gyis// e ma'o bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge
00'dun bdag la sngangs te/ bdag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun yongs su drang zhing/ bcom ldan 'das ni thugs las chung ngur mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rjes su brtson
par bzhugs kyang cim rung snyam du sems bskyed ma thag tu/ lha sbyin rdzu 'phrul de las yongs su nyams to/ yongs su nyamasakyang bdag yongs su nyams so zhes mi shes so// de'i tshe bcom
ldan 'dasaMkyi nyan thos krod da'i bu dag slong nog can zhes bya bas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod nga la spyad de/ tshangs nga 'i gnas pa bzhi bsgoms nas/ 'dod pa
rnams la 'dod pa'i 'dun pa sbyang ba'i phyir de la mang du gnas pas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dang skal ba mnyam par skyes so// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ngan slong gi chu
srin byis pa gsod kyi ril 'jigs byed kyi tshal gyi ri dgas kyi nags na 'dug go/ de nas tshangs pa nog can gyis lha sbyin rdzu 'phrul de las yongs su nyams bar shes nas/ dper na skyes bu stobs
dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskums pa las bskyang ba 'am/ brkyang ba las bskums pa tsam gyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten las mi snang bar byas te ngan sbeng du 'ongs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'galagyi
bu chen po'i mdun du 'dug go/ de nas tshangs pa nog can gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// tshodang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po shis par gyis shig/
lha sbyin rnyed pa dang bkur stes zal gyis non pa/ sems gtugs pa la sdig kha'i 'a dod pa 'di lta bu skyes te/ dani bcom ldan 'das bgres/ 'khogs/ gtugs te 'khor
bzhi la gdams dag dbog tu mnyal bar gyur gyis/ e ma'o bcom ldan 'das kyi dgeslong gi dge 'dun bdag la spang te/ bdag gis dag slong gi dge 'dun yongs su drang zhing/ bcom ldan 'das ni
blo/ thugs las chung ngur gnas shing mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rjes su brtson par bzhugs kyang ma rung snyam sems bskyed ma thag tu/ rdzu 'phrul de las slar yongs su
tshanyams te/ yongs su nyams kyang bdag ni sa yongs su nyams so zhes ma shes kyis/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu snying brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song staphyin nas den

'di rgyus bar gsol na legs so// tshodang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos tshangs pa nog can l cang ma skyabs khas blangs so// da nas tshangs pa nog can gyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos
na mnabama' 'gal rgyabu chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal to/ de nyidadu mi snang bar gyur to//de nas 3 rnam snang ga nas sa skya ba dang ni ma nas tshad ldan la 'bag mtshan
ya
ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas tshodang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas 1 bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas
nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos tshangs pa nog can dang lhan cigabor skabs kyi gtamaji snyed glengs pa de dag thams
cad rgyas par gsol to// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mo'u 'gal gyi bu snga mo zhig tu lha spyi
soms la bkranas rig par ma byas sam/ ca ne da gzod tshangs pa nag can gyis sbran/ btsun pa mad lags so// bcom ldan 'das dang/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po thabs cig tu
bar skabs kyi gtam 'di gleng bar mdzad pa na/ de nas lha sbyin grogs dge slongabazhi po kakakaka dang/ khan da drab bya dang/ ka ta mo ra ka tigya dang/ rgya mtshos byin dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das
gang na ba der sor ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lha sbyin rgyang ring po kho na nas gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu lha sbyin
'o ni da ltar 'ong gis tshig srungs shig dang/ de'u re skyos bu gti mug 'o ni bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid lung ston to// de nas tsho dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
dganyis la mgo bo phyag byas nas/ ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na 'od ma'i tshal nas mi snang bar gyur te/ ngan slong gi chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ril 'jigs byed kyi ni/
dgas kyi nags su phyin pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas lha sbyin bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag
ts+tshA byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'dasal/ lha sbyin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// da ni bcom ldan 'das bgres/ 'khogs/ gtugs te/
[@]'khor bzhi la gdams ngag dbog tu mnyel bar gyur gyis a ma'o bcom ldan 'dus kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun bdag la spongs shig dang/ bdag gis dag slong gi dge 'dun yongs su drang
gis / bcom ldan 'das ni thugs las chung dur bde bar gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rjes su brtson par bzhugs su gsol/ bka' stsal pa// skyes bu gti mug re zhig shA ri'i bu dang mo'u

'gal gyi bu tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa de dag la yang/ nga dge slong gi dge 'dun mi sbyong na/ ro drang 'dra pa mchal ma 'thung ba khyod la lta ga la sbong de nas lha sbyin 'di snyam du sems te/
bcom ldan 'das kyis [︽]shA ri'i bu dang mo'u 'gal gyi bu la ni bsngags pa gsungs la/ bdag la ni ro dang 'drab mchil ma 'thung ba'o zhes smad pa gsungs so snyam mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das/
ma la lha sbyin 'khrugs pa dang/ zhe sdang dang/ nga rgyal dang/ 'chab pa dang/ bgrongs pa dang/ mi bzod pa dang/ ma dad ba bstan to// da nas lha sbyin gyis mjal la zhes byas nas mgo lan/
gsum lcogs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo// 'dul ba gzhi//
bam po go bdun pa/ de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/
bsil yab thogasate/ btsem ldan 'das kyi snam logs nas bcom ldan 'das g.yob cing 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la
'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na/ dge slong ji snyed nye bar brten te gnas pa de dag thams cad rim gro'i gnas su sdus/shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'/
bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ 'od ma'i tshal byu ka phan ta ka gnas pan/ dge slong ji snyed te bar brten te gnas pa de dag thams cad rim gro'a gnas su bsogs nas/ bcom ldan
'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal to/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas// bcom ldan 'das la/
bsogs lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dan de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ramagro'i gnas gang nab der gshegs te byon nas/dge slong gi/
dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag ston pa lnga po 'di dag 'jig rten na yod cing mngon ti/
lnga gang zhen/ 'din ston pa gcig ni tshul khrims yongs su ma dag pa yin bzhin du bdag gi tshul khrims yongs su dag ste/ nyon mongs pa can ma yin no zhes khas 'che ba sta/ de nyan thos rnams dang/
lhan cig gnas pa'i rgyus so sor shes nas/ ston pa zhes ldan 'di ni tshul khrims yongs su ma dag pa yin bzhin du bdag gi tshul khrims yongs su dag ste/ nyon mongs pa can ma yin no khas
'chi ba yin te/ gal to bdag cag gis gzhan la de skad smras na/ des na 'di'i yid la ma 'bab par 'gyur bas/ ston pa de la yid du ma 'ong bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de bdag cag gis glengs te cing
ston ba shes ldan 'di rang nyid shes par 'gyur grang/ 'di bdag cag la 'di lta ste/ chos gos dang/ bsod snyoms dang/ gnas mal dang/ nad gsos kyi rgyun sman gyi yo byad rnams
kyis sems so snyam ste/ de nyan thos rnams kyis tshul khrims las rjes su srung bar soms so// ston pa lta bu ni nyan thos rnams kyis tshul khrims kyi sgo nas rjes su bsrung bar reb yin te//
'di na 'jig rten na ston pa yod cing mngon pa dang po yin no// gzhan yang 'di na ston pa gcig ni 'tsho ba yongs su ma dag pa yin bzhin du bdag gi 'tsho ba yongs su dag ste/ nyom mongs ba can ma
yin ne zhes khas 'che ba sdu/ de nyan thos rnams dang lhan cig gnas pa'i rgyus so sor shes te/ ston pa shes ldan 'dune 'tsho ba yongs sum dag pa yin bzhin du bdag gi 'tsho ba yongs su dag ste/
nyon mongs pa can ma yin no zhes khas 'che ba yin te/ gal te bdag cag gis gzhan la de skad smras na/ des na 'di'i yod la ma 'bab par 'gyur pas/ ston pa de la yid du mi 'ong bar 'gyur
ba gang yin pa de dag cag gis glengs ta ni rung/ ston pa shes ldan 'di rang nyidi shes par 'gyur grang/ 'di bdag cag la 'di lta sta/ chos gos dang/ bsod snyoms dang/ gnas mal
drung nad gsos kyi rkyen sman dang/ yo byad rnams kyis sems so snyam ste/ de nyan thos rnams kyis 'tsho ba'i sgo nas rjes su bsrung bar sems so// ston pa de lta bu ni nyan thos rnams
kyis 'tshe ba'i sgom nas rjes su bsrung bar re ba yin te/ 'di ni 'jig rten na yod cing mngon pa'i ston pa gnyis pa yin no// gzhan 'di na ston ba gcig ni shes pa mthong ba los sum ga pa yin bzhin
du bdag gis shes pa mthong ba yongs su dag ste/ nyon mongs pa can ma yin no zhes khas 'che ba ste/ de nyan thos rnams dang lhan cig gnas pa'i rgyus so sor shes nas/ston pa shes na 'di shes
thubya/ pa mtho ba yongs su ma dag pa yin bzhin du bdag ni shes pa mthong ba yongs su dag ste/ nyon mongs pa can ma yin no zhes khas 'tshab yin te/ gal te bdag cag gis gzhan/
la 'di skad smras na/ des na 'di'i yid la ma 'bab par 'gyur bas/ ston pa de la yod du ma 'ong bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ba dag cag gis glengs te ci rung/ ston pa shes ldan 'di rang nyid shes
par 'gyur grang/ 'di bdag cag la 'di lta sta/ chos gos dang/ bsod snyems dang/ gnas mal dang/ nad gsos kyi rgyun sman gyi yod byad rnams kyis sams so snyam ste/ de nyan thos rnams kyis/
gnas pa mtho ba'i sgo nas rjes su bsrung bar soms so// ston pa de lta bu na nyen thos rnams kyis shes pa mthong ba'i sgo nas rjes su bsrung bar re ba yin te/ 'di ni 'dzag rten na yod cing mngon pa'i
ston ba gsum pa yin no// gzhan yang 'di na ston pa gcig ni lung ston pa phun sum tshogs pa ma yin bzhin du bdag gi lung ston pa ni phun sum tshogs pa yin te/ nyon mongs pa can ma yin no zhes khas
'tsho ba ste/ de nyan thos rnams dang lhan cig gnas pa'i rgyus so sor shes nas/ ston pa shes ldan 'di ni lung ston pa phun sum tshogs pa ma yin bzhin du bdag gi lung ston pa ni phun sum tshogs pa/
yin te/ nyon mongs pa can ma yin no zhes khas 'che ba yin te/ galate bdag gis gzhan la de skad ces smras na/ des de' yid la mi 'bab par 'gyur bas/ ston pa de la yid du mi 'ong bar 'gyur ba de
bdag cag gis glangs te ci rung/ ston pa shes ldan 'di rang nyid shes par 'gyur grang/ 'di bdag cag la 'di lta ste/ chos gos dang/ bsod snyoms dang/ gnas mal dang/ nad gsos kyi rkyen
sman dang/ yo byad rnams kyis soms so snyam ste/ de nyan thos rnams kyis lung ston pa phun sum tshogs pa'i sgronas rjes su bsrung bar soms so// ston pa de lta bu n nyan thos rnams kyis lung ston pa
phun sum tshogs pa'i sgo nas rjes su bsrung bar re ba yin te/ 'di ni 'jig rten na yod cing mngon pa'i ston pa bzhi pa yin no// gzhan yang 'din ston pa gcig ni chos 'dul ba nyes par 'chad bzhin du
bdag gi chos 'dul ba ni legs par bshad pa yin te/ nyon mongs pa can ma yin no zhes khas 'che ba ste/ de nyan thosa rnams dang lhan ciga gnas pa'i rgyus so sor shes nas/ ston pa shes ldan
'di ni chos 'dul ba nyes par 'chad bzhin du bdag gi chos 'dul ba legs par bshad pa ste/ nyon mongs pa can ma yin no zhes khas 'che ba yin te/ gal te bdag cag gis gzhan la de skad smras na/
san 'di'i yod la ma 'bab par 'gyur bas/ ston pa de la yid du ma 'ong par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de bdag cag gis glengs te mi rung/ ston pa gshes ldan 'di rang nyid shes par 'gyu'agrong/
'di bdag cag la 'di lta ste/ chos gos dang/ bsod snyoms dang/ gnas mal dang/ nad gsos kyi rkyen sman dang/ yo byad rnams kyis sems so snyam ste/ de nyanathos
rnams kyis chos 'dul ba legs par bshad pa'i sgo nas rjes su bsrung bar soms so// ston b de lta bu n nyan thos rnams kyis chos 'dul ba legs par bshad pa'i/
sgo nas rjes su bsrung bar re ba yin te/ 'di ni 'jig rten yod cing mngon pa'i ston pa lnga po yin no// dag slong dag nga ni tshul khrims yongs sudag pa kho na yin pas/ nga tshul khrims yongs
su dag pa ste/ nyon mongs pa can ma yin no zhes zhal gyis 'che ste/ nyan thos rnams kyis nga la tshul khrims kyi sgo nas rjes su bsrung bar bsam yang ma gos la/ nga yang nyan thos rnams
