thogs te rgya mtsho chen par chas pa na/ de nubo sdog byed gang yin pa des bsams pa/ 'di skye bo mang bo sdug pa dang yid du 'ong ba yin te/ gal te yang rgya mtsho chen po'i thu grub ste slar 'ongasan/

lhag par yang skye bo mang bo sdug pa dang yid du 'ong bar 'gyur zhing/ des na pha 'dug bazhin du rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcug par 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa 'di yid kyis/ 'di'i gong
ci'i dus la bab ce na/ bdag kyang de dngalhan cig rgya mtshon por zhugs la der 'di srog dang bralan/ bdag mi 'dod bzhin du yang rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro snyam
du bsams nas/ pha'i drung du song ste smras pa/ lha dag byed rgya mtsho chen por mchin/ bdag kyang dadang lhan cige 'chi'o// des smras ba/ dbazhin du gyis shig/ de nas dge byed kyi rang gi

zlo yul du dril sgrogs su bcug pa/ grong khyeran gnas pa'i tshong pa shes ldan dag nyon cige/ gzhenan dag byed cong thogs te rgya mtsho chen por 'jug gis/ ded dpon dag byed dang lhan cig rgya mtsho chen por
'jug par khyed cag la sa su spro ba de shog gam dang/ la gcan dang/ gru btsas med par 'gyur gyis/ rgya mtsho chen por 'dong ra'i thong sta gon gyis shig/ tshong pa brgya phrag du mas rgya mtsho chen
po 'gro ba'i zing sta gon byas so// de nas ded dpon dag byed nu be sdog byed dang lhan cig dgo mtshon dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dag byas nas/ tshong pa brgya phrag du mas yongs su bskor te shing
rta dang/ khur dang/ gzab dang/ pang chod dang/ rnamo dang/ ba lang dang/ bong bu dag gis rgya mtsho chen por 'jug ba'i ngo mang po khyer nas chas te/ daram gyis rim gyis grong rdal

dang [0f10 ]grong khyer dang/ yul dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang dang/ tshong rdal rnams la lta zhing rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram du phyin nas/ de nas kar sha pa Nalnga brgyas spu nyos te/ zho shas 'tshob lnga po

[s ]stobs par byed pa dang/ sel bar byed pa dang/ rgyal chen pa dang/ gru pa dang/ rlung g.yor thogs pa khrid nas lan gsum du dril bsgrags te rgya mtsho chen por zhugs nas gru spangs pan/ nu bo snage byed la
smras pa/ gal te rgyu mtsho chen pa'i dbus su gru chag bar rgyun/ ma brtags par nga'i mgul du 'jus shig/ dres mas ba/ legs kyis de bzhin du bgyi'o// jitsam na gru de rjes su mthun pa'i

rlung gis rin pe tsho'i gling du phyin nas/ rlung g.yor thegs pas smras pa/ 'dzam bu'i grong gi tshong ba shes ldan dag nyonacig/ ni kho mo'i gling bya ba rdo rje dang/ brdzun dang/ an da rnyil dang/ margad/
lasogs pa'i rinape tshasna tshogs kyi 'byung gnas shig yod do zhes thos pa gang yin pa der yu bu phyin gyis/ na bo tsho'i 'dod pa long zhig 'di nas de rnams dga' ba dang mgu bas brtags shing
brtags naas/ rin po che rnams kyis gru de dper na/ til lam/ lus sam/ rgyu srananam/ sranam la sogs pa bzhin du bkang ngo// byang chub sems dba' rnams ni shin tu partags

pa dang mkhas pa la ne pas/ gzhon nu dge byed kyis chen po la 'os ba'in bu chen po rnams skad pa la btags so// ji tsam na chu de slar basgyur ba las 'gramadang ha cang yang mi'ong ba zhig tu chu sriti'i
phigs kyis tshul ma yin pas ma rung bar byas so// donas sdig byed kyis dag byed kyi mgul du 'jus pa dang/ des de 'bad pa chen pos 'gram du phyung ngo
gapa dang/ de 'gres pa'i skud pa la rin po che btags pa dag sdig byed kyise mthong nas/des bsams pa// 'di na rin pe cha'adi lta bu dag khyer te 'gro bar 'gyur la/ bdag ni lag pa stong
bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba lta zhes bsams nas/ des de la gnyid stug pes non pan rin po che de rnams kyang phyogs/ mig gnyis kyang tshor mas byung nas/ des de led brgya mtsho'a'agram du bor te/
songang// sdus te phyugs rdzi dag cig phyugs skyong zhing phyogs dor phyin pa dang/ de rnams kyis de mthong nas sa ba/ kyenang rje khyod su zhig/ ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pade rnams kyis

thosanas snying rje skyes to/ de rnams kyis de phyugasardzi dpon po'i khyim du khrid de// de da na ba wang blang bar brtsams pa dang/ phyugs rdzi dbon po de'i chung ma gzugs dang lang tsho 'drigs pas rgyags
pas nga wang gi sgra thos nas bsgrags pa las/ de byas pa chud gzon pa'i spyod pa rjesasu dran nas rna ba bkab ste 'dug nas ma btub bo// 'dod pa la zhen pa rnams ni mi bya ba ciya nga med pas/ des
khyim thab la dbar pa smras pa/ mi long ba 'di bdag la bsgugs na khyod 'di 'drab dag sdud par byed dam/ bsha khon can rnams kyin ng na 'di lta ste/ bud med kyi sha khon na tha chad yin pas des
bsams pa/ 'di chad pas ni bcad zin pas spang ba ma gtogs par 'di la ci byar yang med do snyam nas/ des de khyim nas sbyangs te lam po che dang/ sang dang/ bzhi mdo dang/
sum mdo rnams n nga wang gis 'tsho bar byed do// de'i pha ga nas de'i nub sdog byed rgyal srid la bzhag go/ de yang rim gyis mtshams gzhan gyi rgyalapo sngon bumo byin pa gang yin pa de'i grong khyer
du phyin to// de yang chen mor gyur nas/ de slong ba yul sna tshogs na gnas pa rgyal po'i bu dang/ blon po'i bu dang/ mdun na 'don gyi bu dag lhags nas/ phas sbas pa/ bu mo khyod gang
la zhi ba'i gzhon nu dag byed don rgya mtsho chen por song ba las de nyid du tshul ma yin pas sha bar gyur to// da na khyed slong pa dag lhags te/ gang la khyod ma byin pa de mi dga' bar 'gyur na//
'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ des smras pa/ yab gal te de ltan grong khyer byi dor bgyid du stsol cig dang/ bdag nyid kyis khyim thab bdam mo// rgyal bos smras pa/ bu de bzhin
gyis shig/ de nas rgyal pos yul sna tshogs dang/ grong khyer sna tshogs rnams su rang nyid khyim thab 'a dam par bsgrags nas/ grong khyer de la nga gsog ma dang/ rjerang/ gyo ma bsal
cing tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab dri zhim po'i yig par dag bzhag/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan bsgreng/ dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po sbyangs/ me tog/
rnam pa sna tshogs kyis lha rnams kyi dga' tshal gyi skyed mos tshal bzhin du dga' dga' ltar byas nas dril sgrogs su bcug pa/ grong khyer na gnas pa dang/ grongam dang/ yul sna tshogs
nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyi shes ldan dag nyon cig/ sang rgyal po'i gzhon nu ma rang nyid khyim thab 'dam gyis/ spyod cag 'byer ba ji lta ba bzhin 'du bar gyis
shig/ nam nangs nas rgyal bo'i gzhon nu ma de rgyan sna tshogs kyis klubs te/ gzhon nu ma du mas yongs su bskor nas/ nags tshal gyi lha me tog rgyas ba'i nags tshal gyi nangan shin tu
mdzes pa dbazhin du/ dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos grong khyer gyi dbus na srog chags brgya stong phrag mang bo 'dus ba'i nang du rang nyid kyis khyim thab dam du 'ongs so// dag byed de yang de'i
phyogs gzhan zhig na pa len cing 'dug go/ sems can rnams ni las rnams kho nas phan tshun sbyor bar byed ba yin la/ rgyu'i stobs che yang rkyen gyi stobs la ltos ba yin pas/ de nas
rgyal po'i gzhonanu ma de pa wang gi sgras soms bsdus pas/ dag byed pa tshad lenapa la chags nas des de la 'di bdag gi khyimathob bo zhes me tog gi 'phrod pa bor ro// skye bo'i tshogs yid mi
bde bar gyur cing kha cag snying na nas mod la 'phya bar brtsams pa/ rgyal ba'i gzhon nu ma 'di ltar gzugs bzang ra/ dar la bab pa// sgyu rtsal phunasum tshogs pa dang ldan pas/ yul sna
tshogs nas lhags pa'i rgyal po dang/ blon po dang/ mdun na 'don gyi bu rnams dang/ gzhan yang grong khyer na gnas ba'i skyes pa gtso bo rnamaMs spangs te 'khong ba la khyim thab tu 'dam pa mi
[tshig/ zho shas 'tsho ba rnams yid mi bde zhing yid mi dga' bas rgyal po la sbas pa// lha gzhon nu ga kyis khyim thab bdams lags so// rgyal bos smras pa/ ci 'dra ba zhig/ lha long
ba zhig lags so// de yang thosanas yid mi bde bar gyur to/ de nas de bkugs smras pa/ bu rgyal po dang/ nor can dang/ tshong dpon dang/ ded dpon dang/ blon po'i bu dang/
mdunan 'don gyi bu gzugs bzang ba/ dar la bab pa/ 'byor ba phun sum tshogs pa dgayodan/ khyodakyis ci'i phyir 'di 'dra ba zhig khyim thab tu gdags/ des smras pa// yab 'di
kho na bdag 'tshal lags so// rgyal pos smras pa// bu gal te de lta na de nyid kyi thad du songaci'aphyir 'dug/ de de'i drung du song nas smras ba/ bdag gi khyim thab tu khyod bdams so// des
smras pa/ khyod kyis malegasab zhig byas te/ de ltabod kyi 'di ni lang pa yin pas/ bdag skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyad par bya'o snyam du bsams pa lta zhig/ sa smras pa//
bdag ni de lta bu'i las byed pa ma yin no// des smras pa// tsa mngon/ des bden pa gsol bar brtsams to/ bden ba dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis rgyal bu gzhon nu dag byed de dang/
khyod la 'dod chags skyes kyi gzhan su la yang ma yin zhen/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des khyod kyi mig gcig sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur cig// ces bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs ma thag kho
ca// @#// nar de'i mig gcig sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to// des smras la/ dag byed de nyidang yin te/ nu bo shes sdig byed kyis 'di lta bu'i gnas skabs su byas so//
des smras ba/ gzhonanu dag byed de kho na khyod yin par tsa mengon/ des kyang bden pa gsol bar brtsams te/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis sdig byed kyis bdug gi mig byungan/ de la
nasems cung zad kyang ma byung zhen/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag gi mig cig shos kyang ston bzhin gyur cig ces byas pa dang/ bden pa gsol bas de'i mgacig shos kyang sngon gyi
ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to// de nas rgyal de'i gzhon nu ma des dge byed dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin pa de khrid nas rgyal po'i drung du song ste smras pa// yab dag byed na 'di nyid lags so// rgyal
po yur ma ches pa las/ des ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang/ rgyal po mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas/ nas des bu mo rdo dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos byin nas/ dpung chen po dang chas te grong

tsit+taM khyer der dong ste sdug byed rgyal srid las phyung nas/ dgabyed de yang pa'i rgyal srid la bzhag go/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi dag byed gang yin pa ni nga yin no// de'i tshe
de'i dus kyi sdig byed gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin 'di nyid yin te/ dan yang 'di byas pa mgazob dang byas pa ma tshor yin no// de ltar 'di byas pa ma gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba yin no/

tsa/ gzhan yang 'di ji ltar byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas ba ma tshor bde nyen cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba rgyal po'i pho brang yin rgya ba sho zhig 'byor ba dar rgyas ba dang/ bde ba dang/ lo legs pa// skye bo dang ]
mi mang bsarapa chu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug la// de btsun modang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed de/ de rtsa bar byed/ dga' bar byed//
dag 'a dgur spyod par byed pa las/ rim gyis bu bzhi btsas te yal ga dang/ lcag ma dang/ rjes su mthun pa'i lcag ma dang/ sa ga'o// de rnams bsrings bskyod de chen rer gyur nas//
yul gzhan gyi rgyal po'i bu mo dag las chung ma blangs pa dang/ de rnams rgyal po la brnyas thabs byed par brtsams pa dang/ de nas rgyal pos phyugs te rang rang gi chung ma khrid de dong ba las/
jitsam na dgon palam zhig tu phyin pan/ de rnams lam rgyags chad nas de rnams phan tshun du nang khrims bcas te/ chung ma re'i bsad la do'i shas dgon pa'i lam brgal bar bya'o zhes
byas so// sags bsams pa// gzhan gyi srog bcod pa phas rang gi srog chud zos pa bya'i 'dir yong rtsi'i dus la bab ce na/ chung ma khrid de bris te 'gro snyam nas/ sa chung
ma khridad bres pa las/ de'i chung mar bza' ba dang btung ba dang bra ba dang/ lam gyis dub pas slong blong por gyur te smras pa/ rje'i sras srog dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro// sags
bsams pa/ bdag gis 'di srin po rnams kyi nang nas yongs su bskyabs na/ da gal te shi bar gyuran ma legs so snyam nas/ des brla'i sha las bcad de de
thar bcug cing lag pa gnyis kyi rtsa gtubs pa'i khrag byung de/ des de khrid de rims kyis ri zhig gi drung du phyin nas/ dan rtsa ba dang 'bras bus tshobar byed do// di'i drungan bab
'tsho/ chu zhig 'bab pa de la/ mizhig dgras lag pa dang rkang pa gdubs nas chur bskyur te/ da chus khyer ba na nyam thag pa'i de'o'i skad 'byin// sa ga yang phyogs gzhon zhigen
rtsa ba dang 'bras bu rko ba las/ des mi de'i 'o dod 'bod pa thos nas/ de sems rgyud snying rjes brlan pas/ ri de la 'dzegs te kun tu blta bar brtsams pa las/ ji tsam
ma da chus khyer ba de mthong nas/ des myur ba myur bar las babs te/ 'bab chu'i nang du zhugs nas mi de khur du blangs nas 'bab chu'i 'gram du phyung ste bzhag nas/ de'i
sdug bsngal gyis snying gdungs nas smras pa/ bu 'di ni las gyur/ des ji ltar gyur pa thams cad las ra/ de nas des de dbugs phyung sta/ rtsa ba dang 'bras bus tshim par byas nas
chung ma la gtad do// des de'i rim gro byas nas sos par gyur to// de de'i rim gro byed pan gcugs pa'i bde bas yang dang yang du drung du song nas gtam rnam pa sna tshogs smras
wa zhing 'dug go/ 'di na chos nyid yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags chung ba yin pas/ sa ga de dang lhan ge res 'ga' gab dgur spyod la/ re 'ga'/
dga' dgur spyod par mi byed do// byang chub sems dpa'i mthus sdong bu dang/ rtsa ba dang/ 'bras bu de dag lhag par mthu dang ldan pa yin pas des de dag longs spyod pas nyon
mongs pa bdonos mi rkang lag rdum po de la bsgugs pa ra brtsams pa dang/ de ma btub nas/ smras pa// ra zhig bdag sogs rjen pa dang 'dra ba las da ltar sos pa yang stas te gson
nagal te yang 'di 'dra ba byas nas/ khyed kyi khyi des bdag thams cad srog dang phral bar 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa 'dayod do// de la des yang dang yang du bsgrugs pa dang/ nyon mos
ba rnams ni thul bar dka' ba yin pas de de dang lhan cig skul le// de de dang lhan cig kun tu dga' ba dang/ yid du 'ong ba dang/ lhag par chags bar gyur pas mngags kyang de'i drung
du mi 'gro'o// des bsams pa// 'di ltar 'di chags par gyural/ sha khon rnams kyi nang nan 'di lta ste/ bud med kyi sha khon tha chad yin pas/ da ni bdag ma rung ngo snyam
nas des de dang lhan cig gros bya bar brtsams to/ khyed kyi khyo 'dis gal te bdag cag nyal par shes par gyur na/ gdon mi za bar khyod la gnod pa byed cing bdag kyang srog dang
phal bar 'gyur ro// des bsams pa// smras pa 'di ni legs kyiso/ thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam ne// bud med na ma bslabs par mkhas pas des
mgo gos kyis dkrisanas mi'i brag ka zhig na nyal te 'dug go/ jitsam nas ga rtsa ba dang 'bras bu khyer te 'ongs na de de ltar nyal ba mthong nas/ de nas dris pa/ bzang me 'di ci zhig/ des
smras pa/ rje'i sras bdag klad pa bro 'atsal te ta par mi bde 'a// sags snas pa/ de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ des ri'i bya skyibs na rdo dreg cig mthong nas/ des smras pa//
ji'i sras bdag sngon yang klad pa'i brend 'di lta bu s thebs pa na/ smras pas rdo dreg bstan to/ das sos par gyur lags so// sa gas rgyas pa// rdo dreg btsal le// des smras
pa rje'i sras ri'i bya skyibs 'di la mchis kyis/ bdag gis khyed kyi dpyang thag gathung gas khyed kyis phyung zhig/ bdag nyid chen be do drang po yin pas de'i ngan g.yo ma shes pas de bzhin du
byas zung zhig dang dbyung do shes khas blangs nas/ das de thag pa las dpyangs la btang ba dang/ des lag pa gcig gis thag babatang ban des kyad btang nas chur lhung ngo

sems can tshe ring ba rgyal srid kyi bde ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ban kho 'chi ba yin pas/ chu'i rgyun phyogs su khyer nas rgyal po'i pho brang zhig tu phyin to// de'i rgyal po yang bu med bar shi'i// blon
bo rnams dang/ grong mi dang/ yul mi dang bcas pa thams cad 'dus nas gros byed de/ shes ldan dag rgyal po nongs nad su zhig rgyal srid la gzhag par bya/ de rnams kyis mtshan mkhan gyi
ma rnams bskos te/ shes ldan dag sems can bsod nams kyi skal ba chen bo dang ldan ba chel ga dang/ de rgyal srid lagazhag par bya'o// de rnams kyis phyogs kun tu btsal bar
brtsams pa na/ las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni// chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/ rnyed na lus can rnams la ni// 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid// sa ga la rgyal srid 'byung
bar 'gyur ba'i las rnam par smin pa nyid nye bar gnas pas/ 'bab chunas byung nas phyogs gzhan zhig na 'dug pa las/ byang chub sems dpa'i mthus phyogs de rgyan gyis brgyan pa
bzhin 'dug ga/ ji tsam na mtshan mkhan gyi mi rnams phyogs der lhagasan/ bdag nyid chen po de rgyal sud kyi mtshan ldan par mthong nas/ de rnams dga' ba dang yid bde bas blonaM
po rnams kyi drung du deng sta smras pa/ bdag cag gis btsal na sems can bsod nams kyi skal ba chen po dang ldan pa zhig yod de/ de largyal srid 'os so// de nas blon po de rnams
kyis lam byi dor byas grong khyer byi dor byas nas/ dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos grong khyer dukhrid de nyi ma dang/ tshes grangs dang/ yud tsam dang/ rgyu skar rnams rim bzhin dusbyar
[rpo]da/ targyal srid kyi dbang bskur ro// de la btsun mo med nas blon po rnams dang/ mdun na 'don rnams dang/ yul gzhan gyi rgyal bo rnams dang/ gzhan
yang nor can dang/ tshong dpon dang/ ded dpon rnams rang rang gi bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis klubs nas khrid de rgyal pos khab tu bzhes par bya ba'i phyir grong khyer der lhags na/ rgyal po de
ts+tsa bud med kyis sun phyung ba yin nga sa khas ma blangs so// blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha rgyal po rnams ni btsun mo dang/ gzhon nu dang/ blon pa dang/ grong ma dang/ yul
mar bcas pa lags kyis btsun me bzhug tu gsol/ yul sna tshegs na gnas pa'i mi'i gtso bo rnams dang/ yul gzhan gyi rgyal bo rnams dang/ ma gtse bo de rnams kyi bu mo rnams
de'i mngon sum du gyur bar bya ba'i phyir sta gon byas te bzhag na/ 'on kyang de khas len du ma btub ste bud med rnams yang dang yang du smad do// sems can rnams kyi bsod nams kyi
mthus longs spyod rnams mathu dang ldan zhing phun sum tshogs pa yin pas/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'i bud med byas pa chud gzon pas ri de las bor ba de'atshe/ ridi'i rtsa ba dang
'bras bu rnams bsrabs par gyur cing mthu med par gyur to// de nas bud med de mu ge'i dus kyi 'chi ba'i 'jigs pas skrag nas/ rkang lag ma tshang ba do khur du thogs te gleng mthar
song nas lam le cho dang/ srang dang/ bzhi mdo dang/ sum mdo rnams su sprang zhing rgyug/ dris ban sbas pa/ bdag khyim thab las ma 'phyo ba'o// bud med gang zhig khyim
thab las ma 'phyo ba de 'jig rten gyis mchod pa'i chos de yod pas/ de gang du zhugs pa der slong me thob bo// dze tsam na de rim gyis rgyal bo'i pho brang du phyin pa dang/ 'jig rten gyis thos

nas mtsheb tu ngo mtshar skyes so// kha cig dag na ngo mtshar skyes nas de la blta ba'i phyire byung ba dwang/ grong khyer na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshigs kyis glags rnyed nas de dag 'phya par byed/ gzhogs
'byas byed/ kha zer bar byed/ rgyal bo 'di ni bud mad thams cad la smon par byed na/ khyim thab las mi 'phyo ba mi rkang lag ma tshang ba khur du khyer nas 'byam pa dam pa 'di ma mthong ba
lta/ gtam de mdun na 'don gyis/ rgyal po'i smras pa dang/ rgyal pos bsams nas des smras pa// bud med de bltas khug cig/ da bkug nas rgyal pos mthongob dang/ 'dzum
dmul te tshigs su bcad pas smas ba/ nga yi ba nuyisha dag dang// khrag kyang thos shing 'thus nas ni// rdum pa khur du thogs pa khyod// khyim thab las du mi 'phyo 'am// rdo drag dag
gi chodadu ni// ngani g.yang sar bor nas su/ rdum pa khur du thogs pa khyod// khyim thab las da ma 'phyo 'am// de ngo tsha bar gyur pa'i snying gis gdong smad de 'dug go/ blon po rnams
kyis don de rgyal po la dris ba dang/ des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras nas/ de la smad pa'i tshig gis grong khyer gyi phyi rol tupaskad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal bu gzhon nu sa ga gang yin pa ni nga nyid yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bud med gang yin ba de ni lha sbyin 'di nyid yin te/
den yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba yin no// da ltar yang 'di byas pa ma gabre ba dang byas pa ma tshor ba yin no// gzhan yang ji ltar 'di byas pa ma gzob
dang byas ba ma tshor ba de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba thams cad kyi grong rdal gyi grong khyer na/ rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen zhes bya ba zhig rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ 'byon
ba dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bde ba dang/ lo legs pa/ skye bo dang ma mang pos rab tu gang ba/ 'thab pa dang/ 'thab mo dang/ khrag khrug dang/ 'gyed pa dang/ chom
rkun med cing nad rab tu zhi bar gyur ba/ 'bras dang/ bu ram shing dang/ ba lang dang ma he phun sum tshogs pa na/ chos kyi rgyal po tshes dang ldan pa/ chos bzhin gyis
rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ rgyal po de yang dad pa bzang ba/ dge ba'i bsam pa can bdag dang gzhan la phan par zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid chen pe chos 'dod pa/ skye dgu la
[o/]byams pa zhig yod pa re/ dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed / dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed de/ rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur
spyod par byed pa na/ btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur to// de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas/ khye'u gzugs bzang po// mdzes ba// bstan sdugab pags pa'i mdog gsar 'dra ba/
mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/ dpung ba ring ba/ dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/ smin ma 'dzar ba/ sna'i gzas mthel/ yan lag dang/ nying lag ga thams cad dang ldan pa zhig/
btsas so// btsas nas de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas/ khyabu'amodicir gags zhes mang 'dogs par byed do// nye du rnams kyis smras pa/ khye'u 'di rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes
gnyen gyi sras yin pas/ de bas na khye'u'i ming thams cad sgrol zhes bya bar gdags so zhes btags nas/ khye'u thams cad sgrol ma ma brgyad po// pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang/
nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang/ dra ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang/ rtsed grogs kyi ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad nas de'o ma dang/ zho dang/ mar dang/ zhun mar
dang/ mar gyi nying khu dang/ gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed skyed par byed cing/ rdzing na gnas pa'i pad+ma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do// gang gi tshechen
por gyur pa de'i cho yig dang/ grangs dang/ rtsis dang/ lag rtsi la nye bar zhugs shing rgyal bo rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur lulakyi 'byor pa dang/ mthu
dang / brtson 'grus thob pa/ sa chen po'i spyil 'khor mdon par zi la gyis mnan te gnas pa rnams kyi bzo'i gnas dang/ las kyi gnas tha da par gyur pa gang dag yin pa// 'di lta ste//
sgyu glang po che'i gnya' bar zhon pa dang rta la zhon pa dang/ shing rta'i thabs dang/ ral gri'i thabs dang/ gzhu'i 'dzin stangs dang/ mdun du bsnur par dang/ phyirab snur pa dang/ lcags
dkyus sgyur thabs dang/ zhags pa gdab pa dang/ mda' bo che 'phen pa dang/ gcad pa dang/ dral ba dang/ dbug pa dang/ 'dzin stangs dang/ gom stangaso dang/ rgyang nas
phog padong/ sgra grag par shog pa dang/ gnad du bog pa dang/ mi 'tshor ba'aphog pa dang/ tshabs che ba ste/ gnas lnga rnams la yang byang bar gyur to// gzhon nu thams cad sgrol dad pa
bzang po/ dge ba'i bsam pa can bdag dang gzhan la phan par zhugs pa// snying rje can bdag nyid chen po chos 'a dodapa/ skye dgu rnams la byams pa/ thams cad rab tu gtong ba/
thams cad yongs su gtong ba/ chags pa med par yongs su gtong ba/ gtong ba chen po la zhugs pa yin te/ de'i gtong ba rgya chen po thes nas/ dpag tshad brgya nas kyang don du gnyerapa'i
skye bo 'ong ste/ thams cad kyang yid la re ba yongs rdzogs par byas nas gtong ngo// de nas re zhig ga na cigon byang chub sems dang 'ashing rtanor bu dang gsar dang/ dngul dang/ rdo rje dang/ ]
byu ru dang/ ba zlumadang/ sdug dang/ pad+ma rA ga dang/ in+d+hanA las 'bar bar byas pa/ tsan dan mchog gi snying po las bsgrubs pa/ sang ge dang/ stag dang/ gung gi pags pas g.yogs pa/
rta rlung gi shugs ltar mgyogos ba/ gser dang dngul gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i sgra 'khrol ba bzhi dang ldan pa mchog gi nang du zhugs nas/ grong khyer dam pa nas skyed mos tshal du sngon du song ngo//
denas bram ze ga byed dang cig byed kyiyan lag shes pa kha cig gis thams cad sgrol bsu nas smras pa/ rgyal rigs gzhon nu khyod rgyal bar gyur cig/ yang smras pa/ khyod ni 'jig
rten thams cad du// thams cad gtong zhes rnam par grangs// bram ze rnams langashing rta de/ khyod kyis sbyin bar gtang bar rigs// de skad ces smras ba dang/ byang chub
sams dpa' thams cad sgrol shing rta de las myur 'gyur bar babs te snying dga' ba dang/ mgu ba dang/ rab tu dga' bas bram ze de dag la shing rta de byin nas sbas pa// bdag gis
ji ltar bram ze la// mchog tu dga' bas shing rta btong/ de bzhin bdag gis srid pa gsum// btang nas byang chub mchog reb shog/ de dus gzhan zhig na glang po che'i mchog
rgyal srid 'phel zhes bya ba ma tog kun da dang/ kumud dang/ kha ba dang/ dngul dang/ sprin dkar po lta bu'i mdog can bdun legs par gyur ba/ rkang lag legs
par gnas pa/ glang po chos srungs kyi bu ltar 'gying zhing 'grob/ skal ba mchog gi mtshan can/ bsod namasabyas pas mthong ba la zhon nas/ shin tu sdug pa'i bran dang/ mdza'
ts+tso bshes dang/ g.yog 'khor rnams phyi bzhin 'brang zhing/ zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba bzhin du sos ka'i dus la bab pas shing rnams mi tog kha 'bus shing nga
ba dang/ khrung khrung dang/ rma bya dang/ natso dang/ ri skagasadwang/ khu byug dang/ shang shang te'u sgra 'byin pa'i nags tshal gyi skyed mos tshal gyi sar song ba dang/ des phyir
rgol bas chad pa'i bram ze kha cig gzhon nu thams cad sgrol gyi drung du ris pa ris bar 'ongs nas/ gzhon nu thams cad sgrol la smras pa/ rgyal rigs gzhon nu khyed rgyal bar gyur cage/
yang smras ba/ lha min lhar bcas 'jig rten du// khyod ni thams cad gtong zhes grags// khyed kyi glang po mchog 'di ni// bdag cag rnams la stsal ba'i rigs// de skad ces smras
ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' glang po tsho'i mchog de las myur ba myur bar babs nas/ dga' ba dang/ mgu ba dang/ rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis de dag la glang po che'i mchogade byin
0 nas lcas ba/ bdag gis ji ltar bram ze la// mchog tu dga' bas glang chen btang // de bzhin bdag gis srid pa gsum// btang nas byang chub mchog 'og shog/ rgyal po thams cad kyi
bshes gnyen gyi bu thams cad sgrol gyis glang po che'i mchog rgyal srid 'phel zhes bya ba phyir rgol bas rmad pa'i bram ze rnams la byin zhes thos so// thos nas kyang rgyal po thams cad kyi
bshes gnyen shin tu khros 'khrugs nas gzhon nu thams cad sgrol bkug ste smras pa// gzhon nu khyod dang 'i yul na ma 'dug par song zhig/ de nas gzhon nu thams cad sgrol phas sngas
pa dang/ bsams ra// bdag gis byang chub kyi phyir 'bad pa byas pa dang/ 'jig rten pa thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi go cha bgos pas glang po che dayang btang ste//
de bas khyim na gnas pas ni// ci nus pas na sbyin pa btang// dka' thub nags su brten nas ni// nges pa mchog dag bya ba yin// bslas na mi sbyin zhes bya ba'i// tshig ni smra bar
mi phod kyis/de bas bdagan khyim spangs te// dka' thub nags su rab tu 'gro// de nas byang chub sams dpas de ltar snying la mna'i mtho bcad nas/ chung ma rgyags sbyin ma'i drung du song ste
de dag rgyas par smras so/ de nas rgyags sbyin mas thos ma thag tu sdug pa dang bral bar dogs pa'i snying gis/ thal mo sbyar te byang chub sems dba' la smras pa// rje'i sras gal te de lta na/
bdag kyang dka'athub kyi nags su mchi su/ bdag ni rdza'isras dang bral na skad cig tsam yang 'tsholor rdzom sgrig lags so// ci'i slad du zhe na/ nam mkha' zla bas stobs
par gyur pa dang// ji ltar s ni lo tog gis stongs dang// pad+ma chu yis stongs par gyur ba dang// bud med khyim thab kyis stong de bzhin no// byang chub sems dar sa smras pa/ bdag cag mthar
gdon mi za bar 'bral bar 'gyur te/ 'di na 'jig rtan gyi rang bzhin yin no// khyod ni bza' ba dang/ btung ba dang/ mal cha dang/ bgo kha mchog la goms pas lus shin tu skyid de ba yin/
dka' thub kyi nags na na lha dang lo ma bting bar na nyal/ rtsa ba dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu naza/ rtswa dur ba dang/ zug rdo dang/ rtswa dang/ tsher mas gang ba'i sa la ni rgyu/ yang
[% ]dang yang du zagacig pa la ni ston/ bdag nyid skye bo thams cad la ni bsten dgos/ glo bur du 'ongs pa thams cad mchod pa la na 'bar dgos la/ de na ya da nga gdon mi za bar su mi
nus kyis sbyin pa gtong ste/ de la khyod kyis cung zad kyang ma 'gyod par bya dgos so// de bas na re zhig da dung yang legs par soms shig/ rgyugs sbyin mas smras pa/ rje'i
sras bdag rdo tsa theg gis/ rje'i sras kyi rjes su sgrub lags so// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ gal te de lta na dam bcas pa de dag khyod kyis dran bar byos shig/ de nas byang
chub sems dpa' pha'i drung du song nas mgo bos phyag byas te/ yab cig bdag gis sbyin par glang chen stsal// nongs pa gang lags sa bdag bzod par gsol// bdag ni grong nas gon
par mchi lags kyis// mi yi dbang po phyag mdzod stongs ma gyur// de nas rgyal po bu dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis dbugs kyis brnangs te/ skad 'dar 'dar por smras pa/ bu sbyin
pa'i blo dor la 'jug cig/ byang chub sems dpas sas pa/ sa ni ri dang bcas par yang// gal to ldog par 'gyur gda' yis// sa bdag bdag ni sbyin pa las// soms na
ldog par mi bgyid do// zhes smras nas song de/ de nas bu dang/ bu mo dang/ chung ma dang lhan cig shing rta'i nang du zhugs te/ grong khyer dam pa de nas byung nas/ pho brang 'khor gyi mi

dang yul mi myang n byed pa brgya stong rjes su 'brang bzhin du song ngo// de nas mi zhig gis ngu zhing skye sngags 'don pa'i sgra de yang thos/ skya ba'i tshigs chen po grong khyer gyi sgor byung ba yang
mthos nas/ mi zhig la dris pa// kun ng rje skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'ditsho rjes 'debs pa ci las gyur/ dos sbas pa/ shes ldan ci ma shes sam/ 'di ltar ma yi dbang po nyid
kyisras po mchi ba bzang/ brtan pa'i ngang tshul rab tu sbyin la dga' b 'di nas sprugs// de ni bu dang chung mang bcas te nags mthar chas pa la// pho brang 'khor pa rnams 'dus
gshin tu snying rjes tshe ris 'debs// de nas byang chub sems dbas grong khyer dam pa de nas byung ba'i pho brad 'khor pa rnams la ci rigs par mngon du sed nas stsas pa/
shes ldan dag slar das shig/ slar dengs shig/ 'di ltar shin tu yun ring po nas sdug pa dang 'grogs pa yang mjug tu gdon mi za bar 'bral kha'i mtha' can du 'gyur te/ gnyen gyi
skya bo dang 'grogs pa ni lam ka'i ngal bso ba'i bsti gnas kyi shing dang 'dra bas gdon mi za bar sdug ba dang bral bar 'gyur ro// ci'i phyir zhen/ 'jig rten kun na skyabo dbang med de//
mdza' ba rnams dang 'bral bar 'gyur bsams nas// khyed kyis sa steng 'bad pa thams cad kyis// zhi phyir blo gros mi g.yo brtan par gyis// de nas dpag tshad sum brgya 'dras ra
dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas bram ze zhig mngon du 'os ti smras pa/ kye rgyal rigs gzhon nu bdag ni khyed kyi yon tan thos nas 'di nas dpag tshad sum brgya tsam gyi yul
nas 'dir mchis lags kyis/ khyod kyi shing rta mchog 'dis bdag ngal ba 'bras bumachis par bgyi ba'i rigs so// de nas rgyugs sbyin ma ma bzod pa skyes te tshigabarlang pos
bram ze de la smras pa/ e ma'o nags na'ang mi dbang sras la slong ba gang/ bram ze 'di ni shi tu brtse ba med pa'i blo// mi dbang sras po me dbang dpal las nyams gyur pa/ 'di
la 'dare na snying rje cig mi skye 'am/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa// khyod kyis bram ze ma spro zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ rgyags sprin gal te nor 'dod len ba 'di dag med gyur na// kun
sbyin med par ma gang zhig gis sa steng bud+d+hA ba 'thob/ sbyin sogs pha rol phyin drug tshul gyis yon tan mchog can gyi// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kun mkhyen nyid mchog rtag tu
'thob// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dpa' pas rta dang ldan pa'i shing rta de bram ze de la byin nas smras pa/ bram ze ser sna dri ma sel byed pa// shing rta rab tu byon pa 'di
yis 'dir// bdagan drang srong che mchog gis bskor ba'i// zag med chos kyi shing rtache skor bshog/ de nas thams cad sgrol gyis snying rab tu dga' bas shing rta'i mchog de yang
bras tre la byin nas/ gzhon nu mdog gnag phrag pa la khyer/ rgyags byin mas ni gzhon nu ma dra ba can khyer nas/ dka' thub kyi nags logs su chas pa dang/ rim gyis dka'
thub kinags su byin to// de nas thams cad sgrol dka' thubakyi tshal der rang gi snying mgu bar byed pa'o brtul zhugs blangs te gnas so// ji tsam na rgyags sbyin ma rtsa ba dang 'bras bu'i phyir
dka' thub kyi nagasanas song ba dang/ bram ze zhig thams cad sgrol gyi drung du 'ongs nas snas/ rgyal rigs gzhon nu khyod rgyal bar gyur cig/ bdag cag bkol ba ma mchis pas//
@#// sa shug lhan cig 'khyam bgyid na// de yi don du bus pa gnyis// khyod kyis bdag la sbyin pa'i rigs// de skad ces smras pa dang/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
thams cad sgrol bu sdug pa gtong ba la cung zhig sems shing 'dug pa dang/ de nas bram ze des byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol la snus pa/ kye rgyal rigs gzhon nu bdag gis khyod
thamasacad ster ba'o zhes thosan/ 'di ltar khyod la bdag gis bslangs pa de la ci zhig dpyad du yod/ khyod ni kun star snying rje yi// bdag nyid can du sa steng grags// ji ltar grags pa
dbazhin du// khyed kyis rtag tu bya ba'i rogs/ deskad ces smras pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol gyis bram rje de la smras pa/ kye bram ze chen po/ rang gi srog ni gtong
ba la'ang// lan 'ga' dpyod pa ma myong na// rang gi bun gtong ba la// bdag blogazhan du 'gyur skyes// bram ze chen po de lta med kyis/ bdag gis nags su skyid bskyed pa'i//
bus ba 'deganyis yongs spangs na// ma dang bral ba'i nyon mongs pa// 'di dag ji ltar gnas snyam mod// gzhon nu shin tu brtswa med pas// bus pa btang la bdag min zhes//
khacig bdag la 'phyar 'ong gis// bram ze bdag ni khridan legs// de nas bram ze des thams cad sgrol la sa ba/ kyirgyal rigs gzhon nu rgyal po chen po'i rigasas sapa//
sa 'di thams cad du yon tan grags pa/ srog chags thams cad la snying brtse bas 'o byams par zhugs pa/ sbyin pa dang/ mchod pa dang/ bkur stis spos kyi glang bo lta bu/ dag sbyong
dang bram ze dang/ glo bur ba'i skye bo la mchod pa byed pa// skya bo bkranapa dang/ 'jongs pa dang/ mgon med pa dang/ ltegs pa yongs su sdug pa thams cad kyi yid la re ba longs
su rdzogs par byed pa/ mthong na don yod pa khyod kyis bdag 'ongs pa nom pa med pa 'am/ lum gyis dub pa 'bras bu med pa 'am/ mthong na don med pa 'am/ ra ba dang yun ring po
nas brnag brnag pa'i 'dod pa 'bri brus med par bya ba gang yin pa de ni cha ma yin te/ khyod kyis mar do zhes bya ba'i tshig kho bo'i yin la re ba kun tu rtog pa'i rta btab na myur du ldeg par 'gyur
ro/ de bsan khyod kyis bdag gi yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par byas nas gtang ba'i rigs so// da ci'i phyir zhe na/ chu gter gos su gyon zhing bza' mgamtshungs med pa// ri bo
mchog rgyas nu mar ldan pa'i ra stod can// gling khyaragrong rdal bcas pa'i sa la btsal byas kyang// mche bzang khyod dang mtshungs par gtong 'od yod ma yin// danas byang chub sems
dpa' thams cad sgrol gyis bram ze'i tshig de thos nas bu la chags pa'i blong bas 'di dgasems par byed de/ gal te re zhig bu gnyis te// bram ze byed na bu dang ni// bral ba las byung
[e ]/sdug bsngal dag/ bdag dang rgyugs spyin gyis 'thob 'gyur// 'on te 'di la ma byin na// brtul zhugs las kyang nyanas gyur cing// bram ze 'din tshabacad d//
ji ltar 'os pa bzhin du 'grogo/ nyis na bu bral nyam thag pa'i// mya ngan sa stong pa dag gis blangs// de bzhin ma byas dam bcas pa// zhig nga brtul zhugs nyams par 'gyur//
dunas byang chub sems dba' thams cad sgrol gyis sdug ba'abu gnyis nges bar gtang bar chad nas smras pa/ kyi kho bos/ dka' spyad brgya yis 'jig rten sdug bsngal gyi// rgyu mtsho
chen be so sor 'jigs byed pa// gting ma dbogs par rab tu bying ba dag/ pha rol bsgral phyir lam gyi zam stegs bca'// zla ba dri med zhu ba'i bzhin ras can// mtshum kha nas de
skad tshig smras nas// mchima'i man chus mig ni gang gyur pa'i// byis pa gnyis po bram ze de la byin// yang smras pa/ bu 'di byin pa'i 'bras bu ni// rgya chen bdag gis thob
gyur nas// des ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las// 'jig rten rnams ni bsgral bar bya// byis pa gzhon nu dag byin ma theg tus 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// ranas sa g.yos pa des nags
don gnas pa'i dka' thub can rnams sngangs nas/ phan tshun smras pa// sa ni mi bzad gsos gyur pa// 'di ni su yi mthu ltas yin// gang gi mthun 'di 'dra ba// shin tu gsal bar
shes par bya// don gnas 'dreg dad rus gcig pa rgan po dka' thub can ltas shesapa la mkhas pa gzhan zhig yod pa des/ drang srong de rnams la don dge bar byas pa// gdon mi za bar/
dka' thub kyin gs na 'dug pa'i bu byis pa 'bras khu dang chu 'thung ba yin du 'ong ba mgatu sdug par byed pa gnyis thams cad sgrol gyis skye bo sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag pa/ yongs su thar
par bya ba'i phyir btang ste/ des nas g.yos par gyur to////'dul ba gzhi/// bam po brgya pa// de nas bus pa gzhon nu de gnyis
kyis phas snying nas yongs su btad pa'i blo rig nas/ snying rje rje skad dungu zhing thal mo gnyis sbyar nas/ thams cad sgrol gyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ yabacag yum ni ma mchis
par khyod ni bdag gastsol bzhad pa// ra zhig dan mthong gyur nas// de nas bdag cag stsal du gsol// de nas byang chub sems dpa' yid la gcags pa'i sdug bsngal gyis ngo
'dzum gnag cing mchim 'dzag bzhin deganyis la 'khyud nas smras pa/ bu dag nga yi snying du ma sdug min// snying brtse snying rje med min te// 'jig rten kun la phan pa'i phyir// yon tan
mthong nas btang ba yin// can s nga yis byang chub mchog/ zhi ba rang gis thob nas ni// sdug bsngal rgya mcho la gnas apa'i// rten mar 'jig rten rnams bsgral lo// de nas
byis pa la gzhon nu de dag gis phas snying nas yongs su btang ba'i blo ga nas/ tha'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te thal mo sbyar nas// snying rje rje skad dang smra bab pa'i
tshig gis dal gyis sbas pa/ gal te khyod kyis thag bkuman// ma la bdag cag gnyis kyi 'phrin// khyod kyis bzod pa mdzod cig ces// yab cig khyod kyis gsung du gsol// ya ba gzhan
rgyu yang byis par gyur pas blam khyod la nongs par bgyis pa gang/ gal tel lar thugs la mi 'bab tshig 'ga' smras pa 'am// gus bar mnyan pas yongs su mnyes pa nyid du ma bgyis
pa de ni byos pa'i nongs pa lags zhes brjod pa mdzad du gsol/ de skad ces smras nas pha laphyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas/ migamachims gang bzhin bla ma la smra bar
yid la gcags pas yang dang yang phyir lta zhing bsti gnas de nas byung ste songang// de nas byang chub sems dpa' byis pa gzhon nu'i tshig shin tu snying rjer rung ba de dag gis snying blong nas yid
kyis byang chub tu smon lam btabasto/ de dka' thub kyi tshal gyi lo ma'i spyil bur zhugs so// byis pa gzhon nu gdong ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang
rnamabcug tu g.yos so// lha stong phrag du ma yang bar snang la rtsa nyo dang gzhi'i sgra 'byin cing/ a ma'o rab sbyin bdag nyid che// byis pa 'di gnyis btang nas kyang// gangag yid na 'gyur
med pa// de yod nges pa rmad cig go/ das rgyugs sbyin ma rtsa ba dang 'bras bu rnams khyer te bsti gnas legs su chas pa las/ sa che thang du g.yos pa des/ myur ba kho nar bste gnas de nyid du/
song ba dang/ lha gzhan zhig gis rgyags sbyin mas byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad thar par bya bar brtson par byas pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong
ngo snyam nas/ sang geme zhig gi gzugs su bgyur te lam bka gnas 'dug pa dang/ rgyugs sbyin mas ri dgas kyi rgyal po'i chung ma de la smras pa/ ri dgas rgyal po'i chung ma sgog skagam//
kho ma'i lam 'di bkag nas ci ste 'dug/ ji ltar bdag ni mo 'phyo des gyur na// lam las gzur te myur du 'gro bar gyis// gzhan yang/ khyod kyang ri dgas rgyal po'i chung ma la// bdag
kyang mi yi dbang po sung g.ya// btsun mo yin pas chos kyi spunagyur gyis// ri dgas rgyal mos bdag gi lam phye zhig/ de skad ces smras pa dang/ lha seng ge mo'i gzugs su bsgyur ba de yang
lam de nas logs shig tu song de// de nas rgyugs sbyin mas bkra mi[…]zhes pa'i ltas dag mthong nas/ yud tsam zhig bsams pa// ji ltar bar snang la dud mo'i sgra grag pa dang/ ji ltar yang
tshal na gnas pa'i 'byung po rnams mya ngan byed pa'i sgra grag pa las na/ gdon mi za bar bste gnas su ma legs pa zhig byung bar gyur to snyam nas smras pa/ ji ltar bdag mig 'gul ba dang//
ji ltar bya skad 'byin pa dang// ji ltar bdag ni dogs pa las// bus ba de gnyis btang bar nges// ji ltar sa 'di g.yos pa dang// bdag gi snying ni 'dul ba dang//
ji ltar lus kyang rtsa ba las// bus pa dganyis btang bar ngos// zhes de lta bu'i ma legs pa brgya stong dag soms shing bsti gnas su song nas/ bsti gnas su zhugs te ma dga' bzhin du
bltas na/ bu de gnyis ma mthong nas/ da nas rmongs shing snying 'dar bas bste gnas kyi gzhi de'i rjes bzhin du sems te/ phyogs 'di nani gzhon nu mdog nag sring mo dang lhan ciger
dgas kyi phyug gu dang lhan cig rtag tu rtse rtse/ 'di na/ nyis kyi sa rdul las byas pa'i khyim yin/ 'din de gnyis gyi rtsed mo'i cha spyad yon na/ dganyis ni mi snang na gal te zhig na bdag gis
pa mthong gi/ lo ma'i spyil bur zhugs nas nyal lta srid dam snyam du de ltar snying la re zhing bu mthong bar 'dod pas/ rtsa ba dang 'bras bu phyogs gcig tu bzhu gnas mag mchi mas gang bzhin du
khyim thab kyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ rje'i sras khya'u dang bu mo gnyis gang dumachis/ thams cad sgrol gyis smras pa// kho bo'i drung du bram ze zhig/ rebs yang dag 'os bar
gyur[0f10]bus pa de gnyis re la byin// de la rjes su yi rang gyis// de skad ces smras pa dang/ rgyags sbyin ma'i dgas me mda' dug can gyis phog pa bzhin du sa la 'gyel nas/ 1chu'i

gnas nas phyung ba bzhin du 'gro ldog par byed khrung khrung bu stong ba bzhin ni snying rje rje skad du du ba be'u shi ba bzhin du ni 'ba' sgra sna tshogs 'don tsang smras pa/ pad+ma gzhon nu lta bu'i byed
bzhin can// lag pa pad+ma'i 'dab ltar gzhon sha can// bdag gi bu gnyis sdug bsngal ma myongs// 'gro ba dag tu song nas sdug bsngal gyur// ri dgas bu ltar drang zhing rwa dgas tshig
ri dgas lhan med bsti gnas dga' dga' na// de rang bdag gi bu gnyis ji ltar bur// gzhan gyi dbang gis dang zhing sdug bsngal gyur// mig ni mchi mas gang bas mig gis ni// snying rjes
du bas shin tu sdug bsngal ba// de ring bdag gis legs par ma mthong bas// skye po bkren pa'i nang na sdug pas 'tsho// de gas bdag gi pang nas bskyed bskyod pa// zas su rtsa ba
ma tog 'bras bu za// bzod dang gnas pas bla ma rtag dga' ga/ bdag gi bu gnyis shin tu sdug bsngal la/ dzeganyis ma dang nye du bral ba dang// rtsa laga rnams gyis ga'u
lumasu ngas pa las// skya be sdig nangan dang phrad gyur nas// bdag gi bu gnyis shin tu sdug bsngalal// sgom zhing bkrus pas bdag nyid rtag gdungs na// de gnyis su yi
dbang gis 'gro bar 'gyur// bran du 'gyur bas gdon mi za bar na// de gnyis nyam thag sdug bsngal yongs su gzir// bdag gis sa par tshar bas gzhan dag tu// srog chags
ka @#// sdug pa brgya dag phral ba yi// sdig las shin tu mi bzad pa 'dir byas// des na ba be'u de da bzhin che ngos 'debs// bden tshig gang gis bdag ni rtag tu yang//
kyi/ sems can kun la yid ni mnyam gyur pa// bdun tshig des nibadag gi bu gnyis pa// bran du gyur pa las ni thar bar shog/ de nas rgyags sbyin mas bus pa gzhon nu de dag gis bskyed cing
bsrungs pa'i shing gang yin pa de dag le ma thob ba 'dug par mthong nas/ snying du sdug pas 'khyud de smras pa/ bus pas ril ba chung du'i chus pa cus te// lo ma rnams las chu thigs
'dzag pa yi// ljon shing rnams na sems dang bcas pa bzhin// bus pa nu zho ma byur lta bur du// ya nga bus pa gzhon nu de gnyis dang rtse rtse ba'i ri dgas kyi phrug gu bsti gnas na 'dug pa rnamA
mthong nas mi dga' ste/ snying rje rje skad kyi tshig gis dal bus smras/ de yi na'u zla mthong bar 'dod pa gang// gnas su sa tshugs mtshon cing tshol byed pa// ri dgas phrug gu rgyu ba 'di
dag kyang// bdag gi sdug bsngal mi chung gzhan yin no// de nas bus pa gzhon nu de dag lam gang nas dong ba'i lam der rjes bcad pa dang/ bus pa gzhen nu de gnyis rjes drang por
ma byung gi gya gyus gang ba'i mthong nas// lhag par yang sdug bsngal gyis gdungs nas smras pa// ji ltar thon pa'i rjes byung dang// la lor myur du song ba las// brdegs te khrid bar
gdon mi za// kye ma bram ze brtse mod mchog/ mgul ni dbugs kyis brdzangs shing skad kyang 'dzer// ma mchu mdzes pa 'dar zhing bdag gi bu// ri dgas bzhin du mag kyang rig rig ste/
dang pa 'jam bos ji ltar song zhig gu// de nas byang chub sems dpas de ltar smra sngags 'don pa'i bdag nyid de mthong nas/ mi rtag pa nyid dang ldan pa'i tshig de dang de dag gis rnam grangasamad por
go bar byas nas smras pa/ kho bos bu gnyis grags pa yis// btang ba ma yin sdang bram ni// sems can kun la phan don du// gtang bar rab dka' bu de btang// mchog tu gtang dka'
bdag nyid dang// bu dang chung ma rnam btang nas// sems dpa' chen pos tshul bzhin du// byang chub mchog na 'thob par 'gyur// rgyags sbyin bdag gas gtong ba la brten gtang dka'
pa'i// bus pad gnyis 'jig rten thar pa'i don du btang// bdag dang chung ma gzhon nu nor yang btang bya ste// kun la thabs cad gtang ba'i blo gros nga la yod// de nas rgyags sbyin mas/
sams brten te/ byang chub sems dba' la smras pa/ khyod la bar chad ma bgyid kyis// khyod blo gzhan du ma gyur cig/ gal te bdag kyang stsal bzhed na// dogs pa ma mdzad bdag
stsol cig/ gzhan yang/ dpa' bo gang phyir nyid kyim// sdug pas chags pa gtang ba yi// don de myur du thob nas ni// srid las 'gro ba bsgral bar mdzod// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang
bo brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' dang/ rgyugs sbyin ma brtson 'grus shin tu rmad du byung ba dang/ shin tu byadaka'i bar rig nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i chags
kyis yongs su bskor te/ stang gnam mkha' las bsta gnas der lhags nas snang ba rgya chen pos nags de gsal bor byas te/ nam mkha' la 'dug bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'
la sgras ba/ 'di ltar 'jig rten rmongs pa blo na gzhung gis bcings pa'i blo gros can/ log spyod la chags snying gi zhags pa bu yis bcings pa'i nang na yang// khyab bdag khyod gcige
chags pa med pas dga' bskyed pa'i bu gtong bas// nges par go 'phang bad dang zhib dri med dka' ba med pa'i thog/ de skad ces byang chub sems dpa' spro ba bskyed nas/ lha rnams kyi
dbang po ba rgya byin gyis bsams ba/ 'di gcig bu g.yog dang bral na nyon mongs bar 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag gis rgyugs sbyin ma blang do snyam nas/ de nas bram ze'i chakhyad du bsgyur
te byang chub sems dpa'i drung du song nas/ yang byang chub sems dpa' la sa ba/ yan lag kun bazang khyim thab las// 'phyo ba med cing snying nye pa// rigs na ba sngags pa'i
sring mo 'di// bdag la bran mo'i don du stsol// de nas rgyags sbyin ma ma bzod pa skyes nas/ bram ze la snas pa/ ngo tsha med cing ba rkam pa khyod// 'don bram ze'i tha shal te/
0 khyod lta 'phyon ma mi byed cing// dam chos dga' ba nga 'dod dam// de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol snying rje dang ldan pa 'i snying gis rgyags mi ma la brtag par brtsams pa dang/
de nas rgyags sbyin mas byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ bdag ni bdag la dbyar na med// de bzhin bdag la lta ma lags// gcig pu ji ltar bzhugs 'gyur zhes/ de ltar khyer
slad g.yar ngan bgyid// de nas byang chub sems dbas rgyags sbyin m la sbas pa/ go 'phang mi bzad mya ngan med pa tshol bdag la// sa steng 'dir ni rgyags sbyin mya ngon bya mi dgos/
khyod ni mya ngan med par bram ze 'di rjes 'brongs// bdag ni ri dgas 'chi ba bzhin du bsti gnas then// de skad ces smras nas dga' ba dang/ mgu ba dang/ yid rab tu dga' bas bsams/
pa dang/ sbyin pa 'di ni nags tshal 'dir// bdag gi sbyin pa tha ma yin// rgyags sbyin 'di yang yongs btang nas// yongs su bzung ba med par 'gyur// snyam du rig nas/
rgyugs sbyin ma lag ba nas bzung ste/ bram zed la smras pa/ bdag gi mchis bring sdug pa 'di//snye gnas snying nye bsgo ba nyan// ya rabs tshul can snyan par smra// bram ze'i echog
khyer bzhes su gsol// de nas mche ba bzang po yi// chung na byang chub 'dod phyir btang// chu la rgyu ni ji lta bar// sa ni mtha' dag rnam drug g.yos// de nas rgyugs sbyin ma bram
the'i dbang du gyur te/ khyo dang/ budang/ bu mo dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag nas dbugs btsungs bas/ mgul sgra ngar ngan par 'gags bzhin 'di
skad ces smras so// bdag gis tshe rabs snga ma la// ci 'dra ba ya las ngan byas// des na ba be'u shib bzhin// skye bo med pa'i nagasan du/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis
T+Tha bram ze'i cha byad ma snang bar byas te/ rang bzhin gyi cha byad du gnas nas/ rgyugs sbyin ma la smras pa// skal bzang bdag ni bram ze ma yin ma yeng ma yin gyi// bdag ni lha yi dbang de
brgya byin lha min 'dzoms byed de// khyod kyi 'dul ba mchog tu gyur pa 'di yis bdag mgu yis// bdag las dam pa gang zhig 'dod pa de 'dir smra bar gyis// de nas de'i tshig gis rgyags
sbyin ma yade bde ba skyes nas/ brgya byin la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/ spyan stong ldan pa bdag gi bu// bran gyur pa las thar mdzad cing// mes po'i drung du phyin par yang// sum cu rtsa
tsa gsum bdag pos mdzod// de skad ces smras nas yang dbang po chon bo bsti gnas su zhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i drud du song ste/ rgyags sbyin ma lag pa g.yon pas bzung nas/
byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ bdag gis khyod la rgyags sbyin 'di// g.yog gi phyir na sbyin par byas// khyod kyis su la'ang ma sbyin ga/ bzhag pa byin na smad par 'gyur// des/

lha rnams kyi dbang bo brgya byin gyis bram ze khye'u dang bu mo khyer bde ji ltar grong khyer gzhan yin no snyam nas/ grong khyer de nyid du song ste/ bus pa gzhon nu de dag btsong bar brtsams pa de lta bur
rmongs bar byas so// ji tsam na blon po rnams kyis mthong nas rgyal pal smras pa/ lha khyod kyi dbon po mdego gnag dang/ dra ba can dang de gnyis ni// bram ze ng+gashin tu ma lus
pa// grong khyer mchog 'dir 'tshong zhing mchis// de skad thos nas rgyu ba po de sams mi dga' nas smras pa/ gzhon nu gnyis myur du ston cig/ blon po rnams kyis skad
phyung ba dang/ grong khyer ba rnams myur du rgyal po'i mdun du skye bar lhags so// ji tsam na blon de gzhan zhig gis rgyal po'i drung du khrid pa dang/ ma yi dbang po mngon phyogs khrid
pa'i tsha bo gos med cing// lus rdzog dri ma can gyi lus de de yis mthong nas ni// mod la sang ge'i khrid las sa yi steng du lhung gyur te// pho brang 'khor ma thun tshogs bud med
dag kyang ngu bar gyur// de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/ gang zhagi nags na gnas na yang// sbyin pa mngon par dga' ba'i yide// mig bzas de namyur du
'dir// chung ma dang bcas dgug par gyis// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chugs mas dpa' la phyag byas nas rang gi gnas su song ngo// phyi zhig na rgyal po thams
cad kyi bshes gnyen 'das pa dang/ bram ze dang/ blon pe dang/ grong ma dang/ yul mi rnams lhan dug tu blta gnas der song nas// byang chub sems dpa' la
gsol ba btab ste/ rang gi grong khyer du bos nas rgyal por bcug go/ de nas rgyal po thams cad gtong zhes bya bar gyur to// des dge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ bkren pa dang/ 'gongs pa
tshu dang mdza' bo dang/ nye du dang/ gnyen bshes dang/ zheshas 'tshe ba rnams la sbyin pa rnam pa du ma dag byin nas/ tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ byang chub don du gnyer kha yas/
rgyalarigs bram ze rje' rigs dang// dmangs rigs gdol pa g.yung po la'ang// 'jigs pa med par sbyin ba btang// gser dang dngul dang ba lang dang/ rta dang nor bu'i rna rgyan dang/
rwa bzhin las dag byed pa'i bran// tshul khrims phun sum tshogs la sbyin// chags pa med pa'i sems kyis ni/ bu dang bu mo yongs btang bas// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu// mi
yis dag pa thob par gyur// gang gi tshe rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen gyis/ thams cad sgrol gyi ched du bram ze tshu jug la nor mang po byon pa de'i tshe/ de 'byor pa rgya chen por gyur/ dol
snyid du sdug pa dang/ rtsa lag dang/ grogs po dag 'ongos nas smras pa/ khyod kyi 'byor pa dang/ dpal dang/ skal ba phun sum tshogs pa gang yin pa ci yang rung/ de dag thams
camathacad nu gzhon nu thams cad sgrol de la brten te yin no// des smras pa/ gzhon nu thams cad sgrol gyis kho bo la ci zhig byas/ rigs mchog gu nang du skyes pas kho bo 'jig rten gyi yon gnas su
gyur to/ desan kho bo skal ba dang ldan par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ rdo'i tshe de'i dus kyi gzhon nu thams cad sgrol gang yin de ni

da yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi dzu dzu ka gang yin pa da na lha sbyin 'di nyide yin te/ don yong 'di byas ba ma gablo kha dang byas pa mi tshor yin no// da ltar yang 'di byes pa mi gasrob dang byas pa
mi tshor ba yi nano// de lta bas na dgo slong dag 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ byas pa gzo pa dang byas pa tshor bar bya ste/ cung srid byas pa yang chud mi gawan nga ra byan/ mang po la lta smos
kyang ci dgos te/ drag slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal pa'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pan bzhugs so//
de'i tshe yul tsam pa na khyim bdag gru 'dzin zhes bya ba phyug pa/ nor mang ba las spyod chog/ yongs su gzung ba/ yangs shing rgya che ba// rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/
rnam thos kyi bul nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas te/ das rabe sa mnyam ba las chud ma glangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed de/
da rtsa bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod pa 'byed pa las/ dus gzhan zhig na chung ma soms can dang ldan par gyur to// 'di ltar de'i mnga' khongs

su smin par byapa'i phyi'i/ dag yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra cung zad kyang ma thos shing/ grang ba na grang ba'i khyod dang/ drob na drob yo byad dang/ smanangs bcas pa'i kha khrus ha cang yang kha ba ma
ba yin pa dang/ ha cang skyur ba ma yin pa dang/ ha cang lan tshwa chu ban pa dang/ tacang dngar ba ma yin pa dang/ ha cang tshapa ma yin pa dang/ nga cad ngs ba ma yin pa ste/ de ltar kha ba dang/
skyur ba dang/ lan tshwa dang/ dngar ba dang tsha ba dang/ bska ba sbas pa'i kha bas kyis ba snyan bkur byed cing/ do shal dang sa mo dos lus brgyan nas/ lha'i bu mo dga' tshalan rgyub
bzhin du khri'u nas khri'u dang/ khrinas khri'i rgya ste 1 'og gis gzhi lag 'bab bo// de'i tshe khyim bdag gru 'dzin dgos pa 'ga' zhig la rgyal bo 'a khab tu sod do// de yang zla ba dgu 'amaM
bculen te/ rgyu skar gro bzhin la bab pa na/ khye'u gzugs bzang po/blta natsug la mdzes ba/de'i rkang pa'i thol gnyis la sde gsar gyi kha dog 'dra ba sor bzhatsam skyes pa zhig btsas so//
btsas nas ji tsam na me dag gru 'dzin gyi mi zhig ris pa rangs par rgyal bo'i khi btu song nas/ khyim bdag gru 'dzin la smras pa/ khyim bdag dgyes pa skyed cig/ khyod kyi khye'u zhig btsas so//
0/de dga' ba dang yid bde bskyes nas smras pa/ kyenang rje khyod ci zhag smras/ des smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyi khye'u zhig pa tsas so// de dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas yang dris pa/
kyenang rje ci zhig sgra/ des smras pa// khyim bdag khyod kyi khye'u zhig btsas go/ ya nga dris pa/ kun ng rje ci zhig sba/ de nas med 'di snyam du sems te/ ci khyim bdag 'di yang nas yang
du 'dri babadag la bkyal ka smra bar mi 'dod grang snyam du bsams nas cad ma bar 'dug go/ khyim bdag gis smasar/ kun ng rje khyod kyis nyes te gal te khyedakyis lan brgyar snus par
gyuran yang/ ngas kyang khyod kyi kha gsar gyis lan brgya bkang bar 'gyur ba zhig/ de nas khyim bdag gu 'dzin gyis mi de'i kha gsar gyis lan gsum bkang nus/ dkor pa la khye'u dkan
dbab pa'i rin gsar bye ba nyi shu byin cig ces smreng ngo
khyim bdag gru 'dzin dga' ba dang yid bde bas rgyal po'i drung du song nas/ lha bdag gi khye'u zhig btsas so// rgyal pos
snas pa// legs so// ngas de la tsam pa gzhi dang bcas pa dang glang po che bdun gyi tshogs sbyin no// khyim bdag gru 'dzin gyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la bltas ta tsam par
nga// 'dogs par byed do// gzhan dag gis smras// khyecad rgyu skar gro bzhin la phanyis la/ 'di btsas pa na las kyang dkan dbab pa'i rin du gsar bye ba nyi shu phyin pas//

[! ]de bas na khye'u'i ming gro bzhin skyes bya ba nyi shu ba zhes bya bar gdags so zhes/ de'i ming grwa ba zhin skyas bye ba nyi ngu shu pa zhes bya bar btags te/ khye'u gro bzhin skyes bya ba nyi zhu ba ma ma brgyad la
blo rjes su gtad de/ ban 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang/ nu ma snyan pa'i ma ma gas dang/ dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang/ rtse grogs byeduba'i ma ma gnyis te/ dram ma brgyad pa dag gis 'o
ma dang/ zho dang/ mar dang/ zhun mar dang/ mar gyi steng khu dang/ gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis skyed par byed sring bar byed cing/ rdzing na gnas pa'i pad+ma bzhin
myur du skyed par byed de/ de gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tsho/ yi go dang/ thungs dang/ rtsis dang/ lag rtsis dang/ dbyung ba dang/ gzhug pa dang/ gzhag pa la nye bar zhugs shing/
brtag pa brgyud de// gzhi brtag pa dang/ gos brtag pa dang/ rin po che brtag pa dang/ shing brtag pa dang/ glang po che brtag pa dang/ rta brtag pa dang gzhon nu brtag pa dang/

gzhon nam brtag pa dang/ 'byed pa dang/ glog ba la mkhas pa dang/ gale'abor gyur to/de bsod nams kyi skal ba chen po dang ldan pa yin no// zhes rigs mnyam pa mang pos thos nas bu sring dag byin no// de'i
bas 'dug ba'i la ba gsum po/ dgun gyi dang/ dpyid kyi dang/ dbyar gyi brtsig tu bcug ste/ chungam gsum le tshanam dang/ bar ma dang/ chun ma bzhag nas/ de steng gyi khang bzangs kyi/

gzhir song ste skyes ba med pa na rtse bar byed/ dga' ba byed/ dga' dgur spyod par khyen do// de nyi ma re re zhing lnga brgya'i ston mo snod nas 'tshod cing sbyor ro// lha sbyin gyis gzhon nu ma skyes

dag la rbad pa/ gzhon nu rgyal po thams cad ni gang gi tsho sa skya bo skyes par gyur pa de'i tshe/ gzhon nu'i thu bo shos rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la bzhag nas rab tu 'byung na/ khyed kyi yab ni sku kha dog
rnam pa gsum pa'i mthar phyin na/ 'on kyang 'dod pa rnams la zhon bzhin te nye bar zhi bar mi 'grogo/ ma skyes dgras smras pa/ de nyid kyis shes mod/ da la ci byar yod/ lhasbyin gyis smras pa/
pha rol gnon ba gyis shig/ 'dod pa don du gnyer ba rnams na mi byed pa ci'ang med pas/ ji tsam na rgyal po gzugs can snying po bcom ldan 'das mar gsol nas/ 'jams gsol bar
bzhed pa'i 'jags kyi zhal te bros te/ 'od ma'i tshal du song ba ma skyes dgras mtho nas/ des rdo rje rtse gcig pa zhig zhig 'phangs pa dang/ rgyal ba sgra la mkhas pa yin pas/ sa
g.yon phyogs su thug pa'i rje'u chag par gyur nas/ de nyid nas slar log go/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'di lta bu mi mkhyen pa 'am/ mi gzigs pa 'am thugs su ma
chud pa 'am/ rnam bar mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' bas/ da nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa// mo'u
'gal gyi bu ma skyes dgu mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen lha sbyin gyis zinapas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod snyoms ma rung bar cas kyis/ tsam par gru 'dzin gyi bu'i drung du song la bsod snyoms
khyer te shog cig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas ji ltar sams mnyam par bzhag na mi snang bar gyur te/

tsam par phyin pa de lta bu'i ting de 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// grobazhin skyes bya ba nyi shu pa nyi ma la dad pas/ de nyi ma re re zhing nang par sngar langs te nyi ma la phyag byed ba na/ tshe dang ldan pa/
mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i rdzu 'phrul gyis nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor brdol nas babs pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye banyi shu pas mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang bdag gis mngon sum kho nar nyi ma
nyidakyi gzugs mthong re snyam nas/ mchog tu ngomatshar skyes so// mthong nas yang tshigs su bcad pas sbasapa// nyi ma brtol nas sa steng mngon phyogs myur nyid du// bdag gi gnas su byon/
pa 'di ko su zhig lags// 'di nyi ma 'am nor sbyin zla ba 'am brgya byin nam// 'on te lha yi bdag po med la gshegs shig gu// tshodang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i sems kyis kyang de'i
bsam pa shes nas kyang/ tshigs suban de sa la/ kho bo 'od gzer stong gi 'od bar nyi ma ma yin rgyu skar bdag po mni// kho bo rnam thos ma yin mchog ldan ma yin legs ra 'i brtul zhugs
dbang phyug min// kho bo thugs zhi gabri brjid kyis 'bar sangs rgyas sras pa yin ra shes par byos// kho bo thub la bsod snyoms dgos nas bsang ba'i phyir ni khyod kyi drung du 'ongs// gro bzhin
skyes kyis smras pa// ci shes ldan nyid thub pa yin nam/ des tshigs su bcad de sgras ra/ ji ltar gser gyi ri bo lhun pe thur na yungs kar khyer te 'ong ba dang// ji ltar nyi ma'i zlar nas ltad
srog chags srin bu me khyer 'jal ba dang// 'an chen gyis phyug rgya mtsho'i zlar ni 'din gAnag gi rmig rjes sgron pa ltar// de bzhin mi mchog tham sangs rgyas la bzhes ston pa'i sras bdag
rig par gyis/ gro bzhin skyes kyis smras pa// rjes su dang gapa 'di yis na// bdag gis khyed kyi 'dren pa na// ji ltar dka' thub rab tshob// gsal bar rab tu rtogs lags so//
dgos pa ci la byon bka' stsol cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bsod snyems thul cig/ bcom ldan 'das de su yin/ khyim bdag gi bu dag sbyong go'u ta ma shA kya'i sras shAkya'i rigs las sku
dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dgapa kho nas tsam nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
ba zhig yod de/ khyim bdag gi bu de na sangs rgyas zhes bya'o// des sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra sngon ma thos nas ba spu'i khung thams cad gshos shade mngon par dad pa des/
snod du ba so pa lnga brgya po de nyid tshodang lda nupa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la phul lo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos de las bsod snyoms blangs nas/ ji ltar sems mnyam par
bzhag na tsam ba nas mi snang bar gyur te/ rgyal bo'i khab 'od ma'i chol bya ka lan ta ka gnas bar phyin pa dalta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ des bcom ldan 'das la
bsod snyoms phul te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol bar brtsams pa na/ ma ga d+hA'i rgyal ba babusbyangs gzugs can snying pos stod nas bcos pa'i phyi mi shes khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
spyan sngar song ba dang/ jitsaman 'od ma'i tshal thams cad kha zas kyi dri zhim po rnam pa sna tshogs kyis khyab par mthong nas/ des bsams pa// gdon mi za bar lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin
nam/ lha gzhan dag gis bcom ldan 'dras la bsod snyoms phul te/ 'di ltar 'od ma'i tshal 'di kha zas kyi dri zhim bo rnam pa sna tshogs kyis khyab par gyur to snyam du bsams nas/
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyis dbang po brgya byin nam/ lha gzhan dag gis bsod snyomasaM phul ba 'am nyi legs na/ 'di
ltar 'od ma'i tshal 'di zhal zas kyi dri bda' ba sna tshogs kyis khyab par gyuralags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rgyal po chen po lha rnams kyi red nga bo brgya byin gyisakyang ma yin la/

lha gzhan rnams kyis kyang ma bul te/ de lta med kyi khyod kyi yul tsam pa na gru 'dzin gyi bu nyi ma re re lnga brgya'i ston mi snad nas 'tshad cing sbyor ba yod// de las dge slong mo'u 'gal gyi bus blangs
so// bcom ldan 'das de'i bsngags pa gsung bar brtsams ba thos nas// de yang mthong bar 'dod pa skyes pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis de'i bsams pa mkhyen nas bka'
stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po sems can de ni bsod nams kyi skal ba chen pa dang ldan pa yin pas/ khyod bsod namang yongs su zad par 'gyur du 'ong gis/ de la bka'am stsol cig/
de lta bod kyi rgyal po chen po lhung bzed kyi lhagam la longs spyod cig/ des gsol pa/ btsun ba bdag rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba lags te/ sngon ni su'i lhung bzed kyi
sdug na yang ma 'tshol lags med kyi/ bcom ldan 'dasan chos nyid kyis bdag gi yab lags pas/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol na les spyan par bgyi'o zhis/ des
longs spyad par btsams so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal bo chen po khyod kyis sngon lan 'ga' yang baba' ba dang btung ba 'di 'dra ba ni longs spyad pa yod dam/
rgyal pos gsol pa/ ban pa bdag rgyal po'i rgyud du btsas/ rgyal po'i rgyud las chen por gyur cing rgyal por gyur kyang g.yar zas dang btung ba 'di 'dra ba ni sngon
lan 'ga' yang myong bar ma 'tshal lags so// rgyal po chen po sems can skal ba chen po de ni 'di ltar 'di 'dra ba'i bza' ba dang btung ba la longs spyod do// de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo
sbyangs gzugs can snying bos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song nas/ des blon po rnams labasgo ba/ shes ldan/
dag yul tsam par 'dong gis/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go skon cig/ ci'i slad du lags/ gru 'dzin gyi bu blta'o// lha'i yul na de mchis pas 'di nyid du dgug tu gsol/ de ni
soms can bsod namasakyi skalab chen po dang ldan pa yin pas de la bka' mi stsal to// lha ji ltar bka'i ma stsal kyang bdag gis mchi bar 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi'o// de bzhin du gyis shig/
da rnams kyis tsam par yig spring ba/ shes ldan dag rgyal po gshegs bar gyur gyis grong khyer byi dor gyis shig/ rtsa dang chas dag sta gon gyis shig ces spring ba/ de rnams kyis thos nas
shin tu dga' bar gyur pa dang/ yang yi ge spring ba/ shes ldan dag rgyal po ni mi gshegrwa med kyi/ gzhon nu gshegs par 'gyur ro zhes sgreng ba dang/ de rnams skrag sta gzhon nu
[4 ]/gtum po lan 'ga' zhig 'ongs na yang gnod par 'gyur ro snyam mo// yang snying ba/ rgyal po ya nga mi gshegs gzhon nu yang mi gshegs te/ de lta mod kyi khyed kyis gad+ma ji ltar rgyan las bzlog
phyogs su 'bab/ de ltar gags phyogs shig ces spring ba thos nas/ tsam ba na gnas pa'i grong mi rnams 'dus nas/ shes ldan dag gdon mi za bar rgyal po nor dgacag la chad pas
gcad par bzhed pas/ des yi ge 'di skad snying med ces/ de rnams kyis blon po rnams la don de lding ba dang/ de rnams kyis bklags te/ yang drang por sbreng ba/ shes ldan dag
'di ni bden pa yin te/ rgyal pa dang gzhon nu yang mi gshags la/ ga 'i gags btsugs pa yang dgos pa cung zad kyang med do// de lta mod kyi lha ni gru 'dzin gyi bu blta bar bzhed do
zhes spring ba dang/ de rnams kyisanyan rna ba'i mi zhig mngags so// des kyang de bzhin du bsnyad do// de nas de rnams 'dus nas khyim bdag gru 'dzin gyi drung du song nas/ khyim bdag
lha gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa blta bar bzhed nas/ blon po rnams kyis bdag cag la drang bar phreng ste/ can rna ba'i mis kyang don de nyid sbas na 'di theng zhig/ des smras pa/ shes
ldan dag kho bo'i gegs kyi skal ba gang yin pa gser gyi gong bus brtsi ga kyang bla'i bu mi gtong ngo// de rnams kyis smras pa// khyim bdag gal te de lta yin du zin kyang ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo/
rnams la snying brtse bar gyis shige/ des smras pa// shes ldan dag gal te de lta na dam zhig bcag ste/ gal te khyed cag ga bu rnams kyang grobazhin skyes dang lan cig/
gtong ba lta na gtang ngo// de rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag de bzhin du bgyi'o// 'on shes ldan dag dengs shig/ khyim bdag gru 'dzin gro bzhin skyes bya ba nyi shupa gang na ba der song
su phyin nas/ gro bzhin skyes byed nyi shu pa la 'di skad ces smras so// bugrong ma 'di dag 'di skad ces zer ro// des smras pa/ yab gal te de lta na mchi'o// bu gdon mi za bar
rgyal po de khyod kyi rkang pa'i mthul gyi spu gser gyi kha dog can dag blta bar 'dod kyis/ rgyal po de dag ni gnas ma yin par khrobs khyod la gnod pa byed par 'gyur du 'ong gis// khyod kyis
rkang ba btegaste de la bstan par mi bya'o/ 'de re mu tig 'phreng ba 'di rgyal po ri'i zhabs drung du zhog la/ phyag byas nas de'i spyan sngar skyil mo krung chos te 'dug cig dang/ des na snga rnams
mthodo bar 'gyur ro// khyim bdag gru 'dzin gyis bsams pa// gro bzhin skyes bzhin pa gang gis gtang ci sgrung de tsho'i bzhon pas sam/ rta'i bzhon bas sam/ shing rta'i bzhon nga sa
sam/ 'on to gru'i gzhon pas snyam ba las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di dag gi nang na thu'i bzhon pa mchog yin pas/ gru'i bzhin pa sa gtang ngo snyam du bsams nas/ des chu

bo gang+gA la gru sbrengs nas de skyed mos tshal rnam pa sna tshogs byed du bcug ste/ me tog dang 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan zhing ngang pa dang/ khrung khrung dang/ rma bya dang ne tso dang/ ri
skags dang/ khu byug la sogs pa bya rnams skad 'byin cing rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs dang/ bud med rgyan sna tshogs kyis klubs pa dag 'dug tu bcug ste/ 'byor pa des chu'i nang
nas btang ngo// de rim gyis rgyal po'i khab dang nye bar phyin pa/ rgyal po gzugs can snying pos gru 'dzin gyi bu 'ong nge zhes thos nasaM/ de nas rgyal bo'i khab nas gad+ma'i 'bab chu'i bar der
bas brkos nas chus bkang sta de'i nang nas chu drangs so// rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer yang rdob dang/ gseg ma rang/ gyo ma bsal zhing tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ dri zhim pa'i log
ger bzhag/ dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po btags/ rgyal mtshan dang ba dan btsugs/ me tog sna tshogs kyis lha rnams kyi dga' tshal gyi skyed mos tshal bzhin du dga' dga' ltar byas te/

de 'byor ba des rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer du khrid do// de nas rgyal po seng ge 'i khri la 'dug pa'i rkang pa'i drung du mu tig gi 'phreng ba bzhag nas mgo bos phyag byas te mdun du skyil mo krung bcas
nas 'dug pa dang/ rgyal pas de'i rkang ba gnyis la gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba'i druyod pa mthong ngo// mthongo nas kyang kyi ma gro bzhin skyes bya ba nyi shu pa na bsod nams kyis skal ba chen po dang
ldan ba pa ni no zhes mchog tu ngomatshar skyes so// mthong nas smras pa/ gro bzhin skyes khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das mthong ngam/ lha ma ma thong lags so// tshur / ldan s lanan nas
shog 'dong ngo// des dris pa/ lhaci bcom ldan 'das bzhon pas gshegs sam/ 'on te zhabs kyis lags/ rgyal pos smras pa// derab tu byung ba yin na/ de la bzhon pas
ni bya des smras pa// lha gal te de lta na bdag kyang sug pa khe nas mchi'o zhes/ de rkang pa kho nas chas pa nas/ de'i zhe[–]shas 'tsho ba rnams kyis sa la gos dag bting ba dang/ des smras ra//
bcom ldan 'das gding las bzhud dam/ 'on te gding ba mad par bzhud/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ gding ba med par bzhud do// des smras pa/ gding ba sdus shig/ bdag
kyang gdang ba med par 'gro'o// zho shas 'tsho ba rnams kyis gos rnams bsdus pa dang/ mi ma yin pa rnams kyis bting nas/ des smras pa// shes ldan dag ngas khyad rtag la ma bzlog gam/
de rnams kyis sbas pa/ lha bzlog lags so// 'on yang su zhig gis btong/ lha khyod bsod rnams kyi skal ba chen po mnga' bas/ mi ma yin pa rnams kyis gdung lags grang/ des snying
nas tshig tu smras pa/ mi ma yin pa dag gos rnams sdus shig/ de rnams kyis bsdus rkang pas la bzhag pa na/ sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur te/ sa chen po 'di g.yos/ rag
tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ ldag/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg par gyur te/ shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs mtho na shar phyog gis dmar/ lho phyogs
mthon byang phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mthon lho phyogs dma'/ mtha' mthon dbus dma'/ dbus mthon mtha' dma' bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dag slong rnams la
bka' stsal pa/ dag slong dag 'di nas bzung sta bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi bar du/ gru 'dzin gyi bus lan 'ga' yang gdang bu med par rkang pa sa la ma bor te/ da ltar bor ba yang chos la
gus pa yin gyi/ bsod nams yongs su zad pas na ma yin te/ des sa 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to// de nas gro bzhin skyes bya ba nyi shu pa bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin
nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam pa dang/ bag la ladang/ khams dang/ rang
bzhin thugs su chud nas/ gang thos pas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad par mdzad pas/ gro bzhin skyes bya ba nyi shu pas 'jig tshogs la bltu
ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mthe ba ya shas kyi dojos bcom nas/ rgyunatu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong ba dang/ de stan las langs te/ bgos phrag pa gameg
tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos
'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa ltan/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa sbyang lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa// khyim bdag gi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams ni pha mas ma gnang ba'i rigs kyi bu rab tu 'byin pa dang bsnyan par rdzogs par mi byed kyis/
song la pha dang ma la rtogs shig/ rgyal pos gsol pa// btsun pa bdag nirtan pa thams cad kyi dpen po lags te/ na du 'di ni chos nyid kyis bdag gi bu lags pas/ 'di bag gis
gnang lags kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci rigs su dbyung dugasol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas/ dge slong tshur shog/ tshangs par spyad pa spyod
cig ces gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ma thag kho nar skra byi ba dang snam sbyar gyon par gyur te/ skra dang kha spu zhag bdun skyes pa tsam dang/ lag pa lhung bzed dang bya ma
bum gyis 'brel ba dang/ lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to// 'dir smras pa// de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas// skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan
zhing// mod la dbad pa rab zhir gnas gyur te// sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur// drug sde rnams kyis de la co bri bar brtsams pa/ re zhig bstan pa la ni gcig tu brtson par
gnas dgos pa yin/ mar sar gyi gong bu 'dis khyad par ci zhig rtogs pa 'gyur zhes/ du nams kyis de tsho bris pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa
kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces so// btsun pa kun dga' bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis dag srong gcig tu brtson pa'i rnal 'byor dang mthun pa'i ting nge 'dzin dugasungs pa gang lags/ tshe dang ldan pa
grobazhin skyes 'chag pas thub pa'i ting nge 'dzin yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro zhes/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// des bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du song ste 'chag sa byas nas/

de nas tshe dang ldan ba gro bzhin skyas bye ba nyi shu pa rgyal po'i khab kyi bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du gnas nas rtag tu 'grus pa dang ldan par/ byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos rnams la rnal 'byor gyi
rjes su brtson pa'i bsgom pas gnas so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes byeb nyi shu pa gcig pu dban par song ste nang du yang dag par bzhag pa na/ sems lasems kyi rnam par rtog pa 'di
snyam du skyes par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyinyan thos brtson 'grus brtsams te gnas pa ji skad cig yod pa de rnams kyi nang na bdag mchog yin na/ 'on kyang bdag len pa med par zag pa
@#// rnams las sems rnam par grol bar ma gyur gyis/ bdag gi nye du rnams la longs spyod rgya chen po yod pas/ ma la bdag 'dug la 'dod pa rnams la longs spyod cade
sbyin pa dag sbyin bsod nams dag bya'o snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'adas kyi thugs kyis tshodang ldan pa gro bzhon skyes bya banyishupa'i bsam pa mkhyenanas/ dge slong zhig la bka' stsal pa//

dge slong tshur shog khyod gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa gangan ba der song la phyin nas/ gro bzhin skyes bya banyi shu pa la 'di skad ces/ gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa khyod la ston pa gsung ngo zhes sgo zhig/

rgyu btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes/ dge slong des bcom ldan 'das las ma nyan nas/ tshodang ldan pa grobazhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye

pa nyi shu pal 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes khyod la ston pagasungang// tshe dang ldan pa bzhin 'tshal zhes/ tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bya ba nyi shu pas dge slong
de las mnyan nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyane pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig
tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gro bzhin skyes khyod gcig pudabon par song ste nang du yang dag
bzhag pan/ sems la sams kyi rnam par rtog pa 'di lta bu bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos brtson 'grus brtsams te gnas pa ji snyed cig yod pa de rnams kyi nang na bdag mchogayin no/ 'on
kyang bdag len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bar ma gyur gyis/ bdag gi nye du rnams la longs spyod rgya chen po yod pas/ ma la bdag 'dug la 'dod pa rnams la longs
spyod cing sbyin pa dag sbyin/ bsod nams dag bya'o snyam paskyes bar ma gyur tam/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis bdag gisoms
mkhyen to snyam du bsams nas 'jigs pa dang/ skrag pa dang/ skye bas spu zing zhes byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa de lta lags so// de 'i phyir gro
bzhin skyes khyod nyid la dri yis/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzed pa de bzhin du de'i lan thob cig/ gro bzhin skyes ji snyam du sems/ khyod sngon khyim par gyur pa na pa wang gi rgyud kyi sgra lamakhas
pa yin nam/ btsun pa bdag sngon khyim bar gyur pa na pi wang gi rgyud kyi sgra la mkhas pa mad lags so// gro bzhin skyes ji snyam du sems/ gang gi tshapa wang gi rgyudagon rkubasdams pa
de'i tshe ji ga pa wang gi sgra snyan par 'gyur ba 'am/ sgra yid 'ong ba 'am/ sgra dang ldan pa 'am/ las su rung bar 'gyur ram/ btsun pa ma lags so// 'o na gang gi tsho pa wang
gi rgyud lhag par lhod par gyur pa de'i tshojig pa wang gi sgra snyan par gyur pa 'am/ sgra yid du 'ong ba 'am/ sgra dang ldan pa 'am/ las su rung bar 'gyur ram//

btsun pa ma lags so// gang gi tshe pa wang gi rgyud shin tu bsdams pa ma yin zhing lhag par lhod pa ma yin par gyur te/ rgyud ran par 'dug pa de'i tsho pa wang gi sgra snyan par gyur pa 'am/ sgra yide
du 'ong ba 'am/ sgra dang ldan pa 'am/ las su rung bar 'gyur ba yin nam/ btsun pa de lta lags so// gro bzhin skyes de bzhin du ha cang brtson 'grus brtsams pa ni rgod par 'gyur ro//

ha cang zhan na na zhum par 'gyur ro// gro bzhin skyes de lta bas na khyod kyis rin pa nyid rtogs par bya ste/ des kyang nga rgyal du mi bya zhing de la yang bgayod par bya/ de'i tsho mtshan ma yang gzung ba
bya'o// gro bzhin skyes khyod gnas pa 'dis gnas na ring pa ma thigs pa kho nar zag pa rnams zad nas/ zag pa med pa rnam par grol ba'i sams dang/ rnam par grol ba'i shes rab
mthong ba'i chos nyid la rang gi mngon sum du byas nas rdzogs par byas te/ bdag gi skye ba zad do// tshangs par spyod pa bstan to// bya ba byas so// srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes
so zhes sgrogs par 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes byab nyi shu pa btsem ldan 'das kyis gsung pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
0 gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sn gnas song ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pa wa nga gi dpe 'dis/ tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes la gdams ngag thog nas 3/
gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rten pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid gtod par gnas so// gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid gtod par gnas pa na/ gang gi phyir rigs kyi bu

rnams skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas// dad ba yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar byed pa/ tshangs bar spyod pa'i mtha' ba na med pa de nyid la'angagi ya pa
shes sa mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas/ bdag gi skya ba zad de// tshangs par spyod pa bsten te// bya ba byas so// 'di las srid pa gzhan mi shesaso zhes go bar byed cing tshe dang ldan pa/
de kun shes par gyur te/ so mas shin tu rnam par grol ba'i dgra btsem par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan ba gro bzhin skyes bya ba nyi shu pa dgra bcom pa thon+ti/ rnam pa grol ba'i dga'
ba'i bde ba nyams su myong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag bcom ldan 'das lta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba'i dus na 'di yin no snyam nas/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye
ba nyi shu pa dgongs ka nang du yang dag 'jog las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs
gtsached tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la/ tshodang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bya ba nyi shu pas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa/
dge slong dgra bcom pa// zag pa zad ba/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ padag gi don rjes su thob pa// srid par kun tu sbyor ba longs su zad ga yang dag pa'i shes
blo pas sems shin tu rnam par grol bar gyur pa gang lags pa de/ de'i tshe gnas drug la mos par 'gyur te/ sa par 'khyud pa la mos par 'gyur ba lagis/ 'tshob ma mchis pa la mos
par 'gyurab lags/ rab daben ba mos bar 'gyur ba lags/ srid ba zad pa dang/ len pa zad pa dang/ mi brjod par sems la mos par 'gyur pa lags so// btsun pa 'di
na kha cig 'di snyam du/ kyematshe dang ldan pa 'di dad pa tsam kho na la gnas pas nges par 'byung ba la mos so snyam du sems na/ btsun pa de ltar blta bar ma bgyo ste/ 'dod chags zad pa dang//
zhe sdang zad ba dad/ gti nug zad pas nges par 'byung ba la mos par 'gyur ba lags so// btsun pa 'dri na kha cig 'di snyam du/ kye ma tshodang ldan pa 'di tshul khrims kho na la brten nas
ma 'tsho ba la mos so snyam du sems na/ btsun pa de ltar blta bar mi bgyi ste/ 'dod chags zad pa dang/ zha sdang zad pa dang/ gti mug zad bas mi 'tshe ba la mos par 'gyur
lags so// btsun pa 'di na kha cig 'di snyam du/ kyam tshe dang ldan pa 'di rnyed pa dang/ bkur sti deng/ tshigs su bcad pa tsam kho na tshol ba'i slad du rang dang na pa la mos so snyam du
soms na/ btsun pa de ltar blta par mi bgyi ste/ 'dod chags bad pa dang/ zhe sdang zad ba dang/ gti mug zad pa dang/ sred pa zad pa dang/ len pa zad pa las mi brjed pa'i
sems la yang mos par 'gyur lags te/ btsun pa dge slong dgra bcom pa// zad pa zad pa// bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ 'ad ga ron rjes su thob pa/ srid par
kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad po/ yang dag pa'i shesabs soms shin tu rnam par grol bar gyur pa gang lags pa de/ de'i tshe de gnas drug po 'di dag la mos bar 'gyur lags so// gtsun
ba drag spyod slob pa gang yin pa thob pa de/ gong ma'i grub pa dang bdeba'i mya ngan las 'a das pa don du gnyer ba'i tshulan mang du gnas pa ste/ dere'i tshe slob ba'i tshul khrims dang/ slo
pa'i dbang bo dang ldan pa lags so// de dus gzhan na brag pa rnams zad nas zag pa med pa'i rnam par grol ba'i mas dang/ rnam par grol ba'i shes rab mthong ba'i chos nyid la rang gi
mngon par shes pas mno sum dubagyis te bsgrubs nas/ bdag gi skye ba zad do// tshangs par spyod pa bstan to// srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes sgrogs pa de'itshani/
de mi slob pa'i tshul khrims dang/ mi slobaba'i dbang bo rnams dad ldan lags so////bam po brgya
! gcig pa// btsun pa dper na bus pa gzhonon chung ngu zhan pa gan kyal du nyal ba de ni/ de'i tshe byisapa'i ngang tshul dang/ byis pa'i debayo rnams dang ldan lags la/ de dus gzhan chen por gyur/
ba'i rgyus dbang bo rnams yongs su smin pa de'i tshon chen po'i ngang tshul dad/ chen po'i debang bo dang ldan lags so// btsun pa de bzhin du dge slong slob pa'i yod ma thob pa gang lags bte//

rgyu gong ma'i grub pa dang bde ba'i chu ngan las 'das pa don du gnyer ba'i tshul la lan mang du gnas te/ de de'i tshe slob pa'i tshul khrims dang/ slob ba'i dbang po dang ldan lags so// dadus gzhan n
