par shog/ bden pa gsol bran pa'i mid khon khragade mi 'dzag par gyurapa dang/ lha sbyin dang/ ma skyes dgadang/ kakalakadang/ khan de drub pa dang/ katam ra ka
tishu dang/ rgya mtshos sbyin rnams ma gtogs pa/ dge slong dang/ dag slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma rnams dang/ rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye ba'i tshogs
la cher thams cad rab tu dga' bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das ni mkhyen bzhin du gang zhig ji ltar dpyad byed pa de la dbazhin du rjes su dgyes par mdzad do/ de rnams kyi dag pa'i rtsa ba
bskyed ba'i phyir ro/// dge slong rnams tha tshem skyes te/ the tshem thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tsunab tshedang
ldan pa 'od srungs stobs bcu ldan gyis bden pa gsol bas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khrag 'dzag pachadapar gyur pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dgad
ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tum zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dusan yadad dug 'bags nas kun tu 'khrugs par gyur pa na 'dis dug zhig par byas pa de nyon cig/ dgeslong dag sngon byung ba ni 'o
dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na skyed mos tshal rtsa bdang/ sdong bu dang/ me tog dang/ chu phunasum tshogs ba/ bya sna tshogs skad 'byin pa zhig yod de/ dan drang srong chu dang/ rtso bdang/
'bras bu longs spyod pa/ pags pa dang shing shun gyon pa/ rig sngags dang gsang sngags 'chang ba zhig gnas so// ra 'o'adi na khyimabadagacig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma
blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtsi bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed de/ de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/ dus gzhan zhigan chung
ma sems can dang ldan par gyur to// de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang khye'u zhig btsas te/ nyim bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu de'i btsas pa'i de tsas ston byas te ming btags nas/ de bskyed/
bsangs ta chen por gyur to// de 'chag pa 'am/ 'greng ba dang/ 'dug pa 'am/ nyal ba nayang dge bsams shing dgeba'i las byed pas/ deskye bo'i tshogs kyis chos 'dod ces
bya bar ming btags so// de dge ba ci yin zhes tshol ba'i phyir nir 'or nas byung nas dus dus su drang srong de'i drud du 'gro zhing de la bsnyen bkur byed de/ dka' thub kyi drung du 'gro bas dka'
thub ldan dka' thub ldan zhes bya bar yang grags so// de dus gzhan zhig na dug cig gis 'ashagasab langs nas/ de la dug sman du ma dang sngags kyi sbyor bas dpyad byas na yang de'i nad
du zhi bar ma gyur nas/ de'i pha dang ma gnyis drang srong de'i drung du song ste/ drang srong chen po khyod kyi rim gro bgyid pa ni dug gis 'bags nas srog dang bral la thug gis dpyad mdzod cig/
des bden pa gsol bar brtsams te/ bu cig khyod kyi sams la ni// dgra dang mdza' ba mtshungs shes na// bden pa'i tshig ni 'di yis su// khye'u khyod dug ni med par shog/
sabaden pa gsol mthug kho nar dug zhi bar gyur to// dag spong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khye'u gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no// drang srong gangahinab de ni 'od srungs stobs
bcu ldan 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang 'dis bden pa gsol bas nga sos par byas so// da lta yang 'di'i bden pa gsol bas nga sos par byas so/ lha spyi'i sdug bas29nyis
yid mi bde ba dang 'gyod pas sems pa/ bdag gis dag sbyong go'u ta ma la rde 'obs pa ni din med pa zhig byas de/ dag sbyongag ta ma yang ma sod la/ skye bo mang pos kyang rab tu
[q ]shes par gyur ro snyam nas/ dashing drung zhig tu song ste sems khongs su chud cing skyel me krung bcas te 'dug go/ dge slong rnams gnas dang gnas rnams su ra tsun ba dag gzigs shig/ lha

hU~M sbyin 'di 'dra bar gdug ste/ gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das rab tu byung ba de yang pha rol gnod pas steng du rdo'athon no zhes smod par byed/ gzhog 'phyas byed/ kha kher bar byed pa dang/ keka la ka dang/

khan da drab bya dang/ ka ta mor ka ti bya dang/ rgya mtshos khyon rnams kyis smyos pa/ shes ldan dag ma brtags bar byung rgyal du ci brdol/ lha sbyin shing che ge mo zhes bya ba'i drung na bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms
par zhugs pa ma mthong ngam/ bdag nyid chen po de da lta bu byed bar ga la 'gyur/ dgaslong rnams thi tshem skyes ti 1 thatshem thams cad gcodapa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa
kAka lika dang/ khan de drab bya dang/ ka ta mo ra kra ti sha dang/ rgya mtshos byon rnams bdag dang tsha ma mchis bas lha sbyin ngo tsha ma mchis pa'i bsngags pa sgrogs pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'as

kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa na yang ngo tsha med pa'i bsngags pa smras pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba rgyal po'i khab kyim rnams dang rgyal
paso gsang 'ga' zhig gis phyir khrims su bcos pa/ dur khrod gnyis bshams la/ gcig tun skyes pa rnams der bar bya'o// gcig tu na bud med rnams so zhes bcas so//ji tsam dus gzhan/
zhig na ma ning zhig shin s/ de dur khrod gcig tu yang gnas skabs ma rnyed cing/ gnyis par yang ma rnyed do// rgyal po'i khab kyi phyogs shig na skyed mos tshal rtsa ba dang/ 'bras bu dang me tog bun
sum tshogs pa/ byasna tshegs skad 'byin pa zhig yod de/ den drang srong spyi cer chu dang/ rtsa ba dang/ 'bras bu la lengos sbyod ba/ pags pa dang shing shun gyon pa zhig gnas so// phyogs de nayang

zhing gru sum zhig la shing e ran da zhig skyes nas ma ning gi ro de der bor ro// 'odi'i dri tshoranas wa zhig 'ongs te/des mning gir do bza' bar brtsams so// bya rog gcig kyang shing an du'i kha na tshang bcas te

'dug go/de'i blo skyes pa// wal bsngags pa smras dang/ gal te na zes pa'i lhag ma star ro snyam nas/ des de la tshigs su bcad de bsngags pa smras bar brtsams pa/ji ltar khyodan seng ge 'i mgrin pa dang/
ji ltar khyu mchog bshul dang ldan pa yi// ri dgas rgyal po khyod la phyag 'tshal na// gsol ba'i pham phabs la ni thugs dpag mdzod// was bltas te slar tshigs su bcad de sapa/ bya ba
mchog mkha' 'gro ngo// phyogs kun gsal bar mdzad nas ni// rin chen sbram ltar mdzes gyur pa///shing mchogartse la bzhugs 'di gang// bya rog gis smras pa/skal ldan chen po blta ba'i phyir khyod
kur+ya// kyi drung du bdagamachis te// ri dgas rgyal khyod phyag 'tshalan// gsol ba'i pham babs thugs dpag mdzod// was sbyas pa/ rma bya'i mgrin pa lta bu yi// pho rog lta na sdug
(1 pa khyod// kun dga' byed ba rnams kyi gtso// ci bder gsolagyis mar sbyin ga/ de babs nas wa dang lhan cig ga ning gi rol za bar byed pa// drang srong gis mthong nas/des tshigs su bcad d smras//
ljon shing thachad grib ma la// de tsho medabar 'dug nas su// tha chad lo lengs spyod pa// a ma'o ring zhig len nas mthong// bya rog gis thes nas de ma bzod nas/ tshigs su bcad desmras pa 'di
ltar sang garma bya dag/ dam pa'i sha la longs spyod na// gzhan gyisabyin pas 'tshob yi// spyi nyer 'di'i nici zhig gtogs// drang srong de yang mi bzod pa skyes nas/tshigs su bcad de smras pa/'dab/

chags tha chad bya ga dang// rkang bzhi tha chad wa dang ni//ljon shing tha chad e rand// ma ya sbe chad mnang// zhing githa chad gru gsum ste// de tsho med rnams 'dus la ltos// de nas bya ga lhag par yang mi byed

pa skyes nas/ drang srongag me khang du zhugs te blta bar brtsams pa las ci yang mi snang nas/ril ba spyi blugs bcagaste bros so//ji tsam drang srong de me khang du zhugs na ril ba chag pa mthong nas/ sa
bsams pa/ 'di ni bya rog gdug pa de'i las kyis byas kyi/ gzhan ni su yang ma yin no snyam du go nasaM/tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ su la lta de 'dra'ang mi smra ste// ngo tsha med pa'i gdug sems/
kyis[}]ma khang ma rung byas nas ni// la ba yang na bcug par gyur// bsngags 'os smad par 'os kyang rung// yong ye cung zad snum bya//blo gros ldan pas rtag tu ni//kha rog pas ni bde ba 'thob/dug

slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong gang yin pa de nange nyid yin no//de'i tshe de'i dus kyi 'o gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin yin no//de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bya rog na ke kal ka yin te/ den yang ngo tsha med
pa de dag gis de tsho med pa'i bsngags pa brjod do/ da ltar yang ngo tsha mad pa 'di dag ngo tsha med pa'i bsngags pa brjod de// dge slong rnams thetshem skyes te/ the tshom thams cad
gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dang/ lha sbyin thog mar gang du mi mthun bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag sngon byung

ba shang shang te'u gnyis lus gcig tu gyur nas rgya mtsho'i 'gram na gnas te/ tshes can dang chos ma yin pa zhes bya'o// citsaman chos ma yin pa ni gnyid leg/ chos can n mil tshe byed pa dang/ des bdud
rtsi'i 3bras bu zhige chus khyer ba mthong nas/ des de blangs te bsams pa/ ci zhig 'di yang bslang ngam/ 'on te bza' snyam me/ 3yang bsams pa/ rjes kyang lus 'jigacig khe na gso bar zad
stsal nas/des de bsrung ba dang rang nyid rjes te/ desad pa na chos can la bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu'i sgrigs pa byung ba chos ma yin pas tsher nas/des smras pa// de ci'i sgrigs pa yin/ des smras pa/
@# bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu go/ de gang nas rnyed/ des smras pa/ khyod gnyid log pa na kho bos bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu rnyed nas lus gcig khe na gso bar brad da snyam nas/ khyed ma bslang

[） ]bar khe bos zlosas// des smras pa// khyed kyis ma legs pa zhig byas to/ ngas kyang dus shes par bya'o// ji tsam dus gzhan zhigun chos can gnyid log nas chos ma yin pa mel tshe byed pa na/nges gu gi

'bras bu chus khyer ba zhigs khro nas des de zos pa dang/ de gnyis kabargyal bar gyur to// chos ma yin pa dugag 'bras bus kun nas khrugs pas smras pa/ gang dang du skyes pa'i tshe rabs de dang de dag tu khyod la gsod pa
dang phyir rgol ba dang/ dgra bor gyur cig/ chos can gyis smras pa/ bdag kyang gang du skyes pa'i tshe rabs de dang de dag tu khyed la byams ba sgrub par gyur cig ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag jo snyam du sams/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi chos can gang yin pa de nang nyid yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi chos ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin yin te/ der shog
marang dang 'ad ma mthun pa gyur te// sa spyod de la byams pa'i thugs bzhag ge/ gzhan yang ji ltar 'dis nga la mi mthun par byas pa dang/ sa kyang 'di la byams par bsams pa/

de nyon cig/ dag sledi dag sngon byung ba grong khyer wArA NA si na rgyal po'i sres rtsa ldan zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bde ba dang/ le lags pa/skye bo dang ma mang pos rab tu gang ba nargyal srid byed/
du'ajug ge/ ngas yul gzhan gyi rgyal pe'abu me zhig blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed de//de rtse bar byed/dag 'a bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par
byad b.las/ bu mo de dus gzhan zhig nasems can dang ldan par gyur te/ da zla ba brgyad dam dgu len pa'i nyi ma rtse na khye'u gzugs bzang bo mdzes pa blta na sdug pa zhig btsas te dbartsas ba'i

btsas ston rgya cher byas nas/ khye'u mdacir gdugs zhes ming 'dogs par byed do// bon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha khye'u 'di gdugasakyi rtse na btsas bas/ de'i slad du khyedu'i mod nye ma'i mu khyud ces

bgyi bar gdags so zhes/ de'i ming nyi ma'i mu khyud ces bya bar btags nas/ khye'u nyi ma'i mu khyud ma ma brgyad de/ pang na 'tshe ba'i ma ma gnyis dang/ nu ma snun pa'i ma mganyis dang/ dri ma 'phyi lo'i ma

ma gnyis dang/ rtson grags kyi ma ma gnyis la rjes su gtad de/ de ma ma brgyad po dag gis 'o ma dang/ zho dang/ mar dang/ zhun mar dang/ mar gyi snying bu dang (gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo/

gtso bdag gis sring bar byed skyed par byed cing/ rdzing na gnas pa'i bad bzhin dumyur du skyed par byed do// de gang gi tshe chen por gyur ba de'i tsho/ yi ge dang/ grangs dang/ rtsis dang/ lag rtsis la nyebar
zhugs shing/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bayul dang/ dbang phyug dang/ mthu thob pasa'i dkyil 'khor chen po mngon par zil gyis gzhan nas gnas pa rnams kyi bcu'i gnas dang las kyi gan
thadad par gyur pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste/ glang po riganyar zhon ba dang/ rta la zhon pa dang/ shing rta'i thabs dang/ ral gri'i thabs dang/ 'phong dang/ phyibasnar ba dang/
mdun du bsnur ba dang/ lcags kyus sgyur thabs dang/ mda' bo cho 'ben pa dang/ zhags pa gdab pa dang/ gcad pa dang/ dral ba dang/ dbug pa dang/ 'dri stangs dang/ gemo stangs dang/ thor
tshugs dang/ rgyud nas thog pa dang/ hU~M grag par phog pa dang/ gnad du phog pa dang/ mi 'chor bar thog pa dang/ tshabs cher phog pa ste/ bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnasalnga po de dag la yang byang
bar gyur nas/ phasad rgyalatshab tu bcug go/ rgyal po sra rtsi ldan gyi btsun mo dam ban chos ldan zhes bya'o// blon po'i mchog ni phyugs 'dug ces bya ste/ de la rgyal palhag par snying 'jog
go/ ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig rgyal po sra rtsi ldan chos ldan ma dang lhan cigartse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do// da rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dragu'
spyod pa las chos ldan ma sems can dang ldan par gyur to// de mtshan mkhan rnams kyis khye'u zhig btsas par gyur to/des rgyal bo srog dang phul nas/rang nyid nyed pan bcings targyal srid kyi
dbang phyug la dbang byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan te// ji tsam na rgyal bo sa rtsi ldan nad kyis thibs par gyur naso/ del rtsa ba dang/ sdong bu dang/ 'dab ma dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu'i sman
rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas kyang de'i nad de zha bar ma gyur te/ des lus kyi gnas skabs rig ra ba byas nas/ des bsams pa/ bdag 'das nas nyi ma'i mu khyud rgyal por 'gyur ta/ dres gdon
mi bra bar chos ldan ma bsad par 'gyur bas 'dir/ yaji ltar bya ba'i dus la bab/ yang bsams pa/blon de phyags 'dug 'di la bdag gis longs spyod bzang po dag bgo bsha' byas shing na las kyis sa
pa lan gyis 'di lachos ldan na gtad do snyam nas/des phyugs 'dug bkag stabaslob/nga'i btsun mo dam po ni chos ldan ma yin la/blon po mchog na khyod yin tu/ngas lus kyi gnas skabs shasan/
gdon mi za bar ng srog dang 'bral bar 'gyur gyi khyed kyisad la sdug par sems na/ma'i mu khyud kyis chos ldan m ji ltar yang srog dang phral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig/des smras pa// lha de
tsam yang rtsom theg gam/lha thugs las chu dur mdzod cig dang ltar ma bkum ba de ltar sbyo'i//bsags pa kun gyi mtha'abad cing/ mgron po rnams kyi mtha' ltung 'gyu// phrad pa'i mtha'

'bral ba ste// gson pa'i mtha' na 'chi ba yin//rgyal spa tshuldan shanas/de gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan la sogs pa bzang po rnams kyis bkur sti char byas stobasregos so//nyi ma'i mu khyud rgyal/

po'i rgyal srong chen po'i ribang bskur bas dbang bskur ro/des thob pa rnams kyis bsgo ba/chos ldan ma sod cig phyugs 'dug gis smras pa lha ma brtags pa'i bkum ste ni rung//ci khyo'ur btsa' bar 'gyur ma
'on te bu mor 'gyur sus 'tshal/ grol te khye'ur btsas bar 'gyuran/de nyid dgum yod/rgyal ba nyi ma'i mu khyud kyis smras pa/de bzhin du gyis la khyod kho nas srungs shang

sa khyim du bzhag pa na zla ba brgyad dam dgu len pa dang khye'u zhig btsas pa nyid kyi nyi ma la nyapa'i chung ma zhig la bu me zhag btsal sago/desade btsas mthog kho nar lta pa'i chung ma la nor gyis dren
brjod nas phyugs 'dug gis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha chos ldan ma la bume zhig btsas lags so//legs pa zhig skyas so/khye'u de nya pa'i chung mas bsnun skyod bgos te chen por gyur nas/yig
'bru dang glog la bslabs te snyan dngags bya bar brtsams nas/ de'i ming nyaba'i khye'u snyan dngags mkhan nya pa'i khyi'u snyan mkhan zhes bya bar gyurato/ phyugs 'jug gis/chos ldan mal smras pa/
khyed la ni khye'u snyan dngags mkhan zhig btsas par gyur to// de ci 'dra bzhig yin te re zhig blta'o//des smras pa// de blta ci dgos zheg cig/dobu la mngon par dga' zhing lta 'ded pas 'dug tu
mi btub bo/ phyags 'dug gis de nges par gal gyis 'chu bar shes nas/ thabs shig bshams te 'u zhig bskur nas btang ngo//de nad du zhugs pa khon na mtshan mkhan rnams kyis/
pa'i khye'u snyan dngags mkhan 'di ni rgyal po srog dang phul te/rang nyid cod pan bcings nas rgyal srid byed par 'agyur rozhes lung bstan pa rgyal pos thos nas des blon po rnams labasgeb/
sa kyad ma shor bar zung zhig/ de gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa las thos nas/de phan tshun bros pa las/ rgyan me zhig gi khyim du zhugs pa dang des de smras te/de nas yungadad 'brumar gyis lus

bskusanus/ khyogs kyi stod du bzhagasta ro lta bur bcos nas byung ste dur khrod du bor ba dang/ langs tu bros pa dang/ phyogs de na ma zhig la rtog dang 'bras bu tshel ba des/de bros pa mthong nga//de'i phyi
bzhin skyegs shing rgyug pa'i mi de rnams kyis/gde la dris pa/kun ng rjebang ched dang kha dog 'di 'dra ba'i mi 'ga' zhig lam 'di nas 'gro ba khyod kyis ma mthong ngam/des smras pa/mthong ste
lam 'di de nas song de re rnams de'i rjes bzhin du seng ge / da yang ra'ir rten gtso brag mkhan zhig gi khyim du zhugs nas/de la ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang/ snyags ma'i mi rnams kyis
btsal bar brtsams pan/gtse blag mkhan gyis gos kyi thum pa'i nad du bcu gnas abong bu la bka'ata ra 'ar nas phyir byung ste khrus byed pa 'i sor khyer nas btang ba dang/ langs te phyogs bzhin bltas
nas bris so//dar yang mgazhan zhigagis mthong nas/des lhags ma'i mi rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed gang gi don du ra 'or na tshol ba'i mi de ni lam 'di nas seng gis myur du res shig/
de rnams dong ba las/de yang grong gzhan zhig tu lham mkhan gyi khyim zhig tu zhugs na/sa de la ji ltar gyur pa bsnyadanas sbasal/yachaelham la rting par bltas pa zhigagyis shig des smos pa bdag gis
sngon lan 'ga' lad mchil lham de lta bu byed ma myong//des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/blo gros sna tshogs rang bzhin du ma ste//de dag srang gcig tu ni gzhal bamed//lham

ka mkha na byed kyis nga yi tshig bzhin 'dir// rting ba gang de mdun du ltar bar gyis//des lham mkhan de la bslabs nas lham mkhan gyis de 'dra ba'i mchil lham zhigabus so//ri 'ir de'abar bskor ba yin pas de
mchil lham de gyen nas stolakhud nas 'dzul tu brosas//snyags ma'i mi rnams kyis mchil lham gyi rjes bzhinar 'ar de nyid skur ro/de yang bos nas chur zhugs pa dang/ klu rnams kyis gnas su khrid rgyal

dang pos gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa las/de ji ltar kru rnams kyis klu'i gnas su khrid de zhes shes so// rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag pa'i yul na sbrul khas sngogs ji snyad gnas pa de dag thams

cad pa'i spyan sngar khug cig/donams kyis bu thums cad na gnas pa'i sbrul khas sdigs rnams rgyal po la phul le// rgyal pas de rnams la bsgo ba/shes ldan dag ring la gru'i gnas chen geme zhes bya bar klu

zung shig/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes sprul khas sdigs thams cad kyis rgyal polas mnyananas kru'a gnas su deng de 'bregagacig na gnod sbyin ser skya zhes bya ba thug dang 'dra ba zhigayod de/a skrag pas gcan gzan

rnams kyis kyang 'brog de yongs su spangasan/minems kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos te/deser skya'i 'brog ces bya bar grags so// sprul khas sdigs rnams kyi sngags kyi mthus ji ltar glu re la gnod par 'gyur ba/

da ltar byas pas de skrag nas de ser skya'i 'breg de rgal bar mi nus bar der re/klu rnams kyis gros byas pa/bdag cag gis 'di ltar de ser skya'i 'phrog las ma bsgral ba na ma legs pa zhig byas te/deyang gnod

sbyin ser skyas bsad lagabadag cag kyang de'i phyir gtses par 'ong na de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/klu'i rgyal po des smras pa/ don de sprul khas sdigs rnams la rig par bya'o zhes de rnams kyis sbrul las
sngages rnams la smras gshes ldan dgagang gi phyir bdagacug 'khrugasapar byas pa de ni bdag cag gis thabs kyis bsad pa nyid de 'di ltar sar skya'i 'brog tu beraro/sbrul khas sdigs rnams
kyis don da rgyal mol sbas pa dang/ rgyal bos smras pa/ gal te de lta na yang 'on kyang tshol cig/de ser skya'i 'brog na phan tshun 'khyam par brtsams pa na/gnod sbyin sor skyayadaphyogs zhig na spyi
rnams kyis yongs su bskor te 'dug go/de dang khyi rnams kyis de rgyang 'di pa khen nas mthong nas/ des bsams pa/ci 'das bdag shi bar gyur te zhes thos nas/desan de 'dir 'ongs sam snyam mo//

des de la khyi rnams chud pa las/de bris shing ljon pa 'ge kha 'dzegs pa dang/ khyi rnams dang ser skyas ljon shing gi drung du bsdad de/sor skyas smras pa kAya nang rje khyod kyi sar skya'i 'brog na mi mayin pa sa ra
skya zhes bya ba gnas te/ der song ba gang yin pa re des gso de par 'gyur ro zhes thos sam/ khyod dus la bab kyis babs shig des smras ba jisrid 'tsho ba de srid du 'dug go/gnod sbyin ser skya
'dus sgyud kyis bcis te sgrim bas 'dug nas//de yur ba na des de'i stang dugs shig bor ro//khyi rnams kyis bsams pa/'di ni mi de khon lhung ba yin no snyam nas/de rnams kyis gnod

sbyin sar skya bos nas deng ro/da ljon shing las rwa la gyis babs te sed nas/de dang de na kher zhing bsams pa bdag gi zhang bodrang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ba zhig yod kyis de'idrud du 'gro'o

snyam mo//drang srong de la yang r ra zhig na skyed mos tshal rtsa ba dang bum tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ chu phun sum tshogs pa gangashing rnam pa sna tshogs tshang tshong gis mdzes par byas pa bya sna tshogs skad 'byin

pa zhig yodad/de rim gyis thos pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas de'i drung du 'ongs nas dag nyin du 'brel bas smras te 'dug go/der yang rgyal pa'i mo rnams kyis btsal te/de rnams kyis de bzung bar brtsams
pa las/des ra'i g.yang sa nas bdag nyidamachongs so//das mchongs pan mi zhig gis gtsug phud nas 'byung ba las/gtsug phud byung nas de lhung ngo// de rnams kyis bsams pa/'di rig bas 'dong ngo zhes
gtsug phud khyer te rgyal ba'i drung du song nas/de rnams kyis smras pa lha nyapa'ikhyi'u snyan dngags mkhand bkum nas/gtsug phud kyang 'di lags so// rgyal po dgu nas des de rnams la lodas spyod kyis

bgo bsha' byas so/de nas drang srid gi skyed mos tshalana gnas pa'i lha gang yin pa des/ drang srong de la sgras / khyod kyi tsha bo ni sdug bsngal ma bzod pa dog pa nyam nga ba thob na ma dgos sam/des smras pa/

cha ga ba te bdag gis ma bsams bar gyu na/de ring nyid du srog dang bral bar 'gyur ro//drang srong de ni rig sngags dang gsang sngags 'chang ba yin te/gang gis ni skyes pa bud med du 'gyur zhing phyir yang skyes
bar 'gyur pa'i rig sngags shes pas/ des de la rig sngags de bslabs te smras pa/ da ni sod la 'jigs pa dang bag tsha ba med pas 'dug cig/ des rig sngags kyi dpes bskrun par ma nus pa'i nyid

med kyi cha byad du mngon par sprul nas wa rA Na sir song ste rgyal po'i skyed mos tshal na 'dug pa skyed mos tshal gyi srungs masu mthong nas mchog tung mtshar skyes te/ des myur ba myur bar song na rgyal po
ti ma'i mu khyud la smras pa/ lha skyad mes tsha la mthu med gzugs phun sum tshogs pa/ dar la bab pa zhig mchis so// des bsgo ba khrid de shog cig// dos dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos byas te/
rgyal po 'i yi khrang du khrid nas 'di la rgyal po nyi ma'i mu khyud lhag bar chags par gyur ba dang/ des skabs rnyed nas/ dben pa na 'dug pa las bsad de slar yang rig sngags bzlas te skyes par gyur
ba dang/ de nas rang nyid kyis cod pan btsas te/ blon po phyugs 'dug l go bar byas rgyal srid la 'dug go/ lhas tshigs su bcad de smras ba/ gang gi mgo ma bcad pa de bsad min// phyir yang
las nas las ni byed par 'gyur// ji ltar snyan dngags mkhan des glags rnyed nas// su rtsi can du lu de bsad yin// dge slong dge ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshade'i sakyi rgyal po sra rtsi ldan
gyi bu nyi ma'i mu khyud ces bya ba gang yin pa de ni de nyid yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi snyan dngags mkhan gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin 'di nyid yin te/ den pad 'dis da la shar g nyal/

da ltar yang 'dis shur gnyer ro// gzhan yang ji ltar 'as nga la shar gnyer ba de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri 'ir zhig na/nor bu mkhan gnyis shig gnas te/ de gnyis kyis lam botshe dang grong

bgos so//de'i tshong pa 'byor pa yang yongs su khrid pa zhig yod pa de nor bu'i snod khyer nas 'i 'or der phyin to// de nas lan gyis dub pa ngal sos nas/ nor bu mkhan gcig gi drung du song ste smras pa/
nor bu'i snod 'di ni thang chedacug/ des de'i rin thang chung ngu zhig tu bcad pa dang/ des smras pa/ 'di ltar kho bo longs spyod las nyams kyang/ shes rab ma yin pas kho bos 'di ci'i blta shes na/

de skud du smra ba ni'i za tshig/ de de'i drung nas leg ste cig shes kyi drung du song nas smras pa nor bu'i snod 'di ronathang chod cig/ des de'i rin thad thog tu bab par bcad nas/ des smras pa/ 'di skad
kyi yin zla der zhig pa dag la ma bdog ge/ sa skyas ba/ ci bdog pa de phyin la khyer cig/ des blangs so// nor bu mkhan cig shes po des thos nas/ de ma bzod pa skyes te nga'i drud du song nas/ bag
gis 'di thog mar khyim du khrid cing/ bdag gis 'di rin thang yang bcad nas/ khyod kyis ci'i phyir bkur/de gnyis phan tshun khon khyud bar gyur to// dag slong dag ji snyam dusams/ de'i tshe de'i

mas/ dus kyi nor bum khan nor bu'i snyed rin thang chud dur gcod pa gang yin b den lha sbyin 'di nyid yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi nor bu mkhan cig shosarin tha thog tu bab par gcod pa gang yin pa de nyid
yin te/ de na pa da nged phan tshun mi mthun par gyur te/ da ltar ya da nged phan tshun ma mthun par gyurato// gzhan yang de ltar ngedam mthun bar gyur pa de nyen cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba ra
'or zhagan khyim bdag cig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod bar byed de// da tshu bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dag/
dgur spyod par byed las/ dus gzhan zhig na chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu len pa na khye'u zhig btsas so// btsas nas de'i chung ma shi'i//des bsams pa dbya'u
gsor gzhug pa'i phyir gzhan zhig blang ngo snyam nas des gzhan zhig blangs te rang dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ duga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/de las kyang khya'u zhag btsas nas de
mngashago/khyim bdag des bsams ba/gal tagazhan blangs nu de yang 'chibar 'gyur gyis/ khye'u phu bo shes kyi khyim dbub par bya'o snyam nas/ des khye'u phu bo shes kyi khyim phub pa las/de las khye'u

dad bu me mad du btsas so//de'i chung ma desaaparje'i sras khye'u khyod kyi cher mchi des snas pa/ stun 'ong ste nu yin no//des smras garje'i sras khyod la na sras mang la/'din gcig pu lags na/'di dag dang
'di'i khyim dang/ longs spyod mnyam par sprul lam/ des smras pa/ bsrung mo 'di ni 'jig rten gyi chos yin no/des smras pa/ rje'i srasag pa de ltar 'du khum zhig 'dod pa la soser sten pa ni

sdig pa'i sam byed ba ci yang med pas/ des du me tog dang 'bras bu la bud nas dgon par khrid de rdos bskrun te bsad do// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag gi bu phu bo shos

gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin 'di nyid yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi nu bo shos gang yin pa de ni nga da yin ta de ya ngo 'dis nga la ma mthun par byas so//da ltar yang 'as nga la mi mthun par byas so//

gzhan yang dad ji ltar mi mthun par gyur ba de nyon tsago/ dge slong dag sngonar 'or zhigan bram ze zhaga gnas pa des/rigs mnyam pa las chung blangs te/de da dang lhan cigartse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/
dga' dgur spyod par byed do//de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed pan/ cud ma sems can dang ldan par gyur te/de zla ba brgyud dam dgulen pa dang/ bumo gzugs bzad b/
blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa zhig btsas so// bram ze des bsams pa// de'ang bdag gi khyim du khrum lo su bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa de la bu mo 'di bsod snyoms kyi gor sbyin no snyam me// jitsaman
bram ze'i khye'u zhig bsod snyam kyi phyir de'i khyim du zhugs nas bkra shis par gyur cig/ bsod snyoms byin cig/ bram za des de la bos te sbas pa// bram za'i khye'u bu mo gzhon nu 'di bdag khag

khyod la bsod snyoms kyi ger sbyin no//des smras pa/ de ring mi blang gi/ nyim dang yud tsam dag bstan nas rlung de zhes de song ngo// ji tsam na bram ze'i khye'u ga zhan shis bsod snyams kyi phyir de khyim du/
zhugs nas bkra shis par gyur cig/bsod snyems byin cig/ bram ze des de la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u bu mo gzhan 'di bdag gis khyed la bsod snyoms kyi gor sbyin no//des smras pa// 'dir bram
ze'i khye 'u gzhan zhig bsod snyoms la zhugs na/ de laci'i phyir ma byin/des smras pa/ donA'i rgyu skar mi bzang zhes zer/ des smras pa// gal te de lta na blang bar bgyi'o// bram zes smras pa/ khyod
rgyu skar la ci'i phyir mi sdod/des tshigs su bcad de smras pa// don rnams grub par gyur na// de dag thams cad mthun pa ste// rgyu skar thams cad bzung pa yani// nyim thams cad dge ba yin// rgyu
skor brtsi ba lhur len pa// ma rnams don ni nyams 'gyur te// 'di yi den ni rgyu skar yin// skar ma rnams kyis ci zhig bya// zhes smras nas/ des khyer te song ngo// bum lu gzhan po des bram zo sde

las bram ze chag mo zhes bya bas bu mo khyer ro zhes thos nas/ da de'i drung du song ste smras pa// bram ze'i khye'u bdag gis bu mo desngar thob zin na/ khyod kyis ci'i phyir skur/ des smras pa/ rgyu skar

brtsi pa lhur len pa khyod/ re zhig rgyu skar la rtogs shig/ kho pilo ni rgyu skar bzang pa zhes byas pa dang/ de khros par gyur to// rag slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze'i khye'u snga ma
zhes gang yin pa de lha sbyin 'di yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze'i khye'u phyi ma shes gang yin pa de ning nyid yin te/denayang 'di nga dang mamathun par gyur te/da ltar yang
'dir rang mi mthun bar gyur to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khaba'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i glang po che gdug pa

nor skyong zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de nyin re zhing khyim nas phyung ba na skyo bamang ge la 'dogs par byed de// rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis/ rgyal po ma skyes dgu la gsol ba btab pa/lha glang po

chagadug pa nor skyod gdugs re zhing gnas nas byung bo na/ lam patsha dang/ srang dang/ bzhi'adodang/ sum mdo rnams su skye bo mang po kha 'dog par bgyid kyis/lha sa glang po che'i 'dul mkhan rnams la
bka' stsal te/ cinas gdugs re 'ang ma byung bar sang lta bu 'byin par la dril sgrogs su stsal ba'i rigs so//rgyal pos smras pa// de bzhin du byas khyad dengs shig/rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo
ba 8shes ldan dag glang po che'i 'dul mkhan rnams khug cig/ de rnams kyis glang po che'i gdul mkhan rnams bkug pa dang/ rgyal pos smras pa/shes ldan dag rgyal po'i khaban gnas pa'i skye bo'i

tshogs kyis nga la gsol pa/ glang bo chagadug ba nor skyong gdugs rar zhinge gnas nas byung ba na/lam pa tsho dang/ sang dang/ zhi ma dodang gsum mdo rnams su skye bo dang mi mang po la 'dog par byed kyis//

lhas glang po cha'adul mkhan rnams la bka' stsal te/ cinas gdugs re shing mo dbyung bar sang lta bu 'byin pan yang dril sgrogs su stsal ba'i rigs so zhes gsol gyis/ khyed kyis de nyin re zhing ma byung bar
sang lta bu 'byin pa na yang dril sgrogs shig 1 lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes glang bo che'i 'dul mkhan rnams kyis/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra las mnyan nas rkang pa la gtugs te dong ngo/ rgyal po'i khab
na khyim bdag phyag pa/ro mang ga longs spyod che ba zhig gnas pa des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun sung khyin dugadugs tshod la spyan drangs so//lha sbyin gyis ji lta ba khyim bdag

chag me zhig gis/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun sang khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa shes nas/des glang po che'i 'dul mkhan a la mu tig gi do shal brgya stong ri ba byin nas smras pa//

khyim bdag cha ge mos dge sbyong ge'u tam nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig sang khyim du gdugs tshod la sngon dwangs kyis/de la khyed kyis glang po che nor skyong thad nug/des smras pa/'phags pa de bzhin du

bgyi lags kyis/'on kyang 'ol ba lha la yang mkhyen par mdzod cig/de nas lha sbyin rgyal po ma skyes dgru gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras so//khyed kyis ni bdag sangs rgyas/

nyid du gzhug ma nus na/khyod kyis yab srog dang phul nas rgyal srid la 'dug na/bdag gis kyang dge slong go'u ta ma bsad la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid byas/glang po chodan pa zher skyong rgod cig/ ma skyes dgras/
smras pa/ khyod kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nas rul ba rnams 'dul bar mdzad pa yin no zhes ma thos sam des sas pa//gal te ma dul ba 'dul bar yin par gyur na/'disa'i

zhig bdag kho na 'dul bar 'gyur grang zhes/ des de la 'ol byasnas nas/ glang po cher 'dul ma 'an rnams kyi drung du song ste smras pa/ lhal5nga bdag gse 'gi par byas kyis khyed kyis sang glang po che dam pa nor skyong

thod cage/ de nas glang po che'i 'dul mkhan rnams kyis/rgyal po'i khabakyi grong khyer du dril bsgrags pa/rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i grong mi shes ldan dag nyon cig/sang glang po che dam panor skyong gtong gis/de bas
na khyed cag ]thamasacad sang rang rang bsrung ba la sgrims shig/ ces bsgrags/ khyim bdagades thos nas/bdag 'dra bar gyur ngan pa bdag gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa// dge slong dge 'dun sang
byin du gdugs tshod la spyan drangasan/glang po chogadug pa nor skyong yad sang gtong na/bdagags sangs rgyas la sogs bdag slong gi dge 'dun ji ltar gdugs tshod gsol bar bya snyam ste/sams khongs
su chudacad 'dug go/yang basams pa/ g.yos byas la de nyid khyer te bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol le snyam nas des de nyid kyi nu mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon

byas nas/nang par sngar las te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song nas/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu dril bsgrags ba// sang glang po che dam pa der skyod gtong gis/ khyed cag kyang rang srung bal
sgrims shig ces mchis pas/ de bas na bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tum gshegs/ zhal zas dang btung po 'tshal te bdag 'di nyid du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsal pa/khye 2dag

khyod sogs las chung dur gyis 'ol/ zhal zas dang btung ba sta gon byas shig dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa na glang po che'i bsnyangs pa dang bral ba yin pas/nga nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig rgyal po'i
khab tu gshegs so//de nas khyim bdag de yid dga' nas/ rang gi khyim du song ste zhal zas dang btung ba sta gon bya/ gdan bshams nas bcom ldan 'das la sdod cing 'dug go/de nas bcom ldan 'das

snga dro na bza' chos gos mnabs lhung bzed bstsams te/dge slong lnga brgya dang thabs cig rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs pa na gang bo mi dayang nor skyong yang chad do// glang poche'i dam pa nor skyong gis/bcom ldan

'das rgyang po kho na nas mthong ngo//mthong nas kyang 'gying zhing skad phyud nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su mod la shugs ci yod pas bang thag ngas pa rgyugs so//de nas lha sbyin ma skyes dgu ri

grags can steng gi khang babrangs kyi gzhir 'dzags nas/dge sbyong gi go'u ta ma gsod pa la lta zhing 'dug go/ de nas lha sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das de mthong nas/ dga' ba dang/ mgu ba dang/ rab tu dga' bas gsang

bstod de/ tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/rlung po tsayas las bltas na/khyod ni glang chen mthus brdzis pas// shAkya'i bu khyod de ring du// nyan thes bcas te re snyam med//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
lha sbyin ngan byed pa la ni khyad bsad co 'dri smra bar byed// stobs bcu'i stobs ldan rmad byung ba'i/stobs bcu'i mthu la da ltos shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'dras kyi phug g.yas

pa'i mthal nas seng ge ral ba can lnga sprulale//des de rnams kyi dri tshor nas/ gcin dang stug pa shor ta 'bros par brtsams pa na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi zhabs kyi drung grang zhing bsil bar gyur
mgatogs par/ phyogs thams cadra 'bar 18/ tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ma lce gcig tu gyur par byin gyis brlabs so//de nas glang po che dam pa nor skyong phan tshun du brgyug par brtsams pa na/bcom
ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi rdung grang zhing bsil bar gyur pa ma gtogs par/phyogs thams cad 'bar/rab tu 'bar /kun tu rab tu 'bar te/me lce gcig tu gyur par mthong/ nor skyong khugs par mthong nas/

tsho dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ma gtogs par/rag song thams cad bros so//de nas nor skyong dregs pa'i shugs dang bral nas dal gyis 'gro ba'i 'gros kyis/ btsem ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba dang/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi phyaga'akher le dang/ bkra shis dang/ g.yu drung 'khyil pas brgyan pa// bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bskyed pa/ sgrig pa rnams dbugs 'byin par mdzad pas de'i mgo la byugs nas/tshigs

su'acad de bka' stsal ba/ glang chen gtso pi khazhimatho ma btsam/(glang chen de la mtho bo tsam sdug bsngal 'gyur// gtso la gnod pa byas ba pha rol tu// 'gro ba bzang por 'gyur ba ma yin no// bzhin bcos

tsha khyod ra zhig sngon gyi nyis bar gyur bas/dman ba dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes na khyod da dung gzhan gyi srog gcod cing/ gzhan gyi srog gcod pas yongs su dga' bar byed pa/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas khyed

kyi 'gro ba mir 'gyur/ skye ba ni gang tshe phyi ma ni spyir 'gyur/ bzhin bzangs de lta bas na 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ chos thams cad ni bdag med pa// myang n las 'das pa ni zhi ba yin gyis/
nga la sems mngon par dad par gyis la/ci nas kyang dud 'gro'i skye gnas la 'dud chags dang bral bar gyis shig ces bka' stsal nas/ khyim bdag gi khyim gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas gdan
bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so//nor skyong yang com ldan 'das kyi rjes bzhin rjes bzhin songaste/bcom ldan 'das nang du gshegs pa ni da sgo rud du sdod pa las/bcom ldan 'das ma ma theng nas khyim
gzhig par brtsams so// bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim de shel gyi rang bzhin du sprul nas/ de la sangs rgyas kyi sku sgrib pa med par snangang// dus bcom ldan 'das na rdod nas na bshig go/bcom
ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig gdugs tshod gsol nas/yon bsngo ba mdzad de gshegs so/de btso ldan 'das kyi rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du song ba'i skabs de// blon po rnams kyis rgyal po

la rag bar byas so// ma skyes dgras lha sbyin la smas pa/ khyod kyis bdag la gnod ba byas te/ glang po che dam pa 'di la brten nas/mtshams gzhan gyi rgyal po rnams kho bo la gnodapa byed par mi 'gyur na//
deya nga khyod kyis dul bar byas so//de cang mi smra bar 'dug ge/ rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das phyir byung bar gyur ba de ni tshe/glang po che dam pa nor
skyong ji ltar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin 'bad bar mi 'gyur bar sgo chod la zhog cig/ blon po rnams kyis glang cho 'dul mkhan rnams la bsgopo/grung bo che dam pa nel skyong ji ltar yang bcom
ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin 'gro bar mi 'gyur bar sgo chod la zhog cig/ das bcom ldan 'das ma mthong nas rdog pa sna brdzis nas shi ba dang/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes so//
!//'dul ba gzhi// bam ba brgya bzhi pa// chos nyid kyis lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo na skyes ring por ma lon par sems gsum skye bar 'gyur ta/gang nas nga'adzes/

ba dang/ gang du skyes pa dang/ las gang gis yin pa go/ des glang po tsholas shi 'phos pa dang/ rgyal chen bzhi'i 'os kyi lha rnams ku skyes pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa'i byas ba yin par mthong

nas/ de nas sngon glang po che byed byed pa'i lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/bdag zhig lon nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ ma la bdag gis zhag ma lon par bcom ldan

'dwal blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo// de nas sngon glang bo che byed byed pa'i lha'abu rna cha dri ma med cing g.yo ba thogs la do shal dang se mo dos lus brgyan nas/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha rnams

kyi ma tog ut+pal dang/ pad+ma dang/ ku mu da dang/ pad+ma dkar po dang/ man+da ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste 'od ma'i tsho la bya ka lan ta ka'i gnas thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar byas nas/ba com
ldan 'das la me tog gis btor te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin mkhyen nas/

gang thos bas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor yang dag par rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pas/ sngon gyi glang bo che lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la blta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mthong ba de shes kyi rdo
rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas tu/ bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjed pas ched du brjod pa/ btsun pa dag las ma bgyis ta/mas ma lags/ rgyal pos
malags/lha rnams kyis ma lags/ sdug pas ma lags kArang gi skyo bo dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma 'a gas/sngon gyi 'das pas ma lags/ dag sbyong dang bram khres ma lags pa gang lags pa de/ bcom ldan

'das kyis ba dag la mdzad de/khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskums/ rus pa'i ri bo lasazhi bsgral/ na song gi sgo rnams ni da kum/mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phyi/ bdag lha dang mi rnams ni bzhag/
yang gsol ba/khyod mthus rab draganyis pa mang ldan pa'i// zha song shul bkag bsod nams rab ldan pa'i// mtho ris 'gro ba phye zhing bdag gis ni// rgyang n 'das pa'i shul yang thob par gyur// shin tu
rnam dag khyod brten bdag gis ni// da de skyon bral dag pa'i mig thob cing// go 'phang zhi ba 'phags pa dgyes rdog ste// sdug ba sngal rgya mtsho 'ol rgal bar gyur//'gro ba ra lha yin/

i dang lhas mchod pa// skye dang rga dang na 'chi bral ba po// srid pa stong du mthong bar rab dka' ba// thub pa de ring khyod mthod 'bras bu mchis// de nas gdung byas de shul las 'byung bas// zhabs la phyag 'tshal

rangs pa skyes gyur nas// dgra thulagayas nas yongs su bskor byas te// lha yi 'jig rten na ngen phyogs mkha' la song// de nas sngon glang po che byad byed pa'i lha'i bus// tshong pa kha sngogs rnyed pa lta bu dang/ zhing pa la

tegalegs pa lta bu dang/ dpa' bo g.yul ngor rgyal ba lta bu dang/ nad pa nad thams cad las yongs su thar pa lta bur 'byor pa gang gis// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi

gnas su song ngo/ dge slong rnams nam gyi cha stod dang cha snyan la nyal bar rnal 'byor ba rjes su brtson pas gnas pa na/de rnams kyis gcem ldan 'dus kyi spyan snga nastsa ba rgya chen po mthong ngo// mthong
nas kyang yid gnyis su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum bcom ldan 'das la lta ba'i slad du/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/lha rnams kyi dbang po
brgya byin nam/'jig rten skyong ba bzhi mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag da blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ni mi mjed kyi bdag po tshaa pa dngam yin/lha rnams kyidabang

bobargya byin yang ma yin/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi yang ma yin te/ de lta mod kyi dge slong dag khyed kyis glang po che dam pa nor skyong zhes bya ba 'di ltar ga dugapa/ 'di ltar gdum pa des de bzhin gshegs pa bgrong

pa'i phyir pha rol gnon pa byas pa gang yin pa du mthong ngan/ btsun pa mthong lags so// ngas de btul nas da lta mngon par dad par byas tangag nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa yin te/
dmadang sum pa'i spyan sngar 'ongs nas/ sa de la chos bshad debaden pa mthong bar byas nas rang gi gnas su song ba yin no// dgeslong rnams the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad/
gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa nor skyong gis las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam pa ra smin pas dud 'gror skyes lags// las cishig bgyis na/ san rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi

lha rnams kyi nang du skyes nas bden pa mthong bar bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dag srong dag nor skyong 'di nyid kyis las tshog sarnyed pa// rkyen yodas su bsgyur ba/'dod pa bzhin du
nyi bar gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas zhes bya ba nas/lus can dga' 'bras bur 'gyur// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du// dge slong dag sngon

byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu rnams kyi tshe me nyi khro thuban/ 'jigarten du ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa// 'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes
bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa 'od srungs zhes bya ba byung ste/de grong khyer wA rA Na sir nye bar brten nas drang srong smra ba'i ri dgas kyi nags/
na zhugs so// de'i bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung skyo zhal ta byed pan/ dan 'di bslab pa'i gzhi bramo phra mo rnams la gus par ma byas pa de'i las kyi rnam par sminaras dud 'gror skye bar gyur to//dan
'dis dge 'dun la bkur sti byas pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa gang yin pa des babra' ba dang btung bathob par gyur to// nga lasams mngon par byas te shib gang yin pa des/ rgyalachon bzhi'i

ris kyi lha rnams kyin ng du skyes so// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs la rab tu byung nas/ klog pa dang gdon par byas shing phung po la mkhas par byas/khams la mkhas par byas/skye mtshon
la mkhas par byas/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas par byas bgungayonam dus lha 'gyur nas/ ngalas bden pa mthong bar byas so// rag slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa//
rnams kyi zhes bya ba nas las gcig tu dkar ba la brtsa la bar bya ste/ dge slong dgakhyedakyis de ltar bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i ba ragong na bzhin du'o// sdom ni dang pa gad
rgyas dbyung ba dang// ri dgas rul dang spre'u dang ni// glang po che dang bya lo dang// ba lang zla ba rdo ba dang/ glang chen wa dang bral ze'o// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te/ thatshem thams/
cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dag slong lnga brgyas yongs su btangan/tshodad ldan pa kun dga' bos yongs su mi btad pa gzigs/bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa// dag slong dag da ltar gyi 'du'i ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ji ltar 'das pa'i dus nayang kun dga' bo 'dis nga yongs su ma btang ba daton cig dge slong dag sngon byung ba mtsho chen po ma

dres ban ngang pa'i dpon po yul 'khor skyod nas bya bar gyur te/ de la bu gnyis yod da/ gang ba dang/ bzhin rgyus zhes bya ba ste/gang bani phu bo yin no// banargyas ni nu bo yin no// de gnyis las gang

bani gtum pa/ brlang ba/ gzu lums can zhig ste/ rtag tu ngang ba rnams la sdigs par byed de/ kha cig la na sgro 'byin/ kha cig la ni sngar gos rma 'byin par byed cing/ de lta bu dang gzhan yang gnod pa

brgya phrag dag byed de/ dad pa rnams nyi ma rer shing ngang ba rnams kyi dpon pa yul 'khor skyod gi gan du song ste rig par byed nas des bsams pa// gang ba gtum pa/ brlang ba/gzu lums can yin pas/ gal
te bdag gis 'di rgyal tshab la bzhag na/ bdag shin s 'dasangad ba'i tshogs bshig par 'gyur gyis de la thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam mo// das gang ba dang bzhin rgyas gnyis bkug nas bsgo ba/
'bab chu'i dong dang/ mtshodang/ mcho'u rnams bstas nas/ nga'i drung du thog mar su 'os pa de ngad pa rnams kyi dpon por gzhug go/ de gnyis kyang gcig la gcig 'gran pa'i phyir 'khor lnga brgya
lnga brgya dang deng ste/ de gnyis kyis phan tshun gyi 'dab chu'i deng dang/ mtsho dang/ mtshe'u rnams bltas nas/ mthar gyis grong khyer wA rA NA sir phyin to// de'i tshe grong khyer wA zla NA si na

[7 ]rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bde ba dang/ lelegs pa/ skye bo dad mi mang pos rab tu gang ban rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/ desawA rA Na si'i skyed mos tshul dang ha cang yang mi ring ba/

( zhig tutshangs ldan zhes bya ba'i rdzong mtshe'u bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa zhig bskor bcug ste/ derachu nas skyes pa'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs bskyed de// 'gram dad phyogs bzhi kun tu yang ma tog dang 'bras

bu'i shing stong phrag du ma bskyed do// der u t+pa la dang/ pad+ma dang/ ku mu da dang/ pad+ma dkar pos yog par byas shing/ shing tshang tshing du mas mdzes pa// bya sna tshogs mang po skad 'byin pa'i 'byor pa de lta bur

mthongs/ ngang ba gang ba 'khor lnga brgyas yongasasu bskor te babs nas/ ci dga' ba'i spyod pas rtse bar brtsams so// bzhin rgyus la yang rang gitshog sakyis smras pa/ khyed kyang bdas la rtse da mo gyis shig/ des

smras pa 1 re zhig rgyal srid grangs la de nas phyis leg ste rtse bar bya'o// zhes de ringes pa rings par song ste rgyal srid blangs so// da nas ngang pa lnga brgyas yongasasu bskor te wA rA NA sir 'ongs nas/ tshangs ldan gyi

rdzing bur babs te bag myong zhing bdag kyang shing gnas pas che bar brtsams te/ de de lhar bag yod pas gnas pa skye bo'i tshogs kyis mthong nas mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te/ skyes ngang pa'i dpon po mchog tu gzugs
bstan sdug pa gang nas 'dir 'ongs ti/ gzugs bzang pos chun rgyu ba'i 'dab chags thams cad zil gyis mnan nas/ tshad ldan gyi rdzi nga ga rgyan byed cad ga' par gnas shing 'jig rten dga' ba skyed

par byed de// wA rA Na sin gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang thos nas/ tshangs ldan gyi rdzing kun nas bskor te/ de'i gzugs bzang po dang bag skyong zhing gnasal la rtog cing khod do// blon

po rnams kyis/ rgyal po la smras pa/ lha dang pa rnams kyi dpon po zhig ga zhig nas 'dir mchis te/ dechodas ldan gyi rdzid du babs nas/ ngang pa brgya phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing gzugs bzadra pos
chab na rgyu ba'i 'dab chags thams cad zil gyis mnan nas 'jig rten dga' ba skyed cid bag skyong zhing ma lags so// rgyal pos smras pa// shes ldan dag gal te de lta na bu pa rnams khug cig/
de rnams kyis bkug ba dang/ rgyal pos bsgo ba/ shes ldan dgatshangs ldan gyi rdzing nadad pa'i dben pa gzugs mchog tu blta na sdug pa zhig ga zhi gnas 'ongs so zhes thos kyis/ khyed kyis da gcig du

rnyes ma snad par zung la nga la phul cig/ de rnams kyis de mchog tu zhi 'jam pos ma snodapar bzung ba dang/ des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ kho bo snyis ni dam par bzung zin te/ mi yi dbang du song bas kho bo la/

dpyad byar med kyis ngang pa'i tshogs ded de// ma dris par ni mar du 'dong bar gyis// ngang pa gcig gis lnga brgyar ma tshang bar bris so// gcig pu zhig rmisazin pa de nyid la mya ngan byed cing 'dug pa
[1 ]gad bya pa rnams kyis mthong nas mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes shing rgyal pos skug nas mabazung ma bsad de/ de rnams kyis dad pa'i dngon pa de khyer nas rgyal po'i drung du song ba dang/ nyishes/

ma bzung ba de yang chags pa'i snyisabazung bas rang nyid 'od s so// dang pa'i dpe rgyal po la phul ba dang/ rgyal pos smras pa// shes ldan gcig shes 'di ci'i phyir khyer te 'ongs/de rnams kyis spus pa/ lha

bdag cag gis 'di ma bzung ma btang med kyi/ rang nyid mchis lags so// rgyal po mchog tu ngo ma ra skyes nasasmras pa/ gdon mi bra bar 'di ni de'i chung ma yin pas 'ongs kyis/dang pa'i dbon po 'di dang/

spashug lhan tshug thong la khyod cag su ya nga 'di gnyis ma gsod cig/ bya pa rnams kyis smras pa// lha gzhan gyis lekum du mchis/ bka' stsal du gse/ rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba shesaldan rag dong

la grong khyer wA rA Na sir dril sgrogs su chug ste/ lha nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// nga'i yul na gnas pa sus kyang chu nas rgyu ba'i 'dab chang sa rnams na gsad cig ces skyobs shig/ de rnams kyis dri la bsgrags/

so[;]dag gleng dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus na ngang pa'i dpon po bzhin rgyas gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin ste// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi de'i chung ma gang yin pa de ni kun dga' bo ya'i no/dpang pa/gcig gis lnga

brgyar ma tshang ba gang 5na pa de na/dge slong lnga brgyar gcig gis ma tshad pa 'di dag nyid yin te/den yang 'di rnams ngad par gyur pa na nga yongs su btang ste/ kun dga' bo dang par gyur pas ni nga yongs su ma btang ngo/ nga lta
03 yang nga 'di dag gis yongs su btang gi/ dge slong kun dga' bos ni yongs su ma gtang// dge slong dag gzhan yang ji ltar 'di dag gis nga bongs su btangan/ dge slong kun dga' bos/

yongs su ma btang ba de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer wA rA NA si na rgyal po gad rgyangs can zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bde ba dang/ la legs pa//skye bo dang mi mang pos rab rtagang ba na rgyal

srid byed du 'jug go/de la blon pa lnga brgya yod de/de rnams kyi mthus mtshams kyi rgyal po rnams kyis zil gyis mi non no// jitsam na lho phyogs kyi lamanas bya ma bum gyi dbyug gu can zhes bya ba dmag stong thub pa zhig

'ongs nas da blon po gzhan zhig gis rgyal po la phul te/ lha bya ma bum gyi dbyu gu can zhes bgyi ba dmag stong thub pa 'di lha'i slad du lho phyogs kyi shul nas mchis kyis/ lhas 'di yongs su gzung ba'i rigs so/

rgyal pos de yongs su bzung nas langs byed kyi bgo bsha' yang byas so// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal pa gad rgyangs can gyi yul gzhan gyi rgyal po rnams mthu dang dpung chen par gyur te/de rnams dpung gi tshogs

yan lag bzhi pa gang pa mo'i tshogs dang/ rta pa'i tshogs dang/ shing rta pa'i tshogs dang/ dpud bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas/ rgyal po gad rgyangs can dang g.yul sprad pa'i phyir 'ongosaso//rgyal po gad rgyas/

ma gyis kyang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bashrI pe/ glang po che'i tshogs dang/ rta pa'i tshogs dang/ shing rta pa'i tshogs dang/ dpung bu chung gi tshogs gar sten nas sa gzhan gyi rgyal po rnams dang g.yul sprad pa'i
'phyir sngags te bsu'o// rgyal po gad rgyangs can gyis sa gzhan gyi rgyal po rnams bcom/ byed par byas/ thag bcug/ 2ma bar byas/ rgyab kyis bltas par byas te/rang rang gi yul du red/
ngod rnams sud yang 'dus nas/ rgyal po gad rgyangs can gyi blon po lta pa lnga brgya la khyed cag tshur shegacig dang/ khyed cag la les sprod ches khyad par du 'thags pa dag gis bgo bsha' bu'ozhes yo

byad kyis kha drangs pa dang/ de rnams kyis khas blangs so// de nas sa gzhan gyi rgyal po rnams kyis slar yang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi po/ glang po'i tshogs dang/ rtapa'i tshigs dang/ shing rta pa'i tshegs

dang dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas// rgyal po gad rgyangs can dang g.yul sprad pa'i phyir 'ongs so// rgyal po gad rgyangs chen gyis kyang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi po/ glang po che'i tshig gas dang rta pa'i

tshogs dang/ shing rta pa'itshogs dang/ dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas/ sa gzhan gyi rgyal po rnams dang g.yul sprad pa'i phyir spags rta bsu'i / 'gad rgyangs can gyi shun pa lnga brgya g.yul sprod pa na phyi
legs nas bya ma bum gyi dbyug gu can dmag stong thub dang lhan cig g.yul 'gyed par brtsams pa/ rgyal pos mthong bas bag tsha bar gyur pa dang bya ma bum gyi dbyug gu can dmag stong thub kyis rigs
su bcad de smras pa/ khyodan bya ma bum gyi dbyug/ grogs po gcig pus ma btang gi/ yun ring ponas gnang ba yi// grogs po kun gyis khyod btang ngo// des de dag thams cad kha btagago dag slongs/

ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshod 'i dus kyi rgyal po gad rgyangs can gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bya ma bum gyi dbyug gu can gang yin pa de ni kun dga' bo yin na// blon pa lnga brgya po gang yin
pa de dga'i dge slong lnga brgya po 'di dag nyid yin te/ den yang 'di dag gis nga yongs su btang ngo//da ltar yang 'di dag gis nga yongs btang gi/ kun dga' bos na yongs su ma btang ngo//
gzhan yang ji ltar 'di dag gis nga yongs su btang gi/ kun dga' bos yongs su ma btang ba de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba byang chung sems dpa' mas pa'i phung po la gnas pan/ri'i phyogs shig

na ri dgas kyi dpon po seng gar gyur te/ de'i lhag ma bra bawA lcabargya rjes bzhin du 'brang zhing ra la nye bar brtenate gnas so//sang ges srog chags rnams bsad de sha'i dam pa dang khrag gidam pa 'thungs nas bor

ta'agrobs/de rnams de lta bu s dus ring ma zhig 'das par gyur to//jitsam na dus gzhan zhigan ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge mtshan mo srog chags tshel ba na khron par lhung ba dang/ wu lnga brgya po de rnams las wa lnga

brgyar gcig gis mtshad ba soso'adong ste/wa gcig pu zhig sang ga la rtog cing khron pa'i khar 3dug ste/ gang gis na 'di phyin par 'gyur ba'i thabs de ba yod snyam sems shing/ de khron pa'i nye 'khor phan tshun sod

ba las/jitsam na khron pa dang ha cang yang ma ring ba zhig na mtshe'u zhig mthong nas/des brtags nas phye gos gcig nas 'og brus bcug ste khron par mtshe'u'i chus bkang ba dang/ seng ge rang nyid byung bar gyur te//lhas tshig
su bcad de smras pa/stobs che ba 'am gzhan yang rung/ grogs po dag tu bya dgos te// wasan khron ba rnying pa nas//seng ge phud bar gyur la ltos//dgeslong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus//

gyis da ge gang yin pa de nang nyid yin no//de'i tshe de'i dus kyi wa la gcig pu de ni dge slong kun dag bo yin no//wa gcig gs lnga brgyar ma tshang ba gang yin pa de ni dge slong lnga brgya po 'di nyid yin te/den yang 'di dag gis nga
yongs su btang gi/ kun dga' desan yongs su ma btang ngo
da ltar yang 'di dag gis nga yongs su btang gi/ kun dga'i bisan yongs su ma btang ngo// gzhan yang ji ltar 'di dag gis nga yongs su

btang na/kun dga' bos yengs ma btang ba de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba byang chub sems dpa' ma nges pa'i phung pa la gnas pa na phyogs shig na ri dgas lnga brgya'i dgas kyi dpon por gyur to// ji tsam na/
rngon pa zhig gis ri dgas rnams bsher ba'i phyir mdzol dang/ ni dang
rnying rab tu mang po dag btsugs so// ri dgas kyi dpon po de bag skyong zhing gnas pas/'kher lnga brgya dang ri dgas kyi nags rgya shing/ ra ri dwags

cig ri dgas dam pa 'bad mdzod cig/ des kyang tshigs su bcad de smas ba/ rmig pa sar btsugs then kyang ni// 'brong pa rnyi ni dam po yis// bdag gi rkang par 'am smras kyi// gcad mi nus na ci byar yod// de nas na

pa de mda' dang gzhu lagan thogs shing/ gos dur smrig bgos nas phyogs der phyin te//ri dgas mi des ngon pa de ri dgas kyi dpon po gsad pa'i phyi'i sgrim pas nye bar 'ong ba mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang ris pa
rings par tshigs su bcad de smras pa/rnyi 'di gang gis btsugs pa yi//ngon pa 'di ni mchis lags kyis// skal chen pa ni 'bad mdzod cig/ ri dgas dam pa 'bad mdzod cig/ des kyang tshigs su bcad de

smras pa/ rmig pasar btsugs thon kyang ni/'breng pa'i ri na dam po yis// bdag gi rkang par rab smras kyi// gcad mi nus na ci byar yod//de nas ri dgas ma de snying stong nas/ rngon pa de'i mdun du mngon du song

ste de la bsnyen nas tshigs subacad de smras bu/ sho pa gzhun pheb mdzod la// jon pa ral gri glang mdzad de// thog mar bdag khum de nas ni// ri dgas dpen pa la mdzod cig/ de nas rngon pa de ngo mtshar gyis bsdus/

pa'i zlos smras pa/ 'di khyod kyi cir 'od/ des smras pa/khyim thab do//des de la tshigs su bcad de slar smaa pa bdag gis khyod kyang mi gsad la// ri dgas dpon po'ang mi gsad par// snying du sdug pa'i khyim thab

dang// khyodan lhan cig 'grogs por bya// des kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ji ltar rjen pa dag dang ni// sdug pa'i khyim thab dga' ba ltar// de bzhin rngon pa gnyen kun dang// lhan cig tu na dga' gyur/
cig/ de nas don pa de lhagapar yang de mtshar skyes nas/ ri dgas de bkrol nas lhan cig dang de// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi ri dgas kyi dpon po gang yin

pa de ni nga nyid yin na// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi ri dgasumo gang yin pa de ni kun dga' bo yin no// ri dgas gcig gis lnga brgyar ma tshang ba gangayin pa de dag/ dge slong gcig gis lnga brgyar ma tshang ba 'di dag nyid
yin te/ den yang nga 'di dag gis yongs su btang gi/ kun dga' bos na yongs su ma btang ngo// da ltar yang d 'di dag gis yongs su btad gi/ dge slong gun dga' bos na yi ngas su ma btang nge//
pa// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa lha phyin rus pa rnyed pa dang/ bkur sti rul pa/sa bcom pa la gzigs bcom ldan 'das

@# kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang rul da 'di rnyed pa dang/ bkur ste rul pas bcom pa de nyon cig/ dag slong dag sngon byung ba'i 'a'i phyogs

gcig gcig na pad+ma'i rdo nga chen po zhig yodad/ de dang nye ba na grung po rmo zhig gnas so// phyogs gzhan zhigan wa zhig kyang gnas so// jitsam dus gzhan zhig na glang po che pad+ma'i rdzing denas chu'athungs nas
'gro ba dang/ wa 'ong ba des glang po chol smras pa// 'thab ma bya 'am/ lam las 'dzur/ glang po chos basams pa/ rul pa nyon mongs pa spyi brtol can 'di/ gal te bdag gi rkang las ches sam/
0 snas sam/ mche bas bsadan/ mi gtsang bas ma rung bar 'gyur bas/ mdor na rul pa 'di ni rul pa kho nas gsad do snyam du bsams nas/ tshig gas su bcad de smras pa/ khyed ni rkang lag gis mi
gsad// mche bas ma yin snas min te// rul pa rul pas gsad bya bas// khyod ni rdul pas gsad par bya// glang po chos bsams pa// lam bzur te song dang gdon mazo bar 'di bdag gi rjes bzhin 'od
ngo snyam nas/ des lam bzur nas myur ba myur bar song ba dang/ las bsams pa/ tshig tsam khe nas bdag gis 'di bcom pa yin te/ des myur ba myur bar bros so snyam nas dang de'i rjes bzhin
rjes bzhin khAs pa dang/ glang po ches nye bar 'ongs par shes nas shugs drag pos de'i steng du rtug pa bor bas phog nas shi bar gyur to// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshu de'i dus
kyi wa gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin 'di nyid yin te/ den yang rul pa 'di rul pas btsem me// da ltar yong rul pa 'di rnyed pa dang bkur sti rul pas bcom me//gzhan yang dge slong
rnams the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs pas rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang lags pa de dag ni/
'khorapa 'jigs pa chen po las legs par brgal bar gyur la/ lha sbyin gyi lta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang lags pa de dag ni tshul ma lags pas ma rung bar gyur pa la gzigs/ bcom/
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma grad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na ya nga nga'i tshig nyan pa gang yin pa re rag ni 'jigs pa chen

palas thar la/ lha sbyin gyi tshig nyan pa gangayin pa de dag ni tshul ma yin pas ma rung bar gyur pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung bar 'or zhag dang nya ba me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ chu phun sum tshogs pan spre'u/

tshogs kyi dpon po gnyis shig gnas te/ re re la ya nga 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgya yod do// de na tshogs kyi da na pa rige shes gnyid leg pa'i rmi lam na/ bdag gson pa nyid du 'khor lnga brgya dang zangs su
bcug par mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang skug/ sngangasu/ byed de skyo dung zhes byed nas/ nam da ma nangs te nangs pa dang/ spre'u rnams bsogs tu rmi lam bzlas par brtsams pa// shes
ldan dag mdang sum ngas rmi lam ngan pa zhig mthong gis/ gnas 'di nas 'di'i 'dong ngo// spre'u rnams kyis smras pa// dwabazhin du bgyis te 'bres par bgyi'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams
tsit+tAni rmi lam rno ba yin pas/ bdag nyid chen pa dos tshogs kyi dpon pa tsag shos la smras pa/ bdag gis rmi lam 'di 'dra ba rmis nas 'dong na/ gzhan du 'deng ngam/ de yid ma ches nas
smras ra// ci rmi lam du rmis so cog bden pa ra 'gyur ram/ gal te khyod 'gro na song zhig/ khe ba no sbed yul chos yangs par 'gyur bas mi 'gro// res de yid ma ches par rig nas/ bdag nyid
kyi gos red de dang ngo// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na ri 'ord na bun ma ldog thango sa rje bu ma ltos pas lug cig 'khyam zhing phyogs der phyin nas/ de nas de dag brda' bar brtsams pa dang/ des/
'gal dum gyis bsnan pas me 'bar bzhin rgyal pa'i gung pa che'i bris su zhugs pa dang/ 'bar ba des glang po che'i bres bsregs te glang po che mang po zhig tshig go/ rgyal pos sman pa bkug ste
smras pa/ glang po cho mes tshig pa rnams la dpyad du ye/ spyan pa de'igs kyi zhing spre'u rnams kyis ma rung bar byas pas/ des bsams pa// spre'u 'di rnams la shar gnyer ba'i dus la bab ba
snyam du bsams nas smras pa/ lha spre'u'i zhig gis glang po che rnams la bskus na ses par 'gyur ro// rgyal pos chen pa rnams la bsgo ba 1 shes ldan dag spre'u'i zhag sta gon gyis shig/ de
rnams kyis kyang rngon pa rnams la bsgo ba dang/ rjen pa rnams kyis ri zer gyi phyogs 'khoron gnas pa'i spre'u thams cad bzung staphul lo/ sman pa yun ring po nas sha len rjes su 'brel bas gson pa
nyid du'angs su bcug go/ lhas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ grong rdal dang na grong khyas na// mimathun yod par gnas mi bya// lug dang bran me ma mthun pas spre'u rnams dag brlag par gyur// dge

slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi 'u tshog sakyi dpon po rmi lam rno ba gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi tshogs kyi dpon po ge shos gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin 'di nyid
g.yin te/ de na yang nga'i tshig nyan pa gang yin pa de dag ni 'jigul chen pa las thar ro// lha sbyin gyi tshig nyan pa gang yin de dag ni tshul ma yin pas ma rung bar gyur to// da ltar yang

ka nga'i ltaba'i rjes sumathun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni 'khor ba'i rdzogs pa chen po las rab tu thar ro//lha sbyin gyi lta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshul ma yin pas sa rung
gzhan yang nga'i lta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag nibade legs su deng bar gyur cing/ lha sbyin gyi lta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshul ma yi/

pas sdug bsngal du gyur pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba phyogasashigan/ spre'u'i tshogs kyi dpon po 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgya pa gnyis shig gnas so// den cig shog tshogs dang lhan cig ljongs

su deng ste/ rim gyis ri 'or zhig tu phyin pa dang/ ri 'o' ra ni shing kim pa ka zhes bya ba 'bras bus yal ga g.yur za bar 'dug nas// spre'u rnams kyis tshogs kyi dpon po ljon shing lhag par 'bus bu chagasatsapa
babus bus yalag g.yur za bzhig mchis kyis/ skol nub pa 'bras bu rnams gsol lo// tshogs kyi dpon pos shing de la bta/ sa nas/ tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ grong gi drung na 'dug kyang ni//
byis pas 'di la ma zes pas/ rjes su rangs pa na shing 'di yi// 'bras bu bsngor mi rung bar nges// zhes smras nas dngango// tshogs kyi dpen pa cig shes kyang/ tshogs de nyid kyi rjes bzhin rjes/

[4]]bzhin 'khur nas// rim gyis ra 'or du byin pa dang/ spre'u rnams kyisakim pa ka'i ljon shing de mthong nas/ de rnasas kyis tshogs kyi dpon po la smras pa/ tshegs kyi dpon po ljon shing gi 'bras bu mchis/
kyis/ sgol dub pa 'a bras bu rnams la gsol la bde bar bzhudad// des smras pa// legs kyis de bzhin du gyis shig/ de rnams kyis zos pa dang/ thams cad tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to//

dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi tshogs kyirapon po dang pa pa gang yin pa re ning nyid yin no/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi tshogs kyi dpon po gnyis pa shos gang yin pa re ni lha sbyin 'di nyid

yin te/ de na yang nga'i lta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni bde legs su deng ngo// lha sbyin gyi lta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to/

da ltar yang nga'i lta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni bde legs su 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po las brgal la// lha sbyin gyi lta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshul ma
ma yin pas ma rung bar gyur to// gang gi tshe lha sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das la bkrongs pa'i phyir rdo bayangs pa de'i tshe/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'khrugs nas/ lha sbyin gsad
kyis 'dang nge zhes byas pa dang/ 'jig rte/ni mdza' ba dang/ mi mdza' ba dang 2 bar ma dag yod pas/ gzhan zhig gis lha sbyin la sbran na/ de skag nas shing drung zhig tu brten te spyod lam
zhi bas 'dug go/ de rnams kyis de ltar spyod lam zhi de mthong nas/ de rnams kyis smras pa// shes ldan dag lha sbyin bdag nyid chen po 'di bcom ldan 'das bkrongs par ga la
'gyur 1 kha cig gis bdag cag bsus kyis tshu ra 'deng nge zhes de rnams dong nge// dge slong rnams kyis lha sbyin de ltabu'i spyod lam gyis gnas pas/ des na grong mi 'khrugs kyang ma bsad de zhes rjes
tshe nas/ de rnams the tshom skyes te/ tha tshem thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhu sar// btsun pa lha'i sbyin gyi chos lta bu'i sgo nas 'jig rten bsus pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag de ltar gyi'adi 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na ya nga 'das chos lta bu'i sgo nas byi ba rnams srid pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba phyogs

wi shig na/ bya ba rnams kyi rnyogasakyi dpe no pa 'kher lnga brgya pa zhig gnas so// phyil me skyes zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de gzhon pa'i gnas skabs na phyogs gang du gnas pa'i nye 'khor du dag phyib
thams cad bsad do// de yang dus gzhan zhig na rgas par 'gyur te/ rgas pas pha rol gnod pas byi sa gshung nus nas// ris bsams pa/ sngon bdag gzhon pa'i gnas skabs nani/ pha rol
gnon pas phyi ba 'dzin nus na da ni mi nus te/ 'on kyang thabs shig bshoms la brda' no snyam nas/ 'jab cing 'jab cing phyi ba rnams btsal bar brtsa mas te/ des brtsal pa na bya ba lnga

0brgya'i tshogs yod par shes nas/ da spyi ba de rnams kyi khud bu dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tungan g.yo'i dka' thub kyis dka' thub byed pa na/ byi ba rnams phan tshun 'khyam pas spyod lam zhi bas gnas
pa de mthong nas/ de rnams kyis rgyang ring por 'dug nas smras pa// zhang po ci byed/ des snas pa// 'o go gzhon pa'i gnas skabs na bsod nams ma yin pa mang du byas pa/ de bad par bya/

ba'i phyir dka' thub spyod de// de rnams kyis 'dis dam pa ma yin pa'i chos sdig pa spangs so zhes/ de la chos kyi rgyu las byang ba'i dad pa skyes par gyur to// de rnams de la nyi ma re re zhing bskor
ba byas nas khung du 'jug pa na/ des de rnams kyi nang gi tha ma bzung zhing bzung zhing za'o// ji tsam na tshogs de 'gribs naso/ tshegs kyi debon pos bsams pa// bdag gi byi ba rnams ni nyud
bar gyur la/ bya la 'di ni nyam skyes par gyur pas/ 'di lta rgyu zhigayod par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ des byi la de la brtag par brtsams pa dang/ ji tsam na rtug pa spu can mthong nas/ des
bsams pa// gdon mi za bar 'a dis byi ba rnams bsad par gyur gyisaM/ ma la bdag gis 'di mngon sum du bab par bya'o snyam nas/ res de mi mngon pa'is nas brtag pa lhur lenacing gnas pan/
ji tsaman des/ des de tha ma'i byi ba za ba mthong nas/ de de logs su song ste rgyang ring por 'dug nas/ tshigs su bcad de snus pa// zhang po'i yan lag rgyas gyur cing// bdag
gi tshegs ni gribs gyur la// 'bras bu rtsa ba bya ba yi// cug pa spu can la 'byung bas// dka' thub 'di chos dka' thubanan// dka' thub 'din don phyir te// byib rnams

ni 'grib 'gyur bas// ma skyes khyod ni bkra shis shog/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'idus kyi bya la me skyes zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ de'i de'i dusan lha sbyin yin te/ de na yang
'dis chos lta bu'i sgo nas bya ba rnams bros sa// da ltar yang 'dis chos lta bu'i sgo nas 'jig rten bsdus so// dag srong rnams tha tshapa skyes te/ thatshos thams chud gcodang/
sangs rgyas dem bladas la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi gabrigs nga 'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang lags pa de dag bde ba dang legs par 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa las brgal cing/
ya lha sbyin gyi lta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang lags pas sngag bsngal bar gyur pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar gyi'adi 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/
'das pa'i dus na yang nga'i lta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ bde ba dang legs par 'brog dgon pa las thar la/ lha sbyin gyi lta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa

gang yin pa de dag ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba tshong dpon gnyis shig shing rta lnga brgya lnga brgya dang lhan cig tshong sgyur zhing dgon pa'i lam
na/ zhib tu zhugs te/ de gnyis dgon pa'i lam zhig tu phyin nas/ gling rnams res 'ga'ani tshu nyud/ res 'ga'i na chu nyung/ res 'ga' na mid do// de nas tshong pa de glang rnams dang bcas te/
lhag par dub pas sdug bsngal gyis dgon pa'i lam du zhugs pa las/ phyogs shig na gsidam dad chu phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas tshong pa rnams kyis der glong rnams btud 2 rang rang khrus

byas nas chu mang du 'thungs so// de nas gling chu nyungs pa dang rtsa nyungs pas yongs su dugapa de rnams kyis rtswa 'grangs par thos chu 'thungs te ngal bsos pa dang/ de rnams kyi nang na gleng gtso bo
gang yin pa des de rnams la shes par byas pa/ shes ldan dag bdag cag rtsa nyung du dang chu nyung dus yongs su dud pa las/ phyogs 'din gsing ma dang chu phun sum tshogs pa yin gyis/ gal
te khyed cag 'dod na 'di nyid du theg te 'dug par bya'o// glang gtso bo tsag shos kyis/ rang gi tshogs rnams la smras pa// shes ldan rag mi rnams ni mthu dang ldan zhing gdul dka' ba 'dul
bar byed pa yin gyis gnod pa 'thob par 'gyur du 'ongs bas/ bdag cag khal ji ltar bkal bde bzhin du khyer cig/ de skad ces smras pa dang/ glang gtso bo tsag shes khros
nas cang gi tshogs rnams la sbas pa/ 2 shes ldan dag zla ba'i rgyab sus mthong/ 'di dag khal khyer la 'og/ yu bus ni mi der ro/// ji tsaman tshong pa rnams kyis grung rnams
bstod par brtsams pa na/ glang de rnams phya lang byed cing 'dug pa dang/ tshong pa rnams kyis mang du brdegs shing zug gzer bu can gyis gzhus pas khrag 'dzag cing
shing rta dang sbyar ro// gzhan na cang ma byed par khal mnos pas de dag la cung zad kyang ma byas so/ lhas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gling gas pa lang 'di dag na/ leg pa drug tu gtams pas na
rgyadag 'byung zhing khrag 'dzag la// ltogs shange skom par ldan pa ltos/ glang gis b.lang 'di dgano// legs pa dag tu gtams pas na// de rnams dgon pa las brgal nas// bsil ba'i chu la 'thung

ba ltos// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi klong gtso ba legs par ston pa gang yin pa denang na yon no// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi grung gtso bo slu bar byed pa gang yin pa de zha lha snyan 'di nyid/
man te/ de nayang nga'i tshig nyan pa gang yin pa de dag na bde ba dang/ legs par dgon pa las brgal la/ lha sbyin gyi tshig nyan pa gang yin pade dag ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur to//

daltar yang nga 'i lta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni bde ba dang legs par 'khor ba'i 'brog dgenakha nas brgyal la// lha sbyin gyi lta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang yin bde/
ts+tso dag tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to/ dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa lha sbyin blun
[%]zhing 'khor blun pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//dge slong dag de ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yad lha sbyin lhun zhing 'khor blun pa de
nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba dgon pa'i gnas shig na spre'u'i tshogs shig gnas te/ de 'khyam pa na khron par zla ba'i gzugs bar n shar ba mthong nas/ tshogs kyi de pon pos smras pa//
shes ldan dag zla ba khron par lhungo gas/ 'dzig rten zla ba med par bya 'am ci byung ngo
de rnams kyis smras pa/ legs kyis dbyung ngo// de rnams kyis gros bya bar brtsams la// de ji ltar dbyung
bar bya/ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ de ci mngeshes sam/ spre'u brgyus la dbyung yod ces/ de rnams kyis spre'u brgyus te/ dang po pas shing gi yal ga la 'jus nas/ de'i mjug ma la gzhan gyisaM
'dus shing/ de la yang gzhan byas 'dus te/ de bzhin du thams cado'ajus pas/ yal ga lhag par g.yur zosaso// chu klongos pa dang zla ba'i gzugs brnyan yang mi mngon par gyur/ yal ga yang chag
nas thams cad khron par lhung ste/ tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to/ lhas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/'on blun pagang dag la/ 'dren pa blun po yod gyur pa/ de dag thams
'di blun zhing 'khor blun pa yin no// de ltar yang 'du blun zhing 'khor yang blun pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyatshol mgon med zas
sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis las byas shing tshogs rnyed pa 3rkyen yongs su bskyar ba/ 'od pa
bzhin du khyu bar gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las rtag byas shing bsags pas/ nga nyid kyisalas byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhag gas so sor myong bar 'gyur//
las byas shing bsags pa dag ni// phyi rol gyi sa'ikhams la rnam par smin par ma 'gyur zhes bya ba nas/ lus cad dag la 'bras bur 'gyur/ zhes bya ba'i bar gang ma bzhin du'o// gdon mi
za bar lha sbyan gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge 'dun 'byed par 'gyur ro// rgyu lngas na dge 'dun phyed par mi 'gyur te/ re zhig dang par sangos rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung ba'i tshe dge 'dun 'bye bar
ma'agyur do/ kye ma'i grogs po dag sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung zhes grag go zhes/ 'jig rten de la phyogs pasaso// ston pa yongs su mya ngan 'das na dge dun 'du bar ma 'gyur te/
gang la la zhig 'di skad du/ nga nyidi ston pa yin no zhes zer no/ de la gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das zhal bzhugs shadi 'tshol gzhes pa de'i tshe khyod gar song zhes brjod par zad pas so// lta ba'i
nyis ba dang tshul khrims kyi nyes pa ma byung ba'i tshe dang/ nyan thos zung mchog tu ma bstan pa'i tshe dge 'dun 'bye bar mi 'gyur te/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge 'dun bye ba gdon mi za bar nyan thos
zung gis sdums byed pas so// mtshams ma bcad pa na dge 'dun bye bar ma 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtshams kyi nang du dge 'dun 'phye bar 'gyur/ mtshams kyi phyi rol tu ni

ma yin no/[”]/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ nganodage slong gi dge 'dun skyon med pa las tshul khrims kyi skyon dang lta ba'-i skyon gyi skyon byung ste/ tshul khrims kyi skyon na ka lan ta
ka'i bu ba zang sbyin las byung ngo/ lta ba'i skyon yang dge slong 'chi ltas kyi byung bas/ gdon mi za bar lha sbyin gyis dgo 'dun 'byed par 'gyur gyis/ ma la nga rgyal po'i khab tu dbyar
bzhugs par dam bca' 'o snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ slob pa dang mi slob pa'i gang zag rnams dang thabs cig rgyal po'i khab tu gshegasan/ lha sbyin
gyis dge 'dun gyi dbyen bya bar ma zhus kyis/ ma la da so so'i skya bo dge ba'i gang zag rnams dang thabs cig 'gro'o snyam ste/ man yod du ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas/ rim

gro byed pa tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin dang/ dge slong lnga brgya dang thabs cig tu rgyal po'i khab gang na ba de ra rgyu zhing gshegs te/ rim gyis shang gshegasaM pan rgyal po'i khab tu byon no//
bam po brgya lnga pa// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khaba'od ma'i tshul bya ka lan ta ka gnas
par dbyar bzhugs par zhal gyis bzhes so// de'i tshe mu ge nyam nga ba dgon pa slong mo bas zas rnyed par dka' ba byung ngo/ de na bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la 'aka' stsal pa//

ts+tso dge slong dag nga dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po 'di la nang du yang dag 'jog par bzhed kyis/ bsod snyoms stobs pa dang gso sbyong sde de kyi tsho ma gtogs par dwage slong dag su yang nga'i spyan sngar ma 'ong
zhig/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis kyang khrims sub cas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po 'di la bsod snyoms stobs pa dang gso sbyong de nyid kyi tshe ma gtogs pa ba com ldan
'das la blta ba'i phyir bdag cag su yang 'gro bar ma bye'o zhes bcas so/ de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ba'i bu dang mo'u 'gal gnyis ni/ lho phyogs kyi ra la dbyar gnas par dam bcas so// lha
sman gyis zla ba gsum du dge slong gi dge 'dun la chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang/ gnas mal dang/ nad kyi rkyen gyi yo byad rnams kyis bstabs te/ zla ba gsum 'das pa dang/ des dge
slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag dge sbyong ko'u ta ma'i nyan thos rnams la 'di skad ces/ dge slong dgon pa pa nyid kyis ni reg pa dang/ grol ba dang nges par 'byung ba dang//
bde ba dang/ sdug bsngal las 'da' ba dang/ bde ba dang/ sdug bsngal las 'das pa yang thob par 'gyur ro// bsod snyoms pa nyid dang/ phyag dar khrod pa nyid dang/ chos gos
gsum pa nyid dang/ bla gab med pa nyid na deg pa dang/ grol ba dang/ nges par 'byung ba dang bde ba dang/ sdug bsngal las 'das pa dang/ bde ba dang/ sdug bsngal las 'das
pa thob par 'gyur 'o zhis rtso chad kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gang su dag btsal zhugs kyi gzhi po 'di dag ma 'deng la nga mi
las ring du 'gyur/ thag ring du 'phyur gyis/ de tshul shing long zhig ces byas pa dang/ dgeslong lnga brgyas tshul shing blangs te/ lha sbyin stan las langs te song ba'i rjes bzhin rjes

bzhin du dge slong lnga brgya 'brang ngo// tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin sgo na 'dug pa des de dag lha sbyin gyi rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du 'brang ba mthong nas rjes smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ci'i phyir
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spangs te/ sdig pa 'dod pa 'di'i rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du 'brang/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sgra
gcan zani mu ge'i dgon pa nyam nga ba 'di 'dra ba khyung na/ bcom ldan 'dasan ma snang ba na bzhugs te/ bdag cag lha sbyin gyi mthus srog dang ma bral mod/ gal te lha sbyin gyis zla ba gsum du
dge slong gi dge 'dun mag sos par gyur na/ dag snyingagacig kyang ma/son par mi 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe lha spun gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
mthun pa phye ba de 'i tshe/ sa chen pa 'di g.yos par gyur/ skur mad ngo sgrung/ phyogs rnams dmar por gyur/ bar snang lha rnams rdza'i sgra mo dbyin/ des da la ma zhugs pa rnams nges
pa la mi 'jug/ 'bras bu ma 'thob/ 'ded tsha ba sa dang dra la bar mi 'gyur/ brog pa rnams zad par mo 'gyur/ lung ma 'bogs/ ma klog/ ma don/ mdo sde dang/ 'du khang
dang chos mngon pa 'dzin pa dang/ dgan pa pa rnams mdo sde dang/ 'dul ba dang/ chos mngon pa dgon par sems pa la rab tu sbyor bar ma byed/ nyan thos kyi byang chub kyi sa bon skyed/
par ma byed rung/ rang sa ngas rgyas kyi byang chub kyi ma yan la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ma yin no// lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'gro ba yang 'khrugs par gyur to//
stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na chos kyi 'khor lo rgyun chad de/ sems can gyi rgyud la mi 'byung ngo// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang me 'u 'gal gyi bus bsan sa daM/ mi'i
phyir sa chen pa 'di g.yos par gyur snyam mo// dgra bcom pa rnams ni ma bsams par shes pa mthong ba mi 'jug pas/ de gnyis kyis bsams pa la zhugs na/ lha spyan gyis bcom
ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun phye bar thong nas/ de gnyis 'di snyam du sems te/ sang la bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun slar bsdums bya'o snyam mo// de nas tshe
dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu dang mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pa dbyar gyi zla ba gsum pa dag 'dis nas chos gos byas pa dang ldan/ chos gos zin pa dang ldan nas/ chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs te/

rgyal po 'khab gang na ba der rgyu zhing dong nas/ rim gyis rgyu zhing dong pa dang/ rgyal pa'i khab tu phyin te// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang mo'u 'gal gyi bus tshes gos dang lhung bzed ma khos
su phab nas/ rkang pa gnyis bkrus te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ngo// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin sgo na 'dug go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyis/ tshe dang
ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// mkhan pa lha sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun phye'o// des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa bdag rug don 'di kho na'i phyir/
'ongasakyis/ khyod sems las chung ngur gyis shig/ slar bsdums bya'o zhes smras nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang mo'u 'gal gyi bus 'di skad ces gsol
te bdun po bdag dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun bye ba spar spyams bgyid du mchi'o// b.rem ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu dang
mo'u 'gal gyi bu dag legs so legs so// gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun bye ba slar sdums byed pa de ni bsod nams mang ba tshad chod cing grangs med pa skyed
