bar 'gyur ro// dper na 'gang zhig gis skra dum bu brgyar gtubs pa 'phro dang 'phrar sbyar bar byed pa de bzhin du/ gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa 'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun bye ba slar sdumA
byed na de ni bsod nams mang ba tshad med cing grangs med pa skye bar 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu dang mo'u 'gal gyi bu gang zag bzhi po 'di dgan tshangs pa'i bsod nams bskyed par 'gyur ro// bzhi
gang zhe na/ gang zag gang zhig sngonami bzhugs pa'i sa phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gi mchod rten gnas par byed pa 'dra notshengs pa'i bsod nams bskyed pa'i gang zag dar pa yin te/
bskal par mtho ris rnams su dga' bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gang zag gang zhig sngon med pa'i sa phyogs su phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khar byed du 'jug pa 'di ni
tshangs pa'i bsod nams bskyed pa'i gang zag gnyis pa yin te/ bskal par mtho ris rnams su dga' bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gang zag gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun bye ba
slar sdums byed par 'di ni tshangs pa'i bsed nams skyed pa'i gang zag gsum pa yin te/ bskal par mtho ris rnams su dga' bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gang zag gang zhig byams kha dang ldan pa'i/
sems len med pa/ 'gran zla med pa// gnod pa med pa// yangs pa rgya chen por gyur patshad med ba haMn tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mos te/ khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas
shing de bzhin du gnyis pa dang/ de bzhin du gsum ba dang/ de bzhin du bzhi pa dang/ bla dang/ 'og dang/ thad kar rnam pa thams cad du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten 'di byams pa
dang ldan pa'i sems khon med pa// 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa// yangs pa rgya chen por gyur ba tshad med pa shin tu bsgoms pa mos te/ khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te
gnas pa dang/ de bzhin du sAng rje dang/ dga' ba dang/ btang sems dang ldan pa'i sems len med pa// 'gran zla med pa// gnod pa med// yangs pa rgya chen por gyur ba tshad med
pa shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mas te/ khyab par byas nas rdzogs bar byas te gnas shing/ de bzhin du gnyis pa dang/ de bzhin du gsum ba dang/ de bzhin du bzhi da
dang bu dang/ 'og dang/ thang kar rnam pa thams cad ldan pa'i 'dzig rten 'di btang sems dang ldan pa'i sems khen me de ba/ 'gran zla med pa// gnod pa med pa// yangs
pa rgya chen por gyur da tshad me da pa shin tu bsnyems pas skyes te/ khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas pa 'di ni tshangs pa'i bsod rnams bskyed
da pa'i gad zug bzhi pa lan te/ bskal par mtho ris rnams su dga' bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu dang mo'u 'gal gyi bu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la man
zlo bar dga' sderjes su yaM dwangasanas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas chas te/ lha sbyin gang na ba der dong ngo// de'i tshe lha sbyin
lho phyogs kyi ril ka ka lo ka ni de'i g.yas phyogs su bzhag/ khand drab bya ni g.yon du bzhag nas/ sangs rgyas ltar 'tshos shing chos 'chad panA/ lha sbyin gyis tshe dang ldan par 'i bu dang
mo'u 'gal gyi bu gnyis rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong de/ dmagrong nas kyang bsams pa// bdag gis nyan thos chen pa dag kyang dbang du byas pas/ da ni bdag thams rung mkhyenang yin no snyam nas/
ka ka pika dang/ khan du drab bya la longs shig longs shig ces gru phugs byas ba dang/ de gnyis kyis bsams pa// bdag cag gis 'di ltar bde dege 'dun 'byed pa'i grogs byas pa de
nyid bdag cag gis nyes te/ 'di mthu dang ldan pa yin pas/ gal to bdagatsag brdegs na gdon mi za bar 'chi bar 'gyur gyis ldang ngo snyam nas/ de gnyis langs pa dang/ tshe dang ldan kA ri'i
mam/ bu ni g.yus phyogs su 'dug go/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ni g.yon phyogs su 'dug go/ de nas lha spyan gyis/ tshe dang ldan shA ri'i bu la smras pa// shA ri'i bu nga rgyab thugs
ma bde ste re zhig de bsal gyis/ khyed da ga slong rnams la chos kyi gtam spebs par gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i busanang ma smra bas lha sbyin la khas blangs so// de nas lha sbyin du gas bzhi

bltad tu nga ting/ snam sbyar bltab ste sngas su bcug nas glo g.yas pa phab steganyid log pa las/ tshe dang ldan pa shAri'i bus/ ji ltar lus gan rkyal gyis sdur pa'isgra 'byin cing 'dug pa de lta bur byin

gyis brlabs so// denatsa dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ dge slong rnams la smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa dgasten pa lus gan kyal gyis sdug cing gnyid log pa'i gnas skabs la ltos/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i

bus tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal buchen po la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'khor rnams skyo ba skyedatsag/ de nas tshe dang ldan ba me'u 'gal gyi bu chen pa dzaltar sems
ma zhum par bzhag na/ shar phyog kyi steng gnam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas/ spyod lam rnam pa bzhi byed de 'chag pa dang/ 'greng ba dang/ 'dug pa dang/ nyal bar byed do// ma'i ting nge 'dzin la
snyoms par 'jug ste/ me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pa'i lus la sa 'od gzer sngon po dang/ ser pa dang/ dmar pa dang/ dkar po/
dang btsod kha dang/ shel gyi kha dog dag 'byin par byed do// cho 'phrul zung du yang ston par byed de/ lus kyi skad nas me 'bar bar byed rang lus kyi stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyan

dang pamakhar/ klu 'debs par byed do// lus kyi steng nas me 'bar bar byed de lus kyi spyad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'debs par byed pa de lta bu'i ting 'dzin la gnas par zhugs so// shar phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du
lho phyogs dang/ nung phyogs dang/ byang phyogs su yang de bzhin te/ phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par 'du byed pa de dag bsdus to/ stan

bshams pa nyid la 'dus pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi du chen des dge slong rnams skyo ba bskyod do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shAri'i bus dge slong de rnams kyis gang thos na lha sbyin steng
bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad nas// yang smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed phyag las gang dag ston pa la dga' ba de dgan lengs shig 'deng ngo zhes/ tshe dang ldan pa shar 'i bu dang medu
'gal gyi bu gnyis chas pa na/ dge slong de rnams kyang de ri rjes bzhin rjes bzhin 'brang ngo// ko ka la kas lha sbyin bsrung ba/ longs lengs nyan thos chen pa dag gis khyod kyi 'khyer phyogs so/
de nas tshe dang ldan pa shar r bu 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te lha sbyin gyis 'khor ma mthong bar khrid na khrag dron du skyags nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa 'di yod kyis/ mdor na mthong
ba kho nar byas la bkri'o snyam nas/ de dag dal gyis 'gro ba'i spyod lam gyis dge slong ga dege 'dun dang lhan cig dar ba na/ lha sbyin kun nas dkris pa drug pas mag sngogatsang bsnyags pa las/

tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'obs mchog tu 'jigs su rung ba sa'i gting snang ba zhig sprul pa dang/ lha sbyin ke kA la ka dang/ khan da dub bya dang/ ka ta ma ra ka ti'u dang/ rgya mtshos byin rnams
dang lhan cig 'obs de'i mtha' kun tu bskor bar brtsams pa na/ rgal ma nus nas des bsams pa// 'khor ma 'thob par ma zad/ tshul ma yAn pa sa sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro snyam du
bsams nas slar log ga/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang mo'u 'gal gyi bus kyang dge slong gi dge 'dun khrid nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der deng ngo// de nas dge slong de rnams bag can/
gis btsem ldan 'das yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa spangs nas/ lha sbyin sdig pa can la brten pasu thatshig res 'gyod pa skyes/ yadi la gcags pa skyes/yul yul par byas/ phrag pa b.rum/
mgo snyad de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dang ngo// de nas brtsam ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis dge slong de rnams kyi sems mkhyen nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag
khyed rongs pa legs so// rab tu byung pa legs so// khyed kyis mi'i rid pa ni legs par red pa yin te/ brgya paman lan 'ga' 'phags pa'i gnas su skye ba dang dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin pa
dang glen pa ma yin pa dang/ lug ltar lkug ba ma yin pa dang/ lag brda byed bzhi yin zhing legasabar skyes pa dang/ nyes bar smras ba rnamu chos kyi don shes par nus/ brgya lam na/
lanabaga' de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byud/ brgya lam na lan bga' de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i 'dul ba 'jig rten la chos bshad
nga da de// dag slong dag de ltabs na rud par dka' babs kyashin tu dka' bzhi 'di yin te/ 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa'i gnas su skya ba dad/ dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin pa dud/
thunab ma yin pa dad/ lug ltar lkug pa ma yin pa dang/ lag brda byed pa ma yin zhing legs par smras ba dang/ nyes par sbas pa rnams kyi chos kyi don shes par zhus pa'o// da ltar
'jig rten du ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bdebar gshegs pa// 'jig rten mkhyen ba/ skyes
bu 'dul ba/ kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na mad pa// lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasad byung zhing chos bshad ba de nyibar zhi bar 'gyur ba// yongs su mya ngan las
'du'abar 'gyur ba// mngon par byang chub bar 'gyur ba// bde bar gshegs pas rab tu gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ 'di yod pas 'di 'byung la/ 'di skyes pas 'di skyes pa//
'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes ba/ rnam par shes ba'i rkyen gyis mid dang gabrugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rgyan gyis skya mtshad drug/ skumachod/
drugagi rkyen gyis reg pa// rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rgyan gyis sred pa// srid pa'i rkyen gyis len pa// len pa'i rgyan gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rgyan
gyis rga shi dang/ myang n dang/ smra sngags 'don ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams 'byungabar 'gyur to/ sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po/
'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ 'dimad pas 'di mi 'byung la 'di 'gags bas 'di 'gags bar 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/marig pa 'gags bas 'du byed 'gag/ 'du byed
'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam pashes ba 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag/ ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skyamachad drug 'gag/ skye mchad ga 'gags pas
rig pa 'gag dag pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag/ tshor ba 'gags pas srid ba 'gag/ srid pa 'gags bsalen pa 'gag/ len pa 'gags bas srid pa 'gag/ srid pa
'gagasapas skya ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang/ mya nadang/ smra sngags 'don bdad/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bdeb dang/ 'khyug pa rnams 'gags par 'gyur te/ sdug
bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro// dge slong dgade lta bas na bdag gi don dang/ gzhan gyi don dang/ gnyis ka'i don la rjes su lta ba rnams kyisana'adi/
larab tu bsub par byasdu/ cis kyang rab tu byung ba don yod bdang/ 'bras bu dang bcas pa dang/ bdab skyod ba dang/ rnam par smin pa bde ba dang/ gang dag gi chos gos dad/ bsod snyoms
dang gnas mal dang/ nad kyi rgyun sman gyi yo byad rnams la yongs su longs spyod pa de dag las kyang de dag gis phanubatags pa'i'abras bushin tu thob dad/ phan yon che ba dang/ gzi byashen

ba dang/ yangs shing rgya che bar 'gyur ba de ltar dge slong dag khyed kyis bslab par bya'o// gang gi tsho bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de rnams la bos ba legs so zhes bya ba dang/ rab tu byudab legs
sogs bya ba gsungs pa'i/ de rnams kyi zhum pa dang/ mi dga' bdad/ 'gyod pa dang/ rnam par 'gyod pa dang/ yid lag chags pa gang yin pa de dag thamasacad kyi
thams cad du bral bar gyur to// de nas dag srong gzhan rnams the tshom skyes te/ the chos thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'as la/zhus pa/ btsun ba
bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phrin las ci zhig mdzad na/ 'phrinalasaru'i rnam bar smin pas bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun bye bar gyur 'gas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa// dge slong dag de zhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon gyi rmo bas gzhan rnams su'aphrin las byas shing bsags pa dang/ tshog sarnyed pa dag ni zhes bya ba nas/ lus can dag la'abras bur 'gyur//
zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma shin du'o// dge slong dag sngon byung ba'i bsti gnas rtsa ba dang/ log dang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ chu phun sum tshog sapa dang/ shing sna tshogs kyis
mdzes par byas d// bya'i tshogs du masabastan pa gzhan zhigan/ drad srod lnga brgya'i gtso bo drang srong zhig gnas so// ji tsam na drang srong gzhan thig ljongs rgyu shisong ba na bsti gnas
dar phyin na/ drang srong des de la bkur sti legs par ma byas pas debadrod bskyas nas de'i 'khor 'byed par byed de/ drang srong sdig pa 'dod pa 'di cung zad kyang mishasan/ ci sta de'i drung na
bdug/ tshul kho bo dang lhan cig bdang bo bos khyed rnams mngon par shes pa lnga rnams la rab tu dgod do zhes/ des de rnams phyi bas drang srong de'i gdams ngaganyan dum btub bo// drang song
sabasams pa// sdig pa byed pa 'dis bdag gi drang srong 'di rnams bya'o snyam nas/ rdos de la bzhams rta bar brtsams pa// tshidad ldan pa gakho'o 'byed bar ma byed cig/
'din du srong gi sam in no// 'on kyang de 'byed ngazhin tu 'dug tu ma btub nas/ drang srong de yid mi bde zhing thabs shig sams shing gnas so// sangs rgyas rnams byung ba mad ba na/ 'jig
rten du rang sangs rgyas man du dud dan pa la snying brtse ba can bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba/ 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig bu rnams 'byung bar 'gyur bas/ de nas da

sangs rgyas zhig ljongs rgyu zhing song ba na/ drang song de'i bsti gnas su phyin pas dad/ drang srong de'i lus mdzes pa dang spyod lam zhi ba mthong da/ mthong nas des de la dad pa bskyod nas des de la bya
ba byas te/ smon l^ama'agabar btabab/ rang srong sdig can gang yin pa 'dis bdag gi 'khog phyi bas/ bdag gis 'di shes bya thams cad la dbang thob na yang 'khob 'byed par byed bar gyur
cig ces byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi ljongs kyi drang srong gdagis de'i 'khor phya bad ni danyid yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi gnyug mar gnasapa'i drang
srong gang yin padi ni lha sbyin yin te/ sa dile 'khor phya ba'i las kyi rnam par smin bgud yin brjes na/ smon lam log par btab nas 'dis nga'i dge 'dunabya ba yin no// dag slong dag de lta
bas na las gcig tu gzhag pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba nas/ dag slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la brgyab bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/// dge slong rnams the tshom
skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gacod ba sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun ba lha sbyin gyisaphyi ba dag ning bar bgyis/ nad bdag ni phyi bar bgyis pas 'khor phyogs dal
gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag ru ltar gyi bde 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das ba'i dus na yang 'dis phyi pa dag ni nang bar byas/ nang pa dag ni phyi
bar byas pas 'khor phyogs pa de nyon cig/ dag slong dag sdon byung ba phyogs shig na srog chags wa shig gas te/ dazhin dubarkam chags can zhig pas dgon par yang rgyu 2 grong 'dab tu yang rgyug

de mthar gyis rgyu ban/ rams gyi btso blag mkhan zhigagi khyim du zhugs pa las/ mas gyi rdza mar lhung nas de skyag bro bar gyur te dadad ha cang yang mi ring ba na/ tshar go'u phung po zhig 'dug pa de la3la
nas grosa'athus pa las/ de bas kyang lhag par lus ma rung bar gyur to/ chu'i nang du zhugs nas las te song ba na/ nyi ma'i bar gyis phog bsanor bu gzi'i kha dog lta bur gyur pa// jitsam
na wa rnams kyis mthong nas/ de rnams phyogs phyogs su bros te rgyang ring por 'khod nas smras pa// khyod su zhig gang nas 'dir 'ongs/ sa smas ba/ kho bo ni brgyar 'gro'o zhes
byalta/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis rkang bzhi pa rnams kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ro/ wa rnams kyis bsams pa/ 'di'i lus kyi kha dog sngon ma mthong ba las na/ gdon mi bya
bar ri khon yin no snyam nas/ wa rnams kyis rkang bzhi ba thams cad lag par byas so// sangag rnams kyis bsams pa/ bdag cag las khyad par du 'phags pa su zhig yod na//
de rkang bzhi pa rnams kyi rgyal bor 'gyur/ re zhig dong la rang gi tshog sakyi dbon po ba rigapar bya'o snyam nas/ de rnams kyi tshogs kyi dpon po la pa can zhig ni
phyogs shig na gnas pa de la/ de rnams kyis smras pa dang// des nga bzhib gzhan zhig labasgob/ song larkangabazhir pa'i dpon po de nang bzhapa 'ga' gagis/
mthong ngam ma mthong rtags shig/ da pa'i drung du song stabartags na sngon ma mthong b yin zhing sang ge rnams ma gtogs pa rkang bzhi pa thams cad kyis yongs su bskur bar gyur nas/ de de'i drung

dusong stajiltar mthong ba dog pas nga des shes nas/ song ga'i tshogs yongs su bskor tu de'i rgyud du dong ngo// de ni rkang bzhi ba thams cad kyis yongs subaskor zhing glangapo rtsal zhon nas rgyu ban/ da sad
ga rnams kyis yongs su bskor zhing de nas ni stag rnams so// de nas ni rkang bzhi ba rnams so// de rnams kyi phyi rim rgyud ring bo nas ni wa rnams 'adong ngo/ de'i ma'i sul zhig na gnas
ba de ladis wa zhig mngags taM/ bus rgyal srid nyams su myong gis tshur spyon cig ces spring ba dang/ des smras pa// de'i ba khor ci 'dra ba zhig des smras pa// de'i 'khor nad pa ni
sang ga dang/ stag dang/ glang po che dag yin no// phyi pa ni bdag cag nyid yin no// des smras pa// ma rung thin gyis song zhig/ dres tshigs su bcad pas kyang sbas pa/ bdag
[o]di'i 'di'i sul na budab gnas shing// bsil ba'i chu la bsod snyoms 'thung bar byed// de ni ji srid wa sgra mi grag pa// de srid gung blo yis bden 'gro 'gyur// de song sta res wa rnams
la sbas pa/ rkang bzhi pa rnams kyi rgyal po 'di ni wa kho na yin te/ bdag gis de'i ma'i sul ga ga zhes bya ba nad dug pa mthong ngo// de rnams kyis sa pa// gal te de ltar na de la
yin nam ma yin pa wa bdag cag gis brtag go/ chos nyid kyis lnga rnams zhi gang zhig gis wA skad thos nas skad ma phyudun de'i spu rnams 'byi bar 'gyur bas/ wa skad dbyung bar brtsams nas/
desabasams ba/ gal te bdagagis skad ma byung nas gdonami za bar bdagagi spun+nams 'byi bar 'gyur la// gal te glang po cholas babs nas skad phyung na ni 'dis bdag bsar du 'ong gis 'di nyid du
skar dbyung do snyam nas/ des klad pa cha la zhinobazhin du skung dbyung bar brtsams pa dad/ glang po chos shas nas/ wa bdag la bzhon gzhasaros da bor te rkang nga sabardzis sa/ lhas tshig
su bcad de smras ba/ gang dag nad pa phyi ba dud/ phyi ba dang par byed du dag/ 'di 'dra bar 'barlag 'gyur te// glang po che yisawa bzhin no// dge slong dag ji snyam du sams/
de'i tshe de'i dus kyi gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin 'dinyid yin te/ don yang 'dis nang nga ba dag ni phyi lo bar byas/phyirol pa dag ni nad par byas pas/ tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to//
da ltar yad 'dis na ba dgazhi phyi rol bar byas/ phyi rol pa dga'i las byas 'khor rnams phrogs par gyur to// gang gi tshe dang ldan ba shAri'i bu dang mo'u 'gal gyi bu gnyis kyis
lha srin gyi 'khor thugs ba de'i tshe/ lha sbyin gyis ko ka 'bi ka dung khan da ba bya lo khyed gnyis kyis nga'i 'khor 'brog tu bcug go zhes bardegasaso// dag slong mas tshom
'tsha skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tsun pa lha sbyin gyi 'khor nigazhan gyis phrogs la/ gzhan la 'dris sdug bsngal bskyang pa lagabrigs/
rgyu bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ ga spyod dgad ltar gyi bde 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ri jo ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'di'i chung ma gzhan gyis phrogs la/ gzhan dag la tshul ma yin pa'i sdug

bsngal bskyod pa nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byud ba phyogs gzhan zhig zha grung po rmo'i tshog sashig gnas so// dan glang bo che zhig ba lang mo zhig la sdug par 'dzin na/ de ni grung ba'i phrug gu
hi gzhan zhig yodabal lhag par chags nas/ des glang bo cha'i phrug gudu la sbas pa/ tshor dubong gis bdag caga'abros sam/ de nas glang bo'i phrug gu ngusangasapa/ gang gis na bdag
cag 'bros pa'i thabs ci yod/ ris smyos pa/ bdag gis thabs shes so zhes/ des glang po cha del sgos pa// khrus bya ba'i phyir rdzing du 'jug bar byago/ dazhugs ba dang/
07 das sa ba/ bdag cag las su yun du nub par 'dug babalta'o// blun po'i phung po can de re dang lhan cig mun ng du nub ba 'dug pa na/ de langs te glang po che'i thug gu dang lhan cig bros sa//
glangad cha ning zhig 'dug nasalangs na mi snang nas/ des bsams ba bdag pham par 'gyur du 'ong gis/ slar yang nub par bya'o snyam nas/ sa slar yang nub par byas nas/
mchabs labatsugs te 'dug g/ de ring zhig len nas dbugs do chad du langs na glang po cha ma de ma mthong nas sa rdzing bu da phan tshun dudakrug par brtsams pa dang/ des daranya dang/ ru sbal
dung sbal ba la sogs pa srog chags mang bo tshul ma yin bas sdug bsngal bar byas so// lcas tshigs su bcad de sbas pa// kyemakho sha yi phung bo che// 'di lashas bab yod ma
yin gzhan gyis chu 'phrogs gyur na/ gzhan la sdug bsngalasnyan bar khyod/ dag song dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi glang bo dam ba gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin yin te/
dun yang chung ma gzhan gyis phrogs la 2 gzhan la tshul ma yin pa'i sdug bsngalabaskyad do// de ltar yang 'khor gzhan gyis phrogasal/ gzhan la tshul ma yin pa'i sdug bsngal bskyar du
sngomani/ grags dang mashongabanyid dngani// ut+pal mdog zhi bsad pa dang// la ba dang gsum 'o ma dang// sa tshom dang bzod gsol dang// grang dang sams
panyid dang/ dpya dang tha mabazhi yin no/// dge slong rnams thum skyas te/ tha tshog thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus
nga btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang mo'u 'gal gyi bu gnyis kyis/ lha sbyin la grugasabatsal thalas klogs rnyed pa lagabrigs bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag
da ldan gyi 'di'aba' zhig tu mthud de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang shar bu dang mo'u 'gal gyi bu gnyis kyis 2 lha sbyin la rgyugs btsal ba las grugs rtsod pa de klog nyi// dag slong dag sngon
pyad ba ni ra zhig na 'phong gi slob dpon zhig gnas te/ desajigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ da de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur sbyod par byed do//
du rtsa bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/ dus gzhan hrugan chung ma soms can dang ldan par gyur taM/ dri zla ba brgyad dmadabu lon pa na bumozhig btsus
[E； ]btsas nas zhag bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu da btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nasagasadang mthun pa'i ming btags te/ dbaskyed bsrings nas rgan mor gyur to// ra phod
gi slob dpon gyis bsams pa// bu mo 'di'i bdag gis gzugs dang ldan pa 'am tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'am/ ma na su la yang sbyin par mi bya ste/ 'on kyang bdag/
0 las gnas ldabaslabs tu byang bar gyur pa gang yin pa de la bdag gis 'di sbyin no snyam mo// debs bram ze'i khye'u ga nyis shig 'bad brlabs pa las/ don gcig ni gnas lnga la byang bar/
gyur to// cig shosakyis ni gad pa la byang bar gyur to/ 'ju gnyis las gnas lnga la bud bar gyur pa gang yin pa de la des bu ma byin pa dud ( cig shos po de mi bgrod pa skyes nas chom rkun pa/
rnams kyi nad du zhugs te mos rkun lnga brgya'i snga dpon du gyur nas/ du phyogs gcig cig zhu ma bcar nas 'bod do// snga ma po des bumo de bag mar blangs nas/ mda' lnga brgya go ba'i
dong pa gnyis thogs te shing rtar zhugs nas rang gi khyim du dong ngo// jitsaman tshong pachom rkun gyis 'jigs mdun du dong bu stod pa dang/ des smras pa// shes ldan dag dengs shig ci sdod/
dro rnams kyis smras pa/ chom rkun pa sbrumasakyis lam bcad do// sa skyasapa/ tshu ci zhig phyag yod ces chas pa dang/ tshong pa rnams kyis sapa// shes ldan dag pa zhig sdod
ga 'di'i 'grol ga stsa/ 'di dganying 'chib dang chud mkhrogasab 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do// rkun po rnams shing ljon pa zhig la 'dzags nas phyags sultabar byed 'dug
ba dang/ ri rnams kyisadongashing rtar zhugs pa mthong nas/ de rnams kyis skyes ba/ shes ldan dag mi zhig shing rtar zhugs nas 'ong ngo// chom rkun pa'i dpon gyisadel pho nyazhig btang ste//
chu@#// shing rta slar bzlog pa dang/ des smras pa// shes ldan dag dpa' bo dang de'i lan byin cig/ de rnams kyis smras pa// bdag cag kyang dpa' bo yin no zhes sde dgon gyis
mi rgod lnga brgyabatang ba dang/ sad rnams bsad de/ de bzhin du nyi shu zhig 'ongasapa da rnams kyang bsad de/ jitsaman thams cad bsad nas ma rkun pa'i sdadabon 'ba' zhig lus pa dang/ des
la gri blangs tamadun du sdad do// des mda' yang bar brtsams pa na/ 'i ral gris gtubs so// ji tsam na des mda' lnga brgya'aphangs pa de dag thams cad des gtubs nas/ mdab
gcig cig lus te des dam 'phangs pa dang/ bum des smras pa// chad ' bzhi g ste ci bgyi ba phos shig/ des smras ba/ mar ba 'di 'bagazhigalus te/ 'di 'a bangasan kho bo bsar nas
khyed kyang phrogs par 'gyur ro// de nas bu mo des lus kyi sgyur stangs kyis lan bu bcos bar brtsams pa na/ de la chom rkun ba'i sde dbon rtog par byed na/ des ga'i gnad du ma sa
snyan pa dang/ de 'chi kan tshugs su bcad de sa ba shing rtan gyis pad ma bsad/ 'dod chags sdig pa'i sems kyisani// bdag ni g.yul gyi dbus zhugs nas/ bag med
bzhin la blta bas bsad// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshade'i dus kyi shing rta zha gong yin bde nihA pu'adi nyid yin no// de'i de'i dus kyi bu mo gang yin pa de ni mo du stagal
gyi bu yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi chom rkun pa'i snga bon dad yin pa de ni lha sbyin yin te/ rin yad 'a de gnyis kyis kha gragasabatsal ba las glags rnyed de// da ltar yang 'di gnyis kyis de la/
glags btsal ba las rgyags rnyed de// sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i kha'atsho byed gzhon nus bcud kyi a ma'i tshab bya bzhugs bar zhal gyis bzhes so// de nas lus 'phags

ma'i bu ma d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra dpyanyibar ba sgrub pa dbyar zla 'bring po'i dbu ma de nyid kyi mtshan mo inabudang gsing mngon pa'i bla nyi mol/ byon pa'i tshog sakyis yongs su bskor te stang gi khang
bsres kyi gal song sa/ na po rnams la smras pa/ kya'agrong pa dag dbyanyib bsgrub pa dbyar zla 'bring bod mde nyid kyi mtshan mo yin pa shes shing mngon pa'i bla ma 'di lta bu la das
zhig byu/ dunas tho phrad myas kyi bud med cig gis/ lus la pags ma'i bu rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras so/ lta dbyar nye bar bsgrub pa/ ra dbyar zla 'bring po'it+taM/
dbu ma'i mtshan mo lags du mkhyen cing mngon pa'i zlanya mo 'di lta bu la lha 'dodapa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan pas/ rol bur mdzad/ dgyes bde mdzad/ dgyes dgur spyod/
la mdzad na/ lha'i bgyid na da lags ba snyam bgasams lags so// sa pho brang slas gzhan zhig gis yang 'di skad ces smras so// lha dbyar bar bsgrub pa dbyar
zla 'bring bonya dbu ma'i mtshan lags par mkhyen nyim ba'i bla nyi ma 'di lta bu la lta 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byon cing ldanubs/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi nyi 'o
gyi shul phramo rnams bya la go doludag mdzad dgyes par mdzad/ dgyes dgur sbyad pada mdzad na/ lta'i bgyi ba ni da lags basAmabadag sems lags so// gzhon nu 'cham byed
bzang pos 'di skad ces smras so// lha dbyar nyib bsgrub pa dbyar zla 'bring po'i nyedabu ma'i mtshan mo lags bar mkhyen cid mngon pa'i zla nyi mo 'di lta bu blta dbud gi tshogs yan lag bzhir/
glang po chagasad de/ rtopa'i tshogs dad/ shing pa'i tshogs dang/ dbung bu chung gi tshogs go kha skon nas/ gzhan gyi yul 'khor dang gzhan gyi yul du gshegs te/ g.yul
choskaba'i g.yul sprad nasagayul las rgyal ba bgyis te/ rgyal nas g.yul de nyid las sngags bzhugs na/ lha'i bgyi ba nid lags pasAm bdagasams lags so//
da nas blon po rgan po gzhan zhigagis 'di skad ces smras so/ lhadabyar khyabar bsgrub pa dbyar zla 'bring po'i nyi dbu ma mtshan mo lags bar mkhyen cing mngon pa'i zla nyi ga 'di lta bu la// sgyu
'od spungs rdzogs byed dus pha can/ tshogs 'tshogs kyi slob dbon skye bo mang bosagazugs bzang por bkur ba/ skye bo mang bos mdun gyis bku ba kun tu 'tsho lnga brgya'i gtsob ra rgyal
0 ba'akhab tu dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa de laskyabasAn bkur mdzod cig/ lha'i bgyi ba'i ra lugs tha snyam bdagasams lags so// yang blon po rgan po gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces/
skyasaso// lta dbyar nye bar bsgrub dbyar zla 'bring po nyi dbu ma'i mtshan ma lags bar mkhyen cing mngon pa'i zla nyi ma 'di lta bu la/ kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu dang/ smra 'dod
kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal btsan dang/ mi pham skra'i la ba can dang/ kata'i bu nog can dang/ lhagatsor bu la gnyen gyi bu 'dus ba can tshogs kyi slob bon skye bo mang pos gzugs bzang
bod bar b/ tshogs chen pos mdunagyisab ltas ba zhig mchis te/ de rgyal bab ba ba 'di ni du dbyar gnas par dam bcas ba de la lha bsnyen bkur mdzad cig/ lha'i bgyib ni da
lags ba snyam bgusams lags so// rim 'tshobyed gzhon nus ba skyed bar denyid kyin nas dus shing 'dug bar gyur to/ de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hadi rgyal bos skyes
las/ brjod byed g tshon nus skyod la smasab/ kA la 'tsho bcu'i byin cang mi sna/ ni'u 'dami 'am/ lha dbyabar bsgrub ba dbyar zla 'bring po'i nya'i mtshan mo lags bar
mkhyen cing mngon pa'i zlanyimo ba de lta bu la/ lha bcom ldan 'das 'dusab can tshogs can tshogs kyi slob de bon skyo bo mang pos gzugs bzang bos bkur ba/ tshogs chen pos mdun
gyis la lta ba de rgyal bo'i 'dri re kyi bdag gi amra'i tshadabyar bzhugs pa'i zhal gyis bzhes pa de la lta bsnyan bkur mdzod cig/ lta'i bgyi ba nid lags pa/
snyam pa dag ngesamasalags so// de'i tshabus 'phags ma'i bumag pa'i rgyal po ma skyes dgrabcom ldan 'dus lasams gzhol bar gyur/ bcom ldan 'das la 'bab par gyur/ bcom ldan
bltas la bab par gyur to// du nas lus 'phags ma'i bum ga d+ha'i rgyal bo ma skyes dgras/ 'tsho byed gzhon nus bskyod la 'di skad ces/ sa so// 'tsho byed so la spyod poma'i dam pa chen
bstod cig dang/ de la kho ba zhenanas bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i spyi 'gro'o/ lta ba kar bzhin 'tshal zhes 'tsho byed gzhon nus bskyed kyis lus 'phags ma'i bu mag rta'i rgyal bo ma skyes dgra
lasaanyan nas/ glang bo chu dam ba chen pod dang ba gang mo lnga brgya tsamabastar nas/ pho brang pas lag na sgron ma thogs pa lnga brgya tsam ba glang tsho'i re zhon nas lus 'phags ma'i bum ga
d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra gang na ba der so da lta na nas/ lus 'phags ma'i bu mgo d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes gu la 'di skad ces saso lha glang po'i dam pa chen bo ba sgron lags te/
ltar rta'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ de nas lus 'phagasama'i dum gadz+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dag glang po che dam pa chen po la zhon nas/ pho brang slas lag na skyon ma thogs
0pa ldabargyamabagrung mo ro ra zhon pas mdun du bdar nas rgyal po'i khabanas bya ste/ bcom ldan 'dasu blta ba dang bstan bkur bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sbyan ldan song dang/ de'i

lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+ha'i rgyal bo ma skyes dgra tshul sngong byed ngag rnams dang mi mthun par gyur to// de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu mgo d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra rgya la po'i khab nas byung ma thag
kho nar/ bduga'atsho byed gzhon nus bskyed 'dis gsadapar 'dod ba'am/ bsrubabar 'dodab lam/ (khas len du gzhug bar 'a dodapa las/ gshod ma ba 'am/ phyir rgol ba 'am/
mi mdza' ba dag la gtad par mi 'dodo grang snyam du bsams nas/ ga par gyur/ bag tsha bar gyur/ spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas/ 'tsho byed gzhon nus bskyod la 'di skad ces smras so//
'byed khyod kho bo la gsar bar 'dod pa lum/ bslu bar 'dod pa la/ lasalen du gzhug par 'dod pa 'am/ gshad ma pa 'am/ phyir rgol ba 'am/ mi mdzad bu dag la gad
ba mi'adod grang/ des 'di skad cag skyes so// lha khyod la bdag bkrungs par 'tshal ba 3ma/ bslubs 'tshol ba'am/ sku gzhug bud 'tshal ba 'am/ gshad ma ba 'am/
phyir rgol ba ma/ mi mdza' ba dag la gtad bod kha tsha'akha ma lags so// de nas lus 'phagasama'i bu ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ 'tsho bya gzhon nus bskyed la ba de skad
ces snas so// 'tsho byed bcom ldan 'das de la 'khor ci yod/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu lhag tsam mo// am 'o 'byed khyod kyis de ji ltar gsar bar mi
'dod/ bslu bar mi red/ sgra ba/zhug bar mi 'dod/ gdam pa 'am/ phyir rgol ba 'am/ mimadza' ba dag la gtod bar mi bded/ daltar bcom ldan 'das de la la khong da snyad yod na
lu ba'i sgra yang mi grag go sgrid ba'i sgra yang mi grag go/ lha bcom ldan 'das da ni sgra chung ba bzhed/ sgrachung ba la dgyas/ sgra chung bas 'dul/ sgrachung ba'i bdags pa mdzad pas/
'khor yong sgra chung ba nyid do// lha de lta bas na myur ba myur bar glang bo chadam ba chen po thob soge/ 'di ltar 'khor gyi khyim na 'bru mar gyi zhugs mar gyi bod gdo'ago 'dunas lus
'babasama'i bum gad+ma'i rgyal po'i ma skyes dgras myur bsgyur bar glang bo che'i dam ba chen po btab nas/ des jitsam bkon bas rung ba'i sa'i bar bzhonab dung song ste/ bzhon pa sa
bags nas rkang ba kho nas kun dga' ra ba'i nad du zhugs so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dug slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la mtsho ltar dang zhing gsal la rtog pa med khur bzhugs so//
nas lus 'phags ma'i bu mag rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'khor gyi khyams dang nye bar son nas/ batsho byed gzhon nus skyod la rgyus pa/ batshobyed bcom ldan 'das de gang bzhugs/ lha/
bcom ldan 'das da ni dag slong gi dge 'dun gyi gud la mtsho ltar dung zhing gsal larog pa mdu bar ng tshugs pa pa gi bzhalags so/ de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+ha'i rgyal bo ma skyes dgra
bcom ldan 'das gang na bder song sta phyin nas/ bla gos phrag pa gtug gral du dus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de legs su thal mo
sgyur ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad mas gsol to/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dag srong gi dge 'dun dang thugs dul ba nye bar zhib ji lta bu dad ldan pa de bzhin du/ gzhon nu
'char byebazang po yang sems dul ba dang nye bar zhi ba de 'dra ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ rgyalapo chen po dnganyid dag rab rab tu bstanub legasaso legs so// rgyal po chen po rang gi stan la
'dug go/ dunasalus 'gas ma'i bumag blu'i rgyal bos skyes dgras/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bas phyag byas te/ gas gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs
gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la/ lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+ha'i rgyal bu ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gal ta zhu b.lud
bstan pa'i slad du skabs phyi ba ltan bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so// rgyal po chen po ci deng ci 'dod ba zhusashig/ btsunapa las kyi gnasad bzo'i gnas thar pa gang dag lags l
'di lta sta/ 'phrad brgyud pad dang/ smugam mkhan dang/ bdapa dang/ thun dang/ gdul mkhan dang/ glang po la 'tshol ba dang/ lto la 'tshol ba dang/ shing rtam
dang kha gri'i thabs dang/ gzhu'i 'dzin stangs ba dang/ khom 'bring bgyid pa dang/ go rtogs lod dang/ brogar len ba dad/ rgyal bo'i bu rab gnon tshan bo chadababab rtul phod kha rnams dang/
N+NaM mnyis pa bgyid pa dang/ skam khanadang/ khrus mkhan de rnams rang rang gi bzo'a gnas dad lasakyi gnas rnams kyisabagyi ba bgyid cing sbyin pa dag stsol/ bsod nams dag bgyid
la gso pa rnams gso rigs de 'dod pa yon tan lnga 'di med ldan pas rtsa ba bgyid dga' bar bgyid/ ga ba dgur spyod par bgyid ban/ de lta burnams la yang dag bar mthong ba'i
dag sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu gdugs pa thob lags sam/ ('dul ga/ khamabobasgyu drug pa/ rgyul bo chen po khyod kyis 'di 'dra
ba'i zhub 'do las sdon dag sbyong dang bram zugazhan rnams la dris pa drazhanas shu btsun ba dranags rta/ btsun pa dus gcig gzhi bdag daspungs rdzogs byed gang bder mchis te/
mchis nas bod srungs rdzogs byed la bdag gis 'di skad ces/ btsun ba 'od srungs lasakyi gnasar bzo'i gnas tha dad pa gang dag lags 'di lta ste/ 'phreng brgyad ba dang/ smyug
ma mkhan dang/ gdan pa dang/ rtswa thun dad/ 'dul ma ban dang/ glang bo che la zhon pa dang/ rta la zhon pa dang/ shing rta mkhanadang/ lagri'i thabs dang/ gzhu'i 'dzin stongs pa dang/
zhim 'bring byed pa dang/ go re bod dad/ brogar len pa dang shu rgyal po'i bu rub gnon tshon po tshadaba' ba rtul phod pa rnams dang/ mnyes bar byed pa dang/ skram ban dang/ khrus mkhan/
da rnams rang rang gi bzo'i gnas dad lasakyigs rnams kyis bya ba byed cing/ sbyin bdag thagatong/ bsod nams dag byed la gso ba rnams gas zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor tshang ldan par
gyur nas rtsa bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur sbyong bar byed na/ de lta burnams la yang dag pa mthong ba'i rig sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bug dgas pa/'a nyeb bam zhes dris ba na/
do'adi skad ces rgyal po chen po bdag ni 'di ltar lta zhing 'di skad smra ste/ sbyin pa mad do// mchod sbyin med do// sbyin sreg mad do/ legs par spyad pa med do/ gnyis pa
snyad ba mad do// legs par spyad pa dang nyis bar sbyang ba'i las rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin bamad do// 'pha rtan 'di tshad do// 'jig rten pha rol tshad do// ma med do/ 6
yod de/ sems can brdzus te skyab mad// 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa yang dag par song pa yang dag par zhugs pa gang dag tsher denyidi lar dgi mngon par shes pas 'jig rten 'di dang 'jig
rten pha rol mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te/ bdag gaskye ba zad do// tshangs par spyod pa bstenato// bya ba byas so// srade pa 'di las gzhan mngeshas gon
go bar byed pa dag med de// srog 'di de la 'tsho zhingad phyis chad par 'gyur/ zhug par 'gyur te/ shi ba'i 'og tu 'byung ngo// skyes ba'i lus n 'byung ba chen po bzhi las gyur
pa yin te/ de ni gang gi tsheshi ban de'asa'i lus nasa'abag la zha/ chu'i lus ni chu'i/ me'i lus n mi'i/ rlung ga lus ni rlung gi bag la zha bar 'gyur ro// dbang po rnams ni nam
mkha'i rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// skyes bu'i ri ni khri dang lnga'i mdog gis khyer te dur khrod du 'gro zhing bsregs phan chad ma mngon par 'gyur ro// bsreg byadagan thal bar 'gyur ro//
rus ba dag ni tho ba'i mdog 'dra bar gnas so// 'diltar rmongs pas zhe bar bstan ban sman la/ mkhas pas nye bar bstan pan len to// de la gang dag yod bar smra ba de dag thams cad
nagasob gsog brdzun du smra ba rdol ba yin no// 'di ltar byas pa dang mkhas pa de gnyis ni phyis chad par 'gyur/ zhig par 'gyur te/ shaba'i 'og tum 'byung ngo zhes mchi ste/ btsun
ba dper na ma zhig a mra'i 'bras bu rnams dris na/ la ku tsa'i 'bras bu rnams lung ston par bgyid la/ la ku tsa'i 'bras bu rnams dris na/ a mra'i 'bras bu rnams lung ston par
brgyadi ba de bzhin du/ 'od srus rdzogs byed la bgags yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu dris na/ ma mchis pa 'di lung ston par brgyang nas/ btsun pa de la bdag 'dasnyam
du sems te/ bdag 'dra ba'oskyes bu mkhas pas gzugs bzang por bkur ba yul na gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge sbyong ngam bram ze la mngonosum du spyad pa ni bdag gi cha ma lags so snyams/
btsun pa bdag gis 'od srungs rdzogs byed kyis smras pa la mngon par bstod pa yang ma brgyade/ spyod pa yang mi bgyid de/ mngon par bstod pa yang ma bgyisaM/ snyad par yang ma brgyus par
ldan las langs te mas nas/ bdag kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu gang na ba der mchis te/ mams nas kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyabu la 'di skad thos/ btsun pa kun tu rgyu 'jig rten gyi las
kyi gnas tha dad pa gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste/ 'phreng brgyud pa dang/ lcagam mkha dang/ gdan pa dang/ rtswa thun dang/ 'dul mkhan dang/ glang po che la zhon pa dang/
rta la zhon ba dang/ shing rta mkhan dang/ ral gri'i thabs dang/ gzhu'i 'dzin stangs pa dang/ zhes 'brang byed pa dang 2 go ro leng dang/ bro gar len pa dang/ rgyal po'abu
reb gnon gi tshan po che dpar ba rtul phod pa rnams dang/ mnyes par byed pa dang/ sa mkhan dang/ khrus mkhan de rnams rang rang gebazo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas rnams kyi bya ba byed
cing sbyin pa dag gtong/ bsod nams dag byed la gso ba rnams gso nge 'dod ba'i yon tan 'byor cing ldan par gyur nas/ rtse bar byed dga' bar byed/ dga'
dgur spyod par byed na/ de lta burnams la yang dag par mthong ba'i dege sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu gdags pa 'thob bam zhes dris ban/ de 'di skad ces rgyal po chen po bdag 'di ltar lta zhing
'daskad byis sa ste/ sems can rnams kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba la rgyu med rkyen med do// sems can rnams rgyu med rkyen med par kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ro// sems
can rnams rnam par 'gyur ba la rgyu med rkyen med do// sems can rnams rgyu med skyon med par rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// sems can rnams shes pa medabar 'gyur ba dang mthong ba med par 'gyu
ba la rgyu med rkyen medado// sems can rnams rgyu med rkyen med pa shes pa med ba dang mthong ba med par 'gyur ro// sems can zlums shes par 'gyur ba dang mthong bar 'gyur ba la rgyu med rkyen
med do// sems can rnams rgyu med skyon med bar shes pa dang mthong bar 'gyur ro// stobs med do// brtson 'grus med do// stobs dang brtson 'grus med do// skyes bu'i rtsal
med do// pha rol gnon pa med do// skyes bu'i rtsal dang pha rol gnon pa medado// bdag gi rtsal med do// gzhan gyi rtsal medad// bdag ga rtse la dang gzhan gyi rtsal med do// selA
can thams cad dang/ srog chags thams cad dang/ 'byung po thams cad mthu med/ snyebs med/ dbang med/ brtson 'grus med/ pha rol gnon pa med do// 'gro ba mtsham/
sbyor ba'i srid pa dag nges par gyur to// 'di ltar 'gro ba drug po dag tu bde ba dang sdug bsngal so sor myong bar 'gyur ro zhes mchis ste/ btsun pa dper nam zhig a ma'i 'bras bu rnams
drisan/ la du tsa'i 'bras bu rnams lur ston bar bgyid la/ la ku tsa'i 'bras bu rnams dris na/ a mra'i 'bras bu rnams lung ston par bgyid pa de bzhin du/ kun tu rgyu gnag
lhas kyi bu la bdag gis yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu dris na/ rgyu ma mchis pa nyid ngu la nga ston pa ra bgyade nas/ btsun pa de la bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag
'drab 'i skyes bu mkhas pas gzugs bzang por bkur ba yul naganyugamar gnas pa'i dge phreng ngam/ bram ze lade ji ltar mngon sum du smad par bya snyam nas/ bdag gis kun tu rgyu gzhig
lhas kyi bu'i sa pa la mngon par bstod pa yang ma brgyade/ smad ba yang ma brgyud de/ mngon par bastod pa yang ma bgyis/ snyad pa yang ma bgyis par stan las langs te mchis nas/
bdag sna 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can gang na ba der mchis te/ mchis nas smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can la 'di skad ces/ btsun pa yang dag rgyal ba can las kyi
@#/// gnas dang bzo'i gnas gang dag lan pa 'di lta ste/ 'phreng brgyud ba dang/ lcag ma mkhan dang/ gdan pa dang/ rtswa thun dang/ 'bul mkhan dang/ glang po'o
la zhen pa dang/ rta la zhon pa dang/ shing rta mkhan dang/ ral gra'ithabs dang/ gzhu'i 'dzin stangs ba dang/ zham 'brang byed pa dang/ go ri lo dang/ grogar len pa dang/
rgyal po'abu rab gnyen tshan po che dpar ba rtul bod pa rnams dang/ mnyes par byed pa dang/ sgra mkhan dang khrus mkhan de rnams rang rang gi bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas rnams kyis bya
ba byed cing sbyin pa dag gtong/ bsod nams dag byed la gso ba rnam gso zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur nas/ rtsa bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par
byed na/ de lta burnams la yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu gdags pa 'thob bam zhes dris pan/ de 'di skad ces rgyal po chen po bdag ni 'di ltar lta zhing 'di skad smaste/
byed pa dang/ byed du 'jug pa dang/ gcod pa dang ga cod du 'jug bdwang/ sreg pa dang/ srog tu 'jug pa dang/ rdeg pa dang/ jigatu'ajug pa dang/ srog chags la 'atso
ba dang/ ma byin par len pa dang/ 'dod pa dag la log par spyod pa dang/ shes bzhin du brdzun du smra ba dang/ myos par 'gyurab 'i btung ba'athung ba dang/ khyim 'bugs pa dang/
mdud pa 'grol ba dang/ ril gyis 'phrog pa dang/ lam 'gog cing 'dug pa dang/ grong 'joms par byed pa dang/ grong khyer 'dzoms par byed pa dang/ yul 'joms par byed pa dang/
sa gzhi chen po 'di la sems can gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad 'khor lo'i mtha' su gri la byas pas/ de dag thams cad kun du gtsed par byed/ kun tu 'tshog par byed/ kun tu
rdung bar byed/ kun tu 'dra bar byed chung/ de dag thams cad kun tu bad/ kun tu gshegs/ kun tu brdungs/ kun tu bral nas sha'i thang ma gcig tu byed de/ sha'i tshogs
gcig tu byed/ sha'i bus gcig tu byed/ sha'i phung bo gcig tu byed cing/ sha'i thang ma gcig tu byas/ sha'i tshogs gcig tu byas/ sha'i bung gcig tu byas/ 'i
phung po gcig tu byas nas/ de ltar kun tu sgrub par byed pa la 1 gzhadi las sdug pa yang med/ gzhadi las sdig par 'gyur ba yang med do// chu klung gang+gA'i lho phyogs nas kun
tu spyod par byed/ kun tu 'tshig par byed/ kun tu rdung bar byed/ kun tu 'dral bar byed cing 'grol/ chu klung gang+gA'i byang phyogs nas sbyin ba byed/ mchod sbyin byed cing 'gro
khar gyuran/ gzhi de las sdeg pa dang bsod nams kyang med/ gzhadi las sdug pa dang bsod nams su 'gyur ba yang med do// 'di ltar sbyin pa dang/ dul ba dang/ yang dag par sdomo
pa dang/ den dpyod pa dang/ don mthun pas/ de ltar byed pa yang bsod nams ma byed pa kho na yazhiso'os ma ste/ btsunab dperanam zhig a mra'i 'bras bu rnams
sin/ la pa'i 'bras bu rnams lung ston par bgyid la// la ku tsa'i 'bras bu rnams sa na/ a mra'i 'bras bu rnams lung ston par bgyid pa de bzhin du/ smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yad
dag rgyal ba can la bdag gis yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras budra ba dris na/ byed pa nyid la mchas bar lung ston par bgyadi do// btsun pa de la bdag 'ang skam du sems te/
bdag 'dra ba'i skyes bu mkhas pas gzugs bzang por bkur ba yul na gnyug mar gnas pa'i rige sbyong ngam/ bram ze la da ji ltar mngon sum du smad par bya snyam nas/ bdag gas sna 'dod
kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can la mngon par bstod ba yang na brgyud/ snyad pa yang ma brgyade de/ mngon par bstod pa yang ma bgyis/ smadu ba yang ma bgyis par stan las langs te mchas/
ny+nyo bag ma pham skra'i la ba can gang na ba der mchis/ mchis nas mi pham skra'i la ba can la 'daskad ces/ btsun pa mi pham 'jig rten gyi las kyi gnas dang bzo'i gnas tha dad pa gang dag yin pa
'di lta ste/ 'phreng brgyud pa dang/ smyug ma mkhan dang/ gdan pa dang/ rtswa thun dang/ 'dul mkhan dang/ glang bo che la zhon pa dang/ rta la zhon ba dang/ shing rta mkhan dang/
ral gri'i thabs dang gzhu'i 'dzin stang bo dang/ zhim 'bring byed pa dang/ go rolong dang bro gar len pa dang/ rgyal po'i bu rab gnyen tshan po che dpa' ba rtul phod pa rnams dang/ mnyes
par byed pa dang/ sgra mkhan dang/ khrus ma kha' de rnams rang rang ga bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas rnams kyis bya ba byed cing sbyin pa dgagatong/ bsod nams dag byed la gso ba rnams gso/
'ang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur nas/ rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed na de lta burnams la yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi
'bras bu gdags pa 'thob bam zhes dris pa dang/ de 'di skad ces rgyal bo chen po bdag na 'di ltar lta 'ang 'di skad smra ste/ lus bdun po 'di dag ni ma byas pa/ byas pas ma byas pa/ ma
sprul pa/ sprul pas ma byis pa/ gnod par bya ba ma yazhi pa/ thar zug tu gnas pa/ ka ba bzhin du gnas pa dag yin te/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sa'i lus dang/
chu'i lus dang/ me'i lus dang/ rlung gi lus dang/ bde ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ srog gson pa 1de ni bdun pa ste// lus bdun po de dag ni ma byas pa/ byas pas ma byas ba/
ma sprul pa// sprul pas ma byas pa/ gnod par bya ba ma yin pa/ ther zu gzhu gnas pa/ ka ba bzhin du gnas pa dag yin no// de dag na 'di lta ste/ bsod nyams su 'gyur ba'i phyir
ma/ sngag par 'gyur ba'i phyir ram/ bsod nams dang sdig par 'gyur 'a 'phyi'i ram/ bde bar 'gyur ba'i phyiram/ sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ram/
bde ba dang sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir g.yo ba ra ma byed/ rnam par 'gyur bag khyed/ gcig la gcig gnod bar ma byed de// skyes bu gang gas skyes bu'i mgo gcod par byed par byed pa des
kyang 'jig rten na g.yo ba 'am/ gnas pa la gnod pa cung zad kyang ma byed de/ lus bdun bo da lta ba med par mtshon thal byung du 'go zhiri der srog la gnod pa yang med// de la gsod pa byed
pa 'am/ gsad du bcug pa 'am/ dran par byed pa 'am/ dran pa ra byed du bcug pa ram skyabar byed pa 'am/ skyal du bcug pa 'am rnam par rig par byed pa 'am/ rnam par
rig par byed du bcug pa 'ga' yang med de// byis ba 'am ma khos pa gang dag yin pa dag ni skye gnas gtso bo dang ldan pa khri bzhi stong dang/ rtog pa chen po drug khri dang/ drug brgya dang/ 'as
lnga dang/ las gsum dang/ las gnyis dang/ las dang/ las phyed dang lam drug cu rtsa gnas dang/ rtog ba bar ma drug cu rtsa gnyis dang/ 'dushes bdun dang/ sems
can dmyal ba brgya nyi shu dang/ dbang bo brgya sum cu dang rdul gyi khams sum cu rtsa drug dang/ klu'i rigs bzhi khri dgu stongo dang/ nam mkha' lding gi rigs bzhi khri dgu stong dang/ kun tu
rgyu'arigs bzhi khri dgu stong dang/ kun tu 'tshe ba'i rigs bzhi khri dgu stong dang/ gcer bu pa'i ra sa bzhi khri dgu stong dang/ 'du shes can gyi gnas bdun dang/ 'du shes med pa'i gnas 'du/
dang/ lha ma yin bdun dang/ sha za ba dun dang/ lha bdun dang/ mabadun dang/ mtsho bdun dang/ mtsho bdun brgya dang/ 'bri ba bdun dang/ 'bri ba bdun brgya dang rmi lam bdun
dang min lam bdun brgya dang/ sad pa bdun dang/ sad pa bdun brgya dang/ g.yangs bdun dang/ g.yangs bdun brgya dang/ rigs btsun pa drug dang/ mngon par mthe ba bcu dang/ skyes

bu chen pos brgyad po de dag tu bskal pa chen po brgyad khri zhi stong du mtshams sbyar rung 'khor nas sdug bsngal mthar byed do// 'di lta ste/ dper na skud pa'i du gu yang ba steng ga nam mkha' las 'phagA
pa bzangs pa zhu sa lu 'bab pa de bzhin du/ byis pa 'am mkhas pa gang dag yazhi bdag kyang de dag la bskal pa chen po brgyang khri bzhi stong du mtshams sbyor cing 'khor nas sdug bsngal mthar
byed do// de la dge sbyong dang bram ze gang dag 'di skad ces/ bdag tshul khrims sum/ brtul zhugs sam/ dka' thub bam/ tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa 'dis las
yongs su smin bar bya zhing/ yongs su snyani ba ni rag par byas nas byang bar bya'o zhes zer ba 'ga' yang med do// bdeb dang sdug bsngal 'di nges pa yin no// yar skye ba dang mar 'grib
panam srid do// 'di lta bu 'ad/ de dang gzhan ma yin pas/ 'khor ba gzhal lo zhes mtshan+ti/ btsun pa nape ran ma zhig a ma'i 'bras bu rnams dris na/
la ku tsa'i 'bras bu rnams lung ston par bgyid la/ la kutsa'i 'bras bu rnams dris na/ a mra'i 'bras bu rnams lung ston par bgyid pa de bzhin du/ ma pham skra'i la ba can la
sgyu bdag gis yang dag par mthong nga'i dag sbyong tshul gyi 'bras bu dus na/ 'khor ba dag rkang lung ston par bgyidi nas/ btsun pa de la bdag 'dasnyam du sems te/ bdag 'dra ba'i skyes bu
mkhas pas gzugs mdzes par bkur ba yul na gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze la da ji ltar mngon sum dusmad par bya snyam nas/ ma pham skra'i la ba can gyis smas
pa la mngon par bstod par yang ma brgyad/ snyad pa yang ma brgyadi de/ mngon par bstod par yang ma bgyis/ smad bar yang ma bgyis par stan las langs te mchis nas/ bdag
gcer bu pa garkyen gyi bu gang na ba deramachis te/ mchas nas gathobu pa gnyen gyi bu la 'di skadas/ btsun pa gnyen gyi bu 'jig rten gyi las kyi gnas dang bzo'i gnas tha dad pa
gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste/ 'phreng brgyud pa dang/ lcag ma mkhan dang/ gdanub dang/ rtswa thunadang/ 'dul mkhan dang/ glang po che la zhen pa dang/ rta la zhon pa dang//
shing mkhan dang/ ral gri'i thabs dang/ gzhu'i 'dzin stangs pa dang/ zhim 'bring byed pa dang/ go ro khong dang/ bro gar len pa dang/ rgyal po'abu 'ab gnon tshan po che dpa' ba tshul
phodopa rnams dang/ mnyes par byed pa dang/ sku mkhan dang/ khrus mkhan de rnams rang rang gi bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas rnams kyis bya ba byed cing sbyin pa dag gtong/ bsod nams
dag byed la gso ba rnams gas zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor ning ldan par gyur nas// rtsi bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed na/ de lta burnams la la da dag par
mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu gdags ba 'thob bam zhes dras pa na/ ngo 'de skad ces rgyal po chen po bdag na 'di ltar lta zhing 'daskad ces smaste/ skyes bu gang zag 'dis sa sar
myong ba gang yin pa ci yang rung ste/ de thams cad sngon byas pa'i rgyu las byung ba yin no// las rlung pa rnams nadika'agrub kyis 'byang bar 'gyur la las sar pa rnams ni mi bya ba'o
chu lon gyis bzlog par bya'o// de ltar na phyin chad zag pa medade/u0f7c/ zag pha med na las zad do// las zad na sdug bsngal zad do// sdug bsngal thad na sdug bsngal mthar byed par 'gyur
rozhis mchi ste/ btsun pa dmar na sa zhig a mra'i 'bras bu rnams dris na/ la ku tsa'i 'bras bu rnams lung ston par brgyad la/ la ku tsa'i 'bras bu rnams dris na/ a mra'i 'bras/
bu rnams lung ston par bgyid pa de bzhin du/ gcer bu pa gshen gyi bu la bdag gis yang dag par mthong ba'idage sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu dris na/ sren bgyis pa'i rgyu las
byung ba nyid lung ston par bgying nas/ btsun pa de la bdag 'dasnyam du sems te/ bdag 'dra ba'i skyes bu mkhas pas gzugs bzang por bkur ba yul na gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge sbeng ngam/
bram ze la mngon sum du smad pa ni bdag gi che ma lags sosnyam nas/ bdag gas gcer bu gnyen gyi bye'i snas pa la mngon par bstod pa yang ma brgyad/ smad pa yang ma 'gyu8 de/[0f38]mngon par
bstod pa yang m bgyis/ smad pa yang ma bgyis par stan las langs te mches nas/ bdag ka t+ya'i bu nyegacan gang na bder mchis te/ mams nas ka t+ya'i bu nog can la 'di skad ces/
btsun pa ka t+ya'i bu 'jig rten gyi las kyi gnas dang bzo'i gnas tha dad pa gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste/ 'phreng brgyud pa dang/ smyug ma mkhan dang/ gangan pa dang rtswa thun dang/ 'dul
mkhan dang/ glang po che la zhon pa dang/ rna la zhon pa dang/ shang rta mkhan dang/ ral gri'i thabs dang/ gzhu'a'adzin stangs pa dang/ zham 'brang byed pa dang/ go re long dang/
bro gar len pa dang/ rgyal po'i bu rab gnon tshon po tshe dpa' ba rtul phod pa rnams dang/ mnyes par byed pa dang/ sku mkhan dang/ khrus mkhan de rnams rang rang gi bzo'i gnas dang las
kyis gnas rnams kyis bya ba byed cing sbyin pa dag gtong/ bsod nams dag byed la gso ba rnams gso zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor tsang ldan par gyur nas/ rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed
dga' dgur spyod par byed na/ de lta burnams la yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyongag tshul gyi 'bras bu bdags pa 'thong ngam zhes de skad dris pa dang ka ta'i bu nog can bdag la 'ad sad byas//
rgyal po chen po bdag ni 'di ltar lta zhing 'di skad smaste/ gal te 'ga' zhig bdag gi gan du mchis te 'di skad ces/ 'jig rten pha rol yod dam zhes dris na/ de labadag 'jig rten pha rol yod
rozhis dri ba dris pa'i lan 'debasaso// 'jig rten pha rol med pa dang/ 'jig rten pha rol yod pa dang/ med pa dang/ yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin pa dang/ de bzhin du 'jig rten
pha rol 'di lta bu nyid dang 'di lta bu ched ma yin pa dang/ gzhan 'di dang/ gzhan nyid ma yin pa dang/ 'jig rten pha rol gzhan ma yin pa nyid dang/ gzhan ma yin pa ri ma yan pa yin
nam zhes 'drin/ de la 'jig rten pha rol gzhan ma yin pa nyide dang/ gzhan ma yin pa 'di ma yin no zhes dris pa'i lan 'debasasazhes mchas nas/ bag re lu 2dasumadusems te/ rgyal
po'i khab 'dan rab tu byung bar gyur pa ji snyed gnas pa de rnams kyi nang na lhag par blun pa/ lhag par glen pa// lhag par slu bar byed pa ni 'di lta ste/ ka ta'i bunog can 'di yin nosAm pu
las de la yang bag 'di snyam du sams te/ bdag 'dra ba'i skyes bu mkhas pas gzugs bzang por bkur ba pu lan gtug mar gnas pa dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze man/
sum du spyad pa ni bdag gi cha ma lags so snyam nas/ bdag gis ka ta'i bu nog can gyis smras pa la mngon bar bstod par yang ma brgyade/ smad par yang ma brgyad de/ mngon par bastod pa yang ma bgyis/
smad pa yang ma bgyis par stan las langs te mams lags te/ bcom ldan 'das la bdag don da kho ra zhu lags na/ btsun pa 'jig rten gyi las kyi gnas dang bzo'i gnas tha dad pa gang dag lags
'a pa 'di lta ste/ 'phreng brgyad pa dang/ smyug ma mkhan dang/ gangan pa dang/ rtswa thun dang/ 'dul mkhan dang/ glang po che la 'tshal ba dang/ rta la 'tshal ba dang/ shing rtam khan
dang ral gri'i thabs dad/ gzhu'i 'dzin stangs pa dang/ 'am 'bring brgyud pa dang go re long dang/ brogor len pa dang/ rgyal po'i bu rab gnon tshan po che dpa' ba rtul phod pa
khan+d+he rnams dang/ mnyes par ng[©]de pa dang// sa mkhan rang khrus mkhon de rnams rang rang gi bza'a gnas dang las kyi gnas rnams kyas bgyi ba bgyidi rung snyan pa dag stsol/ bsod su
dag brgyade la gso ba dag gso zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byoratsang ldan par gyur nas/ rtse bar bgyur/ dga' bar bgyade dga' dgur spyod par bgyaden/ de lta burnams la yang dga'
mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu gdags pa 'thob lags sam/ rgyal po chen po de'i phyir khyed nyid la dri yis/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du de lung ston cig/ rgyal po chen
po dper na/ 'di ni khyod bran mngag gzhug pa go re long rang dbang med pa dga' dgur byang med pa zhig yod pa des/ khyod steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi la 'dug ste/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor
tsang ldan par gyur nas/ skyes pa med par rol mes rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa mthengo ngo// mthong nas kyang 'dasnyam du sems te/ lus 'phags 'ibu
ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'di yang ma yin la/ bdag kyang ma yin pa las gzhan du na lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras sngon bsod nams dag byas shas bsags ba
des na/ da ltar stong gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi la 'dug nas/ skyes pa med pa'i rol mos rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed kyis/ ma la bdag gis kyang dag pa'i
chos cung zad yang dag par blangs te gnas par bya'o snyam zhing/ bdag gis dge ba'i chos ci zhig yang dag par blangs te gnas par bya snyam ba los/ ma la bdag sa dang kha spu bregs te gos
dur smrig bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas med par rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam nas/ des de ltar thag bcad de skra dang kha spu bregs nas/ gos dur smig bgos te//
dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas/ ris ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs te/ srog gcod pa las slar log/ ma byin par
[Y ]len pa dang/ ma tshangs par snod pa dang/ brdzun du smra ba dang/ phra ma dang/ tshig rtsub po dang/ tshig 'khyal pa dang/ brnab sems dang/ gnod sems dang/ log bar lta
ba sbangs te/ leg par lta ba las slar log par gyur pa de/ khyod kyi zho shas 'tsho ba rnams ljongs su 'khyam zhing dong bas mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang de rnams 'di snyam du sems
te 'di ni lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i 'bangs mngag gzhug pa go re long rang dbang med pa dga' dgur byar med ba yan na/ de sa dang kha spu bregs nas gos tur
smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung gas/ de rjesrid 'tsho ba'i ngeng ra du srog gcod pa spangs te/ srog gcod pa las slar leg/ ma byin par len
[à ]bar ng/ ma tshangs par s+yed pa dang/ brdzun du smra ba dang/ phra ma dang tshig rtsub po dang/ tsheg 'khrul pa dang 2 brnab sems dang// gnod sems dang/ log par lta ba
spyas te/ log par lta ba las slar log nas yang dag pa'i lta ba dang ldan gyis/ mel bdag cag rgyal po'i sa nasngar dong la snyan du gsol lo zhes/ de rnams khyod kyi drung du 'ongs nas
sa pa lha mkhyen pa aglod du gsal lha'i/ 'dzas pa/ pa lhug pa go 'i da ltachis pa dga' dgur bgyir ma mchis pa zhig mchis pa de/ su dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur/
smigaT gos dag// da pa yang dag pa khonan khyimanasi ra ma/ pagasan/ 5 ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs te/ srog gcod pa las slar log/ ma bya'i par len pa
dang 7 ngam pa3 spyod pa dang/ brdzun du/ ba pa phral dang/ rgyu la pho dang/ tshig 'khyal pa dang/ bab sems dang/ gnod sems dang/ log par lta ba sbangs to//
log par lta ba las slar log nas yang dag pa'i lta ba dang ldan lags so zhes smra ba na ]rgyal po chen po de la ji snyam du sems/ jig khyod kyis de skad smra ba la/ shes ldan dag deng la ma
khug cig dang/ slar yang nga'i bran mngag gzhug pa ge re la rang dbang med par 'gyur ro zhes sla bar 'gyur ram btsun pa ma lags so// gzhan du na bdag de la bal ba'i slad du mcha ste/
des sngon bdag la mngon du smra ba dwang/ phyag 'tshal ba dang/ ldang ba dang/ thal mo sbyar ba dang/ 'dud pa'i las gang lags pa brgyas lags pas/ de nyid la bdag gis de dag bgyi zhing/
ji srade 'tsho'i bar du de la 'di lta ste/ chos gos dang/ bsad skams dang/ gnas mkha dang/ nad kyi rkyen snyan gyi yabyad rnams kyis bstabs par bgyi'o// rgyal po chen po de rje
snyam du sems/ de lta yin na ngas yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bstan pa ma yin nam/ btsun pa mad gas te/ de lta na bcom ldan 'das kyis

yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'brasabu bstan lags so// rgyal po chen po dper na/ khyed kyi yul 'dan khyim bdag zhing pa skrun pa skyed pa/ rgyal po'i bang mdzod 'phel bar byed pa zhig
yod pa des/ khyod seng ge khang babs kyi gzhal 'dug nas/ skyes pa med par rol mos rtse bar byed/ gar thar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du
sems te/ lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'di yang ma yin la/ bag kyang ma yin pa las gzhan dun lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes gra sngon bsod nams
dag byas shing bsags pa des na/ da ltar steng gi khang bzangs kyagazhir song nas/ skyes pa med pa'i rol mos rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed kyis/ ma la
bdag gas kyang dge ba cung zad yang dag par blangs te gnas par bya'o snyam zhing/ bdag gso dge ba'i chos zhig yang dag par blangs te gnas par bya snyam pa las/ ma la bdag skra dang kha spu breg
te gos ngur sag bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam nas/ jis de ltar thag bcad de sku dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smig bgos te/
dad pa yang dag ba kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas/ des ji sridi 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs te da srog gcod pa las slar log/ ma byas par len pa dang/ ma tshangs par/
spyod pa dang/ brdzun du smra ba dang/ phra ma dang/ tshig rtsub po dang/ tshig 'khyal pa dang/ brnab sems dang gnod sems dang/ log par lta ba spangs te/ log par lta ba las
slar log par gyur ba de/ khyod kyi zheshas 'tsho ba rnams ljongs su 'khyam zhing dong bas mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dani lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+ha'i
rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i khyim bdag zhing pa skrun pa skyed pa/ rgyal po'i bang mdzod 'phel bar byed pa yan na/ de skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos dur ga bags te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas
khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas/ de ji srid 'tsho'aber du srog gcod pa spangs te/ srog gcod pa las slar log/ ma byin par len pa dang/ mtshangs pa pasprod pa dang/
brdzun du smra ba dang/ phra ma dang/ tshig rtsub po dang/ tshig 'khyal pa dang/ brnab sems dang/ gnod sems dang/ log par lta ba sngangs te/ log par lta ba las slar log
nas yong dag pa'i lta ba dang ldan gyis/ ma la bdag cag rgyal bo'i s+yan sngar dong la gsol lo zhes/ de rnams khyod kyi drung du 'ongs nas sas pa// lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ lha'i
khyim bdag zhing ba skrun pa bskyed pa rgyal po'i bang mdzod 'phel bar bgyid pa zhig mchis pa de/ skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smig bgos nas/ dad pa la ngo dag pa kho nas
khyims khyim med par rab tu byung nas/ des rjesrid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs te/ srog gcod pa las slar log 2 ma byin par len pa dang/ ma tshangs par spyod pa dang/ brdzun du
sba ba dang/ phra ma dang/ tshig rtsub pa dang/ tshig 'khyal pa dang/ brnab sems dad/ gnod sems dang/ log par lta ba spangs te/ log par lta ba las slar log ste/ yang
dag pa'i lta ba dang ldan lags so zhes sman/ rgyal po chen po de ji snyam du sems/ jig khyod kyis de skad smra ba la/ shes ldan dag deng la ma ri khug cig dang/ slar yang nga'i zhing pa skrun pa/
bskyed pa rgyal po'i phing mdzod 'phel ba'i 'gyur zhes sna bar 'gyur ram/ btsun pa ma lags so// gzhan du na bdag de la blta ba'asad du mchi ste/ des sngon bdag la mngon du skya ba dang/
phyag 'tshal ba dang/ ldang ba dang/ thal mo sbyar ba dang/ 'dud pa'i las gang dag lags pa bgyis lags pas/ de nyid la bdag gis de dag bgyi zhing dza sAde 'tsho'i bar du de la 'di lta
ste chos gos dang/ bsod snyoms dang/ gnas mal dang/ nad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bstabs par bgyi'o// rgyal po chen po de jisnyam du sems/ de lta yin
na bas yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bstan pa ma yin nam/ btsun pa mad lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu/
bstan lags so// rgyal po chen po 'di la ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten
mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba// bla na med pa// lha dang ma rnams kyi ston pas nags rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ des chos bshad pa ni thong mar dge ba//
bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang pa/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs sudag pa/ rnam par byang ba/ tshangs par spyod pa rab tu ston/
te chos de khyim bdag gam/ khyim bdag gi bsama'an to/ des chos de thes nas/ gnas gsum po 'di lta ste/ chags pa'i ches dang/ zhe sdang gi chos dang/ gdimug gi chos
la ston pa'i rnam par dag pa tshol bar byed de/ ci tshe dang ldan pa 'dal chags pa gang gis zil gyis non cingesems la khyab na/ ma shes bzhin khonar ma shes so zhes smA/ ma mthong bzhin
kho nar mthong ngo zhes s zhang/ gzhan dag la yang gang dag la yun ring por gnod pa dang/ phan pa ma yin pa dang/ sdug bsngal bar 'gyur bde lta de ltar ston pa'i chags pa ma spangs pa dag
yongs su ma shes pa dang/ ma bkag pa dang/ ma bsal ba'i chags pa de yod dam/ 'on te tshe dang ldan b 'di la chags pa gang gis thal gyis non cing sems la khyab
na mashes bzhin kho nar shes so zhes smra/ ma mthong bzhin khonar mthong ngo zhes sma zhung/ gzhan dag la yang gang de dag la yun ring por gnod pa dang/ phan ba ma yin pa dang/ sdug bsngal
bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar ston pa'i chags ba ma slangs pa dang/ yongs su ma shes ba dang/ ma bkag pa dang/ ma bsal ba'i chags pa de med snyam na/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ tshem
dang ldan pa 'di la chags pa gang gis zil gyis non cingasems la khyab na/ mashes bzhin kho nar shes so zhes smra/ ma mthong bzhin khonar mthong ngo zhes smra zhing/ gzhan dag la yang gang
de dag la yun ring por gnod pa dang/ phan pa ma yin pa dang/ sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar ston pa'i chags pa ma spangs pa dang/ yongs su mashes pa dang/ ma bkag pa dang/
ma bsal ba'i chags pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ mchags pa'i lus kyi 'du byed dang/ ngag gi 'du byed dang/ yid kyi 'du byed gang dag yin pa de dag tshe dang ldan pa 'di la led la/ 'di
chos gang mdor bsdus pa 'am/ rgyas par 'chad kyang rung/ 'di'i chos ni zhi ba/ gya nom pa/ zob pa zab par snang ba/ mthong bar daka' ba/ rtogs par dka' ba/ brtag
bar bya ba ma yan pa/ rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa/ zhib mo brtags pa'i mkhas pa dang mdzangs pas rag par bya ba yin na/ de yang 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa 'di gcig tu chags pas na shes ba'
slab ma yin pas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'di ma chags pa yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa 'din chags ba ma yin no snyam mo// gang ga tsha'adi dang po chags pa'i ches la rnam par dag par mthong nas/ de'i
'og tu gnyis pa zhe sdang gi chos dang/ gsum pa gti mug ga chos tshol bar byed de/ catshe dang ldan pa 'di la gti mug gangags zil gyisanon cing sems la khyab na/ mashes bzhin kho nar shes
so zhes// ma mthong bzhin kho nar mthong ngo zhes sa zhinge/ gzhan dag la yang gang de dag la yun ring por gnon pa dang/ phan pa ma yin pa dang/ sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar ston pa'i
gti mug ma sbas pa dang/ yongs su ma shes pa dang/ ma bkag pa dang/ ma bsal ba'agati mug de yod dam/ 'on te tshe dang ldan pa 'di la gti mug gang gis zil gyis non cing sems la
khyab na/ ma shes bzhin kho nar shes so zhes// ma mthong bzhin kho nar mthong ngo zhes smra zhing/ gzhan dag la yang gang de dag la yun ring por gnod pa dang/ phun ba ma yin pa dang/ sbrag
bsngal bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar ston pa'i gti mug ma spangs pa dang/ yongs su ma shes pa dang/ ma bkag pa dang/ ma bsal ba'i gti mug de medasuman/ de 'di snyam du sems te/
tshe dang ldan pa 'di la gti mug gang gas zil gyis non tsang sems la khyaban/ ma shes bzhin kho nar shes so zhes s+sa/ ma mthong bazhin khe nar mthong ngo zhes zhing/
gzhan dag la yang gang de dag la lun ring por gnod pa dang/ phan pa ma yin pa dang 2 sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar ston pa'i gti mug masangs pa dang/ yongs su mas pa dang/
ma bkag pa dang/ ma bsal ba'i gti mug de med do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ gti mug med pa'i lus kyi 'du byed dang/ ngag gi 'du byed dang/ yad kyi 'du byed gang dag yin pa de dag tshe
dang ldan pa 'di la yod la/ 'di chos gangamador bsdus pa 'am/ rgyas par 'chad kyang rung/ 'di'i chos ni zhi ba gya nom pa/ zab pa/ zab par snang ba/ mthong bar dka'
ba rtogs par dka' ba/ brtag par bya ba ma yin pa/ rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa/ zhib mo brtags pa'i mkhas pa dang mdzangs pas rag par bya ba yin na/ de yang 'di ltar
tshe dang ldan pa 'di gcig tu gtumug pas na shes bar bla ba ma yin pas/ tshe dang ldan ba 'di na gti mug ba ma yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa 'di ni gti chug med pa yin no snyam mo// gar gtsA
'di gsum pa gti mug gi chos la rnam par dag par mthong nas/ de'i 'og tu 'di la rnam pa dang ldan pa'i dad pa skyed par byed do// dad pa skyes nas 'di ltar slob par byed de/ khyim
0 na gnas pa ni gnod pa can/ rdul khrod na gnas pa yin la/ rab tu byung ba ni mngon par skabs yod pa yin te/ khyim ba khyim na gnas pas na ji sridi 'tsho'i bar du gcig tu sal gyis
dag par tshangs par sbyod ba yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dgapa rnam par byang ba 'ba' zhig po 'di la spyad par bya ba ma yin pas/ ma la bdag skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smig bgos
nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam ste/ des de ltar thag gcad nas nor gyi tshogs mang po 'am/ zung du sbas te/ zhe phu'i 'khor mang
po 'am nyung du sungs nas/ skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo// de de bzhin du rab tu byung sa/ de tshul
khrims dang ldan pa la gnas pa yin/ so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa yin/ spyod pa dang spyod yul phun sum tshogs pa yani/ tha na kha na ma tho ba phra mo la yang 'jigs par lta ba/
yan bsub pa'i gzhi rnams blangs te slob pa yin no// desrog gcod pa spangs nas/ srog gcod pa las slar log pa yin te/ chad paspungs yin/mtshon nas sa pa ya'i/'dzem pa
dang snyadi rjer ldan pa yani/ sems can srog chags su gyur pa thams cad la chung du na srog chags grog sbur yan chad srog gcod pa lasaslar log pa yin no// dem byin par len pa spangs
nas ma byin par len pa la slar log pa yin te/ byin pa len pa yin/ byin pa la dga' ba yin/ byin pa lhug par btang ba la dga' ba yin te/ rkun kag
na brkam chags ma lan/ gtsang ma yin/ dgag pa yin/ bdag nyidi kha na ma tho ba med par srung zhing/ mkhyan par len pa las slar log pa yin no// de ma tshangs bar
med ba saanas/ ma tshangs par spyod pa las slar log pa yin te/ ma tshangs bar spyod pa ma yin/ spyod pa ngan pa spangs pas dag pa yani/ gtsang ba yin/ dri nga ba med pa/
yin 'khAg pa dang bral ba yani/ smad rams kyi chos dang bral ba yani/ ma tshangs par spyod pa las slar log pa yin no// de brdzun du sna ba sangs nas/ brdzun du sal
las slar leg ba yin te/ bden par sla ba yin/ bden par s pa la dga' ba yin/ mnyan par 'os pa yin/ yadi chos pa yin/ brten pa yin/ 'jig rten la mi sgrub
lan taM/ brdzun du smra ba las slar log pa yin no// de phru ma'i tshig spangs nas/ phra ma las slar log pa yin te/ de tshu ga dag las thos te/ de dag dbyeba'i phyir pha gi dgalo
sa ba ma lan/ pha gi dag las thos te/ de dag dbye ba'i phyir tshu ga dag kha sbyabam yani/ bye ba rnams sdums byed ba yin/ mthun pa rnams la gzengs bstod pa yani/ mthun
pa la dga' ba yin/ mthun pa la mgu ba yin/ mthun par byed pa'i tshig sna ba yin te/ phra ma las slar log pa yanano// de tshig rtsub po spungs nas/ tshig rtsub po las slar log
pa yin te/ de gang yang tsheg gdug pa dang/ rtsub pa dang/ pha rol la ma nyan pa dang/ pha rol smra 'gong bar byed pa dang/ skye bo mang po'i yadi la ma 'thad pa dang/ skye bo mang po'i
snyang du mi sdug pa dang/ skye bo mang bo mi dga' ba dang/ skye bo mang po'i yad du ma 'ong ba dang/ mnyam par bzhag ba ma yin pa dang/ mnyam par 'jog par 'gyur ba ma lan bde
lta bu'i tshig spangs nas/ gang yang ma tshugs pa dang/ rnar snyan pa dang/ snyang la 'bab pa dang dga' bar byed pa dang/ grong khyer pa dang/ snyan nge 'dzebs pa dang/
rnam par gsal ba dang/ rnam par rig par byed pa dang/ mnyan par 'os pa dang/ mi rten pa dang/ 'gal ba ma yin pa dang/ thub pa med pa dang/ skye bo mang bo la sdug ba dang/
skye bo mang bo mgu ba dang/ skye bo mang po dga' ba dang/ skye bo mang bo'i yid du 'ong ba dang/ mnyam par bzhag ba dang/ mnyam par 'jog par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshig smra bas//
tshig rtsub po las slar log pa yin no// de tshig bkyal ba srings nas tshig bstsal pa las slar log pa yin te/ de dus su smra ba yin/ yang dag par sla ba yan/ de khon nyid slar
@#// yin/ don smra ba yani/ chos smra ba yani/ rtogs ba slu ba yin/ khong du chud par byed pa'i tshig smra ba yin te/ dus su dang 'dren ma ma yin pa dang/ gling
gzhi dang bcas pa dang/ dan rtags dad bcas pa dang/ chos dang don dang ldan pa yin te/ tshig bkyal pa las slar log pa yin no// de ko tshong sngangasanas/ ko tshong las slar log
pa yin te/ de gzhal blugs la g.yo byed pa dang/ srang la g.yo byed pa dang/ tshad la g.yo byed pa sangasanas/ gzhal blugs la g.yo byed pa dang/ srang lu g.yo byed pa dang/ tshad
la g.yo byed pa las slar log pa yin no// de gsug len pa dang/ 'drad pa dang/ bsdogs nas rang gar byed pa spangasanas/ gsug len pa dang 'drad pa dang/ bsdogs
nas rang gar byed pa las slar log pa yin no// de gsad pa dang/ btsade ba dang/ gcad ba dang/ dbugs pa dang/ bsdog pa'i bsam pa spangs nas/ gsod pa dang/ 'ching ba [7]
dang/ gcod pa dang/ 'bags pa dang/ brdzogs pa nyams su myong bar byed ba las slar log pa yin no// de 'od dang bud med dang lhan cig nyal ba sngaanas/ 'od dad bud med dang
lhan cig nyal ba las slar log pa yin no// de zhang ga gzhi dang/ khyim gyi gzhadang/ tshong khang gi gzhi len pa spangs nas/ zhang ga gzhadang/ khyim gyi gzhadang/ tshong
khang gi gzhi len pa las slar log pa yin no/ de gla po che dang/ rta dang/ ba lang dang/ lug dang// bya gag dang/ phag len pa spangs nas/ glang po che dang/ rta dang/
ba 'ang dang/ lug dang/ bya gag dang/ lag len pa las slar log pa yin no// de bran pho dang/ bran modang/ las byed pa dang/ zho shas 'tsho ba len pa spangs nas/ bran
pho dang/ bran ma dang/ las byed dang ltog shas 'tshob ran pa las slar log pa yin no// de bud med dang/ skyes pa dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo len pa sbangs dang/ bud
med dang/ skyes pa dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo lan pa las slar log pa yin no// de gser dang dbur len pa sangs nas/ gser dang dngul len pa las slar log pa yin no//
du 'bru rjen pa len pa sngangs nas/ 'bru rjen pa len pa las slar log pa yin no// de bra gcig pa yin te/ nub mo'i sngangs shang dus ma yan pa'i kha zas smrangs pa yan/ dus
su rgya zhing dus su spyod pas sbyor ba la brtson pa yin/ de lus 'tsho ba tsam gyi chos gos kyis chog shes shing tshod zin pa yin/ bsod snyoms lto 'grangs kyis chog shes/
shing tshod zin pa yin no// de lus 'tsho ba tsam gyi chos gos kyis chog shes shing tshod zin/ bsod snyoms lto 'grangs kyis chog shes shing tshod zin pas/ gang dang gang
du 'gro ba na lhung bzed dang bcas chos gos dang bcas pas 'gro'o// dpar na 'dab chags bya gang dang gang du ldang ba der 'dab ma dang bcas gshog pa dang
bcas te lding ba de bzhin du/ de lus 'tsho ba tsam gyi chos gos kyis chog shes shing tshod zin/ bsod snyoms lto 'grangs kyis chog shes shing tshod zin pas/ gang dang gang du
'gro ba na lhung bzed dang bcas/ chos gos dang bcas pas 'gro'o// 'dul ba gzhu// bam po brgya bdun pa/ rgyal po chen po 'di
ltar yang dgo sbyong ngam/ bram ze kha cig dad pas byin pa dag spradunas/ sa bon gyi tshogs dang 'byung po'i tshogs sna tshogs rtsom ba la sbyorab r brtson pas gnas pa 'di lta ste rtswa
ba'i sa bon dang/ sdong bu'i sa bon dang/ thor to'i sa bon dang/ 'gas pa'i sa bon dang/ lta pa sa bon gyi sa bon nyid de/ go sbyong gi sa bon gyi tshogs dang 'byung po'i tshogs
sna tshogs rtsom pa la sbyor bar brtson pa de lta bu las slar log pa yin no// rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang dag sbyong ngam/ bram ze kha gdadapas byin pa dag spyad nas/ gsog
'jog sna tshogs rtsom pa la sbyor bar brtson pas gnas pa 'di lta ste/ zas kyi gsog 'jog dang/ skom gyi gsog 'jog dang/ gos kyi gsog 'jog pa/ dri'i gsog 'jog
dang me tog 'phreng gi gsog 'jog dang/ lo ma'i gsog 'jog dang me tog gi gsog 'jog dang 'bras bu'i gsog 'jog ste/ dge sbyong ni gsog 'jog sna tshogs rtsom pa
la sbyor bar brtson pa de lta bu las slar log pa yin no// rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze kha cig dang pas byin pa dag spyad nas/ gnas mal mthon po dang/ gnas
mal chen po sna tshogs rtsom ba la sbyor bar brtson pas gnas par byed pa 'di lta ste stanadang/ khA dang/ khri snam bu can dang/ sa kyi snam bu can dang/ be'u rdzas kyis g.yog
pa dang/ ras yug chen gyis g.yogs pa dang/ ras khra bos g.yogs pa dang/ pa le la'i ras kyis g.yogs pa dang/ glang po cho'i 'thab stan dang/ rta'i 'thabastan dang//
ngos gcig bal las byas pa dang/ ngos gnyis ka bal las byas pa dang/ stod bal las byas pa dang/ rgyab bal las byas pa dang/ ka lang ka'i gos kyi steng g.yogs dang/
steng g.yogs dang bcas pa'i gos dang/ phyogs gnyis su stas dmar po bcug ba ste/ dwage sbyong na gnas mal mthon po dang/ gnas mal chen bo rtsom pa la sbyor bar brtson pa de
lta bu las slar log pa yin no/ rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang dge sbyongangam/ bram ze kha cig dad pas byin pa dag spyad nas/ cha ba dang gzhag pa sna tshogs rtsom pa la sbyor bar brtson
bsa gnas al 'di lta ste/man da dbakru ba dang/ dril phyi dang/ me tog gi 'phreng ba dang/ dri dang/ byug pa dang/ khag 'chang ba dang/ sen mo'i kha dog sgyur ba dang//
sa byi dor byed pa dang/ khar phye ma 'debs pa dang/ gdong ga byi dor dang/ gdong me long la blta ba dang/ gtsug phud 'tshang ba dang/ gdugs kyi rtsa ba sbu gu can dang/ ral gri dang/
rje yab nor bu'i yul can dang/ mchil lham khra bo dang/ ges sar pa dang/ ras sar pa kha tshar can 'chang ba'i rang bzhin dgaste/ dge sbyong ni bzhi g pa dang ma ba sna tshogs rtsom pa la
sbyor bar brtson bde lta bu las slar log pa yin no// rgyal po chon po 'di ltar yang dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze kha cig dad pas byin ba dag phyudanas/ ltad mo sna tshogs rtsom pa la sbyor bar
brtson pas gnas ba 'di lta ste// glang po chos 'gyed pa dang/ sa 'gyed pa dang/ shing rtas 'gyed pa dang dbung bu chung gas 'byed pa dang/ dbyug pas 'gyed pa dang/ khu
tshur gyis 'gyed pa dang/ khyu mchog gis 'byed pa dang/ ma nyes 'byed ba dang/ ra 'gyed pa dang/ lug 'gyedapa dang/ bya gag 'thab ba dang/ mchil ba 'grub pa dang/
'ur pa 'thab pa dang/ bya gag dang/ mchal pa dang/ 'ur par 'thab ba nga/ bud med 'thab pa dang/ skyes ba 'thab ba dang/ gzhon nu 'thab ba dang/ gzhon nub 'thab pa
dang shing la 'dzeg pa dang/ bro gar gyi tshogs dang/ phrag pa nas 'gong ba dang/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo dang/ dbung gi tshogs dang// g.yul bshams pa dang/ dmag
ga tshogs la blta ba dang/ 'dun phal chen po la blta bar 'dod pa ste/ dge sbyong na ltad mo sna tshogs rtsom pa la sbyor bar brtson pa de lta bu las slar ldog pa yan no/ rgyal po
chen be 'di ltar yang dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze kha cig dad pas byin pa dag spyad nas/ sgra sna tshogs skrun brtson pas gnas pa 'di lta ste/ glang pa 'askad dang/ rtadzin dang/
shang rta' sa dang/ dbung bu chung gas dang/ rdzapa Ta ha' sa dang/ dung gi sku par/ rnga bo che'as dang/ rol mo'i tshogs pa'i s dang/ gar mkhan gyi sku dang/ gru'i
sgra dang// smra ba'i sgra dang/ se gel gyis dang/ thal me'i sa dang/ bum pa'i na dang/ rang bzo dang/ snyan dngags dang/ tshig dang/ yi ge sna tshogs dang/ 'jig
rten rgyang 'phen dang ldan pa dang grags pa'i gtam kan 'ded ba dag ste/ dge sbyang nas sna tshogs zhan par rtsom pa la sbyor bar brtson pa de lta bu las slar log pa yin no//
rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang dge sbyong ngag/ bram ze kha cig dad pas bya'i pa dag spyad nas/ ugashudadang/ khrus dang/ rgyan ba rtsom pa la sbyor bar brtson bar gnas pa 'di
lta ste/ mgi brgyad pa dang/ mgabcu ba dang/ na ya'i mag dang/ phyogs phyogs nas 'gyed pa dang/ bum pas rtse ba dang/ tsa li dang/ su kha le dang/
pheg gas rtse ba dang/ gul tsab dang/ thur ma dang/ lag brgyan dang/ skugs ji lta bar 'gyed pa ste/ dge sbyong ni ag shud dang/ khrus dang/ rgyun po rtsom pa la sbyor ba de lta/
bu las slar log pa yin no// rgyal po tshon po 'di ltar yang dge steng ngam/ bram ze kha cig dad pas byin pa dag cad nas/ gtam sna tshogs rtsom pa la sbyor bar brtson pas gnas
pa 'di ltaste/ rgyal po'i gtam dang/ chom rkun gyi gtam dang dmag ga gtam dang/ zas kyi gtam dang/ skom gyi gtam dang/ gesA kyi gtam dang/ tshong dus kyi gtam
dang smad 'tshong gi gtam dang/ las ngan pa brjod pa'i gtam dang/ rgya mtsho chen po brjod pa'i gtam dang/ 'jig rten brjod pa'i gtam dang/ ljongs dang/ sna chen po la gtog
pa bde ba'i gtam ste/ dge sbyong ni gtam sna tshogs rtsom pa la sbyor ba de lta bu las slar log pa yan no// rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze kha cig dang ngas byan pa
dag spyad nas/ rtsod pa'i gtam rtsom pa la sbyor bar brtson pas gnas pa 'di lta ste/ ji ltar kho bos chos 'dul ba 'di kun shes pa de bzhin du khyod kyis kyang chos 'dul ba 'di kun shes/
yod kyi/ 'a ni rags pa dang ldan pa khyod kyi rigs pa dang maldan no// nga' ni 'brel la khyod kyi ma 'brel te/ sngar sa bar bya ba na phyisastsas/ phyis su bar bya ba sngar sas la/
khyod kyis kyang ha cang myur bar smras pas na mgasal lo// brtsad pas mjug brtul rgyas/ khyed kyis brtsad pa'i don du smras pa'i tshig de mthong zhig tshar bcad zin to// gal lcogs

nus na dris dang skyes shig ces bya ba ste/ dge sbyong ni rtsed pa sna tshogs rtsom pa kha sbyor ba de lta bu las slar log pa yin no// rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze kha cig da
pas byon pa dag spyod nas/ pho nyar 'gro ba dang gtong ba log pa'i 'tsho bas 'tsho bar byed pa 'di lta ste/ de dag rgyal po'i 'am/ blon po chen po rnams kyi 'am/ bram ze rnams kyi 'am/
glong ma rnams kyi'am/ yul na rnams kyi 'am/ nor can rnams kyi 'am/ tshong dpon rnams kyi'am/ ded dpon rnams kyi pho nya tshu ga nas khrid de pha gar sna 'dren par byed pa dang/

pha ga nas pho nya khrid de tshur gar sna 'dren par byed pa ste/ dge sbyong na pho nyar 'gro ba dang gtong ba log pa'i 'tsho ba de lta bu las slar log ba yin no// rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang dge sbyong ngam
bram ze kha cig dad pas byin pa dgaspyad nas/ tshul 'chos pa dang kha gsag dang/ gzhogs slongs dang/ thob kyis 'jal ba dang/ rnyed pas rnyed pa sgrub par byed de/ ga sbyang
khyu// na tshul 'chos pa dang/ kho gsag dang/ gzhogs slos dang/ thob kyis 'jal ba dang/ rnyed pas rnyed pa bsgrub pa de lta bu las slar log ba yin no// rgyal po chen
