smanabar gsungs pa'i bka' lha sbyin gyisam mnyan par gyur pas/ mnar ma mchis par gzhol bar gyur pa lagazigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de ltar gyi 'di/
'ba' zhig tum zad de/ ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'di ngas phanapang sbas pa'i tshig mnyanupasatshulam yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngonabyung ba ri ror zhig na
'khrul 'khor gyis slob dpomazhig gnasate/ desajigasamanyam pa lasachungamablangs nas/ dedodang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgungasbyod par byed de/ di rtse bar byed/ dga'
[4]bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/ dus gzhan zhig na chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur te/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lo na ban khye'u zhig btsas so// btsas nas 'di ma bdun gsum
nyi'u gcig tu de'i btsas pa'i btsasaston rgya cher byas nas rigs mthun pa'i ming btags te/ de bskyang basrings nasachen bor gyur pa dang de'i phashi'o// de ri'ong gna'akhrula 'khor gyi
slob dpon gzhan zhig yod pa la/ 'khrul 'khor gyi bzobaslab par brtsams nas/ sa ri'or zhiganakhyimabadag cig yod pa las bu mo bslangs pa dang/ des snasapa dang/ gal
tanyi ma ga gemo zhig ma la 'ongasanani sbyin no// gzhan du na ni ma sbyin no// desa'akhrul 'khor gyi slob dpon lasasapa/ mkhan po ri'i che ge mo zhes bgyi ban khyim bdag cigams
pa la bdag gis bu mo bslangasan/ de'i mchid nas galate nyim ga ge mozhes byab la'ongasanan ni/ 'on te ma 'ongs na nom gyin no zhes mchi'o// 'khrul 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis smras pa/

bu gal tedelta na 'dong kho bo nyid kyis rlung bar bya'o zhis de de dang lhan cigashing las byas pa'i rmabya la zhenanas/ khyimagangal nges par byas pa de nyid kyi nyi ma la ri 'or deng phyin pa 'dzig
rtenagyis mthong nas mchog tu ngo tshapaskyasaso// de nas bu mo blangs te slar yang 'khrul 'khor la zhon te/ rang gi khyim du 'ongs nasa'aphrul 'khor bsdus te/ deng ba la gtad nas
smras pa/ khyod kyi bu 'dis 'khrul 'khor 'gro ba'i sbyor shes kyi sar leg pa mishes kyis/ khyod kyis 'dul 'khrul 'khor ma sbyin cig ces bsgo ba de yang nas
mang du ma la smras la/ yum 'khrul 'khorab dag la stsol cig dang skye bo'i tshogs dbang du bgyi'o// des nasapa/ bu khyod kyi slob dpon re 'di 'khrul 'khor 'gro ba'i sbyor ba shes kyi slar
rgyu log pa mishos kyis ma smin cig zer bas/ tshul ma yin pas sdugabasngal bar 'gyur du 'ong ngo// de bas na'omos mi sbyin no// des smras pa/ yum bdag gis 'gro ba dang
ldog ba 'tshal mod kyi/ slob dpon de brag ga gAmi staramod bud med nisims yang zhing 'dod rkyen che ba yin pas/ de de la byin nas 'khrula 'khor sbyar te zhonanas song dang/ skye bo'i tshogs
chen po dga' bar gyur to// de nas 'khrul gyi slob dpon gyis mthong nas/ des smras pa/ pha gi srung mi 'ong bar song ngo// des ji lta ji ltar 'khrul 'khor bcus pa de ltade ltar
shin tu thagaring por ldings nas/ ji tsam na rgya mtsho chen por ldings pa dang rgya mtsho chen po ni lhas rgyan du char 'bebs pa yin pas/ des sbyor kha rnams bangs nas tshul ma yin bs
sdug bsngal bar gyur to// lhas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gang zhig don 'dod brtse bas lan pa yi// jiyang bstan pa'i tshiganami 'dzin cing// 'chos pa med cing su'i tshig mi
nyan gang// de ni shing lasabyas pa'i bya yis khyer// dge slong dag jisnyam du sems// de'i tshadi'i dus kyi 'khrul 'khor gyi slob dpon gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi
de'i slob ma gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin 'di nying yin te/ de nayang ngas phan par smras na/ pa'i tshig 'dis ma mnyan pas tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to// nga ltar yang ngas phanangar
snusan pa'i tshig 'disamamanyanapas/ mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasalanye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa
dge 'dun gyi dbyenazhes bgyi dge 'dun mthun pa zhes bgyin/ de la dbyen ni gang lags/ dge 'dun rdzun pa ni gang lags/ nyib 'khor 'di ltar dge slong rnams chos la chos ma
yin pa'i'adu shes dang/ chos ma yin pa la chos kyi 'du shes dang/ mimathun pa lamathun pa'i 'du shes kyis las rnams byed na 'di ni dge 'dun gyi dbyen zhes bya'o// 'diltar chos l chos kyi
'du shes dang/ mthunabal mah+phun pa'i'adu shesakyis las rnams byed na 'dinadage 'dun mthun pa zhes bya'o// gang nadage slong gcig gnas pa de ni dge 'dunagyi dbyen du ma 'gyur ro// gang

naganyis dang gsum nas/ brgyad kyi bar du gnas pa den yang dge 'dun gyi dbyen du mi 'gyur ro// gang na dge slong dgu rim lhag pa yodapa de na rgyu gnyis kyis dge 'dun gyi dbyen du 'gyur te/gsol ba'i las
dang tshul shangalenapas so// gsol ba'i las jilta bu zhe na/ 'dultar lha sbyin gyis dge slong rnams la go bar byed/ kun du go bar byed/ slob par byed/ 'dzin du
'jug par byed de/ tshe dang ldan pa dag dag sbyong go'i tamani 'di skad ces/ brtul zhugs kyi gzhi lngas dge slong dag pa dang/ grol ba dang/ nges par 'byung ba dang/ bde ba dang/ sdug bsngal
tshe las 'da' bar 'gyur/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal las 'das pa thob par gyur ti/ tshodang ldan pa dag lta gangazhin/ dge slong dgon pa pa nyid ni dag pa dang/ grol ba dang/ nges par 'byung
klub dang/ bde bdang/ sdug bsngal las 'da' bar 'gyur/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slongashing drung pa nga dang/ bsod snyoms pa 'od
dang chos chos gsum pa nyid dang/ phyag dar khrod pa nyid ni dag pa dang/ grol ba dang/ nges par 'byung pa dang/ bde ba dang/ sdug bsngal las 'da' bar 'gyur/ bde ba dang sdug
bsngalalas 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes zer na/ tshodang ldan pa dag khyed cag las gang brtulazhugs kyi gzhi lnga po 'di dagags dag bdang/ grolab dang/ nges papo'abyung bar mibadrong poredag
dgesbyongago'u dam lasaring du gyisaMshig/ tha dad par gyis shig/ rgyang srings shig ces zerab 'odi nigasolab te/ de lta bu'i gsol ba'i las kyis yin no// tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhen/
'di ltar lnga sbyin gyis dge slong rnams la go bar byed/ kun tu go bar byed/ slob par byed/ 'dzin du 'jug par byed de/ tshe dang ldan pa dag dge sbyong go'u tamani 'di skad ces/ brtul zhugs
kyi gzhilngas dge slong dag pa dang 3grol pa dang/ nges par 'byung ba dang/ bde ba dang/ sdug bsngal las 'da' bar 'gyur/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal las 'das pa thobapar 'gyur te/ tshe dang ldan
pa dag lnga gang zhe na/ dge slong dgon pa ba nyid ni gang dang/ grol ba dang/ nges par 'byung ba dang/ bdeb dang/ sdugabasngal las 'da'abar 'gyur/ bde ba dang sdugang sa la las 'das pa thob par
ro dge slong shing drung pa nyid dang/ bsod snyoms pa nyid dang/ chos gos gsum pa nyid dang/ phyagadakhrodal nying ni dag pa dang/ grol ba dang nges par 'byung ba dang/ bde ba dang/
sdug bsngal las 'da' bar 'gyur/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal las 'das bzlob par 'gyur ro zhes zer na/ tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag las gang brtul zhugs kyi gzhol po rang reg gis dag pa dang/
grol ba dang/ nges bar 'byung ba mibazodang de dag dge sbyong go'u ta ma las ringadu 'gyur/ tha dad par 'gyur/ rgyang sring bar 'gyur gyis/ tshulashang long zhig ces lha sbyin bdag nyid
dang ltas tshulashing len pa yin te/ de lta bu ni tshulangashing len ba yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa re zhig
gnas nias phyung bas dge 'dun gyi dbyen du 'gyur la/ gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pas ma lags/ gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i rjes su phyogs pas
malags/ gnas nias 'byin pas ma lags sam/ gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogasaM pas malags/ gnas nias 'byin pa'i rjesasuphyogs pa'i rjes su phyogs pas ma lags sam//
btsun pa re zhig gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pasadage 'dun gyi dbyen du 'gyur la/ gnas nas phyung bsam lags/ gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i rjes su phyogs nga sa ra
lags/ gnas nas 'byin pa'i malags/ gnas nas 'byon pa'i rjes su phyogs pas ma lags/ gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i rjes su phyogs pas ma lags sam/
btsun pa re zhig gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i rjes su phyogs pas dge 'dun gyi dbyen du 'gyur la/ gnas nas phyung bsu ma lags/ gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pas
malags/ gnas nas 'byon pas ma lags/ gnas nias 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pas ma lags/ gnas nasa'abyin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i rjes su phyogs pas ma lags sam/
btsun pa re zhig gnas nas 'byin pas dge 'dun gyi dbyen du gyur la/ gnas nas phyungabasam lags/ gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs bas ma lags/ gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su
[phyogs pa'i rjes su phyogs pas ma lags/ gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pas ma lags/ gnas nas 'byin nga 'i rjes su phyogs pa'i rjes su phyogs pas ma lags sam//

re zhig gnas nas 'byin pa'iN+Dis su phyogs pa'i rjes su phyogs pas dge 'dun gyi dbyen du 'gyur la/ gnas nas phyung bsam lags/ gnas nas phyung ba'is su phyogs pas ma lags/
gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i rjes su phyogs pas ma lags/ gnas nas 'byin pas ma lags sam gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pas ma lags sam/ nye ba 'khor
gnas nas phyud bo 'ba' zhig ma gtogs par/ 'di dag thams cad kyis dge 'dun gyi dbyen du 'gyur ro// bar sdom la/ dge 'dun dbyen dang mthun pa dang/ gcig pu dge 'dun
dbyen min dang// tham dgu po'i dbyen dang ni//gnas dbyung gsum po drug tshan yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'akhong gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa
bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun pa'i dbyen bgyis nas/ mnar med pa'i kha na ma tho ba skye zhing mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho ba'i las kyis reg par 'gyur rozhes gangagasungs
pa/ btsun pa ji tsam gyis na nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun pa'i dbyen bgyisanas/ mnar med pa'i kha namatho bsazhing mtshams med pa'i khan ma tho ba'i las kyis reg par 'gyur lags/ nye bar
'khor 'diltar dge slong chos ma yin pa la chos m yin pa'i 'du shes dang/ dbyen la chos mayin pa'i 'du shes kyis dge slong rnams la go bar byed/ kun tu go bar byed/ slob par byed/ 'dzin du
'jug par byed cing/ dge 'dunagyi dbyen bya ba'i phyir pha rol gnonapar byed na/ 'di tsam gyisanar bar 'khor dge slong gisanyanathosakyi dge 'dun mthun pa'i dbyen byas nas/ mnar med pa'i kha
namatho bsazhing mtshams med pa'i khan ma tho ba'i lasakyis reg par 'gyur ro// nye bar 'ong 'di ltar dge slong gis chos ma yin pa la chos r yin pa'i 'dushes dang/ dbyenal chos kyi 'dug
kyis dge slong rnams l go bar byed/ kun tu go bar byed/ slob bar byed/ 'dzin du 'jug bar byed cing/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen bya ba'i phyir pha rol gnon par byed na/ 'ditsam gyis na nye bar
'khor ngage slong nyan thos kyidage 'dun mthun pa'i dbyen byas nas/ mnar med pa'i kha na ma tho ba skyo zhing mtshams med ba'i khan ma tho ba'i las kyisan reg par mi 'gyur ro// nye bar 'khora'adi
ltar dge slong gis chos ma yin pa la chos ma yin pa'i 'du shes dang/ dbyen la yid gnyis kyis dge slong rnams la go bar byed/ kun tu ge bar byed/ slob par byed/ 'dzin du 'jugapar byed
cing dge 'dun gyi dbyen byaba'i phyir pha rol gnon par byed na/ 'di tsam gyis na bar 'khor dge slong nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun pa'i dbyen byas nas/ mnar medwapa'i kha na ma thob
zhing mtshams med pa'i khamam tho ba'i las kyis ni reg par mi 'gyur ro// nye bar 'khor 'di ltar dge slong gis chos m naphal chos kyi 'du shes dang/ dbyen la chos ma yin pa'i 'du shes
kyis dge slong rnams 'go bar byed/ kun tu gobar byed/ slob pa ra byed/ 'dzin du 'jug bar byed cing/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen bya ba'i phyirab rol gnon bar byengan/ 'di tsam gyis na nye bar 'khor dge
slong nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun ba'idabyenabyas nas/ mnar med pa'i khanam tho ba zhing mtshams med pa'i khan ma tho ba'i las kyi rig par 'gyur ro// rtsa bar 'khor 'di ltar dge slong gis chos ma
yin b lachos kyi 'du shes dang/ dbyen la chos kyi 'du shes kyis dge slong rnams l gobar byed/ kun tu go bar byed/ slob par byed/ 'dzin du 'jug par byed cing/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen bya ba'i phyir

pha rol gnon bar byed na/ 'di tsam gyisan bar 'khor dgeslong nyan thos kyi dge 'dunam sbyin pa'i dbyenabyas nas/ mnar med pa'i kha nam tho bskya zhing mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho ba'i las kyisan rig
par mi 'gyur ro// 'bar 'khor 'diltar dge slong gis chos ma yin pa la chos kyi 'du shes dang/ dbyen la yid gnyis kyis dge slong rnams la go bar byed/ kun tu go bar byed/ slob pa ra/

byed da'adzin du 'jug par byed cing/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen bya ba'i phyir kha rol gnon par byed na/'di tsam gyisan 'bar 'khor dge slong nyan thos kyidage 'dun mthun pa'i dbyen byas nas/mnar med pa'i khan ma tho ba skye

zhing mtshamasamed pa'i kha na ma tho ba'i las kyis rig pa ra mi 'gyur ro// nye bar 'khor 'diltar dge slong gis chos lachos ma min pa'i 'du shes dang/ dbyen 'chos ma yin pa'i 'du shes kyis dge slong rnams gopar

byed kun tu go bar byed/ slob par byed/ 'dzin du'ajug bar byed cing/ dge slong dge 'dun gyi dbyenabya ba'i phyir ba rol gnon par byungan/ 'ditsamagyisan nye bar 'khong dge slong nyan thos kyidage 'dun mthun pa'i dbyen byas

nas mnar med pa la kha ma tho ba skyo zhing mtshams med pa'i khanam tho ba'i las kyis reg par 'gyur ro// zhu bar 'khor 'dir dge slong gis chos la chos ma yin pa'i 'du shes dang/ dbyen la chos kyi 'du shes

kyis dge slong rnams 'go bar byed/ kun tu go bar byed/slob bar byed/'dzin du 'jug par byed cing// dge 'dunagyi dbyen ba'i phyi parol gnon par byed na 'di tsam gyis na che bar 'khor dge slong nyan thos kyi dge 'dun

mthun pa'i dbyenabyas nas/ mnar mang pa'i 'anamatho bskyo zhing mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho ba'i las kyis ni rig par mi'agyuyo// nye bar 'khor 'diltar dge slong gis chos la chos ma yin pa'i 'du shesadang/

dbyen la yid gnyis kyis dge slong rnams la go bar byed/ kun tu go bar byed/ slob par byed/'dzin du 'jug par byed cing/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen bya ba'i phyir pa rol gnon par byed na/ 'di tsam gyisam bar 'khor dge slong

nyan thos kyidage 'dunamathun pa'i dbyenang nas/ mnar med pa'i kha na mtho nga skye zhing mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho ba'i las kyis ni rig par mi 'gyur ro// dan bar 'khor 'di ltar dge slong gis chos la

chos kyi 'du shes dang/ dbyena' chos ma yin pa'i 'du shes kyis dge slong rnams la go bar byed/ kun tu go bar byed/ slob par byed/ 'dzin du 'jug par byed cing/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen bya ba'i phyir pha rol gnon

par byed na/ 'ditsabagyisan nye bar 'khor dge slong nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun pa'i dbyen byas nas/ mnar med pa'i lan ma tho ba skye zhing mtshams med pa'i khan ma tho ba'i las kyis reg par 'gyur ro//
nye bar 'khor 'di ltar dge slong gis chos la chos kyi 'du shes dang/ dbyin la chos kyi'adu shes kyis dge slong rnams la go bar byed/ kun tu go bar byed/ slob par byed/ 'dzin du 'jug par byed cing/

dge 'dun gyi dben bya ba'i phyirapha rol gnon par byed na/ 'ditsam gyis na nye bar 'khoradage slong nyanathos kyi dge 'dun mthun pa'i dbyen byas nas/ mnar med pa'i khanamatho bskyo zhing mtshamasamed pa'i
khanam tho pa'i las kyis ni reg par mi 'gyur ro// ltabar la khor 'di ltar dge slong gis chos la chos kyi 'dushes dang/ dbyen la yid gnyis kyis dge slong rnams 'go bar byed/ kun tu go bar byed//
slob par byed/'dzin du 'jug par byed cing/ dge 'dun gyi dpyan bya ba'i phyir pha rolaganon par byed na/ 'ditsam gyisan nye bar 'khor dge slopanyan thos kyidage 'dun mthun pa'i dbyin byas/

nas mnar med pa'i kha na ma tho ba skye zhing mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho ba'i las kyis ni rig par mi 'gyur ro// nye bar 'khor 'di ltar dage slong gis chos ma yin pa la yid gnyis dang/ dbyenal chos
ma yin pa'i'adu shesakyis dge slong rnams la go bar byed/ kun tu go bar byed/ slob par byed/ 'dzinadu'ajug bar byed cing/ dge 'dun gyi dbyenabya ba'i phyir pha rol gnon par byed na/ 'di tsam gyisan
bar 'khoradage slong nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun pa'i dbyen byas nas/ mnang med pa'i kha rnam thob skye zhing mtshams med pa'i kha rnam tho ba'i las kyis ni reg par 'gyur ro// 'bara 'khor 'di ltar
dge slong gi chos ma yin pa la yi deganyisadang/ dbyen la chos kyi 'du shes kyis dge slong rnams la go bar byed/ kun tu go bar byed/ slob par byed/ 'dzin du 'jug par byed cing/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen bya

ba'i phyirapha rol gnon pa byed na/ 'di tsamagyisan nye bar 'khor dge slong nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun pa'i dbyen byas nas/ mnar med pa'i kha na ma tho ba skye zhing mtshamasamed pa'i khar ma tho ba'i las kyis/
ni rig par mi 'gyur ro// nyebar 'khor 'di ltar dge slong gisachos ma yin pa la yid gnyis dang/ dbyen la yid gnyis kyis dge slong rnams la go bar byed/ kun tugo bar byed/ slob par byed/

radzin du 'jug par byed cing/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen bya ba'i phyir pha rol gnonapa byed na/ 'ditsam gyis na nye bar 'khor ngage slong nyan thos kyi dge 'dunam thunaba'i dbyen byas nas/ mnar mang pa'i khanam tho ba

skye zhing mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho ba'i las kyis ni reg bar mi 'gyur ro// nye bar 'khor 'di ltar dge slong gis chos la yid gnyis dang// dbye ba chos ma yin pa'i 'du shes kyis dge slong rnams la
go bar byed/ kun tu go bar byed/ slob par byed/ 'dzin du 'jug par byed cing dge 'dunagyi dbyenabya ba'i phyir pha rol gnon nga byang na/ 'di tsam gyisan nye bar 'khor dge slong nyan thos kyidage 'dun
mthun pa'i dbyen byas nas/ mnar med pa'i kha na ma tho ba skye zhing mtshams med pa'i 'dam tho ba'i las kyis ni rig par 'gyur ro// lubar 'khor 'dultar dge slongagis chos la yid gnyis dang/ dbyen

lachos kyi 'du shes kyis dge slong rnams la gobar byed/ kun tu go bar byed/ slob par byed 'dzin du 'jug par byed cing/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen byuba'i phyir pha rol gnon pa byed na/ 'di tsam gyis na rna bar
'khor dgoslong nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun pa'i dbyen byas nas/ mnar med pa'i kha na ma thob skye zhing mtshams med pa'i kha nam thoba'i lasakyis ni rig par ma'agyur ro// nye bar 'khor 'di ltar
dge slong gis chos la yid gnyis dang/ dbyen la yid gnyis kyis dge slong rnams la go bar byed/ kun tu go bar byed/ slob par byed/ 'dzin du 'jug par byed cing// dge 'dun mthun pa'i
tsa bya @#// dbyen bya ba'i phyir pha rol gnon par byed na/ 'di tsam gyisan bar 'khor dge slong nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun pa'i dbyin byas nas// mnar med pa'i kha na ma tho ba skye zhing
mtshamasamad pa'i gnam tho ba'i lasakyis ni rig par mi 'gyur ro de ltar na de dag nimu bco brgyad du 'gyur la/ dadag las drug la ni mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho ba'i las kyis reg par 'gyur
spyi ti byon la chos ma yin par 'du shes ba gang dag yin pa// lhag ma rnams na mtshams mad pa'i khanam blo ba'i las kyis reg pa mi 'gyur ro// dge 'dun gyi dbyenagyi gzhi rdzogs te//
